
1a1(mdo 'grel): brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las glegs bam gnyis pa bzhugs/
1b1(mdo 'grel): da ni b+hU la sogs pa byings At+ma ne'i tshig can rnams la/ rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga
1b2(mdo 'grel): 'chad par bya ste/ e d+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga rnams b+hU
1b3(mdo 'grel): thob pa la'o zhes pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha te/ e d+ha la laT shab rjes 'brel phyis nas la/
1b4(mdo 'grel): ta ta las a phyung/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e/ tra drangs pa'o/ /e d+he te/ e d+ha la shap laT/ la A hwaM tra las A ma phyung/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e drang/ At kyi nga
2a1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba la 'os A i yra wa ya dag gi wa la la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ i mtshams sbyar/ e d+han+te/ e d+ha la/ shap laT la dzha dzha las a byung/ dzha'i an+ta/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi
2a2(mdo 'grel): mdza' e/ at kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ laTa'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha se/ e d+ha la/ shap laT lra thAs thAs kyi se
2a3(mdo 'grel): 'os thA sa se/ e d+he the/ e d+ha la/ shas laD lra A thAM las a'em phyung/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e aT kyi nga 'gro ba la 'os A i yra? wa ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis i mtshams sbyar/
2a4(mdo 'grel): e d+ha d+hwe/ e d+ha la/ shap laT la d+hwaM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he e d+ha la/ shap laT la eT Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e at kyi yon tan la bos
2b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ a d+hA ba he/ e d+ha la/ shab laT la wa 'dir? ma nyid/ Da 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e/ at kyi yat la ring po 'os/ a ring por song/ e d+ha ma he/ e d+ha la ling/ shap/
2b2(mdo 'grel): ling gi sI yus 'os/ sI yuT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha la shap 'di laT 'di la sI yuT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don wa ya dag gi bal+la 'os ya phyis/ ling gi mdza' ma
2b3(mdo 'grel): yin pa ris? 'byi 'os sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he ta/ ed+ha la shap li la A tAM tu bsgyur sI yuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa byis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he yA tAM/ e d+he ran/ e
2b4(mdo 'grel): d+he la shap lang pa dzha kI yuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshan sbyar/ dzha'i ngan 'os dzha ran/ wa ya dag gis khal la dbyi 'os sa phyis/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he thA(mdo 'grel): e d+ha
2b5(mdo 'grel): la shap ling la thAs sI yuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mdza' ma yin ba sogs kyis sa byis la yang dag ga bal la dbyi 'os sa phyis/ e d+he yA thAM/ ed+ha la shab ling la A bI se yuT ling gi mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he
3a1(mdo 'grel): d+hwaM/ e d+ha la ling shap la d+hwaM sI yuT ling gi mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis/ pa ya zhes pas sa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he ya/ e
3a2(mdo 'grel): d+ha la shap ling la ar sI yuT rjes 'brel gyis i Ta'i at 'os iT at sa phyis mchams sbyar/ e d+he ba hi/ e d+ha la shap/ ling/ la ba hi dang ma heng du bsgyur/ sI yuT rjes
3a3(mdo 'grel): 'brel gyis wa ya dag gis zhes pas ya phyis/ ling gi mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he ma hi/ e d+ha la loT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum
3a4(mdo 'grel): la/ e d+ha tAM/ e d+ha la shap loT la ta Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e et kyi A ma 'os es Am/ e d+he tAM/ e d+ha la shap loT la? A tA ma Ata kyi nga 'gro ba la 'os
3a5(mdo 'grel): A i ya i mtshams sbyar ba ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e et kyi am 'os slar yang Am du log/ e d+han+tAM/ e d+ha la laT ladzha dzha'i yan+ta 'os
3b1(mdo 'grel): dzha an+ta Ta 'gro ba la sogs kyi mdza' e e ta kyi A ma 'os e A ma at kyis yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha swa/ e d+ha la shap loT la
3b2(mdo 'grel): thas thAs kyi se 'os thAs se sa wa dag la ba am dag gos/ e wa/ e d+he thAM/ e d+ha la shap loT la A thAm At kyi da ti la 'os/ A e ya ba ya dag gi zhas pas ya phyis/ i mtshams sbyar/ Ta 'gro ba sogs
3b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mdza' e et kyi Am 'os e sAr Am/ e d+ha d+hwaM/ e d+ha la shap loT la d+hwo Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e sa bdag la pa aM dag dgos/ e slar yang Am/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e dzhe/ e
3b4(mdo 'grel): d+ha la shap loT la iT Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e it kyi i 'os e i ru bsgyur phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas/ AT a ka 'dra ba la ring po e tsa'i 'phal ba byas/ e d+hA ba he/ e d+ha la shap loT la wa hi dang ma hing du bsgyur
3b5(mdo 'grel): Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' a eT kyi i 'os aM i phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas/ AT Ta gnas don ak 'dra ba la ring po/ e d+ha ma he/ e d+ha ba he/ e d+ha la lang sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ i d+ha
3b6(mdo 'grel): ? e d+ha ? lang la ta a tsa dang po rnams kyi aT pos byings la AT/ Ta gnas don/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ i d+he tAM ed+ha la shap lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba la A tA ma da 'gro ba la At kyis 'os
4a1(mdo 'grel): A i a wa ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ i d+han+ta e d+ha la shap lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba/ ladzha dzha'i An+ta 'os dzha An+ta/ at kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis gnyis dag gis gcig pha
4a2(mdo 'grel): rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha thA/ e d+ha la shap/ lang la thAs byings la/ AT dang 'phel la/ i d+he thAM e d+ha la shap lang byings la/ AT dang 'phel ba la A thAM/ nga 'gro ba la At
4a3(mdo 'grel): kyis 'os A i ya ba ya dag gis bal la 'os/ A phyis mtshams sbyar/ i d+hA d+hwaM/ e d+ha la shap lang byings la Ata dang 'phel ba la d+hwaM du bsgyur/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he/ e d+ha la shap lang byings
4a4(mdo 'grel): la Ata 'phelba la iT ru bsgyur mtshams sbyar/ e d+hA ba hi/ e d+ha la shap lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba la wa hi dang ma hid du bsgyur at kyi yat la ring po 'os ring po/ i d+hA ma hi/ e d+ha la lung/ lung la tsli
4a5(mdo 'grel): 'os/ tsli byin/ tsli'i tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ atsa dang po'i AT 'os byings la AT/ AT las kyang 'os 'phel ba dang/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT sbyor ba sogs byas
4a6(mdo 'grel): pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ i d+hiSh+Ta/ la ta ru bsgyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa kha Tu la kha Tu 'os ta Ta/ i d+hi ShA tAM/ la A tAM du bsgyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ i d+hi Sha ta/ la dzA ru
4b1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur dzha las a phyung nas/ atsha ne pa da rnams la at+ma yin pa las so/ /dzha a ta du bsgyur/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i d+haSh+Thi(mdo 'grel): la thAs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os za ba/ i d+hi ShA
4b2(mdo 'grel): thAM/ la A thAM kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ i d+hi d+hwaM/ la d+hi d+ha la'ang ngos sa phyis i Ta'i gdam da 'os d+ha rang gan 'as sam yang na Dha/ i d+hi d+hwaM/ skyes pu phyi ma gsum la/ i
4b3(mdo 'grel): d+hi Shi/ la iT du bsgyur/ i d+hi Shwa hi/ la ba hi ru bsgyur/ i ma d+hiSh+ma hi/ lam ting du bsgyur/ e d+ha la/ liT/ rits+tsha ma yin pa'i i tsa dang/ po las kyang lci ba ldan pa las so zhes
4b4(mdo 'grel): pas/ byings mthar A ma sbyar A ma las sos liT yang 'jig pas/ e d+hwaM zhes pas grub/ de la kraMnya sags sbyar dgos/ A ma pra tya ya batkraM nyo nu pra yo ga syA/ rkyen A ma
4b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin kri nya rjes su sbyar ba'i 'o/ /Am gyi rjes su sbyor ba'i kri b+hU as gsum las/ e d+ha lta bu byings At+ma ne pa da can la Am sbyar ba yin kyang /b+hU dang as gnyis ba
4b6(mdo 'grel): smai'i tshig can yin pas liT pa ra smai'i pa nga'i rkyen rnams sbyor ba kho na yin la/ krinya gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ Am sbyor yul gyi byings de at+ma ne pa da can yin na snga ma dang 'dra
4b7(mdo 'grel): bar krinya at+ma ne'i rkyen can sbyor bar byed la/ byings da pa ra smai pa de can yin na krinya yang pa ra smai pa da'i rkyen tsan sbyar bar bya ste/ e d+haM la b+hu dang as sbyar ba la/ e d+hwaM ba b+hU ba/ i d+hU mA sa/
5a1(mdo 'grel): krinya sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hwaM tsakre/ kril/ laMTa?/ liT la byings Ab+hyA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod ri'i a ta 'os ata du bsgyur/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os kai tse la ta ? la sbyur/
5a2(mdo 'grel): li Ta'i dzha dag gi e sha i re tsa 'os/ ta e sha sha phyig a ka ki a tsa la yaN/ e d+haM tsakrA te/ la A tAM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e/ e d+hwaM tsa kri re/ kri la liT byings gnyis brjod rI'i a 'os ri a ku har ba
5a3(mdo 'grel): gi tsu 'os ka tsa la d+ha ru bsgyur/ liTa'i tadzha dag gi e sha i re tsa 'os dzha i re tsa ru bsgyur/ tsa dbyangs don a ki gi a tsa la ya Na byas pa'o/ /skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la /a d+hwaM tsakri She /la thAs?
5a4(mdo 'grel): su bsgyur thAs kyi se 'os thAs se kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ e d+hwaM tsa kra the/ la A thAM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mthal aM /i ka gi a tsa la yaN/ skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ i Na(mdo 'grel): ShI d+hwaM
5a5(mdo 'grel): lung la TIM d+hau nya/ n+tAt/ iN mdza' las ShI d+hwaM lung liT rnams kyi dti 'i 'o/ /byings i Na so sor bsdu pa'i mdza' las pha rol gyi smon pa'i ling gi sI d+hwaM dang lung liT rnams kyi d+ha yig ni Dha yig tu ba
5a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te /e d+hwaM tsa kri d+hwe /kri la laT byings gnyis brjod/ di'i at 'os ri a ku ha dag gi cu 'os ka tsa la d+h+ra? Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' ya/ mad? 'dis d+haDha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hwaM tsakri/ la iD
5a7(mdo 'grel): ru bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e/ e d+hwaM tsakra ba he/ la ba hi dang ma hid du bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mdza' a/ e d+hAM tsa kri ma ha/ e d+ha la lu Ta wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po
5b1(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ e d+hI tA/ e d+hi tA rau/ e d+hi tA ra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i d+hi tA se/ e d+ha la luT tAs la thAs su bsgyur thAs kyi se 'os thAs se/ tAs asti dag gis dbyi 'os tAs kyis sa phyis wa la dang po'i iT /i d+hi tA sA the/ la A
5b2(mdo 'grel): thA ma du bsgyur /Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e e/ la d+hi tAd+hE d+hwaM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e d+ha la 'ang ngos tAs kyis sa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hi tA he/ e d+hal luT tA sa la iT ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi i i et
5b3(mdo 'grel): la ha 'os su dpal? dang po'i iT/ e d+he tA swa he /la ba hi dang ma nyid du bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' e/ e d+hi tAsma ha/ e d+ha la smon pa'i ling sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hai ShISh+TA/ e d+hi ShA yastAM/
5b4(mdo 'grel): e d+haM ShI ran/ skyes bu dbus maM gsum la /e d+he ShISh+Tha(mdo 'grel): e d+hi ShI yas+thaM/ /e d+hiShI hUMM/ e d+hi ShI DhaM /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la /la yid ru bsgyur /li Ta'i a ta 'os/ it at /e d+hi ShI ya e d+hi ShI pa ha/ e d+hi ShI
5b5(mdo 'grel): ma hi /e d+he la lriT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hi Sh+ya te/ e d+hi Sh+ye te/ a d+hi Sh+yan+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la /e d+hi Sh+ya se /e d+hi sh+ye the /e d+hi Sh+ya d+hE /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hi Sh+ye/ e d+hi Sh+ya pa he/
5b6(mdo 'grel): e d+hi Sh+yA ma he /e d+ha la /lring/ a tsa dang po'i AT 'os byings la AT /aT las kyang ngos/ 'phel ba /sya sbyor ba sogs byas pas /skyes bu dang po gsum la/
5b7(mdo 'grel): i d+hi Sh+ya ta /e d+haM Sh+ye tAM/ i d+haM Sh+yan+ta /skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i d+hi Sh+ya thA /i d+hi Sh+ye d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la /i d+hi Sh+ya d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la /i d+hi Sh+ye /i d+hi Sh+yar ba hi /i 
6a1(mdo 'grel): d+hi Sh+yA ma hi sogs te /cho ga phal cher b+hU thob pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ` /iT k+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs at+ma
6a2(mdo 'grel): Te pa da rnams sbyor ba'i cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ` /da nga sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas cho ga yang liTa'i skabs ma gtogs e b+ha'i skabs dang 'dra
6a3(mdo 'grel): ste/ laT la/ da da te/ da de te/ da dAn+te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ da de ha/ da de yA tAM/ da da ra na sogs so/ /loT la/ da de tAM/ da de tAM/ da den+ta sogs so/ /
6a4(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a da da ta/ a da de tA/ a da da nAM/ sogs so/ lung la/ a da diSh+TA/ a da daShI tAM/ a da di Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ byings gnyis brjod pa dang wal dang po
6a5(mdo 'grel): la iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da da de/ da da dA tA/ da da di ro/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da da di She/ da da dA the/ da da di d+hwe/ da
6a6(mdo 'grel): da di Dhwe?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da da de/ da da di ba he/ da da di ma hi sogs te/ 'dir sha sha/ da da/ pa dang po sogs kyi mdos/ A b+hyA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs mi byed do/ /luT la byings phyed pa'i
6a7(mdo 'grel): bal khA? btul? iT 'os iT sbyar bas/ da di tA/ da di tA rau/ da di tA ra/ da di tA se/ da di tA sA the /da di tA d+hwa/ da di tA phyA da da'i tA swa he/ da da tA swa he/ smon pa'i ling la 'ang iT sbyar ba'i/ /da di ShI yastAM/ da di
6b1(mdo 'grel): ShI ran sogs so/ /lriT la wa dang bo'i iT dang sya tA sa zhes pas/ sya sbyin pas/ da di Sh+ya te/ da di Sh+ye te/ da de Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lriT la a da di Sh+ya ta/ a da di Sh+ye tAM/ /a da di Sh+yen+ta sogs so/ /ShweSh+ka 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs at+ma ne
6b2(mdo 'grel): pa da rnams sbyar /cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ 'dir sub kyi byings sogs kyi byings kyis dang po'i Sha ser mi 'gyur te/ laT la/ ShwaSh+ka te/ ShwaSh+kan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ ShwaSh+ke ta/ ShweSh+ka yastAM/ ShwaSh+ke ran sogs so/ /loT la/ ShwaSh+ka tAM/ ShwaSh+ke tAM/ ShwaSh+kan+taM sogs so/ /
6b3(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a ShwaSh+ka ta/ a ShwaSh+ka tAM/ a ShwaSh+kan+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a ShwaSh+kiSh+Ta/ a ShwaSh+ki ShA tAM/ a ShwaSh+ka Sha ta sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Sha ShwaSh+kAke/ ShaShwaSh+kA te/ Sha ShwaSh+ki ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sha ShwaSh+ki She
6b4(mdo 'grel): Sha ShwaSh+ki She/ Sha ShwaSh+ke d+hwe/ Sha ShwaSh+ki Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Sha ShwaSh+ke/ Sha ShwaSh+ki ba he/ Sha ShwaSh+ki ma he /luT la/ iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la ShwaSh+ki tA/ ShwaSh+ki tA rau/ Shwa Sh+ki tA ra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ShwaSh+ki hA se/ ShwaSh+ki hA sA the/
6b5(mdo 'grel): ShwaSh+ka hA d+hwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ShwaSh+ki tA he/ ShwaSh+ki tAsma he/ smon pa'i ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ShwaSh+ki ShISh+Te/ ShwaSh+ki ShI yastAM/ ShwaSh+ki Shi ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ShwaSh+ki ShI Sh+Tha/ ShwaSh+ki ShI yA s+thAM/ ShwaSh+ki ShI d+hwaM/ Shwa Sh+ki ShI DhwaM /skyes
6b6(mdo 'grel): bu phyi ma gsum la/ ShwaSh+ki ShI ya/ ShwaSh+ki ShI ma he/ lriT la/ sya dang wal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/ Shwa Sh+ki Sh+ya te/ ShwaSh+ki Sh+ye te/ ShwaSh+ki Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lriT la/ a ShwaSh+ki Sh+ya ta/ a ShwaSh+ki Sh+ye tAM// a ShwaSh+ki Sh+yan+ta/ sogs
6b7(mdo 'grel): so/ ` ri dza/ 'gro ba la ste gnas pa la 'ang ngo zhes pa la/ laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga snga ma dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ardza te/ ardze te/ ardza n+te sogs so/ /ling la/ ardze ta/ ardze yA tAM/ Ardze ran sogs so/ /loT la/ ardza tAM/ ardze
7a1(mdo 'grel): tAM/ ardzan+taM sogs so/ /lang la/ Ardza ta/ Ardze tAM/ Ardzan+ta sogs so/ /lud la/ bal dang po'i iT dang tsla? si tsa ru bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ Ardzi Sh+Ta/ ardzi ShA tAM/ Ardzi Shat sogs so/ /liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ ri'i
7a2(mdo 'grel): at 'os/ ri a dang dang po'i at kyi ring po de la nuT ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A nri dzA te/ A Nri dza te/ A nri rdi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A nri dze She/ A nri dze d+hwe/ A nri dzi Dhwa/ skyes bu phyi
7a3(mdo 'grel): ma gsum la A nri dze/ A nri dzi ba he/ A nri dzi ma he/ luT la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang tAs sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ ardzi tA/ ardzi tA rau/ ardzi tA ra/ ardzi tA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ardzi ShISh+Ta/ ardzi ShA yastaM/ ardzi ShI ran soD
7a4(mdo 'grel): so/ /lriT la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang sya tAs dag lri luT dag la 'os sya sbyar bas/ ardzi Sh+ya te/ ardzi Sh+ye tAM/ ardzi Sh+ya n+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lrid la/ Ardzi Sh+ya ta/ Ardzi Sh+ye tAM/ Ardzi Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ` /ti je rno ba la ste bzod pa la yang zheS
7a5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ gup ti dzi ki ta rnams las san 'os/ san san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis bdod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os dza gong ma phyis/ tsu ku 'os/ dza ga/ /bar la tsar 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ ka Sha 'dus
7a6(mdo 'grel): pa k+Sha /ti tik+Sha/ zhes bsgrubs pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ti ti k+Sha te/ ti ti k+She te/ ti ti Shan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ ti tik+Sha te/ ti tik+She yA tAM/ ti ti k+Sha ran sogs so/ /loT la/ ti ti k+Sha tAM/ ti ti k+She tAM/ ti tak+Shin+tAM soD so/ lang la/ a ti tik+Sha ta/
7a7(mdo 'grel): a ti tik+She tAM/ a ti? byed pa po la sha ba rjes 'brel phyis nas a ha kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ tik+Shan+ta sogs so/ /lung la byings phyed pa'i wal dang po la i Ta 'os/ iT byin/ at kyi dbyi'o/ /byings mdza' i a dbyi
7b1(mdo 'grel): ba sogs byas pas/ a ti tik+ShiSh+Ta/ a ti tik+She ShA tAM/ a ti ti k+Shi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs rkyen sogs kyis byings mthar A ma sbyar/ a ma las sos/ liT 'jig/ krinya sogs sbyar bas/ ti tik+ShAM tsakre/ ti tik+ShAM pa b+hU ba/ ti tik+ShAm la sogs so/ /luT la/
7b2(mdo 'grel): wal dang po'i iT dang/ at kyi dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ ti tik+Shi tA/ ti tik+Sha tA rau/ ti tik+Shi tAr/ ti tik+Shi tA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la 'ang/ ti ti k+Shi ShISh+Ta/ ti tik+Shi ShI yastAM/ ti tik+Shi ShI ra na sogs so/ /lriT la'ang khyings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iT dang/
7b3(mdo 'grel): sya tAs dag ces pas/ sya sbyar bas/ ti tik+Shi Sh+ya te/ ti tik+Shi Sh+ye te/ ti tik+Shi Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a ti tik+Shi Sh+ya ta/ a ti tik+Shi Sh+ye tAM/ a ta tak+Shi Sh+yan+tA sogs so/ ` /Shany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang go'i Sha'i sa
7b4(mdo 'grel): 'os Shas/ danrna? sany+dza swany+dza rnams kyi shap la 'os na dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ laT la/ swa dza te/ swa dze te/ swa dzan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ swa dza ta/ swa dze yA hAM/ swa dze ran sogs so/ /loT la/ swa dza tAM/ swa dze hA/ swa dzanhAM sogs pa dang/ lang la/ a swa
7b5(mdo 'grel): dza tA/ aswa dze tAM/ a swa dzAn+ta sogs so/ /lung la iT me 'jug/ tsli si tsa ru bsgyur/ dzhal las dzhal la dbyi ba dang/ tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lung gi skyes bu dang lo gsum la/ a swaM?k+tA/ a swi k+Sha tAM/ a swaMk+Sha tAM/
7b6(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a swaMk+tha/ a swak+Shi tAM/ a swaMgd+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a swaMk+Shi/ a swaMk+Sha hi/ a swak+Sh+ma haM/ laT la/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ swa dzi(mdo 'grel): saM yo gA da pi li To ba ki tAM/ swany+dza las brtsegs pa las kyang li Ta'i kit yang na'o/ /swany+dza
7b7(mdo 'grel): dang brtsegs ba las kyang pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams ni/ yang na ka 'gro pa'i ming can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni/ it 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyi kiti la na dbyi ba dang yon tan sogs yang na bar
8a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i don te/ kit kyi phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa swa dzE/ sa swa dzA te/ sa swa dzI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa swa dze She /sa swa dza the/ sa swa dzi d+hwe/ sa swa dzi Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa swa dze/ sa swa dzi ba he/ sa
8a2(mdo 'grel): swa dzi ma he/ kit kyi brda chad ma byas pa'i phyogs las kyang na mi dbyi ba ma gtogs gzhan 'dra ste/ sa swany+dzA te /sa saswany+dza te/ sa swany+dzi de sogs so/ /luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dzra gra/ khar la tsa ra 'os/ ga kar bsgyur bas/ swaMk+tA swaMk+tA rau/ swaMk+tA ra/ swaMk+tA
8a3(mdo 'grel): si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ tsu'i ku dang/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sI yu Ta'i sa Sha /ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha sogs byas pas/ saMk+ShISh+Ta/ saM k+ShA yastAM/ saMk+Shi ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ tsu'i ku dang/ khar la tsar/
8a4(mdo 'grel): kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ swaM k+Sh+ya te/ swa k+Sh+ye te/ swaMk+Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a swaMk+Sh+ya ta/ a swaMk+Sh+ye tAM/ a swi k+Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ ` /swa dza te'i sngon du nyer bsgyur ni sbyor na/ pa re ni bi rnams la sogs kyis Shar
8a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ ni Sha dza te/ sogs so/ /si pA dI nI wAT bya pA ye 3 pi/ si ba la sogs pa rnams kyi aT bar na yod pa la'ang yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur pa ri ni bi rnams las sib la sogs ba ste/ Shi bu thags 'thag pa/ Shah gus pa/
8a6(mdo 'grel): nges par 'byung par byed tU? nya stong pa/ Shwany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa rnams dang suT A ga ma'i sa yig rnams ni/ AT A ga ma bar na yod kyang Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ n+ya Sha dza ta/ n+ya swa dza ta/ sogs te/ lang gi rjes so/ /sa di sany+dzyo(mdo 'grel): pa ra sya li Ti/ sa di swany+dza
8a7(mdo 'grel): dag gi pha rol gyi liT la'o/ /sa di ste Sha bla rnam par 'gyur ba dang/ 'gro ba dang /kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o dang/ Shwany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa dag la liT byin pas/ byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+hya sa'i ming can de las pha rol gyis ni/ pa?
8b1(mdo 'grel): ri ni mi rnams sngon ma las kyang khar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ni Sha swa dze 'aM/ ne Sha swany+dze/ sogs so/ ` /tra pU Sha ngo tshab la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs sbyar/ u dang ShA rjes 'brel/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la/ shab dang byings byed pa
8b2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi wal dang po la a'u 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas laT la/ tra pa te/ tra pe te/ tra pan+te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ tra pe ta/ tra pe ya tAM/ tra pe ran/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tra pa tAM/ tra pen+tAM/ tra pan+tAM/ sogs so/ /
8b3(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a tra pa ta/ a tra pe tAM/ a tra pan ta/ sogs so/ /lung la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a tra piSh+Ta/ a tra pi Sha tAM/ a tra pi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ a trapta/ a trapsa tAM/ a trapsa ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ trI pa
8b4(mdo 'grel): la b+ha dza tra pa las kyang zhes pa'i mdos/ /a b+hya sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tre pe/ tre pA te/ tre pi ri/ sogs so/ /luT la/ wal dang po'i iT yang na bar byas pas/ tra pi tA/ sogs sam/ traptA sogs so/ /smon pa'i
8b5(mdo 'grel): ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ tri piShASh+Ti/ tra pi ShI yastAM/ tre pi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ trapsISh+Te/ trapsI yastAM/ trapsI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang iT yang na par byas pas/ tra pi Sh+ya te/ tra pi Sh+ye te/
8b6(mdo 'grel): tra pi Sh+yan+te/ sogs sam/ trassya te/ trapsya te/ trapsyarte?/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a tra pi Sh+ya ta/ a tra pi Sh+ye tAM/ a tra pi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs sam/ a trapsya ta/ a trapsye tAM/ a trapsyan+ta/ sogs so/ /ri da dza b+ho ra tsi/ ra b+hi dza b+ha dag gi a tsa
8b7(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /ra d+ha 'tshe ba dang dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa dag gi rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ ` /dza b+ha la laT sogs sbyar/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la sha pa dang phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la iT sbyor?
9a1(mdo 'grel): ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ dzam+b+ha b+ha te/ dzam+b+he te/ dzam+b+han+te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ dzam+b+he ta/ dzam+b+he yA tAM/ dzam+b+he ran/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dzam+b+ha tAM/ dzam+b+he tAM/ dzam+b+han+tAM/ lang la a dzam+b+ha ta/ a dzan+te tAM/ a ?
9a2(mdo 'grel): lung la /a dzam+b+hiSh+Ta/ a dzam+b+hi ShA tAM/ a dzam+b+ha ShA tAM/ a dzam+b+hi Sha ta/ so so/ /iT la/ dza dzam+b+he/ dza dza m+b+he te/ dza dzam+b+hi re/ sogs su/ luT la/ dzam+b+hi tA/ dzam+b+hi tA rau/ dzam+bi tA ra/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzam+b+hi ShISh+Ta/ dzam+b+ha ShI ye stAM/ dzam+b+hi ShI ra ni soD
9a3(mdo 'grel): so/ /liT la/ dzam+b+hi? Sh+ya te/ dzam+b+hi Sh+ya te/ dzam+b+ha Sh+yan te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a dzam+b+hi Sh+ya ta/ a dzam+b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ a dzam+b+hi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ /` /Sh+Tu b+ha brtan pa la'o zhes pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os
9a4(mdo 'grel): Shas/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas/ ta tar log/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la shab dang phyed pa rnams la iT sbyor pa sogs byas pas/ laT la/ sto b+ha te/ sto b+he te/ sto
9a5(mdo 'grel): b+haTte/ sogs so/ /ming la/ sto b+het/ sto b+he yA tAM/ sto b+he ran/ soD so/ /loT la/ sto b+ha hAM/ sto b+he tAM/ sto b+han+tA/ sogs so/ /lang la/ asto b+ha tA/ a sto b+he tAM/ asto b+han+ta/ /sogs so/ /lung la/ asto b+hiSh+Ta/ asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+han+ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/
9a6(mdo 'grel): asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+hi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ shar dang po sogs kyi a b+hya sa'i sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ tuSh+Tu b+he/ tuSh+Tu b+hA te/ tu Sh+Tu b+hi re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ sto b+hi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sto b+hi ShISh+Ta/ sto b+hi ShA?
9a7(mdo 'grel): yastAM/ sto b+hi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ sto b+hi Sh+ya te/ sto b+hi Sh+ye te/ sto b+hi Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ asto b+hi Sh+ya ta/ asto b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ asto b+hi Sh+ya n+ta /sogs so/ ` /pa Na tha snyad la ste bstod pa la'ang ngo zhes pa laD soD sbyar/ gu pA d+hU ba soD kyi byings
9b1(mdo 'grel): la/ a'e ya sbyor ba dang/ 'grel par At+ma ne pa da rnams la yang na bar bya'o zhes pa byung bas/ a ya sbyar ba'i phyoD kyi laT la/ pa NA ya te/ pa NA ye te/ pa NA yan+te/ sogs dang/ ling la/ pa NA ye tA/ pa NA ye ya tAM/ pa NA ye ran/ sogs so/ loT la/ pa NA
9b2(mdo 'grel): ya tAM/ pa NA ye tAM/ pa NA yan+tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a pa NA ya ta/ a ba NA ya tAM/ pa NA yan+ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ wal dang po'i iT dang/ aT kyi dbyi 'os byings mdza' i a phyis pas/ a pa NA yiSh+Ta/ a pa NA yi Sha tAM/ a la NA yi Sha ta/
9b3(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyi mdos am skyor ba sogs byas pas/ pa NA yaM tsakra/ pa NA yaM pa b+hu ba/ pa NA A mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ pa NA yi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pa NA yi ShISh+Ta/ pa NA yi ShI yastAM/ pa NA yi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /
9b4(mdo 'grel): lriT la/ pa tA yi Sh+ya te/ pa NA yi Sh+ye te/ pa NA yi Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a pa NA yi Sh+ya ta/ a pa NA yaM Sh+ye tAM/ a ba NA yi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ /a ya ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ pa NA te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ pa Ne ta sogs so/ /loT la/ pa Na tAM/
9b5(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lang la/ a pa Na ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a pa NiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ pe Ne/ pe NA te/ pe Ni re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ pa NI tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pa NI ShESh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ pa Ni Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring pa/ a pa Na
9b6(mdo 'grel): Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel pa Na rnam dbye at+ma ne can yin kyang skabs 'gar A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la pa rasmai pa da rnams kyang 'jug go /zhes bshad pas/ pa /NA ya ti sogs kyang 'byung ngo/ /ka mer+Nid/ ka mi las nir 'o/ /ka mu mdzes pa
9b7(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i ka mi las pha rol tu ning 'gyur te/ nga at+ma ne pa da 'jug pa'i don dang/ Na byings la 'phel ba'i don no/ /laT la/ byed pa po la shap yon tan sogs byas pas/ kA ma ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ ka ma ya te/
10a1(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loT la/ kA ma yaM tI/ sogs so/ lang la/ a kA ma ya ta/ sogs so/ /ka mu ya Ni sbyar bas kA sil lung/ lung tsli/ Ni/ sh+ri sogs kyis tsli tsang du bsgyur la ta/ ka mi tsang ta/ nau tsanglu? ba d+hA yA h+ra? swa(mdo 'grel): Ni la tsang la u pha? d+hA'i thung ngu'o//
10a2(mdo 'grel): Ni mdza' can gyi u ba d+hA tsli bsgyur ba'i tsang pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ kA thung ngur song/ tsang la'o zhes bas byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gis tsu? 'os/ tsag/ tsag mi?/ tsang ta /zhes pa byung/ san l+la g+hu ni tsad par na h+ra glo pe/ a ka phyis pa ma yin pa la
10a3(mdo 'grel): yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin no/ khyings kyi mdza' ak so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge phyis pa ma yin pa Ni mdza' can yi ge yang ba yin pa de'i a b+hya sa'i bya ba rnams tsang pha rol las na bzhin du bya'o/ /san+ya? ta/ san la at byi'o?/ /san pha rol la byings
10a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod pa'i dad pa a b+hya sa'i ming can gyi at ni it tA 'gyur te /skabs 'dir mdo snga phyi gnyis kyis tse ka mi/ tsang ta dirg+ho la g+ho(mdo 'grel): yang ba'i ring po'o/ /yi ge yang ba'i sngon ma'i a b+hya sa'i Ni dang tsang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ tsi ring por song/
10a5(mdo 'grel): tsi ka mi/ tsang ta/ Ne ra ni Ti/ iT ma yin pa la Ni'o/ /rnam dbye byings byed pa iT? dang po can ma yin ba pha rol la Ni dbyi bar bya ste/ Na'i rjes 'brel phyis/ tsang gi rjes 'brel da dang tsa'ang phyis/ lung lang sogs kyi phyings la aT sbyar bas/ a
10a6(mdo 'grel): tsI ke ma ta/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a tsI ka me hI/ a NI? ka man+ta/ lung gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsI ka mathA/ a tsI ka me thI/ a tsI ka ma d+haM?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsI ka me/ a tsI ka ma ba hi/ a
10a7(mdo 'grel): tsI ka mA ma hi/ a ya la sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o zhes pa'i mngo Ning? ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ 'grel par/ Ni med pa la'ang tsli? tsang 'o zhes bshad pas/ a tsa ka ma ta/ a tsA ka ma tAM/ a tsa ka man+ta /sogs so/ /lab la/ kA soD
10b1(mdo 'grel): kyi kA mi la Am sbyar/ kI ma/ Am/ liT/ A la'os/ liT 'jigs /a ya man+tA wa byet+ti? Sh+Nad? Shu/ Am mdza' A lu A bya itnu a'iTNu? rnams la a ya'o/ /Am mdza' dang kriT sogs kyi rkyen A lu/ Apya/ itU/ iSh+Nu rnams pha rol la Ni'i mdza' 
10b2(mdo 'grel): can ni a ya zhes par 'gyur te/ kA ma yI tsakra/ kA ma yA ba b+hA? ga kA ma yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /Ning ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ tsak me/ tsak mA the/ tsak mi ro/ skyes bu ra bus ma gsum la/ tsaSh mi She /tsak mE tha /tsak miDhe?/ tsak yiDhe/ skyes du phyi ma gsum la/ tsak
10b3(mdo 'grel): me/ tsa ka mi ba hi/ tsa ka mi ma he/ lu Ta la Ni da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi tA/ sogs dang/ Ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA mi tU/ sogs so/ /ning sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi smon pa'i ling la/ kA ma yi ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs dang/ Nid ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ ka mi
10b4(mdo 'grel): ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ lriT la Nid sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yiSh+ya te/ sogs dang /cang ma/ byin pa'i phyogs la/ ka miSh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du ning sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi lring la/ a kA ma yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang /ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a ka mi Sh+ya tA? sogS
10b5(mdo 'grel): so/ ` /a ya 'gro ba la'o zhes pA laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ a ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ a ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ a ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ A ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ A yiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /nga yA yA sa shtsa/ da ya a ya /As
10b6(mdo 'grel): las kyang ngo/ /nga ya sbyin pa a ya 'gro ba as nya bar sdod pa rnams las kyang liT pha rol ya A ma sbyor bar bya ste/ a ya la/ liT Am sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a yAM tsa kre/ a yAM ba b+hA ga A ya yA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ wal dang po'i /iT sbyin
10b7(mdo 'grel): pas a yi tA?/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ lriT la/ a yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /u pa sarga syA ya tau/ nyer bsgyur bya a ya ti la'o/ /nyer? bsgyur gyir yig ni a ya ti pha rol la la yig tu 'gyur te/ 
11a1(mdo 'grel): a ya ta'i sngon du pra bzhag /mdo 'dis ra la a 'dra ba la ring po byas/ bra plA /ya te /rab tu gro bar byed/ de bzhin du/ pa rA ya la/ par pa ya te/ pa ri ler la ig gi a tsa la ya Na 'os/ mtshams sbyar bas/ pa ri pa lya ya te/ 'grel bar a ya te pha
11a2(mdo 'grel): rol la'ang pra ti dang nir dang dur rnams kyir yig ya ru 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes bshad/ /pas/ prahya ya te/ /so sor 'gro bar byed /nir ya ta /mi 'gro bar byed/ /pha rol tu 'gro bar byed/ dur ya te lta ba'o/ ` /nga ya 'gro ba dang/ 'che ba dang/ yongs su 'gro bar byed sbyin pa rnams
11a3(mdo 'grel): la'o/ zhes pa la/ laT la sogs pa sbyar pa'i bya ba thams cad a ya dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ nga ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ da ye ta /sogs so/ /loT la /da la tAM /sogs so/ /lang la/ a da ya ta/ ngan par 'gre bar byed/ sogs so/ /lud la/ a da yiSh+Ta/? sogs so//
11a4(mdo 'grel): yiT la nga ya a yang A sra las kyang ngos Am sbyar bas/ sa yAM tsa kre/ yAM ba b+hU ba/ /da yAM mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ nga yi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ nga yi ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a nga yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// ` sphA yi 'phel
11a5(mdo 'grel): ba la'o/ /zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ sphA ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ sphA ye te/ sogs so/ /loT la/ shA yatAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a sphA ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung sob sa wal dang bo'i rnams la iT yang na bar bya ste/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/
11a6(mdo 'grel): tsA ya sphA ya bya ya miDA/ tsa ya sphA ya/ byA ya rnams kyi iT yang na'o/ /tsA yri mchod ba/ sphA yI dang o pyA yis 'phel ba rnams kyi li Tam gtogs pa'i wal dang pho'i la iT yang na bar bya ste/ lung la/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a spha yiSh+Ta a sphA yi
11a7(mdo 'grel): ShA tAM/ a sphA ya Sha ta/ sogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ d+ha la'ang ngos si tsa 'di phyis pa'o/ /wra yra dag gi wa la'ang byi 'os ya phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sphAs ta/ asphA sA tAM/ asphA sat /skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ asphA s+thA(mdo 'grel): As+tha:sA?
11b1(mdo 'grel): asphA d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ asphA si/ asphA swa hi/ asphAsma hi/ liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu'o zhes pas thung ngur song/ shar dang po la khang 'os/ sa phyis/ a b+hya sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ pha par bsgyur pa sogs byas pa/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba sphA? ye/
11b2(mdo 'grel): ba sphA ya ta/ ba sphA yi ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa sphA yi Sha/ ba sphA yA the/ pa sphA yi d+hwe/ pa sphA yi DhE/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa sphA ye/ pa sphA yi ba he/ pa sphA yi ma he/ luT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sphA yi tA/ sphA yi tA ro/ sphA yi ta ra/ sogs dang
11b3(mdo 'grel): iT med pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi bal dbyi 'os yra? phyis pas/ sphA tA /sphA tA rau/ sphA tA ra /sogs so/ /smin pa'i ling la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sphA yi ShISh+Ta /sogs dang/ iT mang pa'i phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ sphA saSh+Ti/ sogs so/ /lriT la iT sbyar ba'i
11b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs la/ sphA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi zhes pas/ ya phyis pas/ sphA sya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du lring la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a sphA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ yra phyis pas/ a sphA sya ta/ sogS
11b5(mdo 'grel): so/ ` /o pyA yi 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ byA ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ byA ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ byA ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a pyA ya ta/ sogs so/ /dI pa dzan bud d+ha pU ri tA yi b+hyo:? n+ya tar syAM/ dI pa dzan
11b6(mdo 'grel): bud d+ha pU rit yi pya yi rnams las yang na'o/ /dI pI 'bar ba/ dza nI rab tu skye ba/ bud d+ha khong du chung pa/ pU rI tshim pa/ tA yri rgyud/ o pyA yI 'phel ba rnams las/ lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ta pha rol la tsli ni yang na tsin zhes par 'gyur zhing yang na si
11b7(mdo 'grel): tsar 'gyur te/ tsi No lug /tsiN las 'jig go /tsli tsin ra bsgyur ba'i tsi Na las la bsgyur ba'i ta ag kyang ? bye bar bya ste/ pyA ya la/ lung /lung la tsli dI pa sogs kyis tsli tsa Ni ru bsgyur/ Na 'phel don/ tsa/ tsiN las 'jig go'i don/ /la ta mdo 'dis ta phyis/ a byA?
12a1(mdo 'grel): yi tsli si tsir bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ tsa ya sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste /ir sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a pya yiSh+Ta/ a bya yi ShA tAM/ a bya yi Sha ta/ sogs dang/ /iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/ wa yu dag gi wal la? bya'o?
12a2(mdo 'grel): ya phyis pas/ a pya ste a byA sa tAM/ a byAs ta/ sogs so/ /le Tya ngoshtsa/ liT yang dag la'ang de/ /liT dang yang dag pha rol la byA ya ni pa'i zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ byA yal liT/ mdo 'dis bi du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubS
12a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ pi pyE pi pyA te/ pi pyI re /skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pi byi She/ pa pyA the/ pi pya d+hwe pi pya Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi bye/ pa pyi ra? te/ pi pyi ma he/ luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas ir byin pa'i phyogs la/ pyA yi tA/
12a4(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ wa yra dag gi wa la la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ pyA ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du smon pa'i ling la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bya yi ShiSh+Ta/ sogs dang/ iT mang pa'i phyogs la/ bya sISh
12a5(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ byA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ wa yra sogs kyis ya phyis bas/ byA sya ta /sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a pyA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a pyA sya ta/ sogs so/ ` /
12a6(mdo 'grel): tA yri rgyud dang skyong ba dag la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ tA ya ta/ sogs so/ /ling la/ tA ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tA ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a tA ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa sogs kyi
12a7(mdo 'grel): tsli? pang? ni tsa Nar bsgyur ba'i? phyogs la/ a tA yi/ yang na si tsar bsgyur bas/ a tA yiSh+Ta /a tA yi ShA tAM/ a tA yi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ta tA ye/ ta tA yA te/ ta tA yi re/ ta tA yi She/ sogs so/ /luT la/ tA yi tA/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ tA yi
12b1(mdo 'grel): ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ tA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a tA yi Sh+ya ta/ a tA yi Sh+ye tAM /a tA yi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ /sha la g.yo ba le ste kun tu sgribs ba la yang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ sha la te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ sha le ta/ sogs so/ /ngo?
12b2(mdo 'grel): la/ sha la tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a sha la ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a sha liSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la a b+hya sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ she pe?/ she lA te/ she li ri/ sogs so/ /luT la/ shu lI ta/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i
12b3(mdo 'grel): ling la/ iT sbyar bas/ sha li ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lraT la/ sha li Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a sha li Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /She bri 'khrung pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar /byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ ap te/ sogs so/ /ling
12b4(mdo 'grel): la/ se bet/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sa ba tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a se ba ta/ sogs so/ /lung la byings byang? pa ri wal dang po'i iT 'os/ iT byin pas/ e se biSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ thur du 'os/ /a ir
12b5(mdo 'grel): ba sbyar ba sogs byas pas/ si She be/ si She bA te/ si She bi re /sogs so/ /luT la/ si bi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ se bi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /wiT la/ se piSh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a se bi Sh+ya ta sogs so// ` kA sh+ri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT? soD
12b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar bas/ laT la/ kA sha sta/ sogs so/ /ling la/ kA she te/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kA sha tI/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a kA shat/ sogs so/ /lung la iT sbyar ba'i /a kA shiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /'grel par lungs drangs ba/ kA sha kA so rAmpA?/ kA sha kA sa dag gi
12b7(mdo 'grel): Am yang na'o/ /kA sh+ri 'bar ba dang/ kA sri sgra ngan pa dag gi liT pha rol la A ma yang na sbyar bar bya ste/ A ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA shAM tsakre /kA shAM babnyu? go kA shA mAs/ soD dang/ A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tsa kA she/ tsakA? rA te/ tsakA shi re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT sbyar bas
13a1(mdo 'grel): kA shI tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kA shi ShiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ kA shi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la a kA shiSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /kA sri sgra ngan la la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar ba'i bya ba thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o ba?
13a2(mdo 'grel): i ha rtsed mo byed pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ i ha ta/ sogs so/ /ling la/ a'i he ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ i ha tI/ sogs so/ /lang la/ i ha ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ e hiShDa/ sogs so/ /liT la/ i Ta
13a3(mdo 'grel): dang po lti be ldan ba sogs kyi A ma sbyar bas/ i hI tsa kre a'i hAM ba b+hu ga a'i hA sa mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la /iT byin pas/ A hi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a'i hiShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang byings phyed pa spel dang po'i iT 'os/ /iT sbyin
13a4(mdo 'grel): pas i hi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du lring la/ i hi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ` /bA nga 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la shap las shab rjes 'brel phyis nas ag 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ la ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ 'gro bar bye ba gA te
13a5(mdo 'grel): lam/? tAT 'gro? ba sogs kyis mdza' e ag 'dra ba la ring po/ gA te/ gA te/ 'gro bar byed pa rnams/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pA se/ gA the/ gA d+hwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ gai/ gA ba te/ gA ma te/ li gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ge ha/ ge yA tAM/ ge ran skyes bu dbus ma gsum pa la?
13a6(mdo 'grel): kletrA:? gE yA thAM/ gE d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ge ya/ ge pa ti/ 'gro bar byed pa dang/ la dzha at+ma na pa da rnams la at+ma yin ba las sos dzta a ta du bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mdza' a ak 'dra ba sogs kyis ring po/ /ge ma ti/ loTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ la taT? 'gro ba moD
13a7(mdo 'grel): kyi a/ e kyi a'e ma 'os a Am/ gA tAM/ la a tAM a sha 'dra ba la ring go gA tAM/ dag 'gro bar mthong?/ gA tAM/ rnams 'gro bar mthong? /skyes bu dbus gsum la/ gA swa/ gA thAM/ gA d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ge/ gA wa he/ gA ma he/ lang gi skyes bu dang po/ /'gro bar mdzod/ /gsum la/
13b1(mdo 'grel): a gA ta/ A gA tAM/ la dzha at+ma ne pa da sags kyis dzha at Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis e et kyi A ma/ A gA tA /skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gA thA/ a gA thAM/ a gA d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi gsum la/ a gE /A gA ba hi/ a gA ma hi/ lung la/ a gAsta/ A gasAtaM/ a gA sAt?/ sogs so/ /li Ta'i?
13b2(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza ge/ dza gA te/ dza gI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza gi She/ dza ga the/ dza gi d+hwe/ /dza gi Dhe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza ge/ dza gi ba he/ dza gi ma he/ luT la/ gA tA/ gA tA rau/ gA tA ra(mdo 'grel): gA tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gA sISh+Ta?/
13b3(mdo 'grel): gA sI yastwaM/ gA sI ran/ aT kyis/ iT la'ang dbyi 'os a phyis pa'o/ /sogs so/ /lriT la/ gAsya te/ sogs so/ /ltaMang? lra/ A gA sya ta/ sogs so/ ` /rung 'gro ba la ste bshad pa la'ong zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ra ba te/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ra ba tAM/ soD
13b4(mdo 'grel): so/ /lang la/ a ra ba ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ru d+hu sogs kyi iT yang na bar byas pas/ ar biSh+Ta/ a ra biShA tA/ a ra bi Sha ma sogs sam/ a roSh+Ta/ a ro ShA tAM/ a roSh ta/ sogs so/ /li Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ru ge/ ru ru bA te/ ru ru bi re /skyes bu
13b5(mdo 'grel): dbus ma gsum la/ ru ru bi She/ ru ru ba the ru ru ? ru ru thi Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ru ru pe/? ru ru bi ba he/ ru ru bi ma he/ luT la/ iT yang na par byas pa la/ ra bi tA/ sogs sam/ ro tA/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling luAng iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi ShA Sh+Ta? soD
13b6(mdo 'grel): sam/ ro ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ra bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ ro Sh+ya te /sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a ra pa Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ro Sh+yat sogs so dang bskyod ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs byin pas/ laT la/ nga ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ nga ye ta soD
13b7(mdo 'grel): so/ /lo Ta la/ nga ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ /a da ya ta/ sogs so/ /s+thA g+ho ri tstsa?/ s+thA g+hu'i iT 'ang ngo/ /lung arbman? ba da rnams pha rol la s+thAd? dbyings g+hu'i ming can rnams kyi mdza' aT du 'gyur zhing iT du 'gyur ba de las pha rol gyi tsli? 'gyur ba si ci 'ang
14a1(mdo 'grel): ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de/ yon tan sogs mi byed pa'i don no/ /dang la /lung/ sits/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye pa'i yul la e tsi'i/ At so? ye yA mdo 'dis ? yid? du bsgyur/ tra yig ta pha rol nga'i dus kyi 'os tA phyis
14a2(mdo 'grel): pas/ a di sra tra/ zhes pa la/ h+ra swA daM gA tA/ gzugs thung ngu las so/ /gzugs de phyings mthas? a tsa thung nga las tsli bsgyur ba'i sa tsa nidzha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rel la dbyi ste/ sits? phyis pas/ a ti ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/
14a3(mdo 'grel): a di ShA tI a di Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a di thA/ a di ShA thA/ a di hhwe/ a di Dhi?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a di Shi/ a di Sha hi/ a diSh+ma hi/ nga ya tirdi gi li Ti/ liT la da ya ti'i? di ge'o/ /liT pha rol la nga ya te ste/ de bskyod ba la 'os/
14a4(mdo 'grel): byings deng ni di gi zhes par 'gyur zhing gnyis brjod pa sogs kyang mi byed de/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di? gyi/ di gyI te/ de gyi ra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di gyi She/ di gyA the/ di gyi d+hwe/ di gyi Dha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di gyi/ di gyi ba he/ di gyi ma
14a5(mdo 'grel): he/ luT la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs aM ca at pu bskyur bas/ dA tA rau/ dA tA rau/ /dA tA ra/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i lang la/ dA sISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lrin la/ dA sya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a dA sya ta/ sogs so/ /DIng nam mkha' la 'gro ba la'o zhes pa
14a6(mdo 'grel): la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ Da ya te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ Da yi ta/ sogs so/ /lot? laD ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a Da ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT dang byings la yon tan byis pas/ a Da yi Sh+Ta?/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis
14a7(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /thung ngu 'os thung ngur song/ a b+hyA sa'i cad 'ang ngos Da Tang? bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ Ti Dye/ Ta DyA te/ Ti Dyi? re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la /Ti Dyi She/ Ti DyA? the/ Ti Dyi t+tI/ TaDhI btwi?/ skyes bu phyin gsum la/ Ti Dye/ Ti Dyi ba hwe/ Ti Dyi ma he/ luD la iT skyar yon tan byas bas
14b1(mdo 'grel): Da yi hA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Da yi ShISh+Ta soD so/ /lriT la/ /Da li Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a Da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` gu pa spang pa dang snod pa la'o/ /zhes pa la/ gup ti dza kita rnams las san 'os san sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os /byings
14b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ /ku ha ngag gi tsu 'os ga dzar bsgyur nas/ /dza gungS? /zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ju gupsa te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ dzu gupse/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dzu gupsa tAM /sogs so/ /lang la/ a dzu gupsa? ta /sogs so/ /lung
14b3(mdo 'grel): la// wal dang po'i iT dang/ at kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas// a dzu gupsiSh+Ta? /sogs so/ /laT la/ kAs sogs kyis am sbyar bas/ dzu gupsaM tsakra/ dzu gupsAM ba b+hU ba/ dzu gupsA mA sa sogs so/ /luT la iT byin at kyi dbyi 'os a byis
14b4(mdo 'grel): pas/ ja gupsi ta/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzu gupsi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ dzu gupsi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a dzu gupsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /mAnba d+ha ban+tAnanb+hya? dIrg+ha shtsa b+hyasyA? sya/ mAn ba d+ha tAn shDa? rnams las a b+hya sa'i ring po 'ang ngo//
14b5(mdo 'grel): mA na mchod pa/ /ba d+h+ra smad pa/ dA na kun nas 'gems pa/ shA na rno ba rnams las san 'gyur zhing?/ san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+hya sa'i mang can de yang ring por 'gyur te/ /mA ni la/ san/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os
14b6(mdo 'grel): snga ma thung ngur song/ sin la a ti kyi 'os a i/ mdo 'dis ring po mI mAnsa zhes pa la laT sog pa sbyar bas/ laT la/ mI mAnsa te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ mi mAnsa te/ sogs dang/ loT la/ mI mAnsa tAM/ sogs dang/ lang la/ a mI mAnsa ta/ sogs so/ /
14b7(mdo 'grel): lung la/ lbal?/ dang po'i iT? dang at kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a mI mAnsaSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kA sa sogs kyi em sbyar bas/ mI mAnsAM tsa kra/ mI mAnsAM ba phU ba/ mI mAnsA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT dang aT kyi dbyi'o a phyis pas/ tri?
15a1(mdo 'grel): mAnsitA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mI mAnsi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ lriT la/ mI mAnse Sh+ya te/ sogs dang/ lring la/ a mI mAnsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /ba d+hA? smad pa las na/ san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/
15a2(mdo 'grel): san la at kyi 'os a i?/ mdo 'dis ring po/ /ats gcig pa'i bsha'i b+haSh/ dzhaSh/ mdza' i sa d+hwa ngag la 'os ba 'og ma b+ha/ /bar la tsang 'os/ d+hat ru bsgyur bas/ bI ptatda? zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ pIb+hat+sa te/ sogs so/ /
15a3(mdo 'grel): ling la pI'a? b+hat+set/ sogs so/ /loT la/ bI b+hat+sa tAM/ sogs so/ /lung la/ wal dang ba'i iT dang at kyi dbyi 'os/ a phyis pas/ a bI b+hatshiSh+Ta /sogs so/ /leT la/ bI b+hat+sAM tsakra/ bI b+hat+sAM? ba b+hU ba/ pI b+hat+sA mAs sogs so/ /luT la/ bI b+hat+sitA/
15a4(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ bI b+ha tI ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ pI b+hat+si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a bI d+ha t+siSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /dyut? 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ liT la/ dyo ta twe/ sogs so/ /lin la/ dyo te ta/ sogs so//
15a5(mdo 'grel): loT la/ dyot tI/ soD so/ /lang la ya byo ta soD so/ /Na ? byung?/ masa'? sa lung la'o/ /dyu ta la sogs pa rnams la lung gi ba rasmai par rnams yang na 'gyur te/ pa rasme'i phyogs la/ pu Sha sogs dyu ta sogs zhes pa'i mdos ? ang du bsbyar bas/ a byu
15a6(mdo 'grel): ta ta/ /sa dyu to tAM/ a dyu tan/ sogs so/ /at+man pa da'i phyogs la/ tsli si? tsar bsgyur/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a byo tiSh+Ta/ a dyo tiShA tAM/ a dyo ti Sha ta/ sogs sa/ /dyu ti swA pyo(mdo 'grel): saM? bra sA da NaM/ dyu ti swA bi dag gi saM pra sA ba Na'o/ /dyut
15a7(mdo 'grel): ta 'bar ba/ nyi ShA pa nyal ba dag gi liT la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+hyA sa'i ming can te/ saM bra sA ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur bar bya ste/ di dyu ti re /di dyu ti She/ sogs so/ /luT sa/ iT sbyar bas/ dyo ti hA /sogs so//
15b1(mdo 'grel): smon pa'i ling la/ dyo ti ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ pyo ti Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a dyo ti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /pri tu 'jug pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la brta ta/ sogs so/ /ling la/ bart+se? ta/ sogs so/ /
15b2(mdo 'grel): loD la/ brta tUM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a brta ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dyu ta rnams la sa lur la'o zhes pas/ ang na pa rasmai pa da rnams dang At+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pa ra sa bad sbyar ba'i
15b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs la a bra tat/ a bri ta tAM/ a pri tan/ sogs so/ /atpa ne pa da'i phyogs la/ tsI mi tsar bsgyur/ lbal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a bartiSh+Ta/ a barti ShA hUM/ a barti Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT kha/ ba braM te/ ba bri tA te/ ba gri? ta re/ sogs
15b4(mdo 'grel): so/ luT la/ barti tA/ barti tA ro/ barti tAr(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ barti ShISh+Ta/ barti ShI yAsti? ShI nan? soD so/ /bridb+hya(mdo 'grel): sya sa no(mdo 'grel): brit rnams la sya san dag la'o/ l/ brit la sogs pa ste/ pri tu 'jug pa pri d+hU 'phel pa sh+ri d+hu sgra smang pa/ sya ndu zag pa/
15b5(mdo 'grel): kripA nus pa rnams te/ byins de rnams a'ot+ma ne pa da can yin kyang/ syi dang san dag pha rol la pa rasmai ba pa rnams kyang yang na 'gyur ro/ /na pridb+hya ? tAjhya(mdo 'grel): priT rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no/ /brit sogs lnga las krAM pU par ba'i bzhi la byangs phyed
15b6(mdo 'grel): pa sa yig dang po can pa rasmai pa pa rnams pha rol la iT 'gyur pa ma yin zhing skabs 'gar rgyen gzhan la yang na bar bya ste /britu ? prat? rnams las zhes pas/ lriT pa rasmai pa dang mas sbyar ba'i phyoD la/ bart+sya? ti khat? ta(mdo 'grel): bart+syan+ti?/ sogs so/ /At+ma? ne? bang rnams sbyar ba'i
15b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs la/ bartiSh+ya te/ bardi Sh+ye te/ barti Sh+yan+te?/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ ba rasmai pa da'i phyog sla/ a bartya ta/ a bartya tI/ a pat+syan? sogs so/ /At+ma ne ba bsbyar pa'i phyogs la/ a brti Sh+ya ta/ a barti She tI/ a barti She tA/ a barti Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so:/ syandU? ba gang? 
16a1(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ syanda te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ syande ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ syanda tAM/ sogs so/ /ling la/ a syanda ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dyut sogs kyis par smai bar rnams dang/ At+ma ne ba da rnams yang na par byas pas/ pa
16a2(mdo 'grel): rasmai pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs la pu Sha sogs dyut sogs zhes pas/ tsli ang du bsgyur/ it 'gro ba ma yin ba sogs kyis na phyis pas/ a sya dat/ a sya da hAM/ a sya da na/ sogs so/ /at+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/ a'u 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par byas pas/ idra
16a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a syandi Sh+Ta/ a syandi ShA tAM/ a syandi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /iT ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a syaM ta/ a syan+t+sA? tAM/ a syan+t+sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sya?nshA:a syan+t+sA thAM/ a syaM d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a syaM t+si/ asyaM t+swa hi ma/ asyaM t+sma ti/
16a4(mdo 'grel): liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa syaM da/ sa syaM 'at?/ dA te/ sa syaM de re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa syaM di She/ sa syaM t+se/ dzhal lam dzhal? la 'o si? tsa? phyis/ dzhar dra ba la dzhar rnams kyi 'os dra yang phyis/ khang la tsar ras da ti drangs/
16a5(mdo 'grel): sa syaM dA the/ sa syaM d+hwe/ sa syaM di d+hwe/ sa syaM Dhwe?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa syaM de/ sa syaM dib? ha/ sa syaM dwa he/ sa syaM dma he/ luT la iT yang na bar byas bas/ iT sbyin pa'i phyogs la/ syaM di tA/ sogs dang/ siT med pa'i phyogs la/ dzhad 'dra ba la dzher? rnams
16a6(mdo 'grel): kyi 'os dra phyis bas/ syaM tA/ dzhar? dra bal/ /dzhar? rnams kyi 'os? phyis/ syan+tA ra/ syan+tAr(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar ba'i phyag la/ syaM di ShI Sh+Ta/ syaM di ShI AstAM/ syaM di ShI dan/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ khar la tsang 'os de tar bsgyur bas/ syaM t+sE?/ soD
16a7(mdo 'grel): so/ /lriT la briT rnams las sya san yang dag la 'os/ pa ra smai pa da rnams dang At+ma ne pad rnams yang na bar byas bas/ pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la brit rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no/ /zhes pas iT mi 'gyur te/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/ syaM?
16b1(mdo 'grel): t+sya ti/ syaM t+sya ta(mdo 'grel): syaM t+syan+ti/ sogs so/ /at+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/ at 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par byas pas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ sya diSh+yi te sogs dang/ iT med ba'i phyogs la/ syaM t+sya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ khring la/ pa ra smai ba da'i phyogs la/ a syaM t+sya ta/ a
16b2(mdo 'grel): sya twya hAM/ a syaM t+syan/ sogs dang/ at+ma ne pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas bas/ a syaM di Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ yang na a syaM t+sya ta/ sogs so/ /a nu bi barya b+hi ni b+hya(mdo 'grel): syanda te ra prA Ni Shu/ srog chags ma yin pa la a nu bi pa ri a b+hi ni rnams las syanda ta'i'o//
16b3(mdo 'grel): srog chags ma yin pa la 'jug pa na nyer bskyur a nu la sogs pa 'di rnams las/ syanda te yis yig naM Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ a nu Sh+ya na? te ra tha(mdo 'grel): sa sa sam/ a nu syanda te ra tha(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ gi ba ri/ a b+hi/ ni rnams kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /srog
16b4(mdo 'grel): chags ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi srog chags la 'jug pa na Shar mi 'gyur te/ ni syanda te tastI/ ` /kri pU nus pa la'o zhes shing rta rjes su rgyu/ shing rta rjes su rgyu/ pa la laT sogs sgyar/ gya po ro la(mdo 'grel): kri pUI ra la'o/ /kri bUI ra yig ni brkyen pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur?
16b5(mdo 'grel): bar bya la/ de yang mdza' ? gcig tu ni ma des pas skabs 'gar mi 'sgyur ba yang yang ngo/ /blang chen nges par rgyu/ kri pU ya ? sha pa/ mdo 'dis ri li/ pu ka mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kalpa te/ sogs so/ /ling? la/ kakpe ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kalpa tAM/ sogs so//
16b6(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a kalpa ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dyut rnams las lung la 'os/ pa ra smai pa nga rnams dang at+ma ne pa da rnams yang na byas pas/ pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/ puSha sogs dyut sogs zhes par?/ /tsI ang du bsgyur bas/ a kli pat/ a kI pa tAM/ a kI
16b7(mdo 'grel): pa na/ sogs so/ /at+ma ne pa nga'i phyogs la a'ut 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ a kalpa? Sh+Ti/ a kalpa ShA tAM/ alpi Sha ta/ sogs dang/ iT med ba'i phyogs la/ ling mi tsA bAt+ma ne ba deShu?/ at+ma ne pa da rnams la ling si ca dag go ?
17a1(mdo 'grel): hal mdza' can ik so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge u pa d+hA na yod pa las/ smon pa'i ling dang/ sitsa At+ma ne pa da can dzha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can yod pa ste/ iT med pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do
17a2(mdo 'grel): yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed pa'i don no/ /skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a klipta/ a klipsA tAM/ a klipsa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsuM la a klipthA:a klipsA thAM/ a klibd+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ aklipsi/ aklipswa hi/ a klipsma hi/ liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu

17a4(mdo 'grel): phai/ tsa kli pi ba he/ tsa klipba he/ tsa kli pi ma he/ tsa klipma he/ lu Ti tsa kli pa(mdo 'grel): luT la'ang kli pa'i'o/ /kli pa la luT dang 'ad gi sgras lriT dang lring rnams kyi par sme bad rnaMs yang na 'gyur zhing/ san gyi mdza' la yang pa rasmai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur ro/ /tA si tsa kli pa:
17a5(mdo 'grel): tAs la'ang kli pa'i 'o/ /kli pa las pha rol gyi tAs dang sa yig dang po byings byed ba bar smai pa da rnams la'ang iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ luT la'ang zhes pas pa ra smai pad dap At+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/ mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug/
17a6(mdo 'grel): pu ki mdza' sogs pa kyis yon tan byas bas/ kalptA kalptA rau/ kalptA ra:/ kalptA se/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la a'uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi tA/ kalpi tA rau/ kalpi tA ri:/ kalpi tA se/ sogs so//
17a7(mdo 'grel): iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalptA/ kalptA rau/ kalptA ra:/ kalptA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a'ut 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi ShI Sh+TaM/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ at+ma nai pa da rnams la ling?
17b1(mdo 'grel): si tsa dag go/ zhes pas yi/ ta yin pas yon tan mi byed de/ /klipsISh+Ta/ klipsI yAstAM/ klipsI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ luT la'ang kli pa'i 'os/ pa ra smai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas/ pa ra smai pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tAs lang da? kli pa'i 'os iT mi 'jug ste/ kalpsya?
17b2(mdo 'grel): ti/ kalpsya ta(mdo 'grel): kalpsan+ti/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/ At 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogS la/ kalpiSh+ya te/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ kalpsya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ luD la/ luD la'ang kli pa'i 'os pa
17b3(mdo 'grel): rasmai pa da dang At+ma na pa da yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai ba de rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tAs la'ang zhes pas iT mi 'jug ste/ a kalpsya ta/ a galbsya? tAM/ a kalpsyan?/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a kalpi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/
17b4(mdo 'grel): a kalpsya ta/ sogs so/ ` /bya tha sdug bsngal dang yang dag bar g.yo ba dag la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ bya tha te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ bya the to/ sogs so/ /loT la/ bya tha tI/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a bya tha ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a bya
17b5(mdo 'grel): thiSh+Ta/ a bya thi ShA tAM/ a b+hiSha ta/ soD so/ khya thol Ti/ byA swa'i liT la'o/ /liT pha rol la bya tha gnyis brjod pa'i a b+hyA sa'i saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ bi bya the/ bi bya thA te/ bi bya thi re/ bi bya thi She/ sogs so/ /luT la/ bya thi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ bya thi ShISh+Ta/

17b7(mdo 'grel): ra ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a twa tiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ta twa re te/ ta twa rA te/ ta twa ri re/ ta twa ri She/ sogs so/ /luT la/ twa ri tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ twa ri Shi Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ twa ri Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a twa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /de rnams
18a1(mdo 'grel): kyi byed pa po la shap 'jug pa'i yul b+hU la sogs pa las byings at+man pad 'jug pa rnams la laT sogs rnam dbye At+ma ne rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams bshad zin to//
18a2(mdo 'grel): `//da ni b+hU la sogs pa gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la laT sogs par smai ba da dang/ At+ma ne pa da rnams gnyis ka sbyor ba dang/ yang byings At+ma ne can la At+ma ne sbyor ba dang/ pa rasmai pad can la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba sogs cho ga ci rigs pa thun
18a3(mdo 'grel): mong du bshad par bya ste/ ` /Du pa tsa Sha 'chod pa la'o zhes pa la/ rjes 'brel phyis nas laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTa'i pa rasmi pa da rnams la/ pa tsa ti/ pa tsa ti/ pa tsa ta(mdo 'grel): /ba tsan+ti/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pad rnams la/ pa tsa te/ pa tse te/ pa tsan+ti/ so ba so//
18a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ byed pa pa la shap byin pas ling gi pa rasme pa da rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse tAM/ pa tse yu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /At+ma na pa da rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yA tAM/ pa cor na/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ pa tsa tu/ pa tsa tA ta/ pa ca tAM/ pa tsan+tu
18a5(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /Ahma na pa da rnams la/ pa tsa tAM/ pa tse tAM/ pa tsandAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tsa tAM/ /a ba tsan/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tse tAM/ a pa tsan+ta/ sogs so/ /lung
18a6(mdo 'grel): ma/ byings a ni Ta yin pas iT mi 'jug/ bang bradza sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po/ /tsu'i ku 'os/ tsaka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur pa dang/ dzhal dang po can rnams la/ dzhal las dzhal 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubS
18a7(mdo 'grel): pas/ pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a pA k+ShIt a pAk+tAM/ a pAk+Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pak+ta/ a pak+ShA tAM/ a pak+Sha ta/ sogs te/ at+ma ne rnams la u pa d+hA ring po mi byed do/ /liT la/ byings gnyis brjod
18b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang kit rnams la a b+hya sa dbyi zhing er bsgyur ba dang/ wal dang po rnams la kri bri sri sogs kyi mdos iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa bA tsa/ pe tsa tu(mdo 'grel): pe cu(mdo 'grel): pe tsi tha/ pa bak+tha/ sogs dang/ at+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pe tse/ pe tsA te/ pe tsA te/ pe tsi re/ soD
18b2(mdo 'grel): so/ /luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/ pa rasmai pa nga rnams la/ pak+tA/ pak+tA rau/ /pak+tA ra(mdo 'grel): pa k+tA si/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pa tA pak+tA rau/ /pak+tA ra(mdo 'grel): pak+tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi ba rasmai pa da rnams la/ pa tsyAt/ pa tsyastAM/ patsya su(mdo 'grel): soD
18b3(mdo 'grel): so/ /at+ma ne pa da rnams la/ tsu'i ku dang/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pak+ShISh+Ta/ pak+ShI yastAM/ pak+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang tsu'i ku dang/ kun nas de sgyur ba sogs kyis pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ pak+Sh+ya ti/ pak+Sh+ya ta:/ pa k+Sh+yan+ti/ sobs dang/ At+ma ne
18b4(mdo 'grel): nams la/ pak+Sh+ya te/ pak+She te/ pak+Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a pak+Sh+yat/ a pak+Sh+ya tAM/ a pak+Sh+yan/ sogs dang/ At+ma na pa da rnam la/ a pak+Sh+ye tAM/ a pak+Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so// ` /pa tli laM lar yang ste 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ byingS
18b5(mdo 'grel): pa rasmai ba da can yin pas/ laT sogs pa rasmai ba de rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ pa ta ti/ sogs so/ /ling la pa ta ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ lat tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a pa tat/ sogs so/ /pa ta(mdo 'grel): pum/ pata'i bu ma'o/ /pa ta'i tsli? bsgyur ba ang pha rol la pu ma A ga

18b7(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ la pA ta ? pa ta tu(mdo 'grel): pe tu(mdo 'grel): pe ti tha/ sogs so/ /luT la wal dang po'i iT sbyang bas/ pa ti tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pa tyad/ pa tyastAM/ pa tyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ lriT la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ pa ti Sh+ya ti/ pa ti Sh+ya ta(mdo 'grel): pa b+hiSh+yan+ti?/

19a2(mdo 'grel): met/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ba ma tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a ba ma ta/ sogs so/ /lung la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a ba mIta/ ab miSh+TAM/ a ba mi Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs bas/ ba ma e twA b+hyA sa lo bau bA/ ba ma'i a b+hyA sa dbyi ba dang o nyid yang
19a3(mdo 'grel): na'o/ /gong du sha sha dang ba dang po zhes a b+hya sa mi dbyi bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal laT kit pha rol la ba ma'i a b+hyA sa dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur ba sogs yang na par bya ste/ ba bA ma/ /ma tu(mdo 'grel): a tus kha? be ma tu(mdo 'grel): be mu(mdo 'grel): us ba ba mu(mdo 'grel): bom tha/ wal ba ba mi tha/ luT la

19a5(mdo 'grel): can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai ba da rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la byed pa po la shap dang/ b+hA sha/ b+hA sha/ b+hA mu/ sogs kyi mongs/ sh+yan yang na par byas pas/ laT la b+h+ra ma ti/ sogs sam/ b+h+rA mya ti/ soD so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ b+h+ra me ta/ sogs sam

19a7(mdo 'grel): yang na'o/ /dzrAM? 19b1(mdo 'grel): so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ b+h+ra mya ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /Sha ha bzod pa la'o zhes pa byings At+ma ne can yin pas laT sogs at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'o sa/
19b2(mdo 'grel): Sha sar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ sa ha te/ sogs so/ /ling la/ sa he ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sa ha hUM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a sa ha ta/ sogs so/ /lung la iT sbyin pas/ a sa hiSh+Ta/ a sa hiShA tAM/ a sa hi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ se he/ sahA te/
19b3(mdo 'grel): se he re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ i Shu sa ha sogs kyi mdos iT yang na bar byas pas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ sa hi tA/ sa hi hA rau/ sa hi tA ra:sogs dang iT med pa'i phyogs la/ sa ha la/ luT/ tAs/ lu Ta'i dang po sogs kyis ta DA/ sa ha/ tA/ ha'i Dha'o sa ha Dha/ dzha Sha
19b4(mdo 'grel): las d+hA min pas ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/ ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha Dhar bsgyur bas/ saDha/ DhA/ zhes pa la/ sa hi ba ho ro nga war+Na sya/ sa hi ba ha dag gi a yig gi o ta'o/ /Dha'i Dha la dbyi 'os Dha phyis pa las/ Sha ha bzod pa dang/ ba ha thob bdag gi a yig ni ot du bsgyur
19b5(mdo 'grel): bar bya ste/ Dha'i Dha la zhes pas Dha gong ma phyis/ mdo 'dis ot bsgyur bas/ so DhA/ de bzhin du/ so DhA rau/ /so DhA ra(mdo 'grel): so DhA se/ sogs so/ /so Dha(mdo 'grel): so Dha'i 'o/ /sa ha so Dha zhes 'gyur ba'i sngon du nyer bsgyur sa Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang/ soDhA zhes pas sa Sha
19b6(mdo 'grel): yig tu mi 'gyur te/ bi so DhA/ pa ri so DhA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ saM ti ShI Sh+Ta/ sa hi ShI yA stAM/ sa hi ShI ran/ sogs so/ lriT la'ang wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ sa hi Sh+ya te/ sa hiSh+ye te/ sa hi Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lriD la/
19b7(mdo 'grel): a sa hI Sh+ya? ta/ /a sa hi Sh+ye tAM/ a sa hi Sh+yanTa/ sogs so// ` /Sha dri rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba dang kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o zhes pa pa ra smai pa da can yin pas/ laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/ pA g+hA d+hma sogs kyi mongs?
20a1(mdo 'grel): sId du bsgyur bas laT la/ sI da ti/ sogs dang/ ling la/ sI de ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sI da tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a sI da ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ buSha sogs dyut sogs laM 'gro ba zhes bas tsI ang du bsgyur bas/ a sa da ta/ a sa da tAM
20a2(mdo 'grel): a sa dan?/ sogs so/ /liT la sa sA nga/ se ? du(mdo 'grel): se du(mdo 'grel): se di ? sa sadtha/ sogs so/ /luT la/ khar la tsar 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/ sadta/ sat+ta? rau/ sat+tA ra?:/ sat+ta si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling las dyAta/ sa dyastAM/ sadyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la/ sa t+sya hi:sa ha ta
20a3(mdo 'grel): sat+sya nI/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a satsh+yata/ a sat+sya tAM/ a satsh+ya na/ /sogs so/ /sha de(mdo 'grel): shit(mdo 'grel): sha di'i sha 'gro pa'i 'o/ /sha dra'i 'jig pa la'o zhes pa byings ngo bo bar sme bar can yin kyang sha 'gro ba rnams kyi at+ma ne pa de rnams 'jug ste/ laT
20a4(mdo 'grel): sogs byings thams cad pa bzhi po'i At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor/ bA gdrA? t+mA sogs kyi mdos shang shI ya zhes par bsgyur bas/ laT la/ shI ya te/ sogs so/ /loT la/ shI ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a shI ya ha/ sogs so//
20a5(mdo 'grel): lud sogs byings phyed pa rnams kyi pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar te/ lung la/ puSha sogs kyi cli? ang du bsgyur pas/ a sha da ta/ a sha da TAM/ a sha dan/ sogs so/ liT la/ sha shA da/ she da tu(mdo 'grel): she du(mdo 'grel): she di tha/ sha shat+tha sogs so/ /luTal?/ 'bar la tsar
20a6(mdo 'grel): 'os? da ta ru? bsgyur? bas/ shat+tA/ shat+ta rau/ shAt+tAr(mdo 'grel): shat+thA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ sha byA ta/ sha tyA yA stAM/ sha dyA su:sogs so/ /lriT la/ khang la tsang 'os da ta ru bsgyur nas drangs/ shat+sya ti/ shat+sya ta(mdo 'grel): shat+sya nI sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lrid la/ arasya tAM/ a
20a7(mdo 'grel): shat+sya? tAM?/ e shat+sya na/ sogs so/ ` /pa Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pa pa rasmai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai ba da rnams sbyar bas/ laT ya/ pha Na ta/ sogs so/ /ling la/ pha Ne ta/ sogs so/ /loT la phaN tu/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a pha Na ta/ sogs so/ /lung la lbal?
20b1(mdo 'grel): dang bo'i iT sbyar bas/ a phA NI ta/ a phA NiSh+TAM?/ a phA Ni Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /pha NAM tsas btA nAM/ phaN rnams kyi'ang? bdun rnams kyi'o/ /phaN la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang pha Na 'gro ba/ rA dzri/ b+hA dzri/ Tu b+hA sh+ri/ Tu b+hA sh+ri rnams 'bar ba sya mu dang swa na skra ste byings bdun po 'di rnams
20b2(mdo 'grel): kyi liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha pha/ bdag dzo? sogs kyis u ba d+hA? 'phel ba/ rol la a b+hyAs dbyi ba dang e ru bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ pha Na la liT sbyar bas/ pa phA Na/ phe Na tu(mdo 'grel): pa pha Na tu(mdo 'grel): phe Nu(mdo 'grel): pa pha Nu(mdo 'grel): phe Ni tA? pa ? ni tha/ sogs so/ /luT la wa la dang po'i ir byin pas/ pha Ni
20b3(mdo 'grel): tA/ pha Ni tA rau/ /pha Ni tA ra(mdo 'grel): pha Ni tAM si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pha N+ya? na/ pha N+ya ste/ pha N+ya su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la/ thal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ pha Ni Sh+ya taM/ Nal a tu sa pha Na Sh+ya ta(mdo 'grel): pha Ni Sh+yaTti?/ us la thal/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ lring la/ a pha Ni Sh+yat/ e pha Ni
20b4(mdo 'grel): Shu? tAM/ a pha Ni Sh+yan/ sogs so/ ? rA dzri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa byings gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams dang/ Adma na gnyis pa 'jug ste/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa da'i/ rA dza ti/ rA dza ta(mdo 'grel): rA dzan+ti/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne ba da rnams pa/ rA dza te/ rA dze te
20b5(mdo 'grel): rA da ? sogs sa/ /ling gi pa rasme ba da rnams sbyar bas/ rA dze ta/ rA dze tA/ rA dza yu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ rA dza ta/ drA dze yA tAM/ rA dze da na/ sogs so/ /loTa'i ba rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ rA dza tu rA dza tat?/ rA dza tAM/ rA dzan+tu sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa ra la/ rA dza tAM/ rA dze tAM/ so/ /At+ma ne pa ra la/ rA dza tAM/ rA dze tAM
20b6(mdo 'grel): rA dza tAM?/ sogs so/ /lang gi pha rasme pa da rnams sbyar bas/ a rA dzat/ a rA dza tA/ a rA dza na/ sogs so/ /At+mane pa da rnams la/ a rA dza ta/ a rA dze tA/ a rA dzan+ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a rA dzI ta/ a rA dziSh+TAM/ a rA dzi Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs so sya/ /At+ma
20b7(mdo 'grel): na ba? rnams la/ a rA dzilTa?/ a rA dzi ShA tAM/ a rA dza Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ phaN rnams kyi lung bdun rnams kyi las a b+hyA sa dbyi ba sogs ang na par bya ste/ pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ ra rA Nal dzA/ re dza tu(mdo 'grel): a tus/ rA dza ? dzu(mdo 'grel): us ra rA dzu(mdo 'grel): sogs dang dang Atna ne pa da?
21a1(mdo 'grel): rnams sbyar bas/ re dze/ nga rA dze/ ri dzA te/ ra? rA dzA te/ re dzi re/ ra rA dzi re/ sogs so/ /luTa'i pa rasmai ba da rnams sbyad pas/ rA dzi? tA/ rA dzi tA rau?/ rA dzi tA ra(mdo 'grel): rA dzi tA si sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ dA dzi tA/ da dzi tA rau/ dA dzi tA ra(mdo 'grel): rA dzi tA se/ sogS
21a2(mdo 'grel): so/ /smon pa'i ling gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la te/ rA dzyA ta/ rA bya stAM/ A tI rA dzyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ At+ma ne pa da sbyar bas/ rA dzi ShI Sh+Ta/ rA dzi ShI AstAM/ rA dzi ShI ? na/ sogs so/ /lriTa'i pa rasmai ba da rnams la/ rA dzi Sh+ya ti ShA dzaSh+ya ta(mdo 'grel): rA dzi Sh+yan+ti/ soD dang/ at+ma ne ba da rnams
21a3(mdo 'grel): la/ rA dzi Sh+ya te/ rA dzi Sh+ye te/ rA dzi Sh+ye n+tiM?/ sogs so/ /lring gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+yat/ a rA dzi Sh+ya tAM/ a rA dzaM Sh+ya na/ sogs dang/ at+ma na pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+yA ta/ a rA dzi Sh+ye tAM/ a rA dzi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ /` /Tu b+h+rA sh+ri 'bar? ba la'o zhes
21a4(mdo 'grel): pa at+ma? ne? pa da ? yin phas las? sogs at+ma Ne rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/ b+h+rA sha/ b+hwA sha/ b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/ byed pa po'i don la sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ b+hA? sha te/ sogs sam
21a5(mdo 'grel): yang na/ b+hA sha te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ b+hA shet/ sogs la/ yoT la/ b+h+rA sha tAM/ sogs sam/ b+h+rA sh+ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a b+ha sh+ya ta/ soD so ma?/ /a b+hA sh+ya ta/ sogs so//

21a7(mdo 'grel): dang ling la/ ? shi ShiSh+Ta?/ so so/ lriT la/ b+hA shi Sh+yate/ ?/ soD so?/ /lring la ag+h+rI? 21b1(mdo 'grel): sogs sa/ /ling la/ swa ne ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ swa na tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a swa na ta/ sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byis pas/ a swa nI ta/ a swa niSh+TI/ a swa ni Sh+ya(mdo 'grel): sogs sam/ a swA nI ta sogs so/ /liT la/ phaN sogs kyi a b+ha sa dbyi ba sogs yang na
21b2(mdo 'grel): bar byas pas/ swA swAn/ swan tu:/ sa swa na tu:/ se nu:/ sa swa nu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /laT la/ wal? dang po'i eT sbyar bas/ swa ni tA/ sogs dang/ smon pa'i yid la/ swa n+tA? ta/ sogs so?/ /lriT la/ swa ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /lrid la/ a swa ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /gong du bi las kyar sba? ni zas
21b3(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes pas/ swa ni'i sngon du bi dang a bzas kyi don brjod pa na Sha du 'gyur twe/ bi Shwa Na ti mA saM/ zas ma yin na sa Sha ru mi 'gyur bas/ bi swan? ti bI NA/ sogs te/ de bzhin du/ /a wa yang sbyar par bya'o/ ` /kha nu kun nas rko ba la'o zhes pa rasmai par can yin pas
21b4(mdo 'grel): laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas laT la/ khan ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ sha za bar byed/ kha ne ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kha na tu/ sogs so/ yang na/ pi wang gi ? a kha na te?/ sogs so/ /lung la/ 'phel pa yang na bar byas pas/ a khA nI ta/ a khA naSh+Ta/ a khA ni ShA(mdo 'grel): sogs
21b5(mdo 'grel): sam/ a khA nIta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ gi Ta? rnams la/ ga ma? ha na dzan khan sogs kyi mdos A pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs phas/ /tsa? khAn:/ tsagna /tsa kh+nu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /luT la/ wal dang ? iT byin pas/ /ba ni tU/ sogs so/ /yo bi ptA ShA/ ya la 'dam

21b7(mdo 'grel): gzhin du/ lriT la/ a kha na? Sh+ya ta/ /sogs so/ ` /nA a? mchod pa dang zhi ba dag pa'o zhes pa ? pa rasmai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasma? ba da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ tsA ya ti/ sogs so/ /lib la/ tsO? ye ta/ sogs so/ /laT la/ cA ya tu/ sogs
22a1(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a tsA yang/ sogs so/ /lung la/ cA ya sphA ya syA la sogs gyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Tam byin ba'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi thal? la dbye'o zhes ya dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tsA yI ta/ /sa tsA liSh+Ta?/ /
22a2(mdo 'grel): yi Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs sam/ a tsA sIt/ a tsAstAM/ a tsA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /liT la/ tsa tsA ya/ tsa tsA ya tu(mdo 'grel): tsa tsA yu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ tsA yi tA/ sogs san/ tsAtA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ tsA yyaT/ sogs so/ /liT la i Taster
22a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang yar? dbyi pa yang na par byas pas/ tsA yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ tsA sya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a tsA yi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ a tsA syat/ sogs/ ` /pa Sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa yang pa rasmai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams 'jug ste/
22a4(mdo 'grel): byings thams cad ba bzhi pa rnams la/ b+h+rA sha btA sha b+hA mu sogs kyi 'dos sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ la Sha ti/ sogs sam/ la Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ la She ta/ sogs sam/ la Sh+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ la Sha tu/ sogs sam la Sh+ya tu/

22a6(mdo 'grel): la wal dang po di iT byin pas/ la Shi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ la Sh+yA ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la iT sbyar bas/ la Shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring? la/ a la Shi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /A du ba d+ha yA go ha(mdo 'grel): go ha'i u ba d+hA'i a'u ta'o/ /rkyen a ca dang po can/ /
22a7(mdo 'grel): rol la go ha ste/ gu hU kun nas sgrib pa'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni a'ut? ste a'u ring por 'gyur te/ ` gu tU gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa da la/ gU ta ti/ sogs so dang/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU ha te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi pa rasmai rnams la/
22b1(mdo 'grel): gU te ta/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ gU te ta/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i pa rasmai rnams la/ gU ha tu/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne rnams la/ gU ha tAM/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a'ut 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na par byed de/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la go ha'i zhes pa'i mdos u?
22b2(mdo 'grel): la d+hA ring po byed de/ iT byin pa'i phyogs kyi ba rasmai rnams la/ a gU hIt/ a gU hiSh+TAM/ a gU hI Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ at+ma ne rnams la/ a gU hiSh+Ta/ a gU hi ShA tAM/ a gU hi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ak u pa d+hA shal iT med pa sogs kyis
22b3(mdo 'grel): tsI ksa ru bsgyur/ ha'i Dha 'os/ ha Dta/ a tsag cig pa'i ba sha'i b+haSh dzhaSh mdza' i sa d+hwa dag la'o zhes pa'i mdos ga g+ha/ sal Sha Dta dag gi ka 'os Dha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a k+tu k+Shat/ a g+hu k+Sha tAM/ a g+hu k+Shan/ soD
22b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs kyi At+ma ne pa da la/ lu gwA du ha di ha li gu hAM/ Adma ne pa de da n+ta/ du ta di ha li ha gu ha rnams kyi At+ma ne pa da so la gnas pa la yang na 'jig go/ du ha 'dzag di ha nye bar gsog pa/ li ha ro myang ba gu hU kUn nas sgrib pa rnamS
22b5(mdo 'grel): la pha rol gyi cli bsgyur pa'i gsa ni rnam dbye Adma ne pa da so la gnas pa 'am so las skyes pa'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na 'jig ste/ ksa mi 'jig pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a g+hu k+Sha ta/ ksa 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ ta'i b+ha?
22b6(mdo 'grel): 'os da ta Dha?/ d+hA min pa sogs kyis ta dta/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha Dha Dha'i Dha la dbyi 'os/ li? tu las rnams la gnas zhes pas/ rta gong ma phyis/ Dha gong ma phyis/ Dtra? dra phyes/ pa la sba ma'i aN gyi ring po'o zhes pa'i mdos u ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a gU
22b7(mdo 'grel): Dha/ ksya? syA mi/ ksa'i? a tsa la'o/ li ha sogs las pha rol gyi tsli'i 'gyur pa'i kma'i mdza' rnam dbye At+ma na pa da a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol la dbyi ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a a tsang cig ba'i bsha'i/ 'oD kyis gagtar? bsgyur pa'o/ /gU? k+Shwa tI/ ya gtu? ?/
23a1(mdo 'grel): yang 'grel par a tsa dang po yin kyang yang tshig la ksa'i mdza' 'ga' zhig dbyi bar mi 'dod do zhes bshad pas/ a gtu k+Shan+ta/ lta bu'o/ /cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar byas pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gU DhA(mdo 'grel): a g+hu k+Sha thA:
23a2(mdo 'grel): agtu k+ShA ThA/ a g+hu DhwaM/ a g+hu d+hwaM/ skyes bu byi ma gsum la/ a g+hu k+Shi/ a g+hu k+ShA ba ti/ a g+hu k+ShA ma hi/ li Ta'i pa rasmai pa ra rnams la/ dzu gU ta/ dzu gU ha tu(mdo 'grel): dzu gU hi tha/ dzu gU Dha/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ dzu gU te/ dzu gU hA te/ thag? dzu gU hir
23a3(mdo 'grel): ju? gU hi?
