23a5(mdo 'grel): g+hu k+ShA Sh+TI/ g+hu k+ShA yAstaM/ g+hu k+ShI ra na/ sogs so/ /lriT la yang iT yang na bar byas bas ba rasmai pa da rnams la/ gA he Sh+ya ti/ gU hi Sh+ya ta:/ gU hi Sh+ya ni/ sogs sam/ g+hu k+Sh+ya hi/ g+hu k+Sh+ya ta(mdo 'grel): g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU hi Sh+ya te/ gU ti Sh+ye te/ gU hi
23a6(mdo 'grel): Sh+yan+ta/ sogs sam/ g+hu k+Sha te/ g+hu k+Sh+ye te/ g+hu k+Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi ba rasme bar rnams la/ a gU hi Sh+yat/ a gU tiSh+ya tA/ a gU hi Sh+ya na/ sogs sam/ a g+hu ? g+hu k+Sh+ya tAM/ a g+hu k+Sh+yan/ sogs so/ /At+ma ne rnams la/ a gU hi Sh+ya ta/ a gU ti Sh+ye tAM/
23a7(mdo 'grel): a g+hu hi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs sam/ a gA k+Sh+yat/ a g+hu k+Sh+ye tAM/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ /` h+ri ta 'phrog pa la'o zhes ba'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai ba da rnams dang/ At+ma na pa da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i pa rasmai ba da rnams la/
23b1(mdo 'grel): ha ra ti/ sogs dag At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ ha ra te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi ba rasmai ba da rnams la/ ha re ta/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ha re ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ ha ra tu/ sogs dang/ At+ma? ne pa da rnams la/ ha ra to/ sogs so//
23b2(mdo 'grel): lang gi ba rasmai ba da rnams la/ a ha ra ta/ sogs dang/ At+ma na pa da rnams la/ a ha ra ta/ sogs so/ /lud gi ba rasmai ba da rnams la/ si cel 'phel ba ba rasmai ba da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a hA rShi ta/ a hAMrShDA?/ a hArShu:
23b3(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hArShI:/ a hArShAM?/ a hArSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hArShaM/ a tArSha/ a harSha/ a shtsa? ri las kyang ngo/ byings ri mdza' las pha rol gyi iT med pa'i tsli bsgyur ba'i sits rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da pha rol can dang/ smon
23b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i ling At+ma ne rnams kyang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda ched byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba dang yon tan mi byed pa'i don te/ h+rinya la lud At+ma ne rnams sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a h+ri ta/ a h+ri ShA TAM/ a h+ri Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a h+ri thA:
23b5(mdo 'grel): a hI ShA ThAM/ a tri d+hAM?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a h+ri Shi/ a h+ri Sh+ya hi/ a driSh+ma hi/ liT la/ a b+hyA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ ri aT 'os ri a/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ gzugs thung? du las so zhes pas/ dzhal dang po can rnams la sits 'jig go ha dzha/ a b+hyA sa'i tsar
23b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod sa/ dza? dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ba rasme ba da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hA da/ dza h+ra ra?(mdo 'grel): dza hA? ru(mdo 'grel): dza h+ru(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza hartha/ dza ha thu:/ dza h+ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hA ra/ dza ha ra/ dza ha ri ba/ dza ha ri ma/ de bzhin du/
23b7(mdo 'grel): At+ma ne pa dge? skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza h+re/ dza hA te/ dza h+ra re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ha ri She/ dza h+rA tha/ dza ha ri d+he/ dza ha ti Dhwa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza? h+re/ dza ha ri ba te/ dza ha ri ma he/ luT la/ byings thams cad pa dang byings
24a1(mdo 'grel): byed bdag gi 'os yon tan byas pas/ pa rasmai ba da rnams la/ hartA/ hartA rau/ hartA ra(mdo 'grel): hartA sa/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ hartA/ hartA rau/ hartA ra(mdo 'grel): hartA se/ sogs dang/ smon pa'i ling gi pa rasmai pa da rnams
24a2(mdo 'grel): la/ sha yak/ ling rnams la ring 'os ri ring du bsgyur bas/ h+ri yAt/ hi yAstAM/ h+ri yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ri las kyang dos/ /kit yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/ h+ri ShISh+Ta/ h+ri ShI yAstAM/ h+ri ShE ran/ sogs so/ /liT dang lrid? la/ ri ta
24a3(mdo 'grel): han dag gi sya la'o zhes ba'i mdos iT sbyor te/ lriTa'i pa rasmai ba da la/ ha ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ Atna ne ba da la/ ha ri Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lrid gi ba rasmai ba de la/ a ha ri Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne ba da la/ a ta ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /? b+hti nya 'gengs ba
24a4(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes ba'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin bas/ laTa'i ba rasmai pa da la/ b+ha ra ti/ sogs dang/ At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ b+ha ra te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ b+ha ret/ soD dang/ tang la khtar ta/ soD so/ loTa'i at da lakhtar tu/ soD tang la/ b+ha ra tA/ sogs so/ lang
24a5(mdo 'grel): gi a tad la/ a b+ha rat/ sogs dang/ tad la/ a b+ha ra ta/ sogs so/ /lud gi a tad la/ sitsal 'phel bzhes sags kyi mdos 'phel ba byas bas/ a b+hA rShIt/ a b+hA rShAM?/ a b+hArSha(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ lung gi tad la/ re las kyang ngos/ kit yin bas yon tan mi byed/
24a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs thung du las so zhes pa'i mdos rnam dbye dzhal dang po rnams la sits dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a b+h+ri ta/ a b+h+ri ShA tAM/ a b+h+ri Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la kri sri b+h+raM sogs kyi wal dang po rnams la iT mi 'jug ste/ a tad gi skyes bu dang po gsum ba/ ba b+hAr/ ba
24a7(mdo 'grel): b+h+rA tu(mdo 'grel): ba b+h+ru(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+harTha/ ba b+h+ra thu(mdo 'grel): baptra?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ babtAra/ babtA ra pha b+h+ri ba/ ba b+h+ri ma/ tad gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+re/ ba b+h+rA te/ ba b+h+ri re/ skyes bur bus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+ri She ba b+h+rA the/ ba b+h+ri Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba
24b1(mdo 'grel): b+h+re/ ba b+h+ri ba he/ ba b+h+ri ma he/ luT la 'grel par iT yang na bar bshad pas/ a tad la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA si/ sogs sam/ b+hartA/ b+hartA si/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA se/ sogs sam/ b+hartA/ b+hartA se/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling gi a tad la/ sha yak ling
24b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la ring 'os ri ring du bsgyur bas/ b+h+rI yAt/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ri las kyang ngos kit yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/ b+h+ri ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ lriT dang lriD la/ rit han dag gi sya la 'os/ iT byin pas/ lriTa'i a tad la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ tad la/ b+ha ri
24b3(mdo 'grel): Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lrid ga a tad la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a b+ha re Sh+ya ta/ soD so/ /dga? na kun nas 'gems pa la'o zhes pa la/ mAn ba d+ha dAn sogs kyi san dang san la at kyi 'os/ a b+hya sa it mAn ba d+ha dA na sogs kyi a'it bu bsgyur ba sogs kyis
24b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs bas/ dI dAnsa zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs At+ma ne ba da rnams sbyor te/ byings nyid gnyis ka'i tshig can yin kyang san mdza' la tang rnams 'gyur zhes bshad de/ laT la/ dI dAnsa te/ sogs so/ /lid la/ dI dAnse ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ rI dAnsa tAM/ sogs so/ /
24b5(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a dI dAnsa ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ thal dang po'i iT dang/ at kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/ a dI dAnsi Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyis Am sbyar bas/ dA dAnsAM?  ca kre/ dI dAnsA ba b+hU ba/ dI dAnsa mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la yang iT byin bas/ dI dAnsi tA/ soD
24b6(mdo 'grel): so/ /smon pa'i lang la/ dI dAnsi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ dI dAnsi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lrid la/ a dI dAnsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` shAn rno ba la'o zhes pa la yang san sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ shI shAnsaM te sogs cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag ba dAn gyi skabs su bshad
24b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang 'dra'o/ ` /b+ha dza bsnyan pa la'o zhes pa la'o zhes pa gnyis ka'i tshig can bas laT sogs ba rasmai ba da rnams dang At+ma ne ba da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ b+ha dza taM/ sogs dang/ tad la/ b+ha dza te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tad la/ b+ha dze ta/ sogs
25a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ tad la/ b+ha dze ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tad la/ b+ha dza tu/ sogs dang/ tad la/ b+ha dza tAM/ sogs so/ /lad gi a tad la/ a b+ha dzat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a b+ha dza ta/ sogs so/ /lud la tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ /khar la tsar 'os/ /ga ka/ dzhas
25a2(mdo 'grel): las dzha la 'os rnam dbye dzhal dang po rnams la si tsa 'jig/ dzhal ma yin pa rnams la/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hAk+ShIt/ a ba k+tAM/ a b+hAk+Shu? skyes bu dngus ma gsum la/
25a3(mdo 'grel): a b+hA k+ShI(mdo 'grel): a b+hAk+taM/ a b+hAk+ta/ skyes bu byi ma gsum la/ a b+ha klaM ya b+hA kla/ /a b+hA k+Sh+ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+h+dzak+ta/ a b+hAk+ShA tAM/ a b+hAk+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+hAk+ShA(mdo 'grel): a b+hAk+ShA thI/ bad b+ha sogs kyis 'phal ga a b+hAgd+haM?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
25a4(mdo 'grel): la/ a b+hAk+Shi/ a btA hi/ a stA k+ShA? hi/ liT la/ byings gnyis brjod kit rnams la/ tI ga la b+ha dza/ tra pa las kyang dos/ a b+hyAs dbye ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a tad gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+ha thabti? dza ?  :b+he dzu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
25a5(mdo 'grel): b+he dza thi?/ b+ha b+ha k+tha/ b+he dza thu(mdo 'grel): b+he dza skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+hA dza/ ba b+ha dza/ b+he dzi ba/ b+he dzi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ b+hi dza bte dzA te/ b+he dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+he dzi She/ b+he dzA the/ b+he dzi b+hwe/ b+he dziDhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+he dze/ b+he dzi ba he/ b+he
25a6(mdo 'grel): dzi ma he/ /luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dzag/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga gar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a tad la/ b+hak+ta/ b+ha gtA si/ sogs dang/ tad la/ b+hak+ta/ b+hak+tA se/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling gi a tad la/ b+ha dzyA ta/ b+ha dzyA stAM/ b+ha dzyA suT sogs dang/ tang la/ tsu'i ku
25a7(mdo 'grel): 'os/ dza ba/ /bar la tsar 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ b+ha k+ShISh+Ta/ g+hak+ShI yAstAM/ b+hak+ShI ra ni/ sogs so/ /liT la'ang bshad mthag pa'i cho ga dang mthun par bsgrubs pas/ a tad la/ b+hak+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ tad la/ b+hak+Sh+ya te/ sogs so//
25b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a b+hyak+Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ tad la/ a b+hak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` shinya bsten pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTO a tad la/ sh+ra ya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ sh+ra ya te?/
25b2(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tad la/ sh+ra yet/ sogs dang/ tad la/ sh+ra ye ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tad la/ sh+ra ya tu/ sogs dang/ tad la/ sh+ra ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tad la/ a sh+ra yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a sh+ra ya ta/ sogs so/ /lud la
25b3(mdo 'grel): Ni Sh+ri dru sogs kyis tsli? tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hal ltag po dos/ ra phyis/ atsa la byings sh+nu sogs kyi i ya sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ a shi shi ya ta/ a shi sh+ri ya tAM/ a shi sh+ri yan/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a shi
25b4(mdo 'grel): sh+ri? ya ta/ a shi sh+ri ya tAM/ /a shi shI yan+ta/ sogs so/ /leT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swany+dza las brtsegs pa la liTa'i kit yang na'o zhes bas lung 'dren gyi kit kyi brda chad yang na bar byas bas/ ki ti kyi phyogs
25b5(mdo 'grel): la i ya dang kit ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byed de/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shing la/ shi ta? ya tu(mdo 'grel): shi sh+ri ya tu(mdo 'grel): shi sh+ra ya yu(mdo 'grel): shi sh+ri yu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shi sh+ra yi tha/ shi sh+ra yathu:/ shi sh+ri ya thu(mdo 'grel): shi sha ya/ shi sh+ri ya/ skyes bu phyi ma
25b6(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ shi sh+rA ya/ sh+ri sha ya/ shi sh+ra yi ba/? shi sh+ri yi ba/ shi sh+ra yim/ shi sh+ri yi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la'ang/ shi sh+ra ye/ shi sh+ri ye/ shi sh+ra yA te/ shi sh+ri yA te/ sogs so/ /luT la wa la dang po'i iT byin/ byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/
25b7(mdo 'grel): atar la/ sh+ra yetA/ sh+ra yi tra si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ sh+ra yi tA/ sh+ra yi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i yid gyi a tang la/ /git ma ta/ yin pa sogs/ sA tAM?/ kyis ring po byas bas/ shI yAt/ sh+rI yAstAM. sh+rI yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la iT byings bas/ sh+ra yi ShI ?/ sh+ra ya/
26a1(mdo 'grel): ShI yAstAM sh+ra yiShI ngan?/ sogs so/ /lriT? la'ang iT byin ras? yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ sh+ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ sh+ra yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a sha yiSh+yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a sh+ra yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so
26a2(mdo 'grel): ` rany+dza tshos la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai ba da rnams dang/ At+ma ne ba da gnyis ka 'jug go /rany+dze shtsa/ rany+dza'i 'ang ngo/ /rany+dza'i na yang byed pa po'i don gyi shab pa rol la dbyi ste/ na phyis pas/ la Ta'i a tang la/ ra dza ti/ sogs dang/
26a3(mdo 'grel): tang la/ ra dza te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ ra dze ta /sogs dang/ tang la/ ra dze ta/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i a tang la/ ra dza tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ra dza tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a ra dza ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a ra dza ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/
26a4(mdo 'grel): tsu'i? ku 'os/ dza ga/ bar la tsar 'os/ ga ka /kun nas bsgyur ba soD kyis sa sha dang rnaMs dbyadzta? la? dang po rnaMs la/ dzhal las dzhal la 'os/ si ca dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ pad b+h+ra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba'ang bya ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a rAM k+Shit/ a rAM k+tAM/

26a6(mdo 'grel): yang na bar byang de/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum lar rany+dza/ ra rany+dza tu(mdo 'grel): ra ra dzatu(mdo 'grel): ra rany+dzu:/ ra ra dzu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ra rany+dzi tha/ ra rakA/ ra riny+dza thu(mdo 'grel): ra ra dza thu(mdo 'grel): ra rany+dza/ ra ra dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra rany+dza/ da rany+dzi ba/ ra ra dzi ga ra rany+dzi ma/ ra ra dzi ma/

26b1(mdo 'grel): ra ra dzi ba he/ ra rany+dzi ma he/ ra ra dzi ma he/ luT la/ tsu'i ku dang khar la tsar byas pas/ a tang la/ raM k+tA/ raM k+tA si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ raM k+tA/ raM k+tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ it ma yin pa sogs kyin phyis pas/ ra dz+nyA ta/ ra dzyA stAM/ ra dz+nyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ cu'i
26b2(mdo 'grel): ku 'o dang/ khar la tsar kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ raM k+ShI Sh+Ta/ raM k+ShI yAstAM/ raM k+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriTM? la'ang tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ raM k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ raM k+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a raM k+Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/
26b3(mdo 'grel): a raM k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ` /twi Sha 'bar la'o zhes pa 'ang gnyis ka'i tshig tsan yin pas laT sogs kyi pa rasmai pa da dang/ A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/ lan 'it? a tang la/ te Sha ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ twe Sha te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ twe Shet/ sogs dang/ tang

26b5(mdo 'grel): Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ a twi k+Shat/ a twi k+Sha tAM/ a twi k+Shan/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a twi k+Sha ta/ a twi k+ShA ta/ sogs so/ /liT 'phel pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swany+dza sogs
26b6(mdo 'grel): kyi las 'dren gyis ki te du yang na bar byas/ a tang la/ ti twe Sha/ ti twe Sha tu(mdo 'grel): ti Twi Shu tu/ :ti twi ShU:ti twi Shu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ti twi? 26b7(mdo 'grel): gli? skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ti twe Shi/ ti twi She/ ti twe ShA te/ ti twi ShA te/ ti twe Shi re/ ti twa ShI re/ skye bu dbus ma gsum la/ ti twe Shi Sha/ thal/ thal/ ti twe Shi She/ ti twe ShA the/ ti twi ShA the/ ti twe ShI d+hwe/ ti twi ShI d+hwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ti twe She/ ti twi She/ ti twe Shi ba he/ ti twi Shi ba he/
27a1(mdo 'grel): te twe Shi ma he/ ti twi Shi mahe/ luoT? la/ buk mdza' sogs kyi yon tan dang/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ya tang la/ twESh+TA/ tweSh+TA si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ tweSh+TA/ twe Sh+TA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi
27a2(mdo 'grel): a tang la/ twi Sh+yAta/ twi Sh+yA stA/ twi Sh+yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ sa la Sha Dha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ twa k+ShISh+Ta/ twik+ShI yAstAM/ twi k+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang Sha gar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas//
27a3(mdo 'grel): a tang la/ twe k+Sh+ya te/ sogs dang/ tang la/ twe k+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lrid gi a tang la/ a twe k+Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a twek+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` ya dza lha mchod pa dang/ 'grogs par byed pa dang sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes ba'ang gnyig ka'i tshig can
27a4(mdo 'grel): yin pas/ a tang dang/ tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ ya dza ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ya dza te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ ya dze ta/ /sogs dang/ tang la/ ya dze ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ ya dza tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ya dza tAM/ sogs
27a5(mdo 'grel): so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a a dza ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a ya dza ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi dzhal dang po rnams la/ dzha la las dzha la la 'os/ si tsa phyis/ bra Sh+Na? b+h+rasdza? sogs kyis dzaSha/ kha? 27a6(mdo 'grel): b+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yAk+Shitra/ a yASh+TAM/ a yA k+Shu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yAk+Shit(mdo 'grel): a yASh+TaM/ a yASh+TaM?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a A k+ShaM/ a yA k+Sha
27a7(mdo 'grel): a yA k+ShA?/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yaSh+Ta/ a yak+ShA tAM/ a yak+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bar b+h+rad ja sogs kyis 'phel ba/ a yaSh+ThA(mdo 'grel): a yak+ShA thAM/ a yaDnyaM?/ dzha la las zhes pas son? phyis mdza' dz+nya? la rnams kyi dze sha 'os Sha Da Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os dta Dta skye bu phyis ma gsum la/ a ya k+Shi/
27b1(mdo 'grel): a yak+Sha hi/ a yak+Sha hI/ li Tya b+hya sa syo b+ha ye ShAM/ liT la gnyis rnam kyi a b+hyA sa'i 'o/ /liT pha rol la gnyis rnams te ba tsa la sogs pa rnams dad gwah la soD pa rnaMs kyes abgyA sa'i saM pra sA ra Na ri 'gyur te/ ya dza ba tsa sogs kyi nad tshan yin pas/ liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig
27b2(mdo 'grel): tshig la/ i yA dza/ ba tsa swi pa yi dzA dI nI ki ti/ pa tsi swa pi ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi kit la'o/ /ba tsa 'chad pa/ nyi Shwa pa nyal pa gnyas dang ya ja la sogs pa rnam kyi ka 'gro ba'i ming? can pha rol la a b+hyA sa yod na gnyis ka dang a b+hyA sa med kyang ya Na 'i yi ge rnamS
27b3(mdo 'grel): sam pra sA raN? ra 'gyur te/ li Ta'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sA dza tu(mdo 'grel): a'i dzu:skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i ya dzi tha/ i yaSh+Tha/ a'i dza thu(mdo 'grel): i dza/ sky bu phyi ma gsum la/ i yA dza/ i ya dza/ a'i dzi ga a'i dzi ma/ de bzhin du/ hang gi sgyes bu
27b4(mdo 'grel): dang bo gsum la/ a'i dze/ a'i dzA te/ a'i dza rai/? skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ anyi? dzi She/ a'i dzA the/ a'i dzi d+hwe/ a'i dzaDhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsuM? la/ a'i the a'i dzi ra he/ a'i dzi mahe luT la khra shca? b+h+rasdza? soD kyis? rdi? Sha Sha Tu? la Sha Tu 'o na ma brashtsa b+h+rasdza sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha nu la Sha Tu sogs kyi a ha da la/ yaSh+Ta/ yaSh+TA si?
27b5(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ yaSh+Tu/ yaSh+TA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ pa tsi swa pi ya ja la sogs ba rnams kyi kita la'os sa pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ i dzyAta i dzyAstI/ i dzyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ brashca b+h+rasdza? sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha Dha di ga gi ka 'os/
27b6(mdo 'grel): Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis yak+ShISh+Ta/ yak+Shi yAstI/ yak+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang dza Shar bas ra ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ yak+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ yak+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a yak+Shat/ sogs dang/
27b7(mdo 'grel): tang la/ /sa yak+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /`? tu? ba pa sa bon 'debs pa la'o? zhes ba la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ la Ta'i a tang la/ ba pa ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba pa te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ ba pe ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba pa ta/ sogs so/ /
28a1(mdo 'grel): loTa'i a tang la/ ba pa tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba pa tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a ba pat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a ba pa ta/ sogs so/ /lung la dzha la dang po can rnams la/ dzha la las dzha la la 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/
28a2(mdo 'grel): a tang gi skye sbu dang po gsum la/ a babsIta/ a babtAM/ a babsu(mdo 'grel): /skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a babsI:/ a baptaM/ a bapta/ skye bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bapsaM/ a bapsma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skye bu dang po gsum la/ a babsat/ a babsA thAM/ a babsa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsuM?
28a3(mdo 'grel): la/ a babthA(mdo 'grel): a babpwA? thAM/ a babd+hwaM?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bapse/ a bapswa hi/ a babsa hi/ liT la ketam? yin pa rnams la/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+hya sa'i 'os/ a b+hyA sa saM/ pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang/ kit rnams la ba tsi/ swa bi/ ya dza sogs kyi
28a4(mdo 'grel): mngos gnyis ka saM pra sAr dzha la las dzda? la 'os sitsa phyis mdza' dzha la rnams kyi dza ha 'os ba ga Nar bsgyur nas/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po sogs byas pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum/ la u bA pa/ a'u pa tu(mdo 'grel): a'u pu(mdo 'grel): skye bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba pi tha/ a'u ba b+hA/ a'u pa thu:
28a5(mdo 'grel): a'u ba skye sbu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA pa/ u ba pa/ a'u pi ba/ a'u pi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang rnams la/ a'u pe/ a'u bA te/ a'u pi re/ sogs so/ /lu Ta'i a tang la/ baptA/ babtA si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ babtA/ babtA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ba tsa swa pi ya dza
28a6(mdo 'grel): sogs kyi sa ma pra sA ra Na byas pas/ u byAt/ u pyAstAM/ u pyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ bapsISh+Ta/ bapsi yAstwaM/ bapsI ra na/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang pa 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba gzhan med de/ a tang la/ babsya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ babsya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du//
28a7(mdo 'grel): lring gi a tang la/ a bapsya ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a bapsyat/ sogs so/ ` /ba ha thob par byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang/ tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laT li a tang la/ ba ha ti/ soD dang/ tang la/ ba ha te/ soD so/ /li gi a tang la/ ba he ta/ so so dang?/ /tang la/ ba he ta/
28b1(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loT la/ ba ha tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba ha tAM/ sogs so/ /lad gi a tang la/ a ba ha ta/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a ba ha ta/ sogs so/ /lud la/ dzha la dang po can ma yin pa rnams la ha'i Dha 'os/ haDha/ sa la Sha Dha dag gi ka 'os/
28b2(mdo 'grel): Dha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha re bsgyur ba sogs dang/ dzhal dang po rnams la/ h+ra Dh+ra/ dzhal las dzhal la 'os si tsa phyis/ d+hA ma yin ba sogs kyis ta dang tha dag d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha Dha/ Dha'i Dha la dbyi 'os Dha gong ma phyis sa ha'i ba ha dag gi a yig gi
28b3(mdo 'grel): ot 'os/ a ot du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a wAk+ShI ha/ a bo DhAM/ a nyA k+Shu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a wAk+ShI(mdo 'grel): a bo DhaM/ a bo Dha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a wAk+ShwaM /a wAk+Shwa/ a wAk+Sh+ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu
28b4(mdo 'grel): dang po gsum la/ a bi? Dha/ a wak+ShA tAM/ a bak+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bo DhA(mdo 'grel): a bak+ShA thAM/ bad btra? dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/ a bo DhwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bak+Shi/ a ba k+Sha hi/ a bak+ShA? hi/ liT la kit min pa rnams la liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis mdos
28b5(mdo 'grel): a b+hyA sa/ saM bra sA ra Na dang/ kit rnams la/ watsa swa bi yang sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra Na ra 'gyur ba sogs byas bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA ha/ A ha tu(mdo 'grel): a'u hu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba hi tha/ u bo Dha thAl/ A ha thu(mdo 'grel): a'u ha/ skyes bu phyi
28b6(mdo 'grel): ma gsum la/ u bA ta/ u ba ta/ a'u hi ba/ A hi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la/ u he/ a'u tA te/ a'u hi re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ ha'i Dha/ d+hA ma yin pa sogs kyis ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha Dha/ Dha'i Dha la dbyi 'os Dha gong ma phyis/ sa hi ba ha sogs kyis ot tu bskyud
28b7(mdo 'grel): ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ po DhA/ bo DhA pi/ sogs dang tang la/ bo DhA/ bo DhAs/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pa ye dza sogs kyis sa pra sA ra Na byas bas/ u hyAt/ u hyAstAM/ u hyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ ha'i? Dha 'os/ ha Dha/ sa la Sha Dha dag gis/
29a1(mdo 'grel): 'os/ Dha ka?/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ wak+ShISh+Ta/ bak+Shi yAstAM/ bak+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang ha Dha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ wak+ShA ti/ bak+Sh+ya? ta(mdo 'grel): pa k+Sh+ya? mti sogs dang/ tang la/ bak+Sh+ya te/
29a2(mdo 'grel): bak+Sh+ye te/ bak+Sh+ya n+te/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a bak+Sh+ya ta/ ak+Sh+ya tA/ a bak+Sh+ya na/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a bak+Sh+ya ha/ a bak+Sh+ye hAM/ a bak+Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ ma? benya thags thag pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs a tang dang tang
29a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka 'jug ste/ la Ta'i a tang la/ ba la ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ ba yet/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba yet/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i? a tang la/ ba ya tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ ba ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a ba yat
29a4(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ a ba a ha/ sogs so/ /lung gi a tang la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa At/ yam/ ram nam At rnams kyi sak 'ang ngos/ iT dang sak byin pas/ skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ a bA sIt/ A bA siDDA/ a bA si Shu:/ skyes bu dbus
29a5(mdo 'grel): ma gsum la/ a bA sI:a bA siSh+TaM/ a bA siShta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bA si ShaM/ a bA siShwa/ a bA siSh+ma/ tang la sa 'dren ba ma gtogs ba ba lhag bo med de/ skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ a bAsta/ a bA sA tAM/ a bA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bAs+thA
29a6(mdo 'grel): a bA sA thAM/ a bA d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a wa si/ a bA swa hi/ a bAsma hi/ liD la/ beny nyid du gnas pa dang/ ba yi ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs gnyis 'byung ste bany nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs ls/ beny:be nya'i 'o/ gong du liT la gnyis rnams kyi zhes sogs kyis
29a7(mdo 'grel): beny ba tsa'i? sogs d+ha la 'ang ngos saM tsa byis pa'o/ /khong yin kyang de'i dmigs bsal/ liT pha rol la be nya'i saM pra sAr Na mi byed de/ beny la ling sbyar bas/ a tang gi skye bu dang po gsum la/ ba bau?/ At las Nal byi aau 'os/ Nal aau/ iT las kyang At kyi dbyi 'os a phyis ba su tu:/ ba bu:/ skyes
29b1(mdo 'grel): bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba bi tha/ ba bA tha/ ba ba thu:/ ba ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba bau/ ba bi pa/ ba bi ma/ tang la'ang iT las kyang At/ kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ skye pu dang po gsum la/ ba be/ ba bA te/ ba bI re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba bi She/ ba bA
29b2(mdo 'grel): the/ ba bi d+he/ ba bi Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba be/ ba bi ba he/ ba bi ma he/ yang phyogs gcig la/ be nyo ba yi(mdo 'grel): be nya'i wa yi'o/ /beny ni liT pha rol la ba yi zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ li Ta'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ beny/ wa yi ru bsgyur i
29b3(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i ngo na yin pas phyis/ a b+hya sa med ba sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos/ a b+hyu? sa saM gra sA ra Nar byas pas/ u bA ya/ gnyis tshig la byings gnyis brjod/ ba tsi swa bi yadza sogs kyi mdos/ ba gnyis ka saM pra sA
29b4(mdo 'grel): ra Nar ba sgyur/ ak 'dra ba la ring po 'o so ring por bsgyur bas/ a'u yra/ sa tus zhes pa la/ gra hi dzyA ba yi bya b+hi baSh+Ti bi tsa ti bri shtsa ti bri tsha? ti b+huM dzDA? tI nAM di hi tsa gra hi dzyA ba yi byA d+hI baSh+Ti baM tsa ti bri shtsa ti pri tsha ti d+hidzdza ti rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la'ang ngo/ /gra ha nye bar len pa/ dzyA lad tsho
29b5(mdo 'grel): nyams pa/ pa yi ste/ beny snal ma'i rgyud bya d+ha bsnun pa/ ba sha mdzis? pa'i baSh+Ti/ bo ca da tha dang du 'gyur ba/ byashtshu? gcod pa/ prats+tsha shes par 'dod ba/ b+h+ra dzdza 'tshed pa rnams kyi yaN so sor bsdu pa'i yaM ge rnams ni rkyen ka 'gro ba'i ming can dang/ nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol
29b6(mdo 'grel): la saM bra sAn? Nar 'gyur ro/ /khi Dim yo ya(mdo 'grel): liT la ba ya'i ya'o/ /bshad mthan? ba brit? dzyA ba yi/ sogs kyi mdos/ ba ya'i ya yang i ru 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i dmigs pas la/ liT ki ta pha rol la ba ya'i ya yig ni saM pra sU ra Nar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /bashtsA syA n+ya ta ra syAM ki ti kit la de'i 'ang? wa? ya
29b7(mdo 'grel): yang/ /lrit kit pha rol la de'i ste wa ya'i ya yig gi sa pra sA ra Nar mi 'gyur bar bshad pa de ni wa yig tu yag na 'gyur te/ yu dang wa yang na bar byas pas/ a'u ya tu:a'u ba tu:/ de bzhin du/ mang tshig la/ a'u yu:/ a'u bu(mdo 'grel): skye bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba yi tha
30a1(mdo 'grel): a'u ya thu:/ a'u ba thu(mdo 'grel): a'u ya/ a'ue ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u wa ya/ Nal ab ya a'u yi wa/ a'u bi ba/ a'u yi ma/ a'u bi ma/ tang la'ang de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a'u ye/ a'u be/ a'u yA te/ a'u bA te/ a'u/ yi re/ /a'u bi re/ skyes
30a2(mdo 'grel): bu dbus ma gsum la/ A yi She ma ? a'u be She/ a'u a/ yA the/ a'u bA the/ a'u yi d+hwe/ A yi DtO?/ a'u bi d+h+dtwa? a'uM baDhwe /skyes bu phyi ma gsuM la/ ? a'u ye/ a'u be/ a'u/ ma yi ba hi/ a'u bi ba hi/ a'u yi ma hi/ ma hi/ a'u bi ma hi/ luT la/ Sha/ ta 'gro ba ma yin pa A tAM/ sogs kyis dzta e tsa At du
30a3(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba ma gtogs bya ba gzhan/ thas/ med pas/ a tang la/ A thAM/ bA tA/ bA tA si/ soD dang tang la d+hwaM bA tA/ bA hA se/ sogs so/ iT/ smon pa'i ling ba te gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ krit ma yin ba sogs kyis ring po byas pas/
30a4(mdo 'grel): A yAt/ a'u yAstAM/ A yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /tang la bya ba gzhan med/ bA sISh+Ta/ pA sI yAtA/ bA sA ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang a tsa At du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ wA sya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ wA sya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a ba sya ta
30a5(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la a ba sya ta/ sogs so/ /` byeny kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/ laTa'i a tang la/ bya ya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ bya ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ bya yet/ sogs dang/ tang la bya ye ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i
30a6(mdo 'grel): a tang la/ bya ya tu/ sogs dang/ tang la/ bya ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ ya bya yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a bya yat/ sogs so/ /lud gi a tang la/ yam/ ram/ At rnams kyis ka'ang ngos/ sak dang it byin pas/ a byA sIt/ a byA siSh+TI/
30a7(mdo 'grel): a byA si Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a byAsta/ a byA A tAM/ a byAs ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a byAs+thA(mdo 'grel): a byA sA thAM/ a byA trwaM/ nga la rang ngos si tsa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a byA si/ a byA swa hi/ a byAsma hi/ na byo laM Ti/ byA'i liT la
30b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin no/ /bye nyi'i etsa ni li tsa pa rol la At du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ byeny la liT/ liT la/ gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos/ a b+hyA sa saM pra sA ra Na byas/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ bi byA ya/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ byeny(mdo 'grel): ki ti li Ti saM pra A
30b2(mdo 'grel): ra NaM bA/ byenya'i liT kit la saM pra sA ra Na yang na'o/ /byenya'i a b+hya sa ra ma zad liT kit pha rol la gnyis ka saM pra sAr Na ra ra yang na 'gyur te/ a b+hya sa nyid saM pra snye ra Na byas pa'i phyogs kyi rnam dbyes a tsa Nal dang po can rnams la/ a tsa'i a ya a wa sogs dang
30b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na'i phyogs la i ka gi ats la ya Na byis pas/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis la/ bi bya ya tu:/ bi bya tu:bi bya yu:bi b+hyu:/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bya yi tha/ bi bya ya thu:/ bi bya thu:/ byi bya ya/ bi bya/ skyes bu byi ma
30b4(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ bi byA ya/ bi bya ya/ bi bya yi ba/ bi byi ba/ bi bya yi ma/ pi byi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la yang/ art+ti arti bya a ti rnams kyi i Ta 'os/ bi? bye? ye/ bi bye/ bi bya yA te/ bi byA te/ bi bya yi ra/ bi byi re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ thal la iT yang na bar mi byed/ shit ma yin
30b5(mdo 'grel): pa sogs kyis etsa At du bsgyur pas/ a tang la/ byA tA/ byA tA si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ byA tA/ byA tA se/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ti shit ma yin ba/ A TAM /sogs kyis dzha ets At/ bci swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na dang/ krit ma yin pa so Ta
30b6(mdo 'grel): kyis ring po byas pas/ bI yAt/ bI yAstAM/ bI yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tang la/ byA sISh+Ta/ byA sI yAsti/ sogs so/ /lriT la e tsa a ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la bya sya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ byA sya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ a byA syat/ soD
30b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ tang la/ a byA syat/ sogs so/ /` ?ny 'gran pa la ste sgra la yang ngo zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/ la Ta'i a tang la/ hwa yi te/ sogs dang/ tang la/ hwa ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ hA ya ta/ soD so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ hA ? 'oD? dang
31a1(mdo 'grel): tang la/ hwa ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a hwa yat/ sogs dang/ tang la/ a hwa yat/ sogs so/ /li pi si tsi hwa shtsa/ li pi si tsi hwA las kyang ngo/ /li pa byug pa Shi tsa 'dzag pa/ hwAM 'gran pa rnams las kyang tslini ang du 'gyur te ? du
31a2(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ iT la'ang At kyi dbyi 'os a phyis a tang la/ a hwat/ a hwa tAM/ a hwa na/ sogs so/ /tang la yang na par byed de/ At+manE pa de Shwa n+ya ha ra syAM/ At+mane pa da rnams la ma na'o/ /le pa/ Shi tsa/ hwA rnams las At+ma ni pa da rnams pha rol la tsli ang du bsgyur ba dang/
31a3(mdo 'grel): si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ tsli ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la A phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hwa ta/ a hwe tlaM?/ a twa hwan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hwa thA(mdo 'grel): a hwe thAM/ a hwAnda?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hwe/ a hwA bahi/ a hwA ma hi/ tssi si tsa?
31a4(mdo 'grel): ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ e tsa Atadu bsgyur ba kho na sto/ A hwAste/ a twa sA tAM/ a hwa sa ha/ sogs so/ /a b+hyastya sya tsa/ a b+hyasha'i 'a da ngo/ /liT pha rol la hwA'i? a b+hyasta'i sa b+ha sA ra Nar 'gyur ta/ hwA la liT/ a b+hyasta ste gnyis ka saM bra sA ra Na byas/ kit ma yin?
31a5(mdo 'grel): ba rnams la 'phel ba dang yon tan/ kat? rnams la/ a tsa la sh+ya? byings? sogs kyi ub byas bas/ at dag gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzuhA ga dzu hA ba tu(mdo 'grel): dzu hu bu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzu ha bi tha/ dzu ho tha/ dzu hu ba thu(mdo 'grel): dzu hu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzu hA ga dzu ha ga
31a6(mdo 'grel): dzu tu bi ba/ dzu tu bi ma/ de bzhin/ /tang la'ang/ dzu hu ba/ dzu hu bA? te/ dzu hu bi ri/ luD la shit ma yin pa sogs kyis a ce At du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ hwA tA hwA tA si/ sogs dang/ tang la/ hwA tA/ hwA hA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po'i
31a7(mdo 'grel): yang na 'os/ e At du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ hwA yAt/ hwA yAsta/ hwA yA su sogs sam/ hwe yAt/ hwe yA stAM?/ hwe yA su:sogs so/ tang la/ e tsa At du bsgyur bas/ hwA sISh+Ta/ hwA sI yAstAM/ hwA si ran/ sogs so/ /lri ru la'ang e tse At du bsgyur bas/ a tang
31b1(mdo 'grel): hwA sya ti/ sogs dang/ tang la/ hwa sya ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring gi a tang la/ atwA syat/ sor dang tang la a hwAsyat/ soD so/ /bas nges par gnas ba la'o zhes pa pa rasmai pa da tsan yin pas laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ ba sa ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ba se ta/ sogs so/ /loT
31b2(mdo 'grel): laT ba sa tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a ba sa te/ sogs so/ /sasyArd+hA rd+hA tu ke /byings byed pa la sa'i 'o?/ /byings phyed pas yig dang po can pha rol la ba sa'i sa yig ni ta yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ was la lung sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ aShbA? t+su? ti?/ a wAt+tAM/ a bAt+su:skyes bu
31b3(mdo 'grel): dbus ma gsum la/ /a wut+si:a bAn+taM/ a bAt+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bAt+se/ a bAt+sA?/ a bAtshwa/? shU si ba si g+ha sI nAM tsa/ shA si ba si g+ha si rnams kyi 'ang ngo/ /shA su rjes su ston pa/ ba sa ngas? par gnas pa/ b+ha sli? za ba rnams kyis yig? ba bA? dza? sogs kyis 'phel pa/ dzhal? las
31b4(mdo 'grel): lal 'os si ca phyis/ ni iN so sor bsdu ba'i yig dang ka yig spron ma las Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ ba sa la/ laT byin?/ kaM? ta ma yin pa rnams la lit la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi a d+hyA sa si bra sAr Nar bsgyur ba dang/ kit? rnams la/ brtsi swa pi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra?
31b5(mdo 'grel): sAr? Na dang/ mdo 'dis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u pA sa/ u sha tu:au Sh+ya?(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum pa/ u ba saM tha /u bas+tha/ a'u ma? thu:a'a Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA sa/ a'u ba sa/ a'u Shi ka a'u Shi ma/ luT la bastA/ bastA ro/ bastA ra(mdo 'grel): bastA
31b6(mdo 'grel): si/ sogs dang/ smon pa'i ling la/ ba ci sba bi sogs kyi? saM pra sA ra Na dang/ shI sa pa saM g+hi sa sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ /uSh+ya ta/ u Sh+yAstM/ a'u Sh+yA su:sogs so/ /lriT la/ byings phyed pa la sa'i 'os sa tar bsgyur bas khat+sya ti/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du lring la/ a
31b7(mdo 'grel): bat+syat/ sogs so/ ` /ba da gsal par brjod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang ba rasmai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ ba da ti/ sogs dang/ ling la/ ba da to/ sogs? so/ /long? la/ ba da tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a pa da ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ba la dang po'i iT dang/ bang b+h+ra dza sogs kyis 'phel
32a1(mdo 'grel): ba byas pas/ a bA dI ta a bA diSh+TaM/ a pA di Shu:sogs so/ /liT la/ ki tam yin pa rnams la/ liT la gnyis kyi sogs kyis a b+hya sa sa ma pra sA ra Na dang/ kit
32a2(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ ba tsi sA bi sogs kyis gnyis ka sam pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ u bA da/ a'u da tu(mdo 'grel): a'u du:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba di tha/ a'ud thuM(mdo 'grel): a'u da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsuM
32a3(mdo 'grel): la/ u dA da/ u ba da/ a'u di ba/ a'u di ma/ luT la wa la dang bo'i iT sbyar bas/ ba di tA/ ba di tA rau/ ba di tA ra:/ ba di tA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ udyA ta u dyAstAM/ u dyA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la/ iT
32a4(mdo 'grel): byin pas/ ba di Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du lrid la/ a ba di Sh+yat/ sogs so/ ` /Tu o shwaM? 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes ba'ang pa/ ba cis pi sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ rasmai pa da can yin bas/ laT sogs

33a2(mdo 'grel): yul b+hU la sogs pa rnams las/ byings gzhan don gyi tshig can pa rasmai pa da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye ba rasmai ba da rnams sbyor tshul dang/ byings bdag don gyi tshig can At+ma ne ba da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams skyor? tshul/

'os gnyis dag gis cig pha rol gyi gzugs/ he dzhi(mdo 'grel): hu dzhal rnams las hi'i d+hi'o/ /hu sbyin pa dang byings mdza' dzhA la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams las pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi du 'gyur te/ ad+d+hi/ ang la/ laT sha pa/ id sogs kyis shab phyis/ la sa

36b2(mdo 'grel): Nal gnyis la/ han+ti'i hinyni ni rnams la 'os ha g+ha/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos 'phel ba/ kit rnams la gam han sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ han+ti'i hi sogs kyis ha g+har bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ dza g+hA na/ dza g+ha tu(mdo 'grel): dza g+hU(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma'i
36b3(mdo 'grel): gcig tshig la/ a b+hyA sAts+tsha/ a b+hyA sa las kyang ngo/ /a b+hyA sa las kyang pha rol gyi han gyi ha ni g+ha ru bsgyur te/ dza g+ha ni tha/ dza g+han+tha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza g+ha thu(mdo 'grel): dza g+h+na/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza g+hA na/ dza g+hA na/ dza g+h+ri pa/
36b4(mdo 'grel): dza g+h+naM ma/ luT la/ han+ta/ han+tA rau/ han+tA ra(mdo 'grel): han+tA si/ sogs so/ /ha no pa d+ha li di/ ling la han gyi ba d+ha'o/ /smon pa'i ling pha rol la han ni ba zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ han la/ smon ling/ mdo 'dis ba d+har bsgyur/ at kyi dbyi la
36b5(mdo 'grel): a phyis pas/ ba d+hyA ta/ ba d+hyA stAM/ pa d+hyA su:/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ rit han dag gis la 'os/ iT byin pas/ ha ni Sh+ya ti/ ha ni Sh+ya ta/ ha ni Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du/ lring la/ a ha ni Sh+ya na/ a ta ni sh+yaM tAM/ a ha ni dzya na/
36b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /` dyu mngon par 'gro pa la'o/ zhes pa la a tang 'jug cing a'i sogs kyis shab kyang 'jig go /u ho brad+hirlu kiha la/ 'jig pa la hal la ut kyis 'phel pa'o/ /shap 'jig ba lta bu bar rkyen 'jig pa la rkyen hal dang po
36b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro pa'i ming can pha rol la ut kyi 'phel par 'gyur te/ rgyu la laT sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang pa'i gcig tshig la/ dyau ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dyut(mdo 'grel): tyu ban+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dyau Shi/ dyu tha(mdo 'grel): dyu tha/ skyes
37a1(mdo 'grel): bu phyi ma gsum la/ byau mi/ dyu ba(mdo 'grel): dyu ma(mdo 'grel): ling la bya ba lhag po med de/ dyu yA ta/ tyu yA tAM/ tyu yu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loT la/ te ba hal dang po can rnams la 'phel ba dang/ a ce dad po can rnams la/
37a2(mdo 'grel): ats la shU? byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dyau tu/ tyau tA ta/ dyu tAM/ dyu ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dyu hi/ dyu tAda/ dyu taM/ dyu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dya bA ni/ A Ta byin

37a5(mdo 'grel): phyi ma gsum la/ a dyau ShaM/ a tyau Shwa/ a dyau Sh+ma/ liD la/ Nal gnyis dang thal ma yin pa rnams la/ swany+da brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis kit yang na bar byas bas/ kit kyi phyogs la/ i tsa sh+nu byangs
37a6(mdo 'grel): kyi u pa dang/ gi ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du dyA ba/ du dyu ba tu(mdo 'grel): du dya ba tu:/ du dyu bu(mdo 'grel): du bya bu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du dyo tha/ du bya bi tha/ du dyu ba thu:/ du dya pa thu(mdo 'grel): du
37a7(mdo 'grel): byu ? dru rya? ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du dyA ba/ du dya ba/ du dya bi ba/ du dya bi ba/ du dyA bi ma/ du dya pi ma/ luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ dyo tA/ dyo tA rau/ dyo tA ra(mdo 'grel): dyo tI sa/

38a1(mdo 'grel): yu yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la it byin pas/ ya bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du ling la/ a ya bi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ ` /Nu bstod pa la'o/ zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor/ cho ga yu dang

40a1(mdo 'grel): a gA/ a gA ba/ a gA ma/ laT li skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ iN la liT a b+hyA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ la tib/ ti paN pa/ a tsa'i nyra? Nra? 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa'i ay ab

40b1(mdo 'grel): pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ i Nwa di ka i ti tsa bak+ta bya mi ti NAtkArya rU paM tsa/ iN 'dra bar ik ces pa'ang brjod par bya ste/ bya ba iN 'dra zhing gzugs 'ang ngo/ /ik ces pa 'di'ang iN dang 'dra bar

41a7(mdo 'grel): lriT la/ yA sya te/ sogs dang/ lring la/ a yA sya ta/ sogs so/ /bA 'gro ba dang dri ba dag la'o dang/ drA smad pa la'o gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad drA la/ smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan yang ga? rtsags ba sogs kyis a? ru bsgyur ba dang/ mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed pa'o/ /
41b1(mdo 'grel): yA dang 'dra'o/ /khyA gtam la'o/ /zhes pa'ang bshad ma thag pa rnams dang phal cher 'dra ste/ laT la/ khyA ti/ khyA ta(mdo 'grel): khyAn+ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ khyA yA ta/ khyA yA tAM/ khyA yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la/ khA tu/ khyA tAt/ khyA tAM/ khyAN+tu/ sogs so
41b2(mdo 'grel): lang la/ a khyAt/ a khyA tAM/ a khyu:/ a khyAn/ sogs so/ /a sya ti bak+ti khyA ti b+ho nyang/ a sya ti bak+ti khyA ti rnams las a nga'o/ /a su 'phen pa/ btsa brjod pa khyA gtam rnams las tsli ni ang du bsgyur te/ khyA la/ lung/ lung la cli 'os
41b3(mdo 'grel): tsli byin/ mdo 'dis tsli ang/ iT las kyang AT kyis dpyi 'os A phyis pas/ o khyat/ a khya tAM/ a khyan/ sogs so/ /liT la/ gnyis brjod/ hal dang po ltag lo/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ kha tshe/ a b+hyA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ tsha tsar bsgyur ba
41b4(mdo 'grel): sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa khyo/ tsa khya tu:/ tsa khya(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa khyi tha/ ca khya thu:/ tsa khya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa khyau tsa khyi ga tsa khyim/ luD la/ khya tA/ khyA tA ro/ khyA tA ro:/ khyA tI si/ sogs
41b5(mdo 'grel): so/ smon ba'i ling la/ gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi er bsgyur ba dang/ mi bsgyur ba yang na par byas pas/ khye yAt/ khye yAstri/ khye yA su:/ sogs sam/ khyA yAt/ khya yAsti/ khyA yA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la/ khyu sya ti/
41b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lring la/ a khyA myat/ sogs so/ /` pi da shes pa la'o zhes pa la pa ra smai ba de rnams 'jug ste/ bi di li To bA/ bed las li Ta'i yang na'o/ /bid las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i a tang gi tib la sogs pa rnams rim pa
41b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin thal la sogs pa rnams su yang na 'gyur te/ bde la/ laT/ sha ba 'jig/ mdo 'das ti ba sogs pa la sogs su bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bde/ bi da tu(mdo 'grel): bi du(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bit+tha/ bi da thu:/ bi da//

42a2(mdo 'grel): la/ bet+mi/ bitwa:/ bat+mi:/ ling la bya ba lhag po med pas/ bi tyAt/ bi tyA tAM/ bi tyu:/ sogs so/ /bi dAM kurba ndwi tya n+ya ta ra s+thaM/ bi dAM kurban+tu zhes pa yang na'o/ /btil loT pha rol la yang na A ma sbyor zhing loT yang 'jig pa kri nya lo Ta'i rkyen
42a3(mdo 'grel): can rjes su sbyor ba sogs tshig phrad du byas bas/ bi dAM ka ro tu/ sogs te/ bi dAM sngon mas Dukri nya byed pa la/ loD rjes 'brel phyis la ti i u 'os/ i u ru bsgyur bas/ baM dAM kritu bces pala/ ta nA daM b+hya u:/ tan la
42a4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa rnams las u'o/ /ta nu rgyas pa la sogs ba rnams las byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi shap kyi yul la u 'gyur te/ u sbyar byings thams cad pa dad byings phyed pa sogs kyis
42a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan byas pas/ bi dAM ka ro tu grub pa'o/ /a ta utshA rbba d+hA tu ke/ at kyi ut byings thams cad pa la'o/ /krinya u'i mdza' can gyi at ni byings thams cad pa ka da 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la ut du 'gyur te/ lo Ta'i skyes

42a7(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ bi dzAM ka ra bA Ni/ bi dAM ka ra bA pa/ bi dAN ka ra bA ma/ Am? ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la pit rnams la/ puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byed shap 'jig pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bet+tu/ biN+tAt?/ bit+tAM/ bidan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma/

42b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ bet+te rla ngo dzte rdzu swa/ be ti las lang g+hi dzhi'i dzus yang na'o/ /bit las pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dzhi ni dzus su yang na 'gyur te/ a bi du:/ a bi dan/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ dashtsa/ da'i 'ang ngo/ /byings mdza' i da srog med pha

50b5(mdo 'grel): de rnams dang 'dra par bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dpus ma gsum la/ shAssi/ shiShA? shiShtha /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shAsmi/ shiShA?(mdo 'grel): shiSh+ma(mdo 'grel): ling la/ shiSh+yA tAM/ shiSh+yU?(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shAstu/ shiSh+TA ta/ shiSh+TAM/ shAs tu
50b6(mdo 'grel): lo Ta'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ shA hau/ hi la shA'o/ /shAs ni loT bsgyur pa'i ha pha rol la shA zhes par 'gyur te/ shA su la/ loT shap 'jig?/ la sip/ si hi 'os /si hi/ mdo 'dis shAs shA ru pa sgyur 'di la gzhi mnyam pa
50b7(mdo 'grel): las ma grub pa zhes bas sngon ma sa'i rgyu mtshan las hi yang hu dzhal la hiNhi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur ba shAd+hi/ yang na hi tA dang du bsgyur bas/ shaSh+Ti ta/ gnyis chag dang ming tshig la/ shiSh+Ta/ shiSh+Ta /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shA sa ni/ shA sA ba/ shA sA ma/ ? 
51a1(mdo 'grel): gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ti pa/ it kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/ asti ma yin pa'i ti la 'os/ sra dra /hal dIg sogs kyis twa phyis/ gnas med ba sogs kyis a shAd /a shAt/ gnyis
51a2(mdo 'grel): tshig dang mang tshig la/ a shASh+TIM/ a shA su(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ sib la byings kyi ru yang na 'os sra ru dang/ de yang na bar byas pas/ a shA(mdo 'grel): a shAd /a shAd /gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a shiSh+Ti /a
51a3(mdo 'grel): shiSh+Ta /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shA saM/ a shiShwa /a shi Sh+ma/ lung la/ sarti shA sti arti rnams las kyang ngos/ tsli ang du bsgyur/ shAs kyis it ang hal dag la 'os/ u pa d+hA it du bsgyur/ shA si/ g+ha saM ba
51a4(mdo 'grel): si sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a shi Shat/ a shi Sha tAM/ a shi Shan/ sogs so/ /liT la/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shA sa/ sha shA sa tu(mdo 'grel): sha shA su(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma
51a5(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ sha shA si tha/ sha shA sa thu(mdo 'grel): sha shA sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shA sa/ sha shA si ba/ sha shA si ma/ luT la/ shA si tA/ shA si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ shA sa kyi it ang hal dag la 'os u ba d+hA i
51a6(mdo 'grel): shA si g+ha si ba si sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ shi Sh+yat/ shiSh+ya staM/ shaSh+ya su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ shA si Sh+ya ti/ shA Sh+yan ta(mdo 'grel): shA si Sh+yan+ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du /lring la/
51a7(mdo 'grel): a sha si Sh+ya ta/ a shA si Sh+ya tAM/ a shA si Sh+yan/ sogs so/ /` tsak+Shing? gsal bar brjod ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs at+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/ dzhal dang po rnams la brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis ka dbyi ba dang/?
51b1(mdo 'grel): Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsaSh+Te/ tsak+ShA te/ tsak+Sha te/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ la thAs/ thAs kyi se 'os/ thAs se/ brtsegs ba'i dang po sa ga sogs kyis ka phyis/ sa la Sha Dha dag gis

55b3(mdo 'grel): a ba sra ti/ a ba sma hi/ lung la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ a ba siSh+Na/ a ba si ShA tAM/ a ba si Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas
55b4(mdo 'grel): pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba ba se/ ba ba sA te/ ba ba si re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba ba si She/ ba bas the/ ba ba si DThe/ skyes bu phyi ma
55b5(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ ba ba se/ ba ba si ba he/ ba ba si ma he/ luT la/ b+h+ristu/ su tsa/ pa sti sogs kyis aT yang na bar byas pas/ ba si tA/ ba si tA se / sogs sam/
55b6(mdo 'grel): bastA bastA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la iT byen pas/ ba si ShiSh+Ta/ ba si ShIr yA stAM/ ba si ShI ra na/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang iT
55b7(mdo 'grel): phyin pas/ ba si Sh+ya te/ ba si Sh+ye te/ ba si Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lring la/ a ba si Sh+yat/ a ba si Sh+ye tI/ a pas Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /` Ni si'o byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/ 
56a1(mdo 'grel): Na'i na 'os/ Na na/ it 'gro ba sogs kyis num byin shab 'jigs pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ninste/ ninsA te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nanssem bubsA the/ naM nd+dE/ skyes bu
56a2(mdo 'grel): phyi ma gsum la/ ninse/ ni nsA he/ ninsmahe/ ling la/ at mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa'i yu Ta'i sa byis pas/ ninsi ta/ ni nsu yA tAM/ ninsi ran/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ninsti/ na nsi tA/ d+ha la'ang dos sa phyir/ nansA tA/
56a3(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ninma/ ninsa thaM/ ni naM hAM skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ naM nsai/ ni nsA ba hai/ ni nsA ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ninsta/ a ni nsa tuM/ a ni nsa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ninsa:/ a ni nsa thA/
56a4(mdo 'grel): a ni d+haM/ skyes Tu phyi ma gsum la/ a nInsi/ a ninsa hi/ a ninsA hi/ lung las dang po'i iT byin pas A ni niSh+T/ a ni nsa ShAM tA/ a ni nsi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /laT la byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang
56a5(mdo 'grel): po gsum la/ ni ni nsa?/ ni ni nsAte/ ni ni nsi ra/ skyes bu dbus mi gsum la/ ni na nsi She/ ni ni nsA the/ ni nsi d+hwi?/ na ni nsi Dhwe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ni ni nse/ ni ni nsi pa he/ ni ni nsu mahe/ luT la bal dang po'i aTi byin pas/ ni nsi tA/
56a6(mdo 'grel): ni nsi tA sa/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la iT byin pas/ ni sni ShISh+T/ ni nsIShI yA staM/ ni nsi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang iT byin pas/ ni nsa Sh+ya te/ nansa Sh+yan+te/ sogs so/ /lring la/ a ni nsi Sh+ya ta/ a na nsa
56a7(mdo 'grel): Sh+ya tA/ a ni nsi Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ /` ShU da srog chags mngal nas skye pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha sa dang a tsa dang po can rnams la/ a tsa la shU sogs kyis u ba ru bskyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
56b1(mdo 'grel): bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sU te/ su bA te/ su ba te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU She/ su ba the/ su d+h+re/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su be/ sku ba he/ sU ma he/ ling la aT ma yin pa sogs kyis sbi yu Ta'i sa
56b2(mdo 'grel): phyis/ u ba ru bsgyur bas/ su pI ta/ u bIyA tAM/ su bI ran/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sI tAM/ su bA tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU Sha/ sU bA thAM/ sU d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su bai/ su
56b3(mdo 'grel): pA ? tai/ u bA ma hE/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sU ta/ ba sU bA tAM/ a su ba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sU thA:/ a su bA thAM/ a sU d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a su bi/ a swa ba hi/ a sU ma hi/ lud la/ swa ra ta/ ?
56b4(mdo 'grel): ti/ sU ya ti/ d+hAnya a'uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste/ a'iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ a sa biSh+Ta/ a sa bi ShA ta/ a sa bi Sha ta/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la'ang/ byings thams cad pa dang bings phyed pa sogs kyis
56b5(mdo 'grel): yon tan byas bas/ a soSh+T/ a se ShA tAM/ a so Sha Ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a soShthA:/ a so ShA thAM/ a sa d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sa Shi/ a so Sha hi/ ma soshma hi/ ma soSh+ma hi/ li Ta la byings gnyis brjod a tsa

57a4(mdo 'grel): nyal ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tar rnams 'jug ste/ shI nga(mdo 'grel): sarba d+ha tu ka tu Na:/ shIng gi byings thams cad pa la yon tan naM/ /byings thams cad pa'i mang can rnams pha rol la shIng gi yon tan du 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig
57a5(mdo 'grel): tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ sha te/ sha yA te/ shI do ruT/ shIng las ru Ta'?/ /shing bas pha rol gyi At+ma na ba dang rnams la/ aT mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis dzha at du bsgyur ba'i at la ru Ta// A ga ma 'gyur te/ Ta gnas don
57a6(mdo 'grel): rang su brjod pa'i don ni/ /kha Ta'i mang tshi la/ la dzha At+ma ne pa ra rnams la a ta mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis dzha at/ mdo 'di sa ru Ta/ shIng gi byings thams cad pa la yon tan nos yon tan byas pas/ shar te/ skyes bu dbus
57a7(mdo 'grel): ma gsum la/ she She/ sha yA the/ she d+hwe/ skyes bu phye ma gsum la/ sha ya/ sha ba ha/ sha ma he/ ling la/ at mdza' ma yin pa la ling gis phyes/ byings la yon tan/ a tsa sogs kyis za yar bsgyur bas/ sha yi ta/
57b1(mdo 'grel): sha yI yA tAM/ sha yi ra na/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ she tAM/ sha yA tAM/ she ra tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ she Shwa/ Sha yA thAM/ sh+re d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha yai/ sha ya ba hai/ sha yA ma hai/

58a1(mdo 'grel): kho nar gnas so/ /zhes bshad pas/ a d+hi sngon du sbyar/ a tsa dang po can rnams la a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis i ar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ la Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la ba d+hi ti/ a d+hi ya te
58a2(mdo 'grel): a d+hI ya te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+hI She/ a d+hI yA tha/ a d+hI d+hwa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzhI ye/ a d+hi ba he/ a d+hi ma he/ ling la/ at ma yin pa la ling gis dbyi 'os sa phyis/ a ka 'dra ba la ring par gyur zin pa
58a3(mdo 'grel): rol dbyi ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hI ta/ i d+hA yA tA/ a d+hi ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i d+hI thA:/ a d+hI yA thAM/ a d+hI d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hI ya/ a d+hI ba hi/ a d+hI ma he/ lo Ta'i skyes

58a6(mdo 'grel): ba hi/ a d+hyai ma hi/ bi b+ha ShA lung lring ngo/ /lud dag la gdam nga'o/ /lung lring dag pha rol la id sngon la byings ing la/ an la sh+nu sogs kyis i ?m de nas a ce dang po sogs kyis AT/ AT las kyang 'phel ba/ na gAng zhes par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam
58a7(mdo 'grel): ka can du bya'o/ /gAng ku TA da b+hyonyaN+Ni ta dit/ gAng kuT la sogs pa rnams las nyaN 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams pa 'gro ba'o/ /ing bsgyur ba'i gAng dang kuT la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen nya Na 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams la nga 'gro ba'i ming
58b1(mdo 'grel): can zhes brda chad byed de/ dgos pa ni yon tan sogs mi byed pa'i don no/ /g+hu rA s+thA gA bA dza hA hi swaM ha li/ g+hu mA s+tha gA bA dza gA ti sA rnams kyi hal la'o/ /byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang/ mAng gus pa/ Sh+Tha 'gro ba las ldog pa/ ing bsgyur ba'i gang
58b2(mdo 'grel): bA 'thung ba/ dza hAti d+he o hAka gtong ba/ sA ste Sho mdza' i las rnams kyi A te ni rkyen ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can hal dang po can pha rol la a'id du bsgyur bar bya ste/ lung lring la 'dam ka 'os/ id gAng du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la lung sbyar/ mdo 'dis
58b3(mdo 'grel): Ati Ati/ a d+hi sngon/ tsli si tser bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hya gISh+Ta/ a d+hya gI ShA tAM/ a d+hya gI Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+hya gI Sh+ThA:/ a d+hya kI ShA thAM/ a d+hya gI d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a

58b5(mdo 'grel): a d+hyai ShA ThAM/ a d+hyai d+hwa?/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hyai Sha/ a d+hye Shwa hi/ a d+hyai Sh+ma hi/ gAng li Ti/ liT la gAng 'o/ /liT pha rol la id ni gAng du bsgyur bar bya ste/ a d+hi sngon ma'i a nga la liT/ mdo 'dis gAng du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/

59a1(mdo 'grel): a d+hye ShI yA sti/ a d+hye ShI ran/ sogs so/ /lriT la'ang yon tan byas pas/ a d+hye Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /lriD la/ lud lring dag la gdam nga 'os/ gAng du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ gAng gi phyogs la/ g+hu mA s+tha?

59a3(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /` dI d+hA de 'bar ba dang/ rtse ba dag la'o zhes pa la'ang ting rnams sbyor te/ hal po rnams la bya ba med/ atsa dang po rnams la/ a'i a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ la Ta'i
59a4(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI d+hE t+t/ di d+hA te/ dI d+hya te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI d+hI She/ dI d+hyA the/ dI b+hI d+hwe/ skyes bu phye ma gsum la/ dI d+hye/ dI d+hA ba he/ d+hI d+hI ma he/ yI bar+Na yo rdi d+hi bo byo(mdo 'grel): i i yig dag la dAM d+hi be bI dag gi'o/
59a5(mdo 'grel): rkyen yi ste ya yig dang i yig dag la pha rol la/ dId+hA dang bi bi dag gi mdza' dbyi sde/ dId+hI la/ ling/ at mdza' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yu Ta'i sra phyis/ mdo 'dis byings kyi a'i phyis drangs pas/ drId+hA ta/ dI d+hA yA tAM/ dI d+hI ran
59a6(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI d+hI thA(mdo 'grel): dri d+hI yA thAM/ dI d+hI haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI d+hA ya/ dI d+hI ga hi/ dId+hI mahi/ lo Ta la/ la Ta'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI d+hI tAM/ dE d+hya tAM/ dI d+hA tAM/ skyes bu
59a7(mdo 'grel): dbus ma gsum la/ dI d+hI shwa/ de d+hyA thA/ dI d+hI d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI d+hI bi bI iT rnams kyi 'os yon tan mi byed/ dI d+hyai/ dI d+hyA ba hai/ dI d+hA ma he/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dI d+hI ta/ i dI d+hA tI/ a dI d+hya ta/ skyes bu dbus
59b1(mdo 'grel): ma gsum la/ a dI d+hI thA:/ a dId+hya thAM/ a dId+hyi d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dI d+hI/ a dA d+hI ba hi/ a d+hI ma hi/ lung la/ bal dang po'i iT i i yog dag la dI d+hI be bI dag gi 'os phyings mdza' i phyis bas/ a dI d+hISh+TaM/ a dI d+h+ri
59b2(mdo 'grel): ShA tAM/ a dI d+hi Shat/ sogs so/ /liT la/ a ca gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis yi mi yig dag la dI dtI ? ?dag gis 'os i phyis/ Am sbyar bas/ dI d+hyAM tsa kre/ dI d+hyaM ba ? ba/ dI d+hyA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ bal dang po'i iT yi i yig dag la dI
59b3(mdo 'grel): de ne bI dag ga 'os a'i phyis pas/ dI d+hi tAM/ dI d+hi tA se/ de bzhin du/ smon ba'i ling la'ang iT ster ba sogs byas pas/ dI d+ha ShISh+T/ dI d+ha ShI yA stAM/ dI d+hi ShA ran/ sogs so/ /phriT la iT byin a'i dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dI d+hi Sh+ya
59b4(mdo 'grel): te/ dwi d+hi Sh+ye te/ dI d+hi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs dang/ de bzhin du/ lring la/ a dI d+hi Sh+ya ta/ a dI d+hi Sh+ye tAM/ a dI d+hi Sh+ya Dta/ sogs so/ /` be bI rngan pa mtshungs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug cing chog thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ ba bI
59b5(mdo 'grel): te/ be byA ta/ be bya te/ sogs so/ /` dwi Sha mi dga' ba dag la'o zhes pa le a tang rnams 'jug ste/ pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan dang/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs byas pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ dweSh+Ti/
59b6(mdo 'grel): dwiSh+Ta :/ dweShiN+Ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dweSh+Tha:/ dwiSh+Tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dwiSh+ma:/ dwi Sha:/ ling la Sha 'dren pa kho na ste/ dwi Sh+ya ta/ dwi Sh+yA tAM/ dwiSh+yu:/ sogs so/ /lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dwaShi?/ dweSh+Tat/
59b7(mdo 'grel): dISh+TaMm dwiSha ? skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa dang ? dag ges ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ /dwiDhe/ ? tshigs te/ dzu tal la hi d+he/ mdza' dzha la sogs/ ShaD/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha Dha drangs/ dwiSh+Te tra?/ dweSh+Te/ dwaSh+T skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dweShA Ni/ dweShA ga dweShA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang ba'i gcig ?
60a1(mdo 'grel): dang gnyis tshig la/ a dwe Ta/ a dweD/ a dwiSh+TaM/ mang tshig la/ dwi Sha shtsa/ dwi Sha las kyang pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dzha dzus su yang na 'gyur te/ a dwi Shu:/ a dwiSha na/ skyes bu dbus ma
60a2(mdo 'grel): gsum la/ a dweT/ a dweD/ a dwiSh+TaM/ la ti/ it la dngos i byis/ hal dib sogs kyis ta byis/ mdza' i dzha la sogs Sha Da/ gnas med pa la yang na byas/ a dwiSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dweShaM/ a dwi Sha/ a dwi Sh+ma/ lung la/ shal ik u ba d+ha aT med
60a3(mdo 'grel): pa sogs kyis tsli ksar bsgyur/ ka phyis/ sa la Sha Dha da gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ a dwi k+Shat/ a dwi k+Sha tAM/ a dwu k+Shan/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod Nal gnyis dang
60a4(mdo 'grel): thal ma gtogs bzhan ma rnams la/ sbany+dza brtsegs pa sogs kyis kit yang na bar byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di dweSha/ de dwe Sha tu:/ di di Sha tu(mdo 'grel): di dwe Sh+y(mdo 'grel): de dwe Shu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di dwe Sha tha/ di dweSh+Tha/ de dwe
60a5(mdo 'grel): Sha thu(mdo 'grel): de dwi Sha thu(mdo 'grel): da dweSha/ di dwi Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di dwe Sha/ di dwe Shi ba/ di dwi Shi ba/ di dwe Sha ma/ di dwi Sha ma/ luT la puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan Sha Tul Sha Tu byas pas/ dweSh+Ta/ dwe Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la

64b4(mdo 'grel): a'ur+Na bi ShI tan/ sogs sam/ Ar+Nu bi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la'ang iT byin/ yon tan dang ub yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ a'ur+Na bi Sh+ya ti/ a'ur+Na biSh+ya ta:/ ar+Na bi Sh+yan+ti/ sogs sam/ a'ur+Nu bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /tang la'ang Ar+Na

64b6(mdo 'grel): aaur+Nu bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ / ` Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la'o zhes pa la yang o tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ nu ru stu sha mya ma(mdo 'grel): sarba d+hA tu ka/ nu ru stu sham yam las byings thams cad pa la'o/ /nu tha bstod pa ru sgra Sh+Tu nya'i byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar bsgyur bas stu bstod pa/
64b7(mdo 'grel): sha mu nye bar zhi ba/ ya mu nye bar 'gag pa rnams las pha rol gyi byings thams cad pa hal dang po can pa 'gro ba'i ming can yin pa de la a'iT A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ Sh+Tu nyal laT sbyar bas/ a hang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig chig la/ mod 'dis a'iT yang na

68b7(mdo 'grel): kyi liT pha rol la A ma yar na sbyor te/ a ma la' shlu bzhin gnyis brjod pa sogs bya ste/ A ma gyi phyogs la/ dzu ta pI tsa kA ra/ tu ha bA ba b+hub/ dzu ha bA mI sa/ sogs dang/ Am ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu hu ba tu:/ dzu hA bu:/ skyes

90b1(mdo 'grel): la/ an hyat/ sogs dang/ tad la/ a na hyat/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dzhal dang po rnams la sitsa 'jig/ na las ha'i d+ha 'os/ ha d+ha/ khar la tsar sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nA tshi tA/ a nAd+d+hAM/ a nAtshu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsuM laS/

90b4(mdo 'grel): ne ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na nA ha/ nan ha/ ne hi gan ne hi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ni he/ ne hA te/ ne hi re/ skye bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne hi Shi/ ne hA the/ ne hi d+hwe/ ne ti d+hwi/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ne he/ ne hi ba he/ ni hi ma hi/ luT la/ na las ha'i d+ha 'os/

150a7(mdo 'grel): so/ /lri Ta la/ mra da yi Sh+ya hi/ sogs dang/ lring la/ a mra da yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //striny kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba/ la las 'phel
150b1(mdo 'grel): ba byas pas/ sta ri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ stA ra ya ti/ ling/ stA ra yet/ loT/ stA ra ya tu/ lang/ a stA ra yat/ sogs so/ /lung la/ tsli tsang du bsgyur gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ smri dri sogs kyis ir
150b2(mdo 'grel): mi bsgyur/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung du 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a tasta rat/ at sta ra tAM/ a tasta ran/ sogs so/ /liT la Am sbyar bas/ stA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT
150b3(mdo 'grel): byin pas/ stA ra yi tA/ stA ra yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ stAryAt/ stAryA stAM/ stAryA su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la iT byin pas/ stA ra yi Sh+ya hi/ sogs dang/ lring la/ astA ra yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //spa sha
150b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu gsher ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ spa shi zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ spA sha yati/ ling ka spA sha yet/ loT/ spa sha ya tu/ lang/ a spA sha yat/ sogs so/ /lung la tsli tsang
150b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sra phyis/ smri dri sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur?/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a pasba shat/ a pasba sha tAM/ a pasba shan/
150b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /liT la Am sbyar pas/ spA sha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ spA sha yitA/ spA sha yi tA sa/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ spA sh+yA yat/ sogs so/ /lriT la/ spA sha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs
150b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ lring la/ aspA sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// //beSh+Ta dkris pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis tsa'i sbyar bas/ beSh+Ta? zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ beSh+Ta yati/ ling/ beSh+Ta ye ti/ loT/ beSh+Ta yatu/ 
151a1(mdo 'grel): lang/ a beSh+Ta ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la bi b+hA ShA beSh+Te(mdo 'grel): beSh+Ti'i 'dam ka'o/ kheSh+Ti'i ti dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a b+hya sa at du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba gad ma nga can du bya ste/ at du bsgyur pa'i phyogs
151a2(mdo 'grel): la/ a ba beSh+Ta tAM?/ a ba beSh+Ta tAM/ a ba beSh+Tan/ sogs dang/ at du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a bi beSh+Tat/ a bi beSh+T tI/ a bi beSh+Tan/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ beSh+Ta yI
151a3(mdo 'grel): tsa kA ra/ luT/ beSh+Ta yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ beSh+Tyat/ liT/ beSh+Ta yi Sh+ya ti/ ling/ a beSh+Ta yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /b+h+ra dzre 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni ca sbyar/ b+ha dzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyang
151a4(mdo 'grel): bas laT/ b+h+ra dza ya ti/ ling/ b+h+rA dza yaT /` loT/ b+h+ra dza ya tu/ lang/ a b+h+rA dza yat/ sogs so/ lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa b+hA Sha dI pa dzI ba mI la pE DA ma n+ya ta ra syAM/ b+h+rA dza b'nya sa b+hA Sha dE pa dzI ba mI la pI Da rnams kyi yang
151a5(mdo 'grel): na'o/ /b+h+ra dzri dang b+h+ra sri 'bar ba/ b+hA Sha brjod ba/ dI pa 'bar ba/ dzI ba srog 'tsho ba/ mI la sbyor ba/ pI? Da kun tu 'thibs pa rnams kyi Ne dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol u pa d+hA thung ngur yang na bsgyur te/ thung ngur bsgyur
151a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyogs la/ Ni sh+ri sogs kyis tsle? tsang gnyis brjod/ thung ngur bsgyur ra phyis/ a b+hyA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba aka ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos/ a i/ mdo 'dis u pa d+hA thung ngu
151a7(mdo 'grel): ci'i iT med pa la 'os Ni byis pas/ a bi b+h+ra dzat/ a bi b+h+ra dza tAM/ a bi b+h+ra dzan/ sogs dang/ thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a bi b+hA dzat/ a bi b+h+rA dza tAM/ a bI b+h+rA dzan/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la
151b1(mdo 'grel): liT? b+h+rA dza yAM tsa ka ra/ luT/ b+h+rA dza yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ b+h+rA dzyAt/ lriT ta? b+h+rA dza yi Sh+ya? ti/ lrit/ a b+hmo dza yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /b+h+rA sa 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas b+ha? si zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ b+h+rA ma la ta/ ling/ b+h+rA sa?
151b2(mdo 'grel): yet/ loT/ b+h+rA sa yatu/ lang? a b+h+rA sa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ b+hO dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyi mdos/ u pa d+h+ra thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bi b+h+rA sat/ sogs sam/ a bi b+h+rA sat/ sogs so/ /la yig
151b3(mdo 'grel): phyi ma rnams la/ ling/ b+h+rA sa yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ b+h+rA sa yi ta/ smon pa'i ling/ b+h+rA syA ta/ lriT/ b+h+rA sa yi Sh+ya ti/ lrid/? a b+h+rA sa ya Sh+yet/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du// //b+hA Sha brjod pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ de la lat sogs sgyar bas/ laT/ b+hA
151b4(mdo 'grel): Sha ya ti/ ling/ b+hA Sha ye ta/ loT/ b+hA Sha ya tu/ lang/ a b+hA Sha yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ b+h+rA tha g+hA? sha sogs kyis u pa d+hA ldung ngur bsgyur ba dang ma bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bi b+ha Sha ta/ sogs sam/ a di b+ha
151b5(mdo 'grel): Shat/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ liT/ b+hA Sha yA tsa kA ra/ luT/ b+ha Sha yi tA/ smon pa'i ? dra?/ b+ha Sh+yat/ lriT/ b+hA Sha yi Sh+ya te/ lrid/ a b+hA Sha yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //dI pa 'bar ba la Ni tsa dang/ laT

151b7(mdo 'grel): pa ta/ sogs sam/ a dI dE pat/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ laT/ dI pa? yShaM tsa kA ra/ luT/ dI pa yi tA/ smon ling/ dI pyAt/ liT/ dI pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a dI pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //dzI ba sogs

152a7(mdo 'grel): smon ling/ pI Sh+yA ta/ lriT/ pI Da yi Sh+ya ti/ lrid/ a pI Da yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //ka Na sgra la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ kA Ni zhes grub pa la laT
152b1(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyar bas/ laT kA Na ya ti/ ling/ kA Na yet/ loT/ kA Na ya tu/ lang/ a kA Na yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ ka Na ra Na pha Na b+ha Na sh+ra Na hwenyla? pa lu ba lu da he ShAM tsa/ ka Na ra Na ba Na b+ha Na sh+ra Na hwenyla pa lu pa lu khahA? i Sha rnams kyi 'ang ngo/ /ka Na ra
152b2(mdo 'grel): Na pa Na b+ha Na rnams sgra/ sh+ra Na 'a tshed pa/ hwenya 'dren pa/ la pa yongs su brjod pa/ lu pa sbed pa/ lu Sha srub pa/ o hA ka gtong ba/ i Shu 'dod pa rnams kyi 'ang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la u pa d+ha thub bur bsgyur ba dang mi
152b3(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ thung ngur bsgyur ba'i phyogs la sa na bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug cing/ thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba'ang mi 'jug ste/ a cI kA Na ta/ sogs sam/ a tsa kA Na ta/ sogs so/ /la yig
152b4(mdo 'grel): lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ kA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ kI Na yitA/ smon ling/ kA tyA ta/ lriT/ kA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a kA Na yi Sh+yat/ sogs so// //ra Na sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'phel ba 'o sa 'phel ba byas pas/

152b7(mdo 'grel): zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ pA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT?/ bA? Na ya ti/ ling/ bA Na ya tu/ lang/ a bA Na yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA? thung du ba/? bsgyur ba
153a1(mdo 'grel): dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bI pa Na ta/ sogs sam/ a ba bA Na ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ bA Na yAM tsa kA Ta/ luT/ bA Na yi tA/ smon ling/ bA N+yA ta/ lriT/ bA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ lring? ? bA

153a6(mdo 'grel): sam ? a sha sh+rA Nat/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ sh+ra Na yI tsa kA re/ luT/ sh+rA Na yi tA/ smon ling/ sh+rA N+ya ta/ lriT/ sh+rA NA ye Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a sh+rA Na yiSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /hwenye'i dpong brjod 'og tu 'chad la/
153a7(mdo 'grel): ` la ba yongs su brjod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ lA pe? zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT/ lA pa ya ti/ lang/ lA pa yet/ loT/ lA ba ya tu/ ling/ a lA pa yat/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ka Na dza Na
153b1(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a lI la bat/ sogs sam/ A la lA bat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/ liT/ lA pa yA tsa kA ra/ luT/ lA pa yitA/ smon long/ lA pyA ta/
153b2(mdo 'grel): lmi? lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a lA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so sa/ /` lu ba sbed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ puka mdza' sogs kyis mon tan byas bas/ 'o/ pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ lo pa ya ti/ 'di/ lo pa ye ta/

153b4(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ liT/ lo pa yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ lo pa yi tA/ smon ling/ lo pyAt/ lriT/ lo pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a la pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` lu Tha? srub ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa yon tan byas pas/ lo Thi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/

154a6(mdo 'grel): ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ kIrti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ kIrta ya ta/ loT/ kIrta ya tu/ lang/ a kIrta yat/ sogs dang/ lun la/ u rit/ ri'i rita'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA'i raM? yig ni

154b1(mdo 'grel): liT/ kIrta yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ kIt yi tA/ smon ling/ kIrtyAt/ lriT/ kIrta yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a kIrta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` bri tu yod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ 'grel par skabs 'gar u ba d+hA'i it du mi bsgyur zhes bshad las/ ri it
154b2(mdo 'grel): du mi bsgyur/ puk mthal sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ barti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ barta ya ti/ ling/ barta ye ta/ loT/ barta ya tu/ lang/ a barta yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ ri'i? rit 'os/ rit nyid du gnas padang
154b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan yang na bar byas/ yon tan byas pa'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug /Ni'i iT med pa la phyis pas/ a bI bri tat/ sogs sam/ a ba brtat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ barta yI tsa kA ra/
