154b5(mdo 'grel): ling/ mArdza yet/ loT/ mArdza ya tu/ lang/ a mArdza yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ ri'i rit 'os/ u pa d+hA ri nyid du gnas pa 'am 'phel ba yang na bar byas 'phel ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug Ni phyis pas/ a mI mri dzat/
154b6(mdo 'grel): sogs sam/ a ma mArdza ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ mArdza yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ mArdza yi tA/ smon ling/ mArdzyA ta/ lriT/ mArdza yi Sh+ya ta/ lring/ a mArdza yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` nyi Shwa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa byin/
154b7(mdo 'grel): u bA dgA'i los 'phel ba byas pas/ swA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ lam swA pa ya ti/ ling/ spA? pa yet/ liT?/ swA? pa ya tu/ ? a swA pa yat/ sogs so/ /lung la/ swA ba shtsa di/ sbA pi'i tsad la'o/ /swA? pa Ni mdza' can
155a1(mdo 'grel): ni tsli bsgyur bas tsang pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur te/ swa pi la tsang/ Na la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu ngos thong ngur bsgyur/ mdo 'dis saM pra sA ra Na/ tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ yang ba'i ring po kun nas bsgyur
155a2(mdo 'grel): ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a sU Shu phaT/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/ liT/ swA pa yAM tsa kAr/ luT/ swA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ swA pyA ta/ liT/ swA pa yi Sh+ya Shi/ lriD/ a swA ba
155a3(mdo 'grel): yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` sho phra mor byed pa la bo zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nya ba'i yul la e tsa'i At 'os e ca At du bsgyur/ sha Ni zhes pa la/ shA tshA sA hwA byA be paM yu ka /shA tsA sA hwa bya ba pA rnams kyi lu ka'o?
155a4(mdo 'grel): sho bra mor byed pa/ tsho gcod pa/ Sho mdza' i las/ hwenya 'dren pa/ byanya kun nas sgrib pa/ be nya thags kyi rgyu/ pA btung ba rnams kyi Ni pha rol la yuk A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no/ /shA ye zhes grub pa la laT
155a5(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ shA ya ya ti/ 'di/ shA ya ya ta/ loT/ sha ya ya tu/ lang/ a shA ya yat/ sogs so/ /lung la/ gnyis brjod Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a sha sha yat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag
155a6(mdo 'grel): ma rnams la/ liT/ shA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sha ya yi tA/ smon lang/ shA yyAt/ lriT/ shA ya yiSh+ya ti/ ling/ a shA ya yiSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ tsho gcod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa e tsa At yu ka A ga ma byin pas
155a7(mdo 'grel): tshA ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ las tshA ya ya ti/ ling/ tshA ya yet loT/ chA ya ya tu/ yang/ a chA ya yat/ lung/ a tsa tsha yat/ liT/ tshA ya yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ tshA ya yi tA/ smon ling/ tshA yyAt/ lriT/ tshA ya yi Sh+ya ti/
155b1(mdo 'grel): lring/ a tshA ya yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` Sho mdza' i las la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa a tsa At yuk A ga ma byin pas/ sA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sA ya ya ti/ ling/ sA ya yet/ loT/ sabA ya ya tu/ lang/ a sa ya?//
155b2(mdo 'grel): yat/ lung/ a sa sa yang/ liT/ sA ya yAM co kA ra/ luT/ swA ya yi tA/ smon ling/ sA yyAt/ liT/ swA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a sA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` hweny 'dren pa la'o zhes pa la Nits ets/ At/ yuk Ag ma byin pas/ hwA yi zhes
155b3(mdo 'grel): grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ liT?/ hA ya ya ti/ ling pa hwA ya yet/ loT/ hwA ya ya tu/ lang/ a hwA ya yat/ lung la/ hA saM pra sA ra Nam/ hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /hwa'i Ni dang bcas pa'i cing pha rol la rtag tu si pra sA ra Nar bsgyur te/
155b4(mdo 'grel): hwa yi tsang Ni la tsang u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ mdo 'dis saM bra sA ra Na gnyis brjod yang ba'i ring po/ /'grel par saM pra sA ri Na'i pha rol la yuk A ga ma dbyi'o zhes bshad pas yuk phyis/ a tsa'o nyNit? la 'os
155b5(mdo 'grel): 'phal ba/ e ca'i a ya sogs kyis aau A ba/ Ni'i iT maMda? pa la 'os Ni phyis/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a thA hA ba ta/ sogs sam a dzA ha bat/ sogs so/ /yi Ta
155b6(mdo 'grel): sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ hwA ya yAM tsakra ra/ lriT?/ hwA ya yi tA/ smon ling/ hwA yyAt/ lraT/ hwA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a hwA ya yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` byeny kun nas sgrib pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa'i? At/ yuk A ga ma byin pas/ bya yi zhes grub pa
155b7(mdo 'grel): la? la na sogs sbyar bas/ liT/ byA ya yi ti/ lang/ byA ya yet/ loT/ byA ya ya tu/ lang/ a byA ya ya t/ lung a ba byA yat/ liT/ byA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ byA ya yi tA /smon ling/ byA yyAt/ lriT/ byA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ lriT/ a byA ya yi Sh+ya te// 
156a1(mdo 'grel): sogs so//? ` be nya? thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa a tsa At yuk A ga ma byin bas/ bA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ bA ya ya ti/ ling/ bA ya yet/ loT/ bA ya ya tu/ lang?/ a bA ya yat/ lung/ a ba ba
156a2(mdo 'grel): yat/ liT/ bA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ bA ya yi tA/ smon ling/ bA yyAt/ lriT?/ bA ya yiSh+ya ti/ lri /a bA la yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ pA btung ba la Ni tsa sbyar yuk A ga ma byin pas/ pA yi zhes pa la loT sogs sbyar
156a3(mdo 'grel): bas/ laT/ bA ya ya ti/ ling/ pA ya ya ta/ loT/ pA ya ya tu/ lang/ /a bA ya yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ lo ba(mdo 'grel): bi ba te ritstsa b+hyas sya/ pi ba ti'i dbyi zhing a b+hya sa'i a'it 'ang ngo/ /Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la pi ba ti'i u pa d+hA
156a4(mdo 'grel): dbyi zhing a b+hya sa'i 'ang it du bsgyur bar bya ste/ ba yi la tsang lung gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os chi phyis/ mdo 'di si u pa d+hA phyis a b+hyA? sa'ang it tu bsgyur bas/ a pI byat/ sogs so/ /li Ta sogs lhag ma rnamS
156a5(mdo 'grel): la/ liT/ sA yi yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ pA ya yi tA/ smon ling/ pA yAt/ lriT/ pA ya yiSh+yati /lrid/ a bA ya yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ a rti h+rI tsli sogs kyis puka A ga ma/ puk mdza' sogs
156a6(mdo 'grel): kyis yon tan byas pas/ arpaM? zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ arpa ya ti/ ling/ Arpa yet /liT/ arpa ya tu/ lang/ Arpa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ arbi la tsang tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ri'i
156a7(mdo 'grel): at 'os/ de a AT dang 'phel ba byas Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ A rpat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ arpa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ a rpa yi tA/ smon ling/ a rpyat/ liT/ arpa yi phyar? ti/
156b1(mdo 'grel): ling/ Arpa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` h+rI ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa arti h+rI sogs kyis buk A ga ma byin/ puka mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ h+re bi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ h+re pa ya ti/ ling/ h+re pa yet/ loT/ h+rE
156b2(mdo 'grel): ba ya tu/ lang/ a h+re pa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ gnyis brjod/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu/ Ni'i it med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a dzi h+ri bat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ h+re ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ h+re ba ya
156b3(mdo 'grel): tA/ smon ling/ h+re pyAt/ lriT/ h+re pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a h+re pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` tslI 'gro ba Ni tsa sbyar/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk A ga ma/ puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ tsle pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas /
156b4(mdo 'grel): laT/ tsla? pa ya ti/ ling/ tsla ba let/ loT/ tsle pa ya tu/ lang/ a tsla pa yat/ lung/ a tsi tsli bat/ liT/ tsle pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ tsle? pa yi tA/ smon ling/ tsle byAt/ lriT/ tsle pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a tsle pa li Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` rIng nyan pa la'o zheS
156b5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ Nitsa arti h+rI sogs kyis buka A ga ma/ puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ re bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ re ba ya ti/ ling/ re pa yet/ loT/ re ba ya tu/ lang/ a re ba yat/ lung/ a ri ri
156b6(mdo 'grel): bat/ liT/ re pa yI tse kA ra/ luT/ re pa yi tA/ smon liT/ re byAt/ lriT/ re pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lriT/ re pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` kru la sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ arti h+ri sogs kyis puk A ga ma byin/ ba ya dag gi pa la la dbyi bos/
156b7(mdo 'grel): ya phyis/ buk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ko pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ kro pa ya ti/ ling?/ kro pa yat/ loT/ kro pa ya tu/ lang/ a kro ba yat/ lung/ a tsu gru bat/ liT/ kro pa AM tsa kA ra/ /
157a1(mdo 'grel): luT? kro pa yi tA/ smon ling/ kro pyAt/ lriT/ krau pa yiSh+ya ti/ lring/ a kro pa yiSh+yat/ sogs so/ /` k+Sh+mA?  yI rnam par 'dar ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ k+Sh+mA pi zhes pa la laT?
157a2(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ k+Sh+mA pa ya ti/ ling/ k+Sh+mA pa let/ loT/ k+Sh+mA pa ya tu/ lung?/ a k+Sh+mA pa yat/ lung/ a tsa k+Sh+mA phat/ liT /k+Sh+mA pa yAM pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ /k+Sh+mA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ k+Sh+mA pyAt/ lriT/ k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+yati/ lring/ a k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so//
157a3(mdo 'grel): ` ShA? 'gro ba las ldog pa la Ni tsa/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk A ga ma byin pas/ s+tha pi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ s+thA pa ya tI/ ling/ s+thA pa yet/ loT/ s+thA ba yang tu/ lang/ a s+thA pa yat/ sogs dang/ lung
157a4(mdo 'grel): la/ tiSh+Tha? te rit/ tiSh+Tha ti'i it lo/ /Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la tiSh+Tha ti'i u pa d+hA it du bsgyur te/ s+thA pi la tsad/ mdo 'dis it du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ sha pe dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+hya sa'i tsar
157a5(mdo 'grel): lang 'os/ tha ta/ kun nas bsgyur pa la sogs kyis sa Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha thu 'os tha Tha/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a tiSh+Tha pat/ sogs dang/ liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ s+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ s+thA pa yi tA?
157a6(mdo 'grel): smon pa'i/ s+thA byAt?/ lriT/ s+thA pa ya Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a s+thA pa Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` g+ha dri nye par len pa la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa arti h+rI? sogs kyis puk A ga ma byin pas/ g+hA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ g+ha pi yit/
157a7(mdo 'grel): liT?/ g+h+rA ba yet?/ loT?/ g+h+rA ba ya tu/ lang/ a g+h+rA pa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ dzi g+h+ra terbA(mdo 'grel): dzig+h+ra ti li? yad? na'o?/ /Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la dza g+h+ra ti'i u ba d+h+rA it du yang na bsgyur te/ a dzi g+h+ra pat/ sogs sam/
157b1(mdo 'grel): a dzag+h+ra pat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lha ma rnams la/ liT/ g+h+ra? pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ g+hA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ g+h+rA pyutA/ lriT/ g+h+rA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a g+h+rA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` pA skyong ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa 'grel par lung drangs? ba/ pA te Nau?
157b2(mdo 'grel): lu gA ga mo ni tyaM/ pA ti'i Ni la luk A ga ma rtag tu'o/ /pA ti'i Ni pha rol la luk A ga mi rtag tu 'gyur te/ u brjod don ka gnas don rnams phyis pas/ pA li zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ liT/ pA la ya ti/ ling/ pA la yet/ lom pA
157b3(mdo 'grel): la ya tu/ lang/ a pA la yat/ lung/ a pa pa lat/ liT/ pA la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ pA la yi tA/ smon ling/ pA lyAt/ lriT/ a pA la yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a pA la yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` bA 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ po bi d+hU na ne dzu ka ba'i rnam tha da?
157b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba la dzu ka'o/ /ba'i Ni tsa pha rol la rnam par g.yo ba la 'jug pa'i don la dzuk A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas rjes 'brel phyis pas/ bA dzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ liT /bA dza ya ti/ lit?/ bA
157b5(mdo 'grel): dza ye ti/ loT/ pA dza? la tu/ lang/ a pA dza yat/ lung/ a ba ba dzat/ liT/ pA dza yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ bA dza yi tA/ smon ling/ pA dzyAt/ lriT/ bA dza yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a bA dza yi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ rnam par g.yo pa'i don min na dzu ka mi 'gyur te/ arti
157b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sogs kyis dug byin pas/ laT/ bA pa ya ti/ luT/ a ba? ba pat/ sogs so/ /` d+hU ta 'gul bu la'o zhes pa la Ni tso 'grel par lung drangs pa/ d+hUny grI nyo? nu ka ke tsi dpSha/ d+hU nya prI nya dag gi nug 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /d+hU nya 'gul ba
157b7(mdo 'grel): dang prInya tshim? pa dag gi Ni tsa? pha rol nu ka A ka ma skabs 'gar yang na? 'gyur te/ nuk sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ laT/ d+hU na ya ti/ ling /b+hU? na yet/ loT/ d+hU na ya tu/ lang/ /a d+hU na yat/ lung?/ a du d+hU nat/ liT/ d+hU na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT?/ d+hU na yi?
158a1(mdo 'grel): tA/ smon ling/ d+hU n+yA ta/ lriT/ d+hU na yi Sh+ya ti/ ling/ a d+hU na yi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ nuk ma byin pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/ d+hA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ d+hA ba ya ti/ ling/ d+hA ba yet/ loT/ d+hA gang
158a2(mdo 'grel): ya tu/ lang/ a d+hA pa yatA lung/ a du d+hA bat/ lriT/ d+hA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ d+hA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ d+hA byAt/ lriT/ d+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a d+hA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` brI nya tshim pa la Nitsa/ d+hAnya prinya dag gi nuk 'ga' zhig tu yang na 'os
158a3(mdo 'grel): nAk sbyar ba'i phyogs la laT/ prI Na la ti/ ling/ prI Na yet/ loT/ prI Na ya tu/ lang/ a bri Na yat/ lung/ a brI Nat/ liT/ prI Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ prI Na yi ta/ smon ling/ prI N+yAt/ lriT/ pri Na yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a brI Na Sh+yat/ sogs
158a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ nuk med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ prA yi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar ba/ /laT/ prA ya ya ti/ lung/ a pi pra yat/ sogs so/ /` lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bi b+hA ShA
158a5(mdo 'grel): lI ya ta(mdo 'grel): lI ya ti'i 'dam ka'o/ /lI ya ti'i mdza' Nits?  dang lya ba? pha rol la At du yang na bsgyur bar bya ste/ At du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ arti hi sogs kyi sa pu ka A ga ma sbyar bas/ lA bi zhes ba grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
158a6(mdo 'grel): laT lA pa ya ti/ ling/ gA ba yet/ loT/ lA pa ya tu/ lang/ a lA ba yat/ lung/ a la la pat/ liT/ lA ba yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ lA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ lA pyAt/ liT/ lA pa yiSh+ya ti/ lring/ a sA? yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /lI lyo? nuk lu
158a7(mdo 'grel): ga ba n+ya tA ra syAM/ lA lI dag gi nuk lug da ka yang na'o/ /lI chung ngur? gyur ba dang lI sbyor? bar byed pa dag gi snum pa byug pa'i don la ri mo pa? bzhin nuk dang luk A ga ma dag yang na 'gyur te/ laT/ lI na ya ti/ lung/ a li li nat/ sogs dang/
158b1(mdo 'grel): 'grel? bar? lung drangs pas/ bra laM b+ha nA b+hi b+ha pa pU dzA sU dzA su li yo ni tya mA twa ma shi ti pA tsyaM/ 'jigs pa sngon byung mchod pa rnams la lI ngak gi sha 'gro ba ma yin pa la A nyid rtag tu brjod do/ /lIng sbyor ba dang lI chung ngur gyur pa dag gi 'jig pa dang sngon byung ba dang
158b2(mdo 'grel): mchod ba rnams kyi don dang sbyar ba na sha 'gro ba ma yin pa'i rkyen gang byung yang a nyid du rtag tu brjod par bya ste laT/ lA pa ya ti/ lung/ a la ya pat/ sogs so/ /li ya(mdo 'grel): saM mA na na shI lI? nI ka ra Na yo Shtsa/ lI las kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa dang/
158b3(mdo 'grel): la yang na'o/ /lI Ni tsa'i mdza' can las kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa byed pa dang rab tu thob pa la yang laT sogs Atna ne lIng? dang lI gnyis ka bsgrub lugs dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra ste At dang sbyar nas puk byon pa'i/ /pa da rnams 'gyur te/ dza k+Sha? b+hi rA lAng ? te/ sh+ye no?
158b4(mdo 'grel): barti? bA mu /l+lA pa a te/ kastA mul+lu ba ya te/ sogs so/ /` nyi b+hI 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bi b+he terha tU b+ha ye/ ba b+ha ti'i 'dogs? pa'i rgyu la'o/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las pi b+ha ti'i mdza' Nits ral? ba? can rnams la ?  nas gus par 'dod/ /pha rol
158b5(mdo 'grel): ? ? ? gnod pa byed par 'dod/ yas At sa khyod du thob par 'dod/ /yang na bsgyur ro/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ pra yo dza kAd+d+ha yaM tsa pAtsyaM/ 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang brjod do/ /'jigs pa'i rgyud ma ? 'jigs pa sbyor ba las/ byatA? bi b+he? ti'i Nits pha rol
158b6(mdo 'grel): la/ at du yang de bsgyur ro/ /b+hA smro d+hi tu b+hA yo/ b+hIsti dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/ /b+hi dang Sh+mi cung zad rgod pa dag la sa 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa la tang rnams sbyor te/ bi b+ha ti li 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os Ate du bsgyur arti hI
158b7(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis puk a'i? ga ma byin pas/ b+hwA pe zhes grub pa 'o/ /mang 'dis lan sogs 'di rnams sbyar bas/ lom/ b+hA ba ya to/ ling/ b+hA pa yat/ lam b+hA pa ya tA/ lung/ a ba b+hA pa yat/ lung/ a ba b+hA pa ta/ liT/ b+hA ba yI tsa kra/ luT/ bya ba'i te
159a1(mdo 'grel): tog /smon ling/ b+hA pa yi ShISh+Ta/ lriT/ b+hA pa yi Sh+ya te/ lring/ a b+hA pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ yang na/ b+hi yo he tu b+ha ye Shuk/ ? 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shuka 'o/ /b+hi'i Nits pha rol la 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shuk ag ma 'gyur te/ laT?/ Shuk?
159a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pas/ luT/ b+hi Sha ya te/ a b+hi Sha te/ sogs so/ /` Sh+mi cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ni tyisma ya te/ smal ti'i rtag tul/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba na/ sma ya ti'i mdza' Nits pha rol la At du rtag tu 'gyur te/
159a3(mdo 'grel): a'i At/ arti h+rI sogs kyis buk A ga ma byin pas/ snA pi zhes grub pa la/ b+hI si dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os laT sogs tang rnams sbyar pas/ laT? smA pa ya te/ ling/ smA pa la ta/ loT/ sma pa la tAM/ lang/ a smra pa yat/
159a4(mdo 'grel): lung/ a sAMSh+ma pa tA/ liT/ smA pa yI tsakre /luT /smA pa yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ smA pa yi ShISh+Ta/ lriT/ sma pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a smA pa yiSh+yat/ sogs so/ /` s+thA yI 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ spa yo(mdo 'grel): ba(mdo 'grel): sphA yI'i ba'o/ /sgra? yi
159a5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i mdza' ya yig ni ci tsa? pha rol la ba yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ mdo 'dis par bsgyur bas/ sphA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sphA ba ya ti/ ling/ sphA ba yet/ loT/ sphA ba ya tu/ lang/ a sphA ba lat/ lung/ a
159a6(mdo 'grel): si sphA bat/ liT/ sphA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sphA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ sphA byAt/ lriT/ spha ba yi Sh+ya tI/ lring/ a sphA ba li Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` sha bli? 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ sha der? ga tau ta/ sha da'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o/ /sha
159a7(mdo 'grel): ri'i mdza' ra yig? ni ba lang lta bu 'gro ba yin pa brjod pa'i don la Nits pha rol la ta yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ shA ti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ shA ta la ti/ ling/ shA ta yet/ loT/ shA ta ya tu/ lang/ A shAtA?
159b1(mdo 'grel): yat/ ?/ a shI sha tat/ liT/ shA ta yAM tsa kA ra/ lus shA ta yi tA/ smon ling/ shA tyAt/ liT/ shA ta yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a shA ta yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /'gro ba yin na da tar mi 'gyur bas/ laT/ a shA da ya ta/ lung/ a shI sha dat/ sogs
159b2(mdo 'grel): so/ /tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ pha lA ni shA ta ya ti/ gA(mdo 'grel): shad ya ti go pA la ka /ru ha skye ba la'o zhes pa la Nits sbyar/ ru ha(mdo 'grel): ponyn+ya ta ra syAM/ ru ha 'i pa yang na'o/ /ru ha zhes pa'i mdza' ha yig ni Ni tsa pha rol la pa yig
159b3(mdo 'grel): tu yang na bsgyur te/ ro pi zhes grub pa ta laT 'bras bu rnams 'bebs bar byed/ sogs sbyar ba lang rnams 'dad par byed phyug rdzi/ bas/ lam ro pa ya ti/ ling/ ro ba yet/ loT/ ro pa ya tu/ lang/ a ro pa yat/ lung/ a rU ru pat/ liT/ ryo? pa yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ ro pa yi
159b4(mdo 'grel): tA/ smon ling/ ro byAt/ liT/ ro pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a ro pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ yang na par ma bsgyur bas/ laT/ ro ha ya ti/ lung/ a rU ru nyat/ sogs so/ /DaM? krI rdzas brje ba la'o zhes pa la Nits sbyar/ krIng dzAM nI Nau/ krI id dzi rnams kyi Ni
159b5(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /krI nya rdzas brdze ba/ ing klog pa/ dzi rgyal ba rnams kyi mdza' Ni tsa pha rol la At du bsgyur te/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk byin pas/ kA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ krA pa yA ti/ ling/ krA pa yet/ loT/ krA pa ya tu/
159b6(mdo 'grel): lang/ a pa kra yat/ lung/ a tsi kra bat/ liT/ krA pa A tsa kA ra/ lud?/ krA pa yit/ smon ling/ kA phyAt/ lriT/ krA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a krA pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ daM a d+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa la Nits/ krI id sogs kyis mdza' At/ arti
159b7(mdo 'grel): hI sogs kyis puk A ga ma/ ik? gi a tsa la yaN? ra bsgyur bas/ a d+hyA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ a d+hyA pa ya ti/ ling/ a d+hyA pa yet/ loT/ a ? pa yatu/ lang/ a d+hyA pa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ Nau tsa sishtsa ngo:
160a1(mdo 'grel): Ni la'ang san tsang dag la'o/ /Nits dang bcas pa'i san dang cod dag pha rol la'ang ing gi gang du yang na bsgyur te/ gang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+hA dzI ga pat/ sogs dang/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+hi sngon
160a2(mdo 'grel): ma'i A pe ya tsang/ A i ru log/ de gnyis brjod a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a la sogs kyis i Ay/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a d+hya yi pat/ sogs so/ /liT
160a3(mdo 'grel): sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ a d+hyA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ a d+hyA ba yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ a d+hyA pyAt/ lriT/ a d+hyA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a d+hyA/ yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /? dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes pa la Nits/ krI ing dzi sogs kyi mdza' At arti
160a4(mdo 'grel): h+rI sogs kyis puk mdza' a ga ma byin pas/ dzA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ dzA pi ya ti/ ling/ dzA pa yet/ liT/ dzA pa ya tu/ lang /a dzA pa yat/ lung/ A dzI dza pat/ liT/ dzA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ dzA pa yi tA/
160a5(mdo 'grel): smon? ling/ dzA pyAt/ lriT/ dzA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ lring /a dzA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /`? Shi d+ha yang dag par mnyes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ si d+hya te ra pA ra lo ki ke/ si d+hya ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yan pa la'o/ /si d+hya ti'i i yig
160a6(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rten pha rol gyi don nyid ma yin pa la Ni pha rol la At du bsgyur bar bya ste/ sa d+ha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sA d+ha ya ti/ ling/ sA d+ha yet/ loT/ sA d+hA ya tu/ lang/ a sA d+ha yat/ lung/ a sI sad+ha ta/ liT/ sA d+ha
160a7(mdo 'grel): yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sA d+hA? yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ sA d+hyA ta/ lriT/ sA d+ha yi Sh+ya ta/ lring/ a sA d+ha yi Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ laT/ yang na se d+ha ya ti/ lung/ a sI si d+hat/ sogs so/ /de dag tshig grogs dang bcas pa'i dper brjod ni/ rgyal po mnyad? la ? rA
160b1(mdo 'grel): dza sA d+ha ya ti/ gu ru(mdo 'grel): se d+ha ya ti/ /tsiny sogs pa la'o? zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ tsi sphu ror+Nau/ /tsi sphu ra dag gi Ni la'o/ /tsiny dang sphu ra dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la At du yang na bsgyur te/ At du 'gyur ba'i phyogs la/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk A ga ma
160b2(mdo 'grel): byin pas/ bla ma nyes par 'dod/ tsa pi zhes thub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ tsA pa ya ti/ ling/ tsA pa yet/ loT/ tsA pa ya tu/ lang/ a tsA ba yat/ lung/ a tsI tsa pat/ liT/ tsA pa yAM tsa kOo ra/ luT/ tsA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ tsA byAt/ lriT/ tsA pa yi Sh+yat
160b3(mdo 'grel): /lring?/ A tsA pa ye Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ yang na a tsa'i nyNit la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ laT/ tsA ya ya ti/ lung/ a tsI tsa yat/ sogs so/ /` sphur 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ tsi sphu ra dag gi Ni la 'os/ at du bsgyur ba dang mi
160b4(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ At du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ sphA ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sphA ra ya ti/ ling/ sphA ra yat/ loT/ sphA ra ya tu/ lang/ a sphA ra yat/ lung/ a pu sphA rat/ liT/ sphA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sphA ra yi tA/
160b5(mdo 'grel): smon ling/ sphA rUt/ lriT/ sphA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a sphA ra yiSh+yat/ sogs sam/ At du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT/ sphOo ra ya ti lung/ a pu sphu rat/ sogs so/ /` beny thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ pra dza ne bA ya te:/ bI ya ti'i rab du skye ba la
160b6(mdo 'grel): 'o/ /? ya ti'i rab tu skya ba'i don la 'jug pa ni Ni tsa pha rol la at du bsgyur te/ puk byin pas/ bA pi zhes ba la la Ta sogs sbyor bas/ laT/ pA pa ya ti/ ling/ bA pa yet/ loT/ bA pa ya tu/ lang?/ a bA ba ya ta/ lung a bi da pat/
160b7(mdo 'grel): liT/ bA pa yA tsa kA ra/ luT/ bA pa yi tA/ smon ling/ pA pyAt/ lriT/ bA bA yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a bA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ yang na shit ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i At 'os/ e tsa At/ shA? tshA sogs kyis yuk Ag ma byin kha yaM zhes pa'i?
161a1(mdo 'grel): la laT sogs sbyar bas/ luT?/ bA? ya ya ti/ lung/ a bI ba yat/ sogs so/ /? Sh+nyunya bstod pa la'o zhes pha la Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i nyNit la 'os 'phel ba byas/ sta ba zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ stA ba ya ti/
161a2(mdo 'grel): ling/ stA ba let/ loT/ stA ba ya tu/ lang/ /sa stA ba yat/ lung/ a tuSh+TA bat/ liT/ stA ba yAM tsakA ra/ luT/ stA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ stA byAt/ lriT/ stA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a stA ba yiSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ 'phel ba byas
161a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ b+hA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ b+ha? ba ya te/ ling/ b+hA ba yet/ loT/ b+hA ba ya tu/ lang/ a b+hA ba yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ o(mdo 'grel): pu yaN dzya pa re/ u'i pu yaN dza a pha rol la'o/ /san la byings gnyis
161a4(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i a b+hyA sa'i u yig ni pu ste pa sde dang yaN so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge rnams dang dza yig dang u yig rnams gang rung zhig pha rol na yod na i yig tu bsgyur te/ skabs 'dir ak ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol

161a6(mdo 'grel): byAt/ lrit/ b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a b+hA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` yu sre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas/ yA baM? zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ yA ba ya ti/ ling/ yA ba yet/ loT/ yA pA ya tu/ lang/ a yA ba yat/ lung

161b1(mdo 'grel): ba yi Sh+yat?/ ming/ a yA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /dzi 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ dzA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ dzA ba ya ti/ ling/ dzA ba yat/ loT/ dzA ba ya tu/ lang/ a dzA ba yat/ lung/ a dzI dza bat/ lriT/ dzA
161b2(mdo 'grel): yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ dzA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ dzA byAt/ lriT/ dzA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a dzA ba yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` su 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ sra bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sra ba ya ti/ liT/ spA? ba yat/
161b3(mdo 'grel): loT/ srA ba ya tu/ lang/ a srA pa yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ sra ba ti sh+ri No ti dra ba ti pra ba ti pla ba ti bya ba tI nAM bA/ sra ba ti sh+ri No ti dra ba ti pra ba ti pla ba ti/ /bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o/ /sru 'gro ba/ sh+ru nyan pa/ dru 'gro ba sru dang plud?
161b4(mdo 'grel): dang byung rnams 'gro ba rnams kyi san dang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol pa a b+hyA sa ir yang na bsgyur te/ a si sra bat/ sogs sam/ a su sra bat/ sogs so/ la yig lhag ma rnams la/ srA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ srA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ srA

161b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur bas/ a shi sh+ra batA/ sogs sam/ a shu sh+ra bat/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT/ sh+rA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sh+rA ba yi tA/ smon ling/ sh+rA bya tA/ lriT/ sh+rA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a sh+rA
161b7(mdo 'grel): ba yat/ sogs so/ /` dru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ drA? ba zhes pa la laT sogs sbyang bas/ laT/ drA bi ya ti/ ling/ drA ba yet/ loT/ hA ba ya tu/ lang/ a drA ba yat/ lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur bas/ id? dra ba ta/ sogs sam/ ar?

162a7(mdo 'grel): las so/ /sa phal Ni tsa sbyar/ go ha'i u ba d+hA'i a'ut 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ gu hI? zhes grub pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar bas/ laT/ gU ha ya ti?/ ling/ gU hA yet/ loT/ gU ha ya tu/ lang/ a gU ha yat/ lung/ /a dzuA gu hat/ liT/ gU ha ?
162b1(mdo 'grel): tsa kA ra/ luT/ gU ha yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ gU hyAt/ lriT/ gU ha yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a gU ha yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` duSh nyon mongs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ do Sho No/ /do Sha'i Ni la'o/ du Sha'i u pa d+hA'i u ni ci pha rol la a'u ru 'gyur te/ dU She zhes pa la laT sogs
162b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar bas/ laT/ dU Sha yati/ ling/ dU Sha yat/ loT/ dU Sha ya tu/ lang/ a dU Sha yat/ lung/ a du dU Shat/ liT/ dU Sha yI tsa ka ra/ luT/ dU Sha yi tA/ smon ling/ dU sh+yAt/ lriT/ dU Sha yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a dU Sha yi Shat/ sogs dang/ bA tsit+ta bi ra ge/ sems nyon mongs

162b4(mdo 'grel): lung/ a dU du Shat/ sogs so/ /` g+hA Ta byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ mi tAM h+ra swa(mdo 'grel): ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o/ /g+ha Ta la sogs pa ma 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi u pa d+hA Ni tsa pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur te/ laT/ g+ha Ta ya ti/ ling/ g+ha Ta yat/
162b5(mdo 'grel): loT/ /g+ha Ta ya tu/ lag a g+ha Ta yat/ lung/ a dzI g+ha Tat/ liT/ g+ha Ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ g+ha Ta yi tA/ smon ling/ g+ha Tyat/ lriT?/ g+ha Ta yi Sh+yati/ lring/ a g+ha Ta li Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du /bya tha sdul dang 'jigs pas g.yo ba dag la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar
162b6(mdo 'grel): u pa d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas pa slar thung ngur bsgyur bas/ bya thil laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ bya tha yaM ti/ ling/ bya tha yet/ loT/ bya tha ya tu/ lang?/ a bya ya tha yat/ lung/ a bI bya that/ liT/ bya tha yI tsa kA ra/ las bya tha yi tha/ smon ling/ bya thya ta/
