163a1(mdo 'grel): pha rol la mdza' can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu 'os u ba d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ laT/ dza na ya ti/ ling/ dza na yit/ loT/ /dzA? na ya tu/ lang/ a dza na la ta/ lung /a dzI dza na ta/ liT/ za na lA
163a2(mdo 'grel): ca kAr/ luT/ dza na yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ dze n+yA ta/ lriT/ dza na yi Sh+ya ti/ lring /a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` rdziSha lang tsho? nyams pa la Ni tsa/ a tsa'i nyNit la 'os 'phel ba/ dzA ni dzri Sha kna sa rany+dza'i 'das? mdza' 'os thung ngur bskyur/ dza ri zhes pa
163a3(mdo 'grel): la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ dza nga ya ti/ ling/ dza ra yet/ leT/ dzA ra ya tu/ lang/ a dza ra yat/ lung/ a dzI dza rat/ liT/ dza ra yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ dzang yi hA/ smon ling/ dza ryAt/ lriT?/ dza ra yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ adza ra yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ kna? sa
163a4(mdo 'grel): sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa spyad/ kna si zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ kna sa ya ti/ ling kna sa yet/ loT/ kna sa ya tu/ long/ a kna sa yat/ lung/ a tsI kna sat/ liT/ kna sa yI tsA kA ra/ luT/ kna sa yi ta/ smon ling/ kna syAt/ lriT/ kna sa yi Sh+ya ti/
163a5(mdo 'grel): lring/ a kna sa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` rany+dza chos la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ rany+dzi la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ rany+dza ya ti/ ling/ rany+dza yet/ loT/ rany+dza ya tu/ lang/ a rany+dza yat/ lung/ a rI ri ny+dza ta/ liT/ rany+dza yAM tsa kAr/ luT/ ra ny+dza yi tA/ smon ling/ radzya/?
163a6(mdo 'grel): lriT/ rany+dza yi Sh+yati/ lring/ a rany+dzi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /'gres bar lung drangs ba/ rany+dza r+Nau mri ga ra sa Ni na yo? ba(mdo 'grel): rany+dza'i Ni la ri dags kyi mdog lan dbyi'o/ /rany+dza'i Ni pha rol la ri dags kyi ra dog la 'jug pa na na dbyi ste/ laT/ ra dza la ti/ lung/ a rI
163a7(mdo 'grel): ra dza ta/ sogs so/ /dz+nyA? khong du chud pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ laT/ dz+nyA ba ya ti/ lung/ a dzI dz+nyA pat/ sogs dang/ mA ra Na to Sha Na ni shA mane Shu dz+nyA/ 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dz+nyA 'o/ /'chi ba la sogs so? bdon? 'di rnams la 'jug pa ni
163b1(mdo 'grel): dz+nyA ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don to/ dz+nyA la Ni tsa arti h+rI sogs kyis puk A kan byin/ mdo 'dis u ba d+hA thung? ngur bsgyur bas/ dz+nyA bi zhes grub pa la yaT sogs sbyar/ laT/ dz+nya pa ya ti/ ling/ dz+nya ba yet/ loT/ dz+nya ga la tu/ lang/ a
163b2(mdo 'grel): dz+nya pa yate/ lung/ a dzi dz+nya bat/ liT dz+nya ba yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ dz+nya pa yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ dz+nya pyAt?/ lriT/ dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya taM/ lring/ a dz+nya pa yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ don de rnams 'jug pa'i tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ si dz+nya ba ya ti sha drun/ dgra ba rnams kun tu 'tshigs
163b3(mdo 'grel): la?/ pi dz+nya pa ya ti rA dzA ni/ rgyal po rnams dges par 'dod/ dz+nya pa ya ti shastraM lta du'o/ /mtshan cha rab tu rno? bar byed par 'dod/ ` dzwe la 'bar ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ dzwa la hwa la hma la an mony nu pa sargAt bA glA snA ba nwa? ma shtsa/ nyer bsgyur med pa las/ dzwa la hwal hAl nas dang gA
163b4(mdo 'grel): snA ba na banI 'ang ngo/ /nyer bsgyur sngon du med pa la/ dzwa la 'bar ba/ hwa la dang hma la g.yo ba/ Na ma sgra rnams dang/ glA lus rnam par nyams pa/ sna gtsang ba/ ba na slong ba/ Tu ba ma skyug pa rnams kyang ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngu ra
163b5(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba'i don te/ laT/ dzA la la ti/ ling?/ dza la yet/ loT/ dzA la ya tu/ lang/ a dzwa la yat/ lung/ a dzA dzwa lah/ liT/ dzwa la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ dzwa la yi tA/ smon pa'i ling/ dzwa lyAt/ lriT/ dzwa la yi Sh+ya ti/ lring a dzwa la yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ h+ra la
163b6(mdo 'grel): gal? ba la tsi tsa sbyar/ thung ngur bsgyur/ hwa li zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ hwa la ya ti/ lung/ a dzI hwa lat/ sogs so/ / ` hma la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar thung ngur bsgyur/ hma le zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ gyahma? la ya ti/ lung/ a
163b7(mdo 'grel): dzI hmal te/ sogs so/ /de? Na ma sgra la Ne tsa thung ngur bsgyur/ laT/ na? ma ya ti/ lung/ a nI na nat/ sogs so/ /gA lus rnam par nyams pa la/ Ni tsa sbyar/ puk A ga ma byin/ thung ngur bsgyur pas/ laT/ gla ba yati?/ lung/ a dzA? gla pat/ sogs
164a1(mdo 'grel): so/ / ? Sh+NA gtsang pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk ag mthung ngur bsgyur/ sna pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sna ba ya ti/ a sISh+Na sat/ sogs so/ /` ba na slong ba la Ni tse thung ngur bsgyur/ ba ni zhes pa la laT?
164a2(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyang bas/ laT ba na ya ti/ lung/ a bI ba na ta/ sogs so/ / ` Tub ma skyug pa la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur bas/ pa mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ pa ma ya ti/ lung/ a bI ba mah/ sogs so/ /nyer bsgyur yod na thung ngur mi bsgyur te/
164a3(mdo 'grel): ?/ pra dzwA la la ti/ lung/ prA dzI dzwa laT/ sogs so/ /` ka mu mjes pa la'o/ /zhes pa la Ni tsa/ na ka mya mi tsam(mdo 'grel): kam am tsam byi ma yin no/ /ka mu mdzes pa/ a mi nad/ tsam za ba rnams ma mdza' can ma yin te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur mi? sgyur
164a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i don te/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ kA mi zhes pa la mdo 'dis thung ngur mi bsgyur/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ kA ma ya ti/ liT/ kA ma yet/ loT/ kA ma ya tu/ lang/ a kA ma yat/ luT/ a tsI kA mat/ liT/ kA ma yI tsa kA ra/ luT/ kA ma yi tA/
164a5(mdo 'grel): smon ling/ kA myAt/ lriT/ kA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ lriT/ a kA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /TaM a mi nat la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ A mi zhes pa la liT sogs sbyar pas/ laT/ A ma ya ti/ lang/ A ma yet/ laT/ ay? ya tu/ lang/ A ma yah/ lung la/ na
164a6(mdo 'grel): Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod bas/ A mi mat/ sogs dang/ liT sogs ltag ma rnams la/ liT/ A ma yAM tsa kA ra/ lung Ad mA yi tA/ smon ling/ A myat/ lriT/ A ma yi Sh+yat/ lriT/ a Na/ yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /tsa ma za ba la'o zhes pa la NaM tsa
164a7(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba byas/ tsA me zhes pa la la Ta sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ tsA ma ya ti/ ling/ tsA ma yet?/ lot/ tsA ma ya tu/ lang?/ a tsA ma yat/ lu anyShi? tsa mat/ liT/ tsA ma yA tsa kA ra/ luT/ tsA ma yi ta/ smon ling / tsA myAt/ lriT/ tsAm yi Sh+ya ta/ lring/ a tsA ma yi Sh+yat/
164b1(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /shumu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ 'phel ba byas pas/ laT/ ShA ma la ti/ ling/ A shA sha mat/ sogs so/ /sha mo? darsha ni mit/ sha mu'i mi mthong ba lam 'gro ba'o/ /sha mu mi mthong ba'i don la 'jug pa na ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/
164b2(mdo 'grel): dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ mdo 'dis thung ngur bsgyur/ sha mi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ sha ma ya ti/ ling/ sha ma yet/ loT/ sha ma ya tu/ lang/ /a sham ya tu/ lung/ a shi sha mat/ liT/ sha ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ sha ma yi
164b3(mdo 'grel): tI/ smon ling/ sha myA ta/ lriT/ sha ma yiSh+ya ti/ lring/ /a sha ma yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /dza? ya mu nya bar zhi ba la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ laT/ yA ma ya ti/ ling/ yA ma yet/ loT/ yA ma ya tu/ lang/ a yA ma yat/ lung/ a yi yA mat/ liT/ yA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ yA ma yi tA/
164b4(mdo 'grel): yA smon ling/ myAt/ lriT/ yA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a yA ma yi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ ya mony? pa ri be Sha Ne/ ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o/ /ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la ma 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don no//
164b5(mdo 'grel): lngam la ba ya ti/ lung/ a yI ya mat/ sogs so/ /To skha? dir rko ba la'o zhes pa la ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i los 'phel ba nbyas/ skhA di zhes pa la laT sogs sbyr bas/ laT skhA da ya ti/ ling/ skhA da yet/ loT/ skhA da ya tu/ lang/ a skhA da yat/ lung/ a tsI skhA
164b6(mdo 'grel): dat/ liT/ skhA da yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ skhA da yi tA/ smon ling/ skhA tyAt/ lriT/ swA da yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a skhA da Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ skha di da ba pa ri b+hyi tse/ skhA di'i a pa dad pa'i dag las kyang ngo/ /a ba dang pa ri dag las pha rol gyi skha di'i 'ang 'gro ba'i ming
164b7(mdo 'grel): can te/ thud ngur bsgyur bas/ a ba skha da la ti/ pa ri skha da ya ti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ so ba sarga skha de(mdo 'grel): pha Na shatsa ? tsidA/ nyer bsgyud? dang bcas pa'i skha? di dang pha Na dag gi ma 'gro ba 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur gang rung zhig
165a1(mdo 'grel): sngon na yod pa'i skha dir dang pha Na gnyis ni skabs 'ga' zhig tu ma 'gro ba' ming can du yang na bar bya ste/ pra skhad ya ti/ bra skha da ya ti/ sogs so/ /` paN sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni 'phel ba byas/ phA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar
165a2(mdo 'grel): bas/ laT/ phA Na ya ti/ ling/ phA Na yet/ loT/ phA Na ya tu/ lang/ a phA Na yat/ lung/ a bA pha Na ta/ liT/ pha Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ phA Na yi tA/ smon ling/ phA N+yAt/ lriT/ phA Na yi Sh+yato/ lring/ a phA Na yi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na nyer bsgyur
165a3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa'i skha de dang phaN dag sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis mit du yang na bar byas pas/ pra phaT ya ti/ sogs sam/ pra phA Na ya ti/ sogs so/ /` iN 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsi/ Nau ga ma ri bo d+ha ne/ khong du chud pa ma yin pa la Ni
165a4(mdo 'grel): la ga mi'o/ /khang du chud pa'i don ma yin pa la Ni tsa pha rol la iN ni ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ i brjod don yin bas phyis ma Ni tsa'i i la drangs pas/ ga mi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyr bas/ laT/ ga ma ya ti/ ling/ ga ma
165a5(mdo 'grel): yet/ lang/ ga ma ya tu/ lang/ a ga ma yat/ lung/ a dzI ga mat/ liT/ ga ma yA tsa kA ra/ luT/ ga ma yitA/ smon ling/ ga myAt/ lriT/ ga ma yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a ga ma yi Sh+yat/ khong du chud pa'i don la 'jug pa na ga pu mi 'gyur te/ a tsa'i nyNati la 'os
165a6(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba byas pas/ a yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ A ya ya ti/ sogs dang/ lung la a yi/ tsa dbyings gnyis brjod/ /ats dang ba sogs kyis AT/ aT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis A ya Ni la tsang
165a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ A ya yat/ sogs so/ /` han 'tshe ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ ha nastany ciN+Na lo(mdo 'grel): tsaN dang Nal dag ma yin pa la han gyi ha'o/ /ciN dang Nal? ma yin ba'i nyaN 'gro ba'i
165b1(mdo 'grel): rkyan pha rol la han gyi mdza' ta yig tu 'gyur te/ ha ni N+Ta'i ha'i nya na 'gro ba la 'ang ngos ha g+ha mdo 'dis nat 'phel ba byas/ g+hA ti zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ g+hA ta ya ti/ ling/ g+hA ta yet/ loT/ g+hA ta ya tu/ lang/ a g+hA ta yat/ lung/ a dzi g+hA tat/
165b2(mdo 'grel): liT/ g+hA ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT/ g+hA ta yi tA/ smon ling/ g+hA tyA ta/ lriT/ g+hA ta yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a g+hA ta yi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` a'irSh+ya phrag dog gi don la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ a'irSh+yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ leT/ a'irSh+ya ya ti/ ling/ irSh+ya yet/ loT/ irSh+ya ya
165b3(mdo 'grel): tu/ lang/ irSh+ya yat/ sogs dang/ lung la/ a'irSh+yi la/ tsang Sha Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT 'phel ba byas/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni Ni phyis pas/ irShi Sh+yat/ sogs sam/ yang na/ a'irSh+ya te syI? tI ya sya dwa/ a'irSh+ya
165b4(mdo 'grel): ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis so/ /irSha ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la hal brtsegs pa'i gsum pa de nyid yang na gnyis brjod de/ brtsegs pa'i gsum pa ya nyid gnyis brjod pas/ erSh+yi yat/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/
165b5(mdo 'grel): liT/ a'irSh+ya yAM tsakA ra/ luT/ a'irSh+ya yi tA/ smon ling/ irSh+yat/ lring/ a'irSh+ya yi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ irSh+ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni na byA ka ra Na sya sU trA ta ni dzan+tA(mdo 'grel): sa ma phA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las Ni tsa mdza' tsan rnams rdzogs so/ /de
165b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA hal las ya ma rnams kyi lam la dbyi 'os pa gong ma phyis/ Ni mi bya ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi gdon cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i nyi shing rta zhes byar las Ni ci
165b7(mdo 'grel): /mdza' can rnams kyi cho ga dags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so/ /TaM gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/ d+hA te(mdo 'grel): karma Na(mdo 'grel): sa mAn kaTAM kA di ts+tshA yAM bA/ byings las las dang 'dod pas?
166a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o/ /byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dong pa'i don byed pa po mnyam pa ste/ byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don la san yang na 'gyur te /a da za pa san sbyar/ lung
166a2(mdo 'grel): san dag la g+ha sla las ? slir sbyur li phyis/ san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ g+ha dzha ab+hyA sa'i tsar? lang 'os/ dzha dza san la iT 'os/ ir bskyur/ bar la tsar 'os swa trar bskyur bas/ dzi b+ha? tra? zhes grub
166a3(mdo 'grel): pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la shab/ rjes 'brel byis nas/ at la yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ laT/ dzi g+hatsha ti/ ling/ dzi g+hatshet/ loT/ dzi g+hatsha tu/ lang/ /aN? dzi b+ha tas Na?
166a4(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ lung la/ iT byin/ at kyi dbyi'o sa a phyir pas/ a dzi g+hatshaMta/ a dzi b+hutshiSh+Ta/ a dzi g+ha t+mi Shu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /liT la kA sa sogs kyis a ma sbyar/ aT kyi dbyi 'os a za bar 'dod/ phyis pas/ dzi g+hA tshAM tsa kA ra/ dzi g+hAtshAM ba b+hA ba/
166a5(mdo 'grel): dzi g+hAtshA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin a byis pas/ dzi g+hatshi tA/ dzi g+hatshi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzi g+hatsh+ya ta/ dzi b+hatsh+yAstaM/ dzi g+hatsh+ya su(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /lriT la/ iT byin a phyis pas/ dzi g+hu tshi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang/ de
166a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ lring la/ a dzig+hatsha Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ding zad pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar gnyis brjod thung ngur bsgyur bas/ di dI ShA zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ lam dri di ? te/ 'di/ di dA Shi ta/ ? /di da'i? tAM ?
166a7(mdo 'grel): didSha Sha ta/ lang?/ /sra di dI ShiSh+Ta/ liT/ /di dI ShI tsa kre/ luT 'di di Shi tA /smon ?/ ? dI Shi ShISh+T/ ? di dI Shi Sh+ya te/ ? a ding Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ dIng(mdo 'grel): sa n+yA twaM ke tsi dwA/ ring gi san la a nying 'ga' zhig tu
166b1(mdo 'grel): yang na'o/ /dIng gi san pha rol la a nyid du bsgyur ba skabs 'gar yang na bar bya ste/ At du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a b+hyA sa thung ngur bsgyur/ san la it 'os it du bsgyur bas/ ding sa zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ di dA sa te/ lig? di
166b2(mdo 'grel): dA sa ta/ loT/ di dA sa tAM/ 'dra/ a di dA sa ta/ lung/ /sra di dA siSh+Ta/ liT? didA sAM tsa kre /luT/ di dA si tA/ smon ling/ di dA si ShISh+T/ lriT/ di dA si Sh+ya ta/ lring/ a di dA si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` tyu ta 'bar ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ sa na yang dag la 'os
166b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ byung dang swa bi dag gi saM pra sI ra Na 'os/ a b+hyA sa saM bra sAr tar bsgyur/ ba la dang po'i iT byin pas/ di dyut it san zhes pa la/ ra lo byu ba d+hA d+d+ha lA de sa shtsa/ u i u pa d+hA hal dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo//
166b4(mdo 'grel): byings hal dang po can i yig dang u yig gang rung zhig u pa d+hA na yong pa dang bying sar yig dang la yig mdza' can las pha rol gyis na iT dang bcas pa'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bya ste/ kit kyi phyogs la yon tan ma
166b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ kit ma yin pa'i phyogs la buk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ di byu ti Sha 'am/ di dyo ti 'a? zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyang bas/ di byu ti Sha te/ laT/ di dyo ti Sha te/ di dyu ti She ta/ ling/ di dyo ti She ta/ di dyA ti Sha
166b6(mdo 'grel): tA lo? di dyo ti Sha taM/ a di dyu ti Sha Ta/ lang a di byo ti Sha ta/ a di dyu ti ShiSh+Ta/ lung a di dyo ti ShiSh+Ta/ di dyu to ShI tsa kra/ li ru di dyo ti ShI tsa kra/ di dyu ti Shi tA/ luT/ di dyu ti Shi tA/ di dyu ti Shi ShISh+Ta/ smon ling/ di dyo ti Shi ShISh+Ta/ di dyu
166b7(mdo 'grel): ti Shi ? te ba ? di dyo ti ? Sh+ya te/ e di byu ti Shi Sh+ya ta ling a di dyo ti Shi ? ta/ sogs so/ /` uts+tshe? chag pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ 'grel par u ts+tshi'i cha iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod zhes byung bas/ tshig gnyis brjod/
167a1(mdo 'grel): a b+hya? sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tsha tsar bsgyur bas/ u cits+tshi ? zhes grub pa la laT sogs sgyur pas/ laT u tsits+tshi Sha ti/ ling u tsits+tshi She ta/ loT u tsits+tshi Sha ta/ ?/ oM cits+tshi Shi ta/ lung aau cits+tsha ShIt/ liT u tsi ts+tshi'i tsa kAr?
167a2(mdo 'grel): luT/ u tsitshtsi Shi tA/ smon ling/ u tsits+tshi Sh+yat/ lriT/ u tsi ts+tshi Sh+ya ti/ lring a tsits+tshi'i Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` id glog pa la Ni dang san sbyar/ Ni la'ang sa na tsang dag la 'os/ yang na i gAng du ba sgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku hi dag gi tsu 'os gA dzI
167a3(mdo 'grel): thung du 'od thung ngur bsgyur/ san la it 'os/ de it bal dang po'i iT byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin/ e tse'i a ya/ a d+hi sngon du gzhag pas/ A d+hi dzi gA ba yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT
167a4(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyar/ laT ? ad+hi dzi gA pa yi Sha ti/ ling/ ara d+hi dzi gA pa yi Shet/ loT/ a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Shu tu/ lang a d+hya dzi gA pa yi ShaT/ lung a d+ha dzi gA pa yi ShI Ta/ liT a d+hya? dza gA pa yi Sha tsa kA ra/ luT a d+hi dzi gA pa yi ShatA/ smon pa'i ling ad+hi
167a5(mdo 'grel): dza gA pa yi ShA ta/ lriT/ a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Shi Sh+ya ti/ lring/ a d+hya dzi gA pa yi Shi Sh+yaT/ sogs dang/ gang du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ krI ing dzi? rnams kyi Ni la 'os/ /Ang bsgyur/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puk A ga ma byin/ san yang dag la
167a6(mdo 'grel): 'os pa Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ bal dang po'i it byin/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan a tsa'i a la sogs dang a d+hi sngon du bzhag pas/ a d+hya po pa yiSha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a d+hya pi pa
167a7(mdo 'grel): yi Sha ti lug a d+hya pi pa ya ShI ta/ sogs so/ /` Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la Ni gangs na/ Ni la'ang san cing dag la 'os saM pra sAr Nar yang na bsgyur te/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ la shi shwa ya yi Sha ti//
167b1(mdo 'grel): luT/ a shi shwa ya yi ShI ta/ sogs dang/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT/ shu shA ba yi ShI ti/ lung/ a shu sha ba yi ShIt/ sogs dang/ yang Ni tsa med pa byings nyid las na sbyar na/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ laT shi shwa yi Sha ti/ lung a shi sh+ra yi
167b2(mdo 'grel): shIt/ sogs so/ /` he nya 'gran pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa san sbyar/ shit ma yin pa nye ba'i yul sogs kyis e ca At/ hwa'i li saM pra sA ra na 'os/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu hU pa ya Sha zhes grub pa la
167b3(mdo 'grel): laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzu hA ba yi Sha ti/ ling dzu hA ba yi Shat/ loT dzu hA ba yi Sha tu/ lang a dza hA ba yi Shat/ 'ung/ a dzu hA pa yi ShIt/ liT dzu hA ba yi Shi tsa kAra/ luT dzu hA ba yi Shi tA/ smon ling? dzu hA ba yi Sh+yAt/ lriT dzu hA ba yi Shi Sh+ya te/ lring a dzu ha ba yi ShaSh+yat/
167b4(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /`a ni srog la'o zhes pa la san/ bal dang po'i iT byin/ san yang dag la 'os/ na iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod bas/ a ni mi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ latsa a ni ni Sha ti/ ling a na ni She ta/ loT a ni ni Sha tu/ lang A ni ni Shat/ lung a ni ni
167b5(mdo 'grel): ShIt/ liT/ a ni ni ShaM tsa kA ra/ luT a ni ni Shi ta/ smon ling a ni ni Sh+yA ta/ i a ni ni Shi Sh+ya ti/ lring a ni ni Shi Shat/ sogs so/ /` u b+ho sA b+hya sa sya/ sa la a b+hyA sa'i gnyis dag ga'o/ /a ni ti'i san pha rol la nyer bsgyur na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung
167b6(mdo 'grel): na a b+hyA sa dang u pa d+ha'i na yig gnyis ka Na yig tu bsgyur par bya ste/ sbA Ni Ni Sha te/ sogs so/ /` bri tu 'jug pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ ha lan+ta tstse hal mdza' las kyang ngo/ byings mdza' ha la so sor bsdu pa yin pa u ba d+hA na i ka so sor
167b7(mdo 'grel): bsdu ba'i/ /yi ge yod pa di li pha rol gyi san iT med pa na ka 'gro ba'i ming can ta/ 'dzir a tang rnams la/ prit rnams las so so iT mi 'jug/ gnyis brjod/ ri'i aT/ de san la iT 'os it du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis kit yin pas yon tan
168a1(mdo 'grel): sogs mi byed/ bi britsha zhes grub pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT bi britsha te/ ling byi britshe ta/ loT bi britsha tu/ lang A bi britsha ta/ lung a bi britshI ta/ lriT bi britshaM tsa ka ra/ luT bi britshi ta/ smon 'di bi britsh+yat/ sriT bi britshi Sh+ya ti/ lring a bi
168a2(mdo 'grel): bratshi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` tang rnams la bal dang bo'i iT byin yon tan byas/ bi barti Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT pi barti Sha te/ ling be barti Shet/ loT bri barti Sha tAM/ lang/ a bi barti Shat/ lung a ba barti ShiSht/ liT a bi barti Shi tsa kre/ luT bi
168a3(mdo 'grel): barti Shi tA/ smon ling bi barta ShISh+Ta/ lriT bi ba rti Shi Sh+ya te/ lriT a bi barti sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` nri ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ /krit tsrat nrit trit nriT sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ san kit yin pas
168a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan sogs mi byed/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ni nritsha ti/ laT ni narti Sha ti/ ni nritsha/ ling ni na rti Shet/ ni nri tshatu/ loT ni narti Sha tu/ a ni nritshat/ lang a ni na rti Shat/ a ni nritshI ta/ lus a ni narti
168a5(mdo 'grel): ShI ta/ ni nritshaM tsa kA ra/ lis ni narti ShAM tsa kA ra/ ni nritshi tA/ lus ni na rti Shi tA/ ni nritsh+yet/ smon ba'i ling ni na rti ShaT/ ni nritshi Sh+ya ti/ lriT ni na rti Shi Sh+ya ti/ a ni nritshi Sh+yaT/ lring a ni na rti Sha Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` trI rkal bar byed pa dang sgrol bar byed pa
168a6(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT sa ni bA/ san la iT yang na'o/ /brang bri nya dag dang byings rIt mdza' rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur ro/ /i ko dzha la/ i ka las dzhal la'o/ /byings ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i
168a7(mdo 'grel): mdza' can las pha rol gyi san dzha la dad po can te iT med ba de ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ iT med pa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis san kit yin pas yon tan dang 'phel ba mi byed/ byings kyi rIT kyi it 'os rI it du bsgyur
188b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod ri'i aN la pha rol los ra byin/ u pa d+ha li 'ang ngos ring bor bsgyur bas/ ti tIrSha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT ti tIrSha ti/ ling titIrShe ta/ loT ti tIrSha tu/ lang a ti tIrShat/ lung a ti tIrShIt/ liT ti tIrShAM tsa kA ra/ luT ti tIrShi tA/ smon ling ?
188b2(mdo 'grel): tIrSh+yat/ lriT ti tIrSha Sh+ya ti/ lring a ti tIrShit/ sogs dang/ i Ta'i phyogs la bri rI ta dag las yangna 'os iT dang dang a'iT yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/ ri'i at dang san la iT/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyi yon tan byas pas/ laT tri ta ri Sha hi?
188b3(mdo 'grel): lung? a ti ta ri ShAt/ laT ti ta ri ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT ti ta rI Sha ti/ lung a ti ta rI ShI ta/ liT ti ta rI shaM tsa ka ra/ sogs so/ /` dring kun nas gus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ azdzha na ga mAM sa ni/ a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la'o/ /byings a tsa'i
188b4(mdo 'grel): mdza' can rnams kyi mdza' dang han gam dag gi u pa d+hA rnams san pha rol la ring por bsgyur ta/ bri brIr bsgyur/ san la iT yang na 'os iT yang na bar byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs las na kit yin pas/ oSh+Ti'i dang po ma yin pa'i ut
188b5(mdo 'grel): 'os/ /rIt ut du bsgyur/ ri'i aN lar pha rol los ra sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ bu bUrSha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT bu bUrSha ti/ ling bu bArShet/ loT bu bUrSha tu/ lang a bu bA rShaT/ lung a bu
188b6(mdo 'grel): bUrShIt/ liT bu bUrshAM tsa kA ra/ luT bu bUrShit/ smon ling bu bUrSh+yaT/ lriT bu bU rShi Sh+ya ti/ lring a bu bUrShi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ bri rI sogs kis iT dang a'iT yang na bar byas/ gnyis brjod/ ri'i at dang san la it/ byings
188b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ laT bi ba ri Sha ti lung a bi ba ri ShA ti/ lriT bi ba ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT bi ba rI Sha ti/ lur a bi ba rI ShIt/ liT bi ba rI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` Du kri nya byed pa la'o zhes pa las? na
169a1(mdo 'grel): sbyar/ a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la 'os ring por bsgyur/ byings kyi rIt kyi it/ ri'i aN la ra pha rol gnyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ saM sngon du bzhag/ ka ro ti'i saM ba ri u ba sogs kyi mdos ka'i sngon du suT A ga ma byin/ 'grel
169a2(mdo 'grel): bar skabs 'dir iT yang na bar mi byed de iT mi ster ba kho na'o zhes bshad pas iT mi 'jug/ saM tsi skIrSha zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas laT si tsi skIrSha ti/ ling saM tsiskIrShat/ loT saM tsiskIrSha tu/ lang sa ma tsi skIrShat/ lung sa ma
169a3(mdo 'grel): tsi skIrShit/ liT saM tsi skIrShAMtsa kA ra/ luT saM tsi skIrSha tA/ smon ling saM tsiskIrShat/ liT saM tsiskIrShi Sh+ya ti/ lring sa ma tsiskI rShi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` d+hwi gya gyu la 'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la 'os ring por bsgyur/ san la iT yang
169a4(mdo 'grel): na 'os iT yang na bar byed de/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ oShti sngon ma ma yin pa'i ut 'os ut du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod ri'i aN la ra pha rol/ u ba d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring po bsgyur bas/ du d+hurSha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar
169a5(mdo 'grel): laT du d+harSha ti/ lung a du d+hUrShit/ liT du d+hA rShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT di d+hwa ri Sha ti/ lung a d+hi d+ha ri ShIt/ liT di d+hwa 'i ShAM tsa kA ra/ sigs so/ /` dzi rgyal ba la 'o zhes pa las na/ dzi'i san liT
169a6(mdo 'grel): dag la 'os dzi gar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pas/ laT dzi gi Sha ti/ ling dzi gi Shet/ loT dzi gi Sha tru/ lang a dzi gi Shat/ lung a dzi gi ShIt/ liT dzi gi ShI tsa bA ra/ luT dzi gi Shit/ smon ling/ dzi gi Sh+yat/ lriT dzi gi Shi Sh+ya ti lring a dzi gi Shi
169a7(mdo 'grel): Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /`tsi nya sogs pa la'o zhes pas san sbyar/ tsi'i 'dam ka 'os tsa kar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ laT tsi ki Sha ti/ lung a tsi ki ShI ta/ laT tsi ki ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT tsi tsi Sha ti a
169b1(mdo 'grel): tsi tsi ShIt liT tsi tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ha na 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa las na/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+hyA sa'i tsa dbang 'os/ dzha dza sen la iT du bsgyur/ a tsa han gam rnams kyis na la 'os ring por bsgyr bas/ laT dzi g+hAnsa?
169b2(mdo 'grel): ti/ ling/ dzi g+hA nset/ loT/ dza g+hAnsa tu/ lang a dzi g+hAnsat/ lung a dzi g+hansIt/ liT dzi g+hAnsAM tsa kA ra/ luT dzi g+hAnsi tA/ smon ling dzi b+hAnsyA ta/ lriT dzi g+hAnsi Sh+ya ti/ lring a dzi g+hAnsi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /iN 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ sa ni tsa/ akhyA sa las kyang ngas hak+ti/
169b3(mdo 'grel): san la'ang ngo/ /a Na'i san pha rol la 'ang rtogs pa'i don la 'jug pa ma yin na ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ i brjod don no/ /ga mi ru bsgyur/ a tsa han gam rnams kyis na la 'os u ba d+hA ring por bsgyur iT byin pas/ laT dzi gA mi Sha Ti/ ling dzi
169b4(mdo 'grel): gA mi Shet/ loT dzi gA mi Sha tu/ lang a dzi gA mi Shat?/ lung a dzi ga mi Shit/ liT dzi gA mi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT dzi gA mi Shi hA/ smon ling dzi gA mi Sh+yAt/ liT dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ti/ lring a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+yat/ sogs dang/ rtogs pa'i don yin na ga mi ru mi bsgyur/ 'grel
169b5(mdo 'grel): bar a tsa gcig pa dang po la san nyid gnyis brjod do zhes byung bas/ sa gnyis brjod/ san la iT 'os it du bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa gnyis Sha/ pra ti sngon du bzhag pas/ laT pra tI Shi Sha ti/ ling pra tI Shi She ta/ laT bra tI Shi Sha tu/
169b6(mdo 'grel): lang a bra tai Shi Shat/ lung a pra tai Shi ShIt/ liT pra tI ShaM ShaM tsa kA ra/ luT pra tI Shi ShI tA/ smon ling pra tI Shi Sh+yAt/ lriT pra ti Shi Shi Sh+ya ti/ lring a pra tI Shi Shi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /` ik dran pa la'o zhes pa la'ang cho ga dang gzugs thams cad eN dang 'dra
169b7(mdo 'grel): ste khyad par cung zad tsam yang med do/ /ing klog pa la'o zhes pa la san/ i da shtsa/ id gi 'ang ngo/ /id gi 'ang san pha rol la ga mi ru bsgyur bar bya ste/ ga mi ru bsgyur gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga je/ san la it 'os it du bsgyur//
170a1(mdo 'grel): a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la 'os u ba d+hA ring por bsgyur bas/ dzi gA mi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT dzi gA mi Sha te/ ling dzi gA mi She ta/ loT dzi gA mi Sha tAM/ lang a dzi gA mi Sha Ta/ lung a dzi
170a2(mdo 'grel): gA ma ShiShta/ liT dzi gA mi ShAM tsa krE/ luT a dzi gA mi Shi tA/ smon ling dzi gA mi Sha ShISh+Ta/ lriT dzi gA mi Shi sh+ya te/ lring a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /` irSh+ya 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa dang san sbyar/ 'grel par lung grangs pa/ irSh+ya te(mdo 'grel): sa no
170a3(mdo 'grel): bA dwi twaM/ a'i rSh+ya ti las san nyid gnyis yang na'o/ /irSh+ya ti las pha rol gyi san nyid yang na gnyis brjod par bya ste/ san gnyis brjod/ san la it 'os gong ma it du bsgyur/ a'irSh+yi Shi Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
170a4(mdo 'grel): laT a'irShi Shi Sha ti/ lung a'irSh+yi Shi ShIt/ liT irSh+yi Shi ShaM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ yang na irSh+ya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis sos ya Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ a'irSh+yi yi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a'irSh+yi yi Sha ti/ lung a'irSh+yi
170a5(mdo 'grel): yi ShIt/ liT a'irSh+yi ShaM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` b+hu yod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ sa ni gra ha gu he shtsa/ gra ha gu ha dag gi'ang san la'o/ /gra ha nye bar len pa dang/ gu hU kun nas sgrib pa dang/ 'ang sgras byings mdza' uka so sor bsdu
170a6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams las san pha rol gyi san la iT mi 'gyur te/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyi bsgrubs pas/ bu b+hu Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT bu b+hU Sha ti/ lung a bu b+hU ShIt/ liT bu b+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du
170a7(mdo 'grel): hu byin pa las na sbyar/ med 'dis iT mi 'jug/ /a tsa han? gam rnams kyi san la 'os ring por bsgyur gnyis brjod pa sogs kyi bsgrubs bas/ dzu hU Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzu hU Sha ti/ lug a dzu hU ShI ta/
170b1(mdo 'grel): liT dzu hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /`gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes pa la san gnyis brjod ku ha dag gi tsu ha'i Dha 'os/ ha Dha/ a ca gcig pa'i b+ha Sha mdza' sogs kyis ga g+ha/ sa la Sha Dha dag gis ka 'os/ Dha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur
170b2(mdo 'grel): dzu g+hu k+Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzu g+hu k+Sha ti/ lung a dzu g+hu k+ShI ta/ liT dzu g+hu k+ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` bra ha nye bar len pa la san sbyar/ ru da bi da mu Sha gra hi swa bi pra che(mdo 'grel): saM shtsa/ ru da bi da mu Sha gra hi swa pi pra tsha las san 'ang ngo/ /du da
170b3(mdo 'grel): mchi ma 'dzag pa/ bi da shes pa/ mu Sha rku ba/ gra ha ne bar len pa/ swa bi nyal ba/ prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las pha rol gi kriT sogs kyi rkyen k+twa dang san yang ka 'gro ba'i ming can te/ san kit yin pas/ gra hi dzyA sogs kyis sam pra sA ra nar
170b4(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ gnyis brjod ri'i at dang/ san la it ha'i Dha 'os/ ha Dha/ atsa gcig pa'i b+ha Sha mdza' sags kyis/ ga g+ha/ sa la Sha Dha dag gi ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shad bsgyur/ dzi gri kA zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzi
170b5(mdo 'grel): g+h+rI k+Sha ti/ lung a dzi g+h+raM k+Shit/ liT dzi g+h+ri k+ShAM ca kA ra/ sogs so/ /` nyi Shwa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san it yin pas/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra swa ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pi sogs kyis/ su Shupsa zhes grub pa pa laT
170b6(mdo 'grel): sogs sbyar bas/ laT su Shu baS ti/ lung a su Shu psIt/ liT a su Shu psAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /Sh+ming cung zad rgod pa la' zhes pa la san sbyar/ smi pUng raM dzu a shAM sa ni/ smi bUng ri any+dzu a sha rnams kyi san la'o/ /Sh+ming cung zad rgod pa/ bUng dag
170b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ ri 'gro ba/ any+dzu gsal ba/ a sha zas rnams las pha rol gyi san la it 'gyur/ iT bin byings thams cad pa sogs kyi yon tan dang/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ siSh+ma yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs ting rnam
171a1(mdo 'grel): sbyar bas/ laT siSh+ma yi Sha te/ lung a siSh+ma yi ShiSh+T/ liT si Sh+ma yi ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so ` bUng dag pa la'o zhes pa las na/ iT byin yon tan byas e tsa'i a ya gnyis brjod/ u'i bu yaN dzi a pha rol los/ u ir bsgyur ba sos
171a2(mdo 'grel): kyis pi ba bi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT pi pa bi Sha te/ lung a pi pa bi ShiSht/ liT pi ba bi ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /` ri 'gro ba la san/ yon tan/ ra iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ a ri ri Sha zhes grub pa/
171a3(mdo 'grel): la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a ri ri Sha ti/ lung A ri ri ShI ta/ liT a ri ri ShaM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` any+dzU gsal ba dang 'chab par byed pa dang 'gro ba rnams la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ dza iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/
171a4(mdo 'grel): any+dzi dzi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT any+dzi dzi Sha ti/ lung any+dzi dzi ShI ta/ liT/ any+dzi dzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /`a sha zas la'o zhes pa las na sbyar iT byin/ sha iT dang bca pa gnyis brjod/ a shi shi Sha zhes grub pa la
171a5(mdo 'grel): laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a shi shi Sha ti/ lung a shi shi ShI ta/ liT a shi shi ShAM ca ka ra/ sogs so/ /` krInya 'che ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ ki rashtsa bany+tsa b+hya(mdo 'grel): krI las kyang lnga rnams las so/ /krI la sogs pa lnga ste/ krInyA 'tshe ba/ grI ming
171a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ drI rnam par 'dzoms pa/ d+hwi nya 'dzin pa/ brats+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las kyang san la iT 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis iT byin yon tan byas/ gnyis brjod ri'i aT/ san la it 'os it du bsgyur/ ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/
171a7(mdo 'grel): tsi kA ri Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT tsi Sha ri Sha ti/ lung a tsi kA ri ShI ta/ liT tsi ka ri Shi tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ra bzhin du/ grI med pa la' zhes pa las na sbyar/ iT byin bas/ laT dzi ga ri Sha ti/ lung a dzi ga ri ShI ta/
171b1(mdo 'grel): liT zi ga ri ShAM tsa kA rA/ sogs so/ /drI rnam par 'joms pa la san sbyar iT byin/ yon tan sogs kyis/ di da ri Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT di da ri Shwa te/ lung a di da ri ShiSh+T/ liT di da ri ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /`
171b2(mdo 'grel): d+h+rinya 'dzin pa la san sbyar iT byin/ did+ha ri Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT di d+ha ri Sha te/ lung a di d+ha ri ShiSh+T/ liT di d+ha ri ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /'grel par de rnams rIt mdza' yin kyang a'iT ring por mi 'gyur
171b3(mdo 'grel): zhes byung bas a'iT mi 'jug go/ ` prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa la san/ ru da bi da sogs kya mdos san kit yin pas/ kit pha rol la gra hi dzyA sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod san la it/ mdo 'dis iT byin/ pi brits+tshi Sha/
171b4(mdo 'grel): zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT pi prits+tshi Sha ti/ lung a pi prits+tshi ShIt/ liT pi prits+tshi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` d+hUny g.yo ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT ma 'jug gnyis brjod pas/ du d+hA Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT du b+hU
171b5(mdo 'grel): Sha ti/ lung a du d+hU ShI ta/ liT du d+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ /sogs so/ /` di bu rtse ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ bal dang po'i iT puka mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas/ di de Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ lang? di de bi Sha ti/ lung a di de
171b6(mdo 'grel): bi ShIt/ /liT di da ba ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` Shi bu thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin gnyis brjod/ sa Shar mi 'gyur yon tan byas/ si se bi Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 'aT si se bi Sha ti/ lung a si se bi
171b7(mdo 'grel): ShIt/ liT/ si se bi ShA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ri d+hU 'phel ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ sa nI ban+tard+ha b+h+rasdza dam+b+hU sh+ri sbri yUr+Nu b+ha ra dz+nyA pi sa nAM/ a'i pa mdza' dang ri d+ha d+h+rasdza dam+b+ha sh+ri sbri yu a'ur+Nu b+ha ra dz+nyA pi san rnams kyi san la'o?
172a1(mdo 'grel): su pa kyi bings mo rkyen a'i pa mdza' can rnams dang/ ri d+hu 'phel ba/ b+h+rasdza 'tshed pa/ damhu ngan g.yo ba/ sh+ri gus pa/ sbri sgra/ /yu skre ba/ Ar+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa/ b+ha ra ste/ Du b+h+rinya 'dzin pa/ dz+nyA khong du chud ba/ Sha Na sbyin ba rnams
172a2(mdo 'grel): las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la buka mdza' sags kyis yon tan/ d+ha iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ a b+hyA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ d+ha dar bsgyur/ ardi d+hi Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar
172a3(mdo 'grel): bas/ laT ardi d+hi Sha ti/ lung Ardi d+hi ShIt/ liT ardi d+hi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ A ba dz+nyA pyri d+hA mIt/ A ba dz+nyA bi ri d+ha rnams kyi a'ita'o/ /Albi khyab pa/ dz+nyA khong du chud pa/ ri d+hu 'phel ba rnams kyi iT med
172a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i san pha rol la a tsa a'it du 'gyur zhing a b+hya sa'ang dbyi ste/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos/ ri it/ mdo 'dis/ de a'it du bsgyur/ ri'i aN la ra pha rol los ra byin/ a b+hyA sa phyis/ khar la tsar 'os d+ha tar bsgyur bas/ a'irtsha zhes grub
172a5(mdo 'grel): pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a'irtshati/ ling Artshi ta/ loT a'irtsha tu/ lang irtshat/ lung i rtisat/ liT a'irtshaM tsa kA ra/ luT a'irtshi tA/ smon ling a'irtsh+yAt/ lriT a'i rti Sh+ya ti/ lring i rtsha Sh+yi ta/ sogs so/ /b+h+rasdza 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa la san/ i Ta'i
172a6(mdo 'grel): phyogs la/ b+h+ra snga'i b+hardza yang na 'os/ b+hardzar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang ni bar byas gnyis brjod/ san la it 'os it du bsgyur bas/ laT ba b+h+rasdzi Sha ?/ lung a bi b+hasdzi ShIt/ lit pi b+h+rasdzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs
172a7(mdo 'grel): sam/ laT ba b+hardzi Sha ti/ lung a bi b+hadzi ShIt/ liT bi b+harzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ b+h+rasdzi b+hasdzar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la brtsags pa'i dang po sa ka sogs
172b1(mdo 'grel): kyis sa phyis/ bra shtsa b+h+rasdza sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha Dha sogs kyis Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bi b+h+rak+Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT bi b+h+ra k+Sha ti/ lung a bi b+h+ra k+ShAt/ liT bi b+h+rA k+ShAM tsa kA
172b2(mdo 'grel): ra/ sogs dang/ b+hardzar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la gzhan chog 'dra pa la/ rak+Sha'i steng du drangs pas/ laT bi b+hark+Sha ti/ lung a bi b+hark+ShIt/ liT bi b+hark+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` dam+b+hu ngan g.yo pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a'i pa mdza' ri d+hu sogs kyis aT yang
172b3(mdo 'grel): na bar byas/ i ta'i phyogs la/ laT di dam+b+hi Sha ti/ lung a di dam+b+hi ShIt/ liT/ di dam+b+hi ShAM ca kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ damg+ha its+tsha/ dam+b+ha bi it 'ang ngos/ /iT med pa'i an pha rol la dam+b+ha'i a tsa it du bsgyur zhing 'ang gi sgras
172b4(mdo 'grel): tsang yang na a'i ta du 'gyur la a b+hyA sa'ang dbyi ste/ hal mdza' las kyang ngos san kat yin pas/ kit pha rol la it 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ma phyis/ mdo 'dis it dang a'it yang na bar byas/ a b+hyA sa phyis/ a tsa gcig pa b+ha Sha
172b5(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis da d+ha/ khar la tsar 'os/ b+ha bar bsgyur bas/ laT d+hibsa ti/ lung a d+hibsIt/ liT d+hi bsAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT d+hIpsa ti/ lung a d+hIpsIt/ liT d+hApsAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` sh+ri gus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a'i pa mdza' sogs
172b6(mdo 'grel): kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT shi sh+ra yi Sha ti/ lung a shi sh+ra yi ShIt/ liT shi sh+ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han gam rnams kyis san la 'os ring por
172b7(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bas/ laT shi sh+rI Sha ti/ lung a shi sh+rI ShIt/ liT shi sh+rI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` sbri sgra la'o zhes pa la san syar/ a'i a mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT si swa ri ShA
173a1(mdo 'grel): ti/ lung a si swa ri ShI ta/ liT si swa ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han gam sogs kyis ring po/ /oSh+Ti'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i ut 'o sa ri ut/ ri'i an lar/ gnyis brjod/
173a2(mdo 'grel): u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT su swUrSha ti/ lung a su swUrShi ta/ laT su swUrShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /yu sre ba la'o zhes pa las na/ a'i pa mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan dang/
173a3(mdo 'grel): pu yaN dzi a pha rol la u'i 'os/ a b+hyA sa'i u aM ra? bsgyur bas/ laT yi ya bi Shadzi?/ lung a yi ya bi ShI te/ liT yi ya bi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur
173a4(mdo 'grel): bas/ laT yu yU Sha ti/ lung a yu yU ShI ta/ liT yu yU ShAM ta kA ra/ sogs so/ /` a'ur+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa la ro zhes pa la san sbyar/ a'i pa mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas
173a5(mdo 'grel): laT a'ur+Nu na bI Sha ti/ lung aau r+Nun bi ShI ta/ liT Ar+Nu na bi ShAM ca kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT a'ur+Nu nU Sha ti/ lung aaur+Nu nU ShIt/ liT a'ur+Nu nu ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs
173a6(mdo 'grel): so/ /` b+hwanya 'dzin pa la san/ a'i pa mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas bas/ laT bi b+ha ri Sha ti/ lung a bi b+ha ri ShIt/ liT bi b+ha ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs
173a7(mdo 'grel): la/ oSh+Ta'i sngon ma ma yin pas ut 'os/ ri ut/ ri'i aN lar pha rol gnyis brjod/ a b+hyA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba u ba d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT bu b+hUrSha ti/ lung a bu b+hUrShIt/ liT bu b+hUrShAM
173b1(mdo 'grel): tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` dz+nyA khongs su chud ba la Ni tsa/ arti h+rI sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin pas/ dz+nyA pi la san sbyar/ a'i pa mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ laT dzi dz+nyA pa yi Sha taM/ lung a dzi dz+nyA ba yi ShIt/
173b2(mdo 'grel): liT dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ Ni tsa iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis/ A ba dz+nyA bi ri d+ha rnams kyi a'iT 'os a tsa a'it dang a b+hyA sa phyis pas/ laT dz+nyI psa ti/ lung a dz+nyI psIt/ laT dz+nyI psAM tsa kA ra/
173b3(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /` Sha Na sbyin pa la san/ a'i ba mdza' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ laT si sa ni Sha ti/ lung a si sa ni ShIt/ liT si sa ni ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /aT med pa'i phyogs la/ dzan khan san rnamS
173b4(mdo 'grel): gyis nadzha la dag la 'os/ mdza' At du bsgyur/ laT si sA sa ti/ lung a si sA sIt/ liT si sA sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ` ta nu rgyas pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa ta ni pa ti da ri drA b+hyA(mdo 'grel): sa nI DwA/ ta ni pa
173b5(mdo 'grel): ti da ri drA rnams las san la iT yang na'o/ /ta nu rgyas pa/ pa tli lhung ba/ da ri dra da na 'gro rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ laT ti ta bi Sha ti/ lung a ti ta na ShAt/ liT ti ta ni ShAM
173b6(mdo 'grel): tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ta no te rbi b+hA ShA/ ta no ti'i 'dam ka'i/ /ta no ti'i u pa b+hA iT med pa ri san pha rol la ring por bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can te/ laT ti tAnsa ti/ lung a ti tAnsAt/
173b7(mdo 'grel): liT ti tANsAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ ti tansa ti/ a ti tansIt/ ti tansA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /'grel par/ ta na tu las the? tshom la 'jug pa la'ang san 'gyur ro/ /zhes bshad de/ bsgrub tshul dang gzugs snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o/ /` mring srog
174a1(mdo 'grel): gtod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ atsa han ga ma sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/ oSh+Ti'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i ut 'os/ ri ut ri'i an la ra ba rol/ gnyis brjod/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por ring por bsgyur bas/ ?
174a2(mdo 'grel): ti/ lung a mu mUrShIt/ liT mu mUrShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` pa tli lhung ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ ta nu ba ti da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyi iT yang na bar byas/ /i ta'i phyogs la/ laT pi pa ti Sha ti/ lung a bi pa ti ShI ta/ liT pi pi taShI?
174a3(mdo 'grel): kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ sa ni mI mA g+hu ra b+ha la b+ha sha ka ba ta ba dA ma tsa i sha/ san la mI mA g+hu rab+ha shak pa ta pa da rnams kyi a tsa'i i sha'o/ /iT med pa'i san pha rol la mAng gus pa/ mI nya 'tshed ba
174a4(mdo 'grel): g+hu'i ming can rnams dang/ ra b+ha rtsom pa/ Du la b+ha Sha thob pa/ shakli nus pa/ patli lhung ba/ ba da 'gro ba rnams kyi atsa i shar 'gyur zhing a b+hyA sa'ang dbyi ste/ a tsi i sar bsgyur/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sra kra sogs kyis sa phyis/
174a5(mdo 'grel): ab+hyA sa'ang phyis pas laT pitsha ti/ lung A pitshi ta/ liT pitshAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` da ri drA ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la san spyad/ ta nu pa ti/ da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyi/ siT yang na par byas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ iT la ?
174a6(mdo 'grel): At kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ laT dri da ri dri Sha ti/ lung a di da ri dri ShIt/ liT da di ri dri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ laT di da ri drA sa ti/ lung a di da ri drA/ sI ta/ liT dri da ri drA sAM tsa kAra/
174a7(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /` mInya 'tshod pa la san/ san la mI mA sogs kyis atsa is dang a b+hya sa phyis/ sa'i byi nges phyed pa 'os/ sa tar bsgyur pas/ laT mitsha ti/ lud a mi tshI ta ta laT mitshAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` mAng bu su pa la'o
174b1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa la san sbyar/ /san la mI mA sogs kyis atsa is su bsgyur/ a b+hya sa phyis/ sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os/ sa tar bsgyur bas/ mitsha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT mitsha te/ lung a mitshiSh+Ta liT mitshAM tsa
174b2(mdo 'grel): kre/ sogs so/ /` DungAnya sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA g+hu sogs kyis a b+hyA sa phyis nas atsa is su bsgyur/ sa'i bings byed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/ laT atshi ti/ lung a de tshIt/ liT didsAM tsa kAra/ sogs so/
174b3(mdo 'grel): ` Dud+hAnya 'dzin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar sngon ma bzhin bsgrubs pas/ laT d+hita ti/ lung a d+hitshIt/ liT d+haMtshAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ` ra b+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ /san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa as su bsgyur zhing a
174b4(mdo 'grel): b+hyA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang pa so ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsar 'os b+ha bar bsgyur/ ridsa zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT ripsa te/ lung a ripsiSht/ liT ri psAM tsakre/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ N+Da? la d+ha
174b5(mdo 'grel): thob pa la san sbyar bas/ laT lipsa te/ lung a lipsiSh+Ta/ liT lipsAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /` sha kla nus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mA mI sogs kyis atsa is dang a b+hyA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'? dang po sa ka sogs kyis sa phyis /kun
174b6(mdo 'grel): nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis san gyis Shar bsgyur bas/ laT? shikA ta/ lung a shi kAM ? liT shi kAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` pad 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+hA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang bo sa
174b7(mdo 'grel): ka sogs kyis so phyis/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur/ bitsha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tar rnams sbyar bas/ laT brinsa te/ lung A pitshi ? liT pi tshAM sAM tsa kra/ sogs so/ /` A pli khyab pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ A pa dz+nyA bi ri d+ha bya?
175a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi a'it 'os/ a tsa a'it dang a b+hyA sa phyis pas/ phaT a'ipsa ti/ lung i psIt/ liT a'ipsAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /`rA d+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ 'grol par lung drangs ba/ ra d+ho hidsa yAM sa rI? swA
175a2(mdo 'grel): tsya/ ra d+ha'i 'che ba la san i sar brjod do/ /ra d+ha 'tshe ba'i don la 'jug pa na san pha rol la atsi i sar bsgyur zhing a b+hya sa dbyi ste/ atsa i sar bsgyur a b+hyA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsar 'as
175a3(mdo 'grel): d+ha tar bsgyur bas/ pra ti ratsha ti/ laT sogs so/ /'tshe ba'i don min na is su mi 'gyur bas/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT A ri rAtshI ta/ lung A ri rAtshAt/ liT A ri rAtshAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` mu tsI grol
175a4(mdo 'grel): pa la'o zhes ba pa san sbyar/ so sor 'tshe bar 'dod/ mu tsony kra ? sya gu No bA ? mu tsa'i las ma yin pa'i yon tan la yang na'o/ /mu tsa'i las kyi don la sbyar ba ma/ kun tu 'grub par 'dod/ yin pa 'dod pa kho na'i don la 'jug pa na iT med ba'i
175a5(mdo 'grel): san pha rol la u pa d+hA yon tan du yang na bsgyur zhing bsgyur ba na a b+hyA sa yang dbyi ste/ yon tan a b+hyA sa byis/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/ laT mrok+Sha ti/ lung A mo k+ShI ta/ liT mo kAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ las kyi don yin na
175a6(mdo 'grel): yon tan mi byed las/ liT mu mu k+Sha ti/ lung a mu mu k+ShIt/ liT mu mu k+ShaM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /spur 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ tsinya sbu dag gi Ni la yang na 'os Ata du bsgyur bas/ sbA ri zhes pa la san gnyis brjod/ shar
175a7(mdo 'grel): dad bo sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+hya sa'i tsor 'ang ngos pha pa iT byin pas/ laT phu spAr yi ShA ti/ lung a bu sphA ra yi ShA ti/ lung A bu sphA ra yi ShIt/ liT pu spA ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sdang/ yang At du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la yon tan ? pas/
175b1(mdo 'grel): laT bu spho ra yi ShA ti/ lung a bu spho ra yi ShIt/ liT pu spho ra yi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs dang/ ` k+Shu sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni sbyar 'phel ba byas bas/ k+ShA bzhes pa las na dang iT gnyis brjod/ hal dang po ldag po dang/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ka tsar bsgyur ba sogs
175b2(mdo 'grel): kis bsgrubs pas/ laT tsu k+ShA ba yi Sha ti/ lung/ a tsu k+ShA ba yi ShI ta/ liT tsu k+ShA ba yi ShI tsa kAr/ sogs so/ /` bU dag pa la ti tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ pA bi zhes pa la san dang iT gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yaN dzi a pha rol la 'os u ir bsgyur ba sogs
175b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT pi pA bi yi Sha ti/ luD A pi pA ba yi ShIt liT pi pA ba yi ShA tsa kA ra/ sogs so ` b+hU yod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ b+hA bi zhes pa la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod u'i pu yaN dza? a pha rol la 'os u ir
175b4(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bas/ laT pI mA ba yi ShA ti/ luT? bri b+hA ba yi ShIt/ liT pri d+hA? ba yi ShaM? tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel pa byas pas/ yA bi zhes pa la san dang iT/ gnyis brjod/ u'i bu yan sogs kyis u ir bsgyur
175b5(mdo 'grel): bas/ laT yi yA ba yi Sha ti/ lung a yi yA pa yi ShAt/ liT yi yA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ ru sgra lar zhes pa la Ni tsa'i mdza' can la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u'i bu yaN sogs kyis u ir bsgyur pas/
175b6(mdo 'grel): laT ri rA ba yi Sha ti/ lung a ri rA bi a ShIt/ liT ri rA ba yi ShAM tsa k+Sha ra/ sogs so/ /de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ lU nya gcod pa la/ ? li lA ba yi ShiT lung a li lA ba yi ShIt/ liT li lA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` dzu 'gro
175b7(mdo 'grel): pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT dzi dzI? ba yi Sha ti/ lung a dzi dzA ba yi ShIt/ liT dza dzI ba yiShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` Nu bstod pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ nA ba zhes pa la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ 
176a1(mdo 'grel): a? nu nA ba yi Sha ti/ lung a nu nA ba yi ShIt/ liT nu nA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ / ` sru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas bas/ sA bi zhes pa la gnad ? iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sra ba ti/ sh+ri Na ti/ da ba ti/ ?
176a2(mdo 'grel): ti/ pra ba ti/ bla ba ti/ bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na 'os/ a b+hya sa ir bsgyur bas/ ? snya ba yi Sha ti/ liT a si srA ba yi Sha ti/ liT si sra ba yi Sha'M tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ru tsa 'bar ba la'o/ /zhes pa la san sbyar iT byin/ u i
176a3(mdo 'grel): u pa d+hA hal dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngos/ /san iT dang bcas pa kit du yang na bar byas pas/ kit kyi phyogs la yon tan med/ kit ma yin pa'i phyogs la/ puk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ phaT tu ro ci Sha
176a4(mdo 'grel): ti/ lung a ru ro ci ShIt/ liT ru ro tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ ? ru ru tsi Sha ti/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du/ li kha ri mo 'dri ba la'o/ /zhes pa la san sbyar iT byin/ san kiT du yang na bar byas bas/ laT li le khi Sha ti/ lung a li
176a5(mdo 'grel): la khi ShIt/ phiT li le li ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs sram/ laT li li khi Sha ti/ lung a li li khi ShIt/ liT/ li li khi ShAM ce kA ra/ sogs so/ /` ru dir mchi ma 'dzag pa la'o/ /zhes pa la san dang iT/ ru da bi da muSha sogs
176a6(mdo 'grel): kyis san iT dang bcas pa kit yin pas yon tan mi byed/ laT ru ru di Sha ti/ lung a ru ru di ShI ta/ liT 'u ru di ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` de bzhin du bi da shes pa la/ laT bri bi di Sha ti/ lud a bi bi di ShIt/ liT bi bi
176a7(mdo 'grel): di Sha tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` mu Sha rku ba la'o/ /zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ kit yin bas yon tab nu byed/ ? mu mu Shi Sha ti/ lud a mu mu Shi ShIt/ liT mu mu Shi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` bstong ba la'o//
176b1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa la san sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ stau ti n+yo(mdo 'grel): a b+hyA sa sya/ stau ti dang Ni dag gi a b+hya sa'i 'o/ /stau ti dang byings Ni tsa mdza' can gyi sa yig ni a b+hya sa i Na so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol la Sha lig tu 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis sa Shar bsgyur/ Sha
176b2(mdo 'grel): Tul Sha Tu 'os/ ta Ta a tsa han gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ lam tu Sh+TU Sha ti/ ? a tu dwUd ShIt/ liT tuSh+TA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /` nyi Shwa pa nyal ba la'o/ /zhes pa la Ni tsa su ba d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ awA bi zhes
176b3(mdo 'grel): ba la san sgyur/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ byu ti sA pi dag gi si pra sAr Na 'os/ a b+hya sa sa gra sAr ? bsgyur/ ste ti dang Ni dag gi a b+hya sa'i 'os sa Shar bsgyur bas/ laT su ShA pa yi bya ti/ lung a su ShA pa yi
176b4(mdo 'grel): ShIt/ liT su Sha pa yi ShaM tso kA ra/ sogs so/ nya Shwi dmi gsal ba'i sgru la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ buk mdza' sogs kyis yon tan byas/ swe di zhes pa las na dang siT/ sa(mdo 'grel): swi da swi di sa hA nAM tsa/ swi da swa di sa
176b5(mdo 'grel): ha rnams kyi sa'ang ngo/ /swa di mi gsal ba'i sgra/ sa di ro myang ba/ sa ha bzod pa rnams kyi sa yi/ ni a ? sa iN so sor bsdu ba dang Ni tsa'i mdza' yin kyang Shar mi bsgyur ba sa yig tu gnas te/ gnyis brjod/ hal
176b6(mdo 'grel): dang po lhag pa 'os/ ba phyis/ mda' dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/ laT ? swi swi da yi Sha ti/ ? a si swa da yi ShIt/ liT si swa da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /sba da ro myang pa la/ ni tsa u ? d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas bas
176b7(mdo 'grel): sbya de zhes pa pa san iT byin/ gnyis brjod pa phyis/ /san la it 'os it du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis Shar mi bsgyur bas/ laT sri swA da yi Sha ti/ lung a si sbA da yi ShI ta/ liT si spyad yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so//
177a1(mdo 'grel): ` sa ha bzod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ A hi zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ san la it 'os it du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/ laT si sAha yi Sha ti/ lung a si sA
177a2(mdo 'grel): ha yi ShI ta/ liT si sA ha yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ / ` 'grel par rang don la bin pa'i san gyi mdza' la'ang dgos pa yod na sa na sbyor ro/ /zhes bshad pas/ gu pU sped pa la gub ti dza kit rnams la san 'os/ san
177a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu gu pas zhes pa la/ byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa do mnyam pa las yang na 'os/ slar yang san byin/ gnyis brjod zin yin pas slar mi brjod/ bal dang po'i iT at kyi dbyi
177a4(mdo 'grel): 'os a phyis pas/ dzu gu psi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzu gupsi Sha ti/ liT dzu gupsi Shet/ loT dzu tu psi Shi tu/ lang a dzu gu psaM Shat/ lung a dzu gu psi ShI ta/ liT dzu gu psi ShAM tsa kA ta/ luT dzu gupsi Shi tA/ smon ling dzu
177a5(mdo 'grel): gupsi Sh+yA ta/ lriT dzu gu psi Shi Sh+ya ti/ lring a dzu gupsi Shi Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na sya sU trA tsha nan+ta ta(mdo 'grel): sa mAptA (mdo 'grel): zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las san mdza' can rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda spyod ba'i
177a6(mdo 'grel): bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don chog dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las san gyi mdza' can rnams kyi chog rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs
177a7(mdo 'grel): so// //gsum pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen yang gi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/ d+hA to re kA tso ha lA de(mdo 'grel): kri yA sa ma b+hi hA re yang/ byings a tsa gcig phal dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo/
177b1(mdo 'grel): rutsa 'bar ba dang shu tsa mya ngan gnyis ma yin pa'i byings a tsa gcig pa hal dang po can las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa sde shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang pha rol tu 'gyur te/ nga yig ni san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod ba'i don no//
177b2(mdo 'grel): 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sU tsi sU tri mU tra Tartya shU rno ti b+hyo yang/ sU ci sU tri mU tri aT ti arti a sha a'ur+No ti rnams las yang nga/ /sU tsa phra ma/ sU tA rab tu grol ba/ mU tra rab tu 'dzag pa/ aT 'gro ba/ ri 'gro ba/ /a sha zas/
177b3(mdo 'grel): a'u r+Nu nya 'gebs pa rnams las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang 'gyur ro/ /ni tyaM kau Ti lye ga tau/ 'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o/ /'gro ba'i don gyi dbyings las shin tu ba dang yang gi don ma yin pa'i 'khyog bor 'gro ba
177b4(mdo 'grel): kho na'i don la 'jug pa na yang pha rol tu 'gyur ro/ /lu pa sa da tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da ha da sha grAM b+hyo b+hA ba garhA yAM/ lu pa sa da tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da ha da sha/ grI rnams las smad pa nyid la'o/ /lu bli gcod pa/ Sha dlaM rnam par
177b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba/ tsar 'gro ba/ dza pa yang/ dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa/ da ha thal bar byed pa/ da sha mche ba/ grI gsal bar byed pa rnams las snang pa nyid la 'jug pa la yang 'gyur te bya ba yang dag par bsdu ba tsam la ni
177b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin no/ /? //sU tsa phra ma byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang/ san yang dag la 'os gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur bas/ su sU tsa/ yang zhes pa la/ gu no yang lu ko(mdo 'grel): yan 'jig pa dag la yon tan no/ /yang
177b7(mdo 'grel): gi rkyen 'thog pa dang mi 'jig pa dag pha rol la'ang a b+hyA sayon tan du bsgyur te/ mdo 'dis yon tan byas bas/ o sA tsya zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs tang rnams sbyor te/ byed pa po la sha ba at las yon tan la
178a1(mdo 'grel): 'os gnyis dag gi gcig sngon ma'i gzugs su bsgyur bas/ so sU tsya te/ so sU tsye ta/ so sUM tsye ta/ so sU tsya tAM/ i so sU tsya ta/ sogs dang/ lung la/ ya sya ha la(mdo 'grel): ya'i hal las so/ /byings mdza' hal las pha rol gyi ya'i
178a2(mdo 'grel): byings phyed pa pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ mdo 'dis ya phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iT 'os iT byin pas/ a so sU tsiSh+Ta/ a so sU tsi ShA tAM/ /a so sU tsi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyi Am sbyar
178a3(mdo 'grel): ya'i hal la 'os ya phyis pas/ so sU tsA tsa kre/ so sU tsAM ba b+hU ba/ so sU tsa mA sa/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la bal dang po'i iT byin/ ya'i ha la la phas so/ /ya phyis pas/ so sU tsu ShI Sh+Ta?/ so sU tsi Sh+ya te/
178a4(mdo 'grel): a so sU tsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// //mU tra rab tu 'dzag pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa dag la yon tan nos yon tan byas pas/ mo mU tya te/ mo mU tya ta/ mo mA tri
178a5(mdo 'grel): tI a mo mU tu ta/ sos dang/ lung la bal dang po iT byin/ ya'i hal las sos/ ya phyis pas/ a ma mU triSh+Ta(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ liT la Am sbyar/ ya'i hal las sos la phyis pas/ mo mU tAM tsa kra/ sogs so//
178a6(mdo 'grel): lhag ma rnams la iT byin ya phyis bas/ mo mU tri hA/ mo mU tra hA/ mo mU tra ShI Sh+Ta/ mo ma tra She te/ a mo mU tri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// //aT 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os/ Ta dbyangs
178a7(mdo 'grel): shas gnyis brjod/ ? rg+honya gi ha :ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po'o/ /a b+hyu sa ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i rkyen yaka dang yang dang yang 'jig pa rnams pha rol la ring bor bsgyur te/ mdo 'dis Ta ring por
178b1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ at kyi dbyi 'os Ta phyi ma'i a phyis bas/ aT Tya zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ aM TAM Tya ta/ oM dA Tya ta/ aM TA Tye tAM/ /si TA Tya ta/ sogs dang/ lung la iT? byin/ ya'i hal las sos ya phyis
178b2(mdo 'grel): pas/ A TA TiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar ya phyis pas/ a TA TI tsa kre sogs so/ /lhag pa rnams la iT byin ya'i hal la 'os ya phyis pas/ a Ta nI tA/ a TA ShI Sh+Ta/ a TA Ti Sh+ya te/ a TA Ti Sh+ya ta/ srogs
178b3(mdo 'grel): so// //a shA zas la'o zhes pa la yang byis/ /sha dbyangs bcas gnyis brjod/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pas ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur bas/ a shA sh+ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar te/ /da shA sh+ya te/ a shA sh+ye te?
178b4(mdo 'grel): a shA sh+ya tI/ ? shA sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT byin ya'i hal las sos/ ya phyis pas/ a shA shiSh+Ta/ sogs dang/ liT la A na sbyar/ ya'i hal las sos ya phyis bas/ ya shA shAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ a sha shi ta/ a
178b5(mdo 'grel): shA sha shU shTa/ A shA shi Sh+ya te/ a shA sha Sh+yat/ sogs so/ /ra 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ ya ri tsa/ yang la 'ang ngo/ /ri 'gro ba dang brtsegs pa dang po'i ri 'ang yang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur ta/ san? yang
178b6(mdo 'grel): dag la las/ ri gnyis brjod/ yang 'jigs pa dag la yon tan nos a b+hyA sa yon tan dang/ mdo 'dis ri phyi ma yon tan byas pas/ ar ar yang zhes pa la rim par drangs/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po 'os
178b7(mdo 'grel): ring por bsgyur bas/ a rA rla zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ a rA rya te/ a rA rya ta/ a rArya tAM/ a rI rya ta/ sogs dang/ lung la iT byin/ ya'i hal las sos ya phyis pas/ A rI raSh+Ti sogs dang / liT ?
179a1(mdo 'grel): A ? byin a byis pas/ a rA rA tsa kru sogs so/ /lhags ma rnams la/ a rA ti tA/ i rA ri ShI Sh+Ta/ oM rA ri Sh+ya ta/ oM rA rI Sh+ya te/ sogs so// //a'u r+Nu nya 'gegs pa la yang Na gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa
179a2(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a'u r+No nU ya te/ a'u r+No nU ye ta/ a'u r+No nU la tAM/ aau r+No nU ya ta/ sogs so/ lung la iT byin at kyi dbyi 'os ya'i a phyis pas/ or+No nU yi Sh+Ta/ de bzhin du a phyis bas lhag ma rnams
179a3(mdo 'grel): la/ a'u r+No nU yAM tsa kre/ a'u r+No nU yi tA/ a'u r+Na nU ya ShISh+Ta/ a'u r+Na nU ya Sh+ya te/ aau r+No nU yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// //Du dA nya sbyin pa la yang byin/ g+hu mA s+thag+ha pA sogs kyis a tsa AM ta du bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa sogs
179a4(mdo 'grel): kyis yon tan byas pas/ de dI ya ta/ de dI ya te/ de dI ye tAM/ A de dI ya tA/ sogs dang/ lung la iT byin at kyi dbyi 'os i phyis pas/ a de dI yiSh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar a phyis pas/ de dI yAM tsa kre/
179a5(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ lhag ma rnams la/ de dI ye tI/ de dI yi ShI Sh+Ta/ de dI yi Sh+ya te/ a de dI yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// //de bzhin du/ Du d+hanya 'dzin pa la yang/ A a'it du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon
179a6(mdo 'grel): tan byas bas/ de d+hI ya ta/ i de d+hI yiShDa/ de d+hA ya tsa kra/ de d+hi yi tA/ sogs so// //mAng gus pa la'o zhes pa la yang/ A it/ gnyis brjod yon tan byas pas/ me mI yi te/ i me mI yiSh+Ta/ mi mi ya tsa kre/ me
179a7(mdo 'grel): ? yi hA/ sogs so// //Sh+yA? 'gro ba las ldog pa la yang/ A a'it du bsgyur gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+hya sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tha ta/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan kun nas
179b1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ Sha Du la Sha du la Sha Tu 'os tha thar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ teSh+ThI ye te/ i taSh+ThI yiSh+Ta/ teSh+ThI yaM tsa kre/ teSh+ThI yi te/ sogs so// //gai sgra la'o zhes pa la yang/ sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa la e tsa'i
179b2(mdo 'grel): At 'os/ e tsa at/ g+hu mA s+thA gA sogs kyis yid du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi cu dang yon tan byas pas/ dze gI ya te/ athi dza gI yiShta/ dze gI yAM tsa kre/ dze gi ya hA sogs so// //o haka gtong ba la yang sbyar/ g+hu sogs
179b3(mdo 'grel): kyi ? a'i/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+hya sa'i car 'ang ngos/ dzha dza/ yon tan byas pas/ dza hi yi ti/ i dze hI yiSh+Ta/ dza hA yAM tsa kre/ dzi hI yi hA/ sogs so// //Sho mdza' i las la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ sha 'gro ba nye
179b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa At/ g+hu sogs kyis it/ gnyis brjod yon tan dbang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ se ShI ya te/ a lung sI ShI yiSh+Ta/ se Shi ya tsa kre/ se ShI yi tA/ sogs so// //Tu
179b5(mdo 'grel): o shi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la yang/ shwi'i 'dam ka 'os/ s+thaM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ sho shU yi te/ a sho shU yiSh+Ta/ sha shU yA tsa kre/ sho shU yi tA/
179b6(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ she shwI ya ta/ i she shwi yiSh+Ta/ she shwI yAM tsa kre/ shi shwI yi tA/ sogs so// //smri dran pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jigs pa sogs kyi ya b+hya sa yon
179b7(mdo 'grel): tan nas la dang po lhag pa sogs kyis ma dang ri phyis/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po 'os ring bar bsgyur/ yang la 'ang ngos yon tan byas pas/ sA sma rma te/ a sA sma tiSh+Ta/ A sma rAM tsa kre/ /sA sma ri tA/
180a1(mdo 'grel): sogs so// //Du kri nya byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang/ rit kyi rIng 'os ring du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod /thung ngu 'os thung dur bsgyur /ra phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu /yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/
180a2(mdo 'grel): tse krI ya te /a tse krI yiSh+Ta /tse krI yAM tsa kre /tse krI yi tI/ sogs so// //lam sngon du byung na ka'i sngon du suT byin pas/ sA tse skri yi te/ sogs so// //Shi tsa srung ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs
180a3(mdo 'grel): kyis yon tan byas bas/ se si tsya te/ a se si tsiSh+Ta/ se si tsI tsa kre/ se si tsitA/ sogs so// //si tso ya di/ si tsa'i yang la'o/ /si tso sa yig ni nyer bsgyur dang a b+hyA sa/ sa Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung yang/ yang pha rol
180a4(mdo 'grel): la Shar mi 'gyur te/ a b+hya sa'i dper brjod bstan zin la/ nyer bsgyur la ni si si tsya te/ sogs so// //pra dza 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang/ gnyis brjod/ hal dang po sogs kyis ra phyis /ka 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por
180a5(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bas /bA bra dzya te/ a gA pra dzaSh+Ta/ bA bra dzA tsa kra/ bA bra dzi tA sogs so// //grI gsal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang/ gro ya di/ grI'i yang la'o/ grI'i ra yig ni yang pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ byings kyi rit kyi it 'os rI
180a6(mdo 'grel): it/ ri'i a Na la ? pha rol los ra/ mdo 'dis ra lar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu dang/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas bas /dze gi lya ta/ a dze gi liSh+Ta/ dze gi laM tsa kre/ dze gi la tI/ sogs so// //lu bli gcod
180a7(mdo 'grel): la la'o zhes pa la/ yan spyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon byas bas/ lo lu bya te/ a lo lu piSh+Ta/ lo lu bA tsa kra/ lo lu bi tA/ sogs so// //ku 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ na ka ba te rya ri/
180b1(mdo 'grel): ka ba taMI yang la ma yin no/ /ka ba ti'i a b+hyA sa'i ka yig ni yang pha rol la tsa yig tu bsgyur ba ma yin te/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs yon tan/ mdo 'dis ka tsar mi bsgyur/ ko kU ya Te/ i ko kU yiSh+Ta/ ko kU yAM tsa kre/ ko kU yi kA?
180b2(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /'grel bar skabs 'gar tsar bsgyur ba'ang yod de/ /zhes bshad pas/ tso kU ya te sogs so// //bany+tsu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ nI gwanycu sraM su d+hwaM su kas pa ta ba da skandAM/ pany+tsu sraM su d+hwaM su ka sa ba tang
180b3(mdo 'grel): da skanda rnams kyi nI ka'o/ /pany+tsu 'gro ba/ sraM su dang/ d+hwaM su 'og tu lhung ba/ ka sa 'gro ba/ ba t+mi lhung ba/ pa da 'gro ba/ skanda 'gro ba rnams kyi yang gi rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la a b+hyas la NI ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas
180b4(mdo 'grel): don no/ /gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nI ka a ga ma/ glo bur ba ka ti yin pas a b+hyA sa ring bor bsgyur/ it 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis riT pha rol la na phyis pas/ ba nI batsya te/ a ba nI ba tsi Sh+Ta/ ba nI ba tsA tsa kre/ bai nI ba tsu tA/
180b5(mdo 'grel): sogs so// //sraM su 'og tu lhung ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nika A ga ma byin ka 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshon las a b+hyA sa ring por mi 'gyur ra phyis/ it 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ sa nI
180b6(mdo 'grel): sra sya te/ a sa nA sri siSh+Ta/ sa nI sra sAM tsa kre/ sa nI sras si tA/ sogs so// //ya mu nye bar 'gog pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ nu gtonya nu nA si kAn+ta sya/ rjes su sna ldan mdza' can gyi at kyi nug 'o/ /byings rjes su sna
180b7(mdo 'grel): ldan gyi mdza' can u ba d+hA at yin ba'i a b+hyya sa la yang rkyan gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nu ka a ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don don dang a brjod pa'i don no/ /gnyis brjod hal dang po lhag po sogs kyis ma phyis/ mdo 'di 
181a1(mdo 'grel): nuka Aga ma byin/ pri Sho dar sogs kyis na nga ror byas/ kit kyi rgyu mtshan las ring por mi 'gyur pas/ yaM ya mya te/ a yaM ya miSh+Ta/ yaM ya mAM tsa kre/ yaM ya mi tA/ sogs so// //Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o
181a2(mdo 'grel): zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ ma phyis mdo 'dis nuk A ga ma byin/ na'i 'ang tshig mdza' min pa'i dzhal la nang ro/ /kit la ring bor mi bsgyur/ baM ba mya te/ a bi ba miSh+Ta/ baM ba mAM caM kre/ baM ba mi tA/ sos so// //
181a3(mdo 'grel): ta nu rgyas pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ na phyis/ mdo 'dis nuk a ga ma ring po mi byed/ tan+ta n+ya te/ a tan+ta niSh+Ta/ tan+te nAM tsa kre/ tan+ta ni tA/ sogs so/ /rjes su sna ldan gyi mdza' yin kyang u ba d+hA at yin na
181a4(mdo 'grel): nuk mi 'gyur te/ b+ha ma khro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ a b+hya sa'i tsa da 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur/ kit min pa sogs kyis slar yang ring por bsgyur bas/ bA b+hA mya te/ bA b+ha miSh+Ta/ dA b+hA mAM tsa
181a5(mdo 'grel): kraM/ bA b+hA mi tA/ sogs so// //dzan skye ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang/ ya la 'dam ka 'os mdza' aT du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byed/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ rjes su sna ldan mdza' tsan gyi at kyi
181a6(mdo 'grel): nuk A ga ma byin pas/ dzaM dza n+ya te/ a'u dza dza naSh+Ti/ dzaM dza nAM tsa kre /dzaM dziM ni tA/ sogs dang/ at du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur kit ma yin pa sogs kyis slar ring por bsgyur bas/ dzA dzA ya
181a7(mdo 'grel): te/ a dzA dzA yiSh+Ta/ dzA dzA yAM tsa kre/ dzA dzA yi tA/ sogs so// //Sha na sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang/ ya la 'dam ka 'os/ At du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka byas/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan
181b1(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis nu ka byin pas/ saM sa n+ya te/ a saM sa ni Sh+Ta/ saM sa nAM tsa kre/ saM sa ni tA/ sogs dang/ at du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ sA sA ya te/ a sA sA yiSh+Ta/ sA sA yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// //de bzhin du/ khan rko ba la/ tsa kha n+ya
181b2(mdo 'grel): te/ a tsa kha niSh+Ta/ tsA kha nAM tsa kre/ tsa kha nI tA/ sogs sam/ tsA khA ya te/ A tsA khA yiSh+Ta/ tsa khA yaM tsa kre/ tsa khA yi tA/ sogs so// //han 'tshe ba la/ yang/ gnyis brjod/ na phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+hya sa'i car 'ang
181b3(mdo 'grel): ngos/ dzha dza/ rjes su sna ldan mdza' i sogs kyis nuk A gam/ a b+hyA sa las kyang ngos ha g+har bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ dza g+ha n+ya te/ a dzaM g+ha niSh+Ta/ dzi g+ha nAM tsakre/ dzaM g+ha ni hA/ sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs ba/ han+te(mdo 'grel): hidsa yI ya di ? b+hA bo
181b4(mdo 'grel): bak+ta bya(mdo 'grel): han+ti'i 'tshe ba la yang la g+hi nyid du brjod do/ /han+ti'i yang pha rol la 'tshe ba'i don la g+h+nI? zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ han/ g+h+nI ru bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur/ na phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+hya sa'i tsar ?
181b5(mdo 'grel): ngos/ dzha dza/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ dze g+h+nI ya te/ a dze g+hi yiSh+Ta/ dze g+hi yA tsa kra/ dza b+hA ya tA/ sogs so// //dza pa yid la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ dza ba dza b+ha da ha da sha b+hatsdza ba shAM tsa/ dza ba dza g+ha
181b6(mdo 'grel): da ha da sha b+hatsdza? ba sha rnams kyi 'ang ngo/ /dza ba yid/ dza b+ha las rnam par nyams pa/ da ha thal bar byed pa/ da sha mcheb/ pany+dzu kun tu nyed pa/ ba sha 'ching ba rnams kyi a b+hyA sa la 'ang yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la
181b7(mdo 'grel): nuk A ga ma 'gyur te/ gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nu ka A gam byin pas/ dzaM dza bya te/ a dza dza piSh+Ta/ dzaM dza pAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //de bzhin du/ dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ nuk byin pas//
182a1(mdo 'grel): dza dza b+hya te/ a dzaM dza b+hiSh+T/ dzaM dza b+hA tsa kre/ sogs so// //da ha thal bar byed pa la/ yang sbyar nuk byin pas/ daM da hya te/ a daM da hiSh+T/ daM da hAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //da sha mche ba la/ /yang
182a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ nuka byin pas/ daM da sh+ya te/ a daM da shiSh+Ta/ daM da shA tsa kre/ sogs so// //b+hany+dzu nyed pa la yang/ iT 'gro ba ma yin la sogs kyis na phyis /gnyis brjod /nuk A gar byin bas/ baM b+ha dzya te/
182a3(mdo 'grel): a baM b+ha dzaSh+Ta/ baM b+ha dzA tsa kre/ sogs so// //pa sha 'chid pa la yang gnyis brjod/ nuk A ga ma byin pas/ pa pa sh+ya te/ i paM pa shiSh+Ta/ paM pa shAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //tsa la g.yo ba la'o zhes pa
182a4(mdo 'grel): la/ yang sbyar/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ la tsa yAn+ta syA b+hyA sa sya nu grA/ la tsa ya'i mdza' i a b+hya sa'i nuk yang na'o/ /byings tsa yig dang la yig dang ya yig rnams kyi mdza' can gyi a b+hyas la yang rkyen gnas pa dang
182a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuk a ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ nuk byin pa'i phyogs la/ tsaM tsa lya te/ a tsa tsa liSh+T/ tsa tsa lAM tsa krr/ sogs dang/ nuk ma byin pa'i phyogs la ki tam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ tsA
182a6(mdo 'grel): tsa lya te/ i tsA tsa liSh+Ta/ tsA tsa lAM tsa kre sogs so// //de bzhin du/ many+tsa khra la'o zhes pa la/ yang it 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/ lung 'dren 'dis a b+hya sa la nuk yang na bar byas pas/ ma
182a7(mdo 'grel): ma tsya te/ a maM ma tsiSh+Ta/ maM ma tsa tsa kre/ sogs sam/ mA ma tsya te/ a mA ma tsiSh+T/ mA ma tsaM tsa kre/ sogs so// //da ya sbyin pa la nuk yang na bar byas pas/ da da yya? te/ aM daM da yiSh+Ta/ daM daM yA tsa kra/
182b1(mdo 'grel): sogs sam/ dA da yya te/ a dA da yiSh+Ta/ dA da yAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //tsar 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ tsar pha lo tsa/ ca ra pha la dag gi 'ang ngo/ /tsa ra dang pha la dag gi a b+hyA sa at la yang 'jig pa dang gnas pa
182b2(mdo 'grel): dag pha rol la nuk A ga ma 'gyur te/ utpa ra sya ta(mdo 'grel): at las pha rol gyi uta'o/ /tsar dang pha la dag gi a b+hya sa at las pha rol gyi a ni yang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol ut du bsgyur te/ gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis a
182b3(mdo 'grel): ut/ mdo snga mas nuk A ga ma byin/ hal las sos ring por bsgyur bas/ tsaM tsUrya te/ a tsa tsU riSh+Ta/ tsaM tsU rA tsa kre/ sogs so/ /phal rdzogs pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar cho tsar dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ paM
182b4(mdo 'grel): phu lya te/ a pa phuM liSh+Ta/ paM phu lAM tsa kre /sogs so// //nri ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ rI gri du ba d+ha sya tsa/ rit u pa d+hA'i 'ang rI ka'o/ /byings rit u ba d+hwa na yod pa'i a b+hya sa la'ang yang rkyen 'jig pa
182b5(mdo 'grel): dang gnas pa dag pha rol la rIk a ga ma 'gyur te ka gnas don no/ /k+Sha g+h+nA di Shu tsa/ k+Shu b+hA la sogs pa rnams la'ang ngo/ /k+Shu b+ha khro ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rtsa tshig gis ma zin na'ang gzugs legs shing brjod bde ba rnams bya'o san yang
182b6(mdo 'grel): dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ri'i at 'os ri at mdo snga ma'i rikA A ga ma byin/ mdo 'dis na Nar mi bsgyur bas/ ni 'di Nri tya te/ a na rI nri tiSh+Ta/ na rI nri tAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //gra ha nye bar len pa la/
182b7(mdo 'grel): yang sbyar/ gra hi dzyA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar brgyur/ gnyis brjod ri'i at/ rit u pa d+hA'i 'ang rIg? 'os/ rIka A ga ma byin pas/ dza rI gri hya te/ a dza rI gra haSh+Ta/ dza ri gri haM tsa kre?/ sogs so// //kri pU nas?
183a1(mdo 'grel): pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ kri ba'i ra la 'os ri lir bsgyur/ gnyis brjod ri'i at 'grel par li u pa d+ha can la lIk A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ lik byin pas /tsalI kli bya? te/ a tsa la kla ?
183a2(mdo 'grel): tsa lI klaM bAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //brang ? gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang/ gra ha dzyA sogs kyis sam pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod ri'i at/ 'grel bar hal brtsegs pa'i sngon ma'i rit la'ang rI ka A ga ma
183a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ rI/ /byin/ pa rI bri shtsya te/ a pa ri'i gri shtsiSh+Ta/ pa rI pri shtshAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //de bzhin du/ pra ts+tsha shas par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gra hi dzyA sogs kyis saM ? star ? bsgyur
183a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ ri'i at/ rI ka A ga ma byin pas/ pa rI prats+tsh+ya te/ a ba ri pri ts+tshi Sh+Ta/ pa dI pri ts+tshi tsa kre/ sogs so// //nyi ShA pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ swa ba sya ma bye nya rnams kyi yang la'o/ /Shwa ba nyal ba/ sya
183a5(mdo 'grel): mi rnam par rtog pa/ byenya kun nas sgrib pa rnams kyi yang pha rol las pra sA ra Nar bsgyur te/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ so su bya te/ a so su piSh+Ta/ so su pAM tsa ke/
183a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ sya ma la/ yang sbyar/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod yon tan byas pas/ se si mya te/ a se si miSh+Ta/ se si mAM tsakre/ sogs so// //byenya kun nas sgrib pa la/ yang sbyar/ saM pra sA ra Na? bsgyur/
183a7(mdo 'grel): yang 'jigs pa sogs kyis yon tan/ krit min pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur ba ?/ be pI ya ti/ a ? ba yiSh+Ta/ be bi yA tsa kre/ sogs so// //pa sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ na ba sha(mdo 'grel): ba sha'i ma yin no//
183b1(mdo 'grel): yang pha rol la ba sha'i saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ gnyis brjod kit ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ pI ba sh+ya te/ i bA ba shiSh+Ta/ bA ba shAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //ci nya gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/
183b2(mdo 'grel): tsA ya(mdo 'grel): kI/ tsi'i kI'o/ /tsi nya'i yang pha rol la kI zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ tsi kIr bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os thung dur bsgyur/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ tse kI ya te/ a tse kI yaSh+Te/

183b6(mdo 'grel): shing nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ a yang kI ti/ ka nga 'gro ba la a yang ngo/ /rkyen pa yig dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la shIng gi mdza' a yang du bsgyur te/ da dbyangs 'gog pa'i don dang ya'i a brjod don no//
183b7(mdo 'grel): a'i A yar ru bsgyur/ kit ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ shA sha yya te/ a shA sha yiSh+Ta/ shA sha yAM tsa kre/ sogs so// //Dha kri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung du 'os/ o a'ur
184a1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis de slar yon tan/ a b+hya sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ Dha Dar bsgyur bas/ Do Dhau kya ta/ Do Dhau kye ta/ Do Dhau kya tAM/ a Do Dhau kya ti/ a Do Dhau kiSh+Ta/ Do Dhau kAM tsi kre/ Do Dhau kI tI/ Do Dhau ki Shi Sh+Ta/ smon ling

191b7(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a'iT yang na bar byas pas/ dzhar 'dra ba la dzar rnams kyi 'os d+ha phyis dza rgi d+hyI ti/ dzarga DDnyi /gnyis tshig la/ dzhaSha mdza' sogs kyis ta d+ha/ dzha sha las dzha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os d+ha dar bsgyur bas
192a1(mdo 'grel): dzargri d+d+ha (mdo 'grel): mang tshig la dzha at 'u bsgyur bas/ dzargri d+ha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzargri d+hI Shi/ dzargarti/ dzargribd+ha (mdo 'grel): zargrid+d+ha /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza rgri d+hI mi/
192a2(mdo 'grel): dzrga rd+hmi /dza rgri dwa(mdo 'grel): dza rgrad+hma(mdo 'grel): 'di ga dza rgrid+hya dra dza rgri d+hyA hI kha rgridyataM/ dza rgrad+d+hu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza rgri d+hI tyaM/ dzargra rdU/ dza rgridb+ha ta/ dza grid+dA/ dza rgri b+ha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la
192a3(mdo 'grel): dzargri d+d+hi/ dzargri d+d+hAt/ dzargri d+d+hi/ dzargri d+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza rgrid+ha ni/ dzargri d+hA ba/ dzargri d+hA ma/ de bzhin du lang ga skyes bu dang pho gsum la/ a rdzargri d+hA ti /a dzargi d+d+hI/ a dzargri d+hu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum
192a4(mdo 'grel): la/ a dzargri d+d+hI(mdo 'grel): a dza rga(mdo 'grel): a dza rgri d+d+ha/ A dza rgrid+d+ha/ skyes pu phyi ma gsum pa/ a dza rgrid+ha/ a dza rgrid+hA/ a dza rgid+hA/ a dzargri d+hA/ lhag ma rnams la/ lung a dzargrid+hIt/ liT/ dza rgri d+hI tsa kA ra/ luT dza rgri b+hi tA/ smon ling/ dza rgri
192a5(mdo 'grel): d+hyat/ lriT dza rgri d+hi Sh+yati/ lring a dzargri d+hi lyat/ sogs so/ /yang na rik A ga ma sbyar bas/ dza ri gri d+hi ti/ ri dzi gad+hi/ sogs sam/ dza rI gri d+hi ti/ dza rI garb+hi/ sogs so/ /Du ginya byed pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang
192a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod ri'i at/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ rit shtsa/ rit las kyang ngo/ /byings rit mdza' can las kyang yang 'jig pa pha rol la a b+hyas la rug dang rig dang rIk A ga ma rnams 'gyur te/ mang 'dis ruk A ga ma byin/
192a7(mdo 'grel): yang gi a tsi la'ang 'os yang phyis pas /tsa rkra zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor te/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la a'Ti yang na bar byas pas/ tsarka rIti/ tsarkarti/ gnyis tshig la/ tsirtra? rta(mdo 'grel): mang tshig la a b+hyatsha las at
192b1(mdo 'grel): 'os/ dzha sat/ ik gi a tsa la yaN byas pas/ tsarkra ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrabs pas /skyes bud bus ma gsum la/ tsakra rI Shi/ tsarkarShi/ tsa rkri tha(mdo 'grel): tsa rkri tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsarka rI mi/ tsarka rmi/ tsarki ba(mdo 'grel): tsa kri ma:
192b2(mdo 'grel): ling la/ tsarkri yAt/ tsarkri yA'tAM/ tsarkri yu (mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas /skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsarka rI tu/ tsarka rtu/ tsa rkri tAt/ tsa kri tAM/ tsarkra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsarkri ti/ tsarkri tAta/ tsa rkriti/
192b3(mdo 'grel): tsarkriT/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa rka rA Ni/ tsarka rA ga tsarka rA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang ba gsum la/ a tsarka rIt /a tsarka(mdo 'grel): a tsarkri tAM/ a tsa rka tu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsarka rI(mdo 'grel): a tsarka(mdo 'grel): a tsarkri

193a1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdogs so// //gsum pa ming dbyings su bsgrubs pa'i kya? tsa'i 'jug yul dang cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ sA pa At+mA na:kyatsa/ su ba las bdag nyid la kyang ?
193a2(mdo 'grel): byings ming du bsgrubs zin su 'jug pa'i yul la bdag nyid 'dod pa'i don la ming de nyid slar byings su bsgrubs pa'i rkyen kyatsa yang na 'gyur te/ tsa yig dbyangs 'gog pa'i don dang /ka yig kyatsa la 'ang ngos don no/ /kyatsa? tsa/

196a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mdza' i hal rnams kyang dpyi ste/ b+h+ri shA ya te/ u nma nA ya te/ sogs te/ b+h+raM sha sogs ni/ b+h+rI Sha/ unma nas/ shIg+h+ra/ paN+Di ta/ utshuk /a pha? mi nas/ du rma nas/ nri pa ta/ shu ci/ tsI la/ badzra/ phe na/ brtsas/ ha ri te/ ma dra
