254b7(mdo 'grel): sog? Sh+ya? so/ /karma N+yA k+to she kri nya(mdo 'grel): kha muny/ las las kri nya la spyo ba la kha mu nya'o/ /las las pha rol gyi krinya las spyo ba rtogs par byed pa la/ /ba mun 'gyur te/ kha mu ma gyi don zos shing zos nas 'gro bar byed/ dang nya 'phel ba'i
255a1(mdo 'grel): don no/ /tsau ri kA raM/ spyo ba ma yin na k+twA sbyar bas/ sA d+hu kri twA stau ti/ swA du mi No mul/ zhim pa la Na mu la'o/ /zhim pa'i don can gi tshig las pha rol gyi kriny Na phul? 'gyur te/ swA sh+re kA raM b+huk+te/ yang na/ k+twA sbyar bas/
255a2(mdo 'grel): swA du kri twA b+huk+te/ a n+ya thai baM ka tha/ rku ba'i las byed/ mitwAM b+hyashtsa/ a n+yA thA/ legs so byas nas bstod/ e bo/ ka thi/ it+thaM rnams las kyang ngo/ /a n+yA thA ka thaM/ it+tha rnams dang gzhan yang mang po'i pha rol zhim par byas te zas/ gri krinya la Na? mu la 'byung
255a3(mdo 'grel): te/ a n+ya thA kA zhim par byas te zas/ raM b+huk+te/ e baM kA raM b+huk+te/ ka thaM kA raM b+huk+ta/ at+thi b+huk+te/ sogs so/ /dzI bA dwi de:/ dzA ba las bi di las so/ /dzI bA las pha rol gyi bi dir thob pa la Na mul 'gyur te/ dzI ba be da(mdo 'grel): b+huk+te/ ni mU la
255a4(mdo 'grel): sa la yo(mdo 'grel): ka Sha/ rnam pa gzhan du byas te zas/ de ltar byas nas zas/ ci ltar byas nas zas/ 'di ltar byas bas zas/ ni mU las kha dag la ka Sha las so/ /ni mU la dang sa la dag las pha rol gyi ka Sha las Na mu la 'gyur te/ 'tsho ba thob nas zas/ ni mU la
255a5(mdo 'grel): kA ShaM/ sa la kA ShaM/ shuSh+ka tsU r+Na rU k+She Shu pi Sha:/ shuSh+ka tsur+Na rU k+Sha rnams la pi Sha las so/ /shuSh+ka tsur+N+ya rU k+Sha rnams las pha rol gyi pi Sha la Na mul 'gyur te/ shuSh+ka pe ShaM/ tsur+Na pe ShaM/ nges par rtsa ba nas 'tshod/
255a6(mdo 'grel): sa mU lA nad kyis 'tshe/ kri ta dzI bi Shu ha na krinya gra ha:/ sa mu la A kri ta thI ba rnams la ha na krinya gra las so/ /sa mU la A kri ta dzI ba rnams las pha rol gyi rim pa bzhin skam po theg/ zhing par theg/ gyod po theg/ ha na kriny gra ha
255a7(mdo 'grel): rnams lag Na mul 'gyur te/ sa mU la g+hA taM/ da rtsa ba 'joms/ a kri ta kA raM/ kun nas byed pa byas/ dzI ba grA hAM/ dzI ba grA haM/ srog 'dzin par byed/ ha sta kang yo(mdo 'grel): barti gra hA byAM/ hasta sha ra dag la brti gra ha dag las so/ /hasta dang ka ra dag las pha
255b1(mdo 'grel): rol gyi brti dang gra ha las Na mu la 'gyur te/ hasta brAhaM/ ka ra grA haM/ hasta bartaM/ ka ra bartaM/ spai pu Sha:/ swa la pu Sha las so/ /swa las pha rol gyi pu Sha las Na mu la 'gyur te/ swa pe ShaM/ u pa me ne karma Ni tsa/ nye bar 'jal ba la las la'o/ /nye bar
255b2(mdo 'grel): 'jal ba las byed pa dang las las kyang na mul lag pas bzung/ lag pa bzung/ lag pa 'jug/ 'gyur te/ ratna ni d+hA yaM/ /mu pa daM sha sti tI yAM/ gsum pa la u pa daM sha rang rgyas pa/ las so/ /gsum pa'i mdza' nya ba'i tshig las pha rol gyi
255b3(mdo 'grel): u ba daM sha las Na mu la 'gyur te/ mU la ke no pa daM sha b+huk+te/ A pa dA na pha rA psA yAM/ At las yul/ rin po che bzhin nges par 'dzin/ byung khungs la yongs su myur ba la'o/ /khyung khur te lnga pa'i mdza' nye ba'i tshig la chas myur
255b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba'i don la rtse ba can gyis nye bar za bar byed/ Na mu la 'gyur te/ sha yA ya:/ nyal ba las langs/ ut+thA yaM/ dI dI yAM tsa/ gnyis pa la 'ang ngo/ /gnyis pa'i mdza' can nye ba'i tshig las kyang myur ba rtogs
255b5(mdo 'grel): par byed pa la bya ba'i don la Na yul 'gyur te/ yaSh+Ti ga haM yu d+hyan+te/ a bya ye pa thA b+hi pri yA khya nre krinya:/ ut snga ma'i shtA la Na mul yug a'i ga ma/ ut la ste b+hu sogs kyis sa byin/ k+tA Na mu lau/ kyang mi zad pa la mngon par dga' ba brjod pa la
255b6(mdo 'grel): krinya las k+ta dang Na mu la dag go/ /gang mi zad pa nye ba'i gsal shing bzung nas 'bab par byed/ tshig las mngon par dga' ba brjod pa'i don rtogs pa byed pa'i bya ba ma k+ta dar Na mul 'gyur te/ utstsai kri tya pri yAM brU
255b7(mdo 'grel): te/ ? ? brjod de mtho bar byas/ utstsau kri thA pri yAM brU twE/ utstsii kA raM pri yAM prU te/ dga' brjod de mtho bar byas/ sogs so/ /i tipA Ni ni byA ka ra Na stsa sU tra tpi? dtA? ta ya sa mApta:/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las krit la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //
256a1(mdo 'grel): de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod ba legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las krit la sogs pa byings las ming du
256a2(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //'grel pa'i mjug tu sbyar byang dang shis pa brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa byung ba ni/ pra kri yA kau mu dI se yaM rA ma tsan+d+ra pra kA shi tA/
256a3(mdo 'grel): a sa twa tsasta mo ba d+hyAt+sa tstsaM ka ra bri yA ci raM/ bod skad du/ rab byed shin tu gsal pa de 'di yang/ /dga' byed zla bas rab tu gsal bar byas/ /bden med brjod pa mdza' ma 'ching byed de/ /dpyod ldan dam pa rtag tu dga' bar byed/ /ces
256a4(mdo 'grel): so/ /gnyis pa shis pa brjod pa ni/ A tsAMrya pA tu b+ha ga bA na shi Sh+yaM pA tu bi nA ya ka:/ /nirbig+h+naM syA tstsa sarba tra pA Ni nI ya pra sA da ta:/ /bod skad du/ slob dpon srung bar mdzod cig bcom ldan 'das/ /slob ma srung bar mdzod cig rnam
256a5(mdo 'grel): par 'dren/ /thams cad duAng gegs yod ma yin pa/ /drang srong pa Ni ni ya bka' drin las/ /mang+ga la le kha kA nAM tsa pA Tha kA nAM tsa mang+ga laM/ mang+gA laM sarba b+hU tA naM b+hU mi b+hU pa ti mang+ga laM/ /'dri ba rnams kyang bkra shis shing/ /klog pa rnams
256a6(mdo 'grel): kyang bkra shis pa/ /srog chags thams cad bkra shis shing/ /sa dang sa bdag bkra shis shog /ces pa'o/ /de ltar brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po brgyad kyi nang tshan de rnams kyi nang nas kyang go don cho ga sogs phul du
256a7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa mdor na sgra'i gtsug lag thams cad kyi phyi mo lta bur gyur pa'o skol gyi ston pa mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud sogs su lung bstan pa'i bram ze chen po pA Ni ni la 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
256b1(mdo 'grel): gis dngos su bstsal pa/ pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs reg zig tu bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rang cag gangs ri'i khrod pa rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i skyabs dang?
256b2(mdo 'grel): dpung gnyen dam pa 'phags pa phyag na padmo nyid gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan
256b3(mdo 'grel): lang? tshol sde tshangs sras bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mnyam pa med pa'i thugs rje'i gzer gyis bskyangs shing/ paN+Di ta mched la gser dngul zho grangs brgya phrag du ma sogs ci 'dod kyi yo byad mdza' dag 'bang med du bstsal te/ bka' 
256b4(mdo 'grel): 'bangs la'ang khyod kyis gzhung bod skad du bsgyur ba dang/ 'grel pa'i go don dper brjod zin bris su 'debs pa sogs kyis shig ces bka' gnang ba thob par brten/ dam pa gang de'i gzhal du med pa'i bka' drin las
256b5(mdo 'grel): dang? sprod pa'i ring lugs la cung zad tsam sbyangs pa bka' 'phangs kyi tha chung gtsang stong 'dar gyi sa'i char se'i rigs las skyes pa dag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/ ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer bong pa'i rmongs
256b6(mdo 'grel): brtul snyoms las pas/ 'phags yul ku ru k+She drang? bram ze gtsang ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i mahA baN+Di ta pa la b+ha dra dang/ paN+Di ta go gu la nA tha mi sh+ra mched kyi drung du gzhung gi sgra sgrub dang go don dper
256b7(mdo 'grel): brjod sogs legs par nyan te gzhung bong skad du bsgyur/ slob dpon chen po rA ma tsan+d+ras mdzad pa'i 'grel pa pra kri ya ste? rab tu bya ba zhes pa gzhir bzhag kun bshad rtsa bsgrubs kyi mtshan bu zhib par btab yod/ sogs cho ga rdo/? /
257a1(mdo 'grel): dka' ba rnams la slob dpon mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis zur brgyan te cung zad rgyas par byas/ /rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te/ me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag gsum cu/ rtsa gcig bsre ba
257a2(mdo 'grel): rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa pho khyi lo rang lo nyer lngar sleb pa chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar 'go brtsams/ kun ldan zhes pa lcags byi nag pa zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal pa gsum pa ba she'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grwa chen po
257a3(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi rang shag rgyud steng spyil por sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can yongs la phen par gyur cig /ces pa 'di la bdag nyid blo gros kyi na tshang? shin tu gzhon bas 'gyur ma dag pa dang/ dper brjod
257a4(mdo 'grel): go don sogs la 'gal 'khrul snang na bla ma mchog dang mkhas ba'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzod la tshul bzhin 'chos par mdzad du gsol/ dge 'dis dpal stug gsang ba kun 'dus rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi 'dzin/ /mdza' yas gdul bya skabs gsum
257a5(mdo 'grel): yongs kyi gnyen gcig dpal ldan ngag gi dbang/ /blo gros bzang po'i nyi zlas rab 'khyud rgya chen shes bya'i mkha' la khyag /mtsho ltar zab yangs mkhyen pa'i dpal mnga' ji srid bar du brtan pa dang/ /bgrang yas skye rgu'i legs byas kyis bskrun lugs zung
257a6(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi gdugs dkar po/ /phul byung khyon yangs 'dod dgu'i dpal ster yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis spras/ /nam yang 'gog med mkha' la rab bteg phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil gang /bstan dang 'gro ba'i mi mthun gdung sel mchog tu lhag bar
257a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes gyur cig /tshul 'dir log rtag rdul gyis nyer bsgribs nas/ /gzhung don dga' ma'i bzhin ras mi gsa na/ /mkhas mcho dam pa'i spyan sngar mi 'chab pas/ /dpyad gsum dag pas byi dor mdzad du gsol/ /gang gi rig tshul gal? dA'i yab gcig laS
257b1(mdo 'grel): nyer 'ongs legs tshogs rab dngos de la 'gro yis/ /yid can rmongs ba'i dri ma kun bkrus nas/ /kun mkhyen rin chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog/ // */ /'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor zhes bya ba rtsa 'grel bzhugs so// // */ /kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal
257b2(mdo 'grel): 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'brel brdeg /log rtag byang chub yul snang ba'i/ /chos kun sems su gcig mi gcig /lhun gyis grub pa gang lab kyi/ /de nyid snang ba yang dam med/ /ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/ /khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul/ /'khrul ba nyid nad na ci la
257b3(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang/ /de dag dgos ba'i the tshom gang/ /de rnams khyad par ji ltar che/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor bzhin/ /gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/ /sgyu ma rnam gnyis dpyod yul ni/ /sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig/ /de'i de nyid ji lta ba/ /mkha' dang
257b4(mdo 'grel): gzha' snang ji bzhin du/ /log rtog sems rgyud? tha dad kyang/ /rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka' / /sems nyid nor bu rin po che/ /ji ltar dmigs shing sems bar snang/ /'go la sems rgyud gnyis 'chang/ /de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ /log rtog mun ba'i yul snang kun/ /
257b5(mdo 'grel): sems phyir mdza' la brtsod pa med/ /gang la yod? med med pa ltar/ /rtog ba'i smra bsams yul las 'das/ /de ni de phyir rgyal 'go zhes/ /ris su bcad pa med pa la/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ /phyogs su bltas na nor ba'i blo/ /ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i sems/ /me?
257b6(mdo 'grel): 'o dag ? dang mkha' sprin bzhin/ /rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/ /phyogs gcig rkyen bya dus su 'khrul/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs ba/ /snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/ /rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir/ /de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta ba/ /
257b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab thun mong spyan yin no/ /rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag /shes rab can gyi mchog yin no/ /rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/ /lta ba med phyir rang spyi chos/ /dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'od bral bas/ /ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/ /gsum gnyis gcig gi ?
258a1(mdo 'grel): yang ? dang bo dngos dang gsal ba dang/ /snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dang/ /so so sems rgyud tha dad ba/ /gcig na bdun la snga rtog skye/ /de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/ /tha dad zhen dang bdun gyis 'gal/ /de bas dgag dang sgrub med ba'o?/ /gcig dang dun med pa'o/ /gsum ba'i snga?
258a2(mdo 'grel): ma rtog skyon dbu khyim? med pa'i the tshom dag /skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shing/ /mi mkhas mkhas ba'i bsam ba ni/ /mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas ba/ /shin tu mi mkhas mthar ltag mi mkhas yod med brtsod byed cing/ /dag gcing bsgrub ba gang byed pa/? de de del? chags sdang skye//
258a3(mdo 'grel): mkhas dang shin tu mkhas ba ni/ /mkhas ba phal la dgag sgrub can/ /sgrub ba'i don la brten par byed/ /byas ba'i bzung 'dzin dbang gyur ba'i/ /ma nor 'am dang bral ga yin/ /shin tu mkhas ba thams cad la/ /sems phyir dgag sgrub pa med/ /de la rang rig dang? smad phyir/ /dgag
258a4(mdo 'grel): sgrub bral la yid mi rton/ /de phyir so so dgag bsgrub can/ /sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen ba'i phyir/ /de de med bag la mthong/ /de bas rang gi brtags mthong yi/ /de de skas gdang ji ltar lta po/ /khyad bar grangs dang dor ba med/ /cha yod dug la mi 'thung bzhin/ /log lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur/
258a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis po de ltar de nyid la/ /grub ba'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon/ /ma grub grub na nges tshig med/ /de ma grub na de bzhin no/ /de bas srid dang mi srid kun/ /lhun grub phyogs su grub ba med/ /bzhi ba sdam skyom drug gnyis/ /de bzhin phyin rjes su mthun/ /gnyis med zhe na dus gsum
258a6(mdo 'grel): lung 'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang/ /sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar/ /ngo bos tha dad 'gyur ba med/ /phyogs las logs pa'i tha dad med/ /lnga ba 'khrul gzhi yod med ba'i/ /skyen ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs/ /mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/ /chos
258a7(mdo 'grel): yod bzhin bas rang sems la/ /de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug /rang bzhin lhun 'grub dpag bsam bzhin/ /so sor snang ba dus gsum du/ /rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub ba/ /'bra yo 'byung 'jug med snang bzhin/ /gzhi yod dang dbyer med mtshungs/ /drug ba de ltar de
258b1(mdo 'grel): bden na/ /de la skyon du bya ba bdun/ /thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la/ /gnyis mthong 'khrul bar blta ba 'khrul/ /de bas blung dang dor ba med/ /bde? sdug gnas su ris ma blta/ /bdun ba rang rig can yin na/ /de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/ /me lnga'i bdag? po tshun? ?
258b2(mdo 'grel): sems/ /rang? spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/ /rang yul med bar nges gsal ba/ /nam mkha' sbrin mthong 'od bzhin du/ /rab rib gang dag shes rab snang/ /brgyad ba nges mthong sgrib ba'i grangs/ /brgyad ba bsnyad ba yan lag bcas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yaM bzhir gyur ga/ /nges bar ngos zin bya bar bsnyad/ /ma
258b3(mdo 'grel): rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/ /the tshom nyid kyang nges ba'i spyan/ /log rtog nyid kyang na nor lam/ /de la mi mthun shes dang bral/ /dgu ba 'das dang 'jig rten ba'i/ /theg pa'i lta ba gral bgod pa/ /skas gdang lta bur bstan ba dag /kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten
258b4(mdo 'grel): shes 'phags ci smos te/ /de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub/ /rim ba yong med khyad bar dang/ /ltos bas phye ba'i khyad bar ni/ /bdag spong bdag med sgrub ba dang/ /gzugs spong phyi steng sgrub ba dang/ /don 'gog sems tsam sgrub ba dang/ /mdza' spong mdza' bral sgrub ba dang/ /dri spong dag bsgrub
258b5(mdo 'grel): bo? dang/ /mched gdon? tshan? med? sgrub ba dang/ /klang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang/ rtsol stso? tsa ba? bras bsgyur ba dag de dag kun kyang yod med phyir/ /dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o/ rim par phye ba'i khyad bar ston/ /mthong nga dag dang ma dag ba'i/ /rim bas don gcig khyad bar snang/ mthong ba dag ba kun mthong 'di/ /sna tshogs theg
258b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i lta ba dang/ /ji snyed bsdom? pa'i bya ba rnams/ /sbyar bar byang? ma yin yang/ /ma 'dris yongs su rdzogs par gsal/ /kun shos bzhin 'dra rab ring dri ma nyid/ /bstan ba'i me long? mthong goms rang dag sar/ /'byung bas ma 'ongs de can ched bgyis pa'i/ /dge rtsas bdag dang mdza' yas grol ba
258b7(mdo 'grel): ? dgu bskor rdzogs sho?// // */ /'brel ba gsung so// // */ /rnal 'byor rigs pa'i me tog 'phrul gyi me long la dang? zhabs su bsdus ba'i don bzhi ste/ /phyag 'tsha mchod pa'i lung dang/ dam bca' ? sdom ba'i lung dang/ /gzhung? lugs rtsa ba'i lung dang/ /? tshoD
259a1(mdo 'grel): kyi lung dang bzhi'o/ /kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal nas/ /shes pa gang gis gang ltar phyag btsal ba'o/ /rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg /ces pa/ lta ba'i rim pa spyi'i shan dbye ba'i phyir 'grel ba ste/ /the tshom gtar dka' gnad du brdeg par dam bca' pa'o/ /lung bsnga ba bstan
259a2(mdo 'grel): pa la gnyis te/ /dris pa'i lung dang lan no/ /dris pa ni dgu ste/ log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i/ /chos kun sems su gcig mi gcig /ces pa/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul byang chub sems su gcig mi gcig dris pa dang po'o/ /lhun gyis sgrub ba gang la bgyi dris pa gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid
259a3(mdo 'grel): snang ba yod dam med/ /ces pa/ lhun grub snang stong gang yin dris pa gsum pa'o/ /ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/ zhes pa/ chos kun gzhi yi sangs rgyas pa yin nam/ ma? rgyas pa yin dris pa bzhi pa'o/ /khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul/ /ces pa lnga pa'o/ /'khrul pa nyid don ci lags/ sheS ba
259a4(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa'i grub mdza' dris pa drug pa'o/ /rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang/ zhes pa bdun pa'o/ /de dag dgos ba'i the tshom gang/ zhes pa/ skyon dris pa brgyad pa'o/ /de rnams khyad par ji ltar che/ /bdun po theg pa gzhan las gang spags dris pa dgu pa'o/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor bzhin/ zhes pa/ mtshon
259a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dgus mtshon du btub pa'o/ gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/ zhes pa/ don dris pa lan zung dgu yi tshig gis gsal bar ston pa'o/ /lan dang po bstan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni/ /sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig /ces pa/ log rtog sgyu ma'i sems can dang/ ye sheS
259a6(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyor yul 'khrul lam ma 'khrul gnyis sems kyi de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gcig par lan gdab po/ /de'i dpe ni/ de'i de nyid ji lta ba'o/ /mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/ zhes pa/ gzha' tshon snang ba dang rang bzhin stong pa dbyer med pa bzhin//
259a7(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs ni/ log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang/ rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka' / zhes pa/ log rtog gi rgyud so sor rtog pa dang/ 'du shes tha dad pas/ tshor ba dang/ 'du byed da lta ba dang/ rgyal ba'i thugs gsal ba rtaD kyis tha dad pa las mi mthun pa ni rgyal ba dang 'gro ba la rigs brgyud rtag
259b1(mdo 'grel): pa dngang? pa med pa'i phyir/ gcig ces dgos ches gnyis kyi phyir brjod kyis ngo bo gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i dang du dbyer med pa la de skad brjod pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ sems nyid nor bu rin po che/ zhes pa/ lhun grub kyi dpe'o/ /ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang/ zhes pa/ lhun gyi ma grub pa
259b2(mdo 'grel): dang ma grub pa'i chos thams cad du sems so sor snang ba'o/ /'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang/ zhes pa/ sems kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid kyi gzhi 'am dngos po zhes pa skad gcig ma ni bsam pa 'am blo zhes rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i sems rgyud gnyis pa 'gro ba gcig la med de/ skabs
259b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mi brjod pa'o/ /de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ zhes pa/ sems can gyi sems gcig pa de ni dngos po brtag dka' ste/ dgos 'dod bsked pa'i nor bu lta bu gcig la gcig ma grub pa dang/ lhun grub kyi ngo bo la ni phyogs gcig pa'i lhun grub tu khas blangs pa'o/ /lan gsum pa
259b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/ zhes pa/ 'gro ba so so'i ma rig pa'i snang ba tha dad pa bsdu'o/ /sems phyir mdza' la brtsod pa med/ ces pa/ snang ba yod med kun bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dbyer med pa la yod med sgro bskur tu brtsong pa byis pa'i blo/ /dpe ni/
259b5(mdo 'grel): gang lnga? yod med med pa ltar/ ces pa/ dngos po gang la phan pa 'ba' zhig yod zhe 'am/ gnod pa'i mthu 'ba' zhig yod ces phyir ni mi btub ste/ brtags na mi dmigs par/ bsam na phan gnod so sor snang yang dbyer med pa ltar/ rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ shes pa/ 'khrul pa'i snang
259b6(mdo 'grel): bar do med dbyer med pa ni thun mong chen po'i smra bsams las 'das pa ste/ don dam dngos po 'am gzhi la med/ kun rdzob blo 'am bsam pa la yod ces smra ba dag mi mkhas pa'i shes pas/ 'di skad du/ sems 'di yod do med do zhes/ byis pa rnams ni brtsod par byed/ zhes ba
259b7(mdo 'grel): la sogs chags lo/ /lan? bzhi pha ni/ de ni de phyir rkyal 'gro zhes/ ris su bcang pa med pa la/ sems snang stong dbyer med pa'i lhun grub de ni/ tshig snga ma gtan tshigs su gyur pas ye sangs rgyas pas rgyal ba zhe 'am/ 'gro ba 'khor ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gnyis kar/
260a1(mdo 'grel): sems 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med la mi bsam mi brjod do/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ zhes pa/ gnyis su med pa'i dpe ste/ la la'i gtsang ba la la la'i mi gtsang bar snang bas
260a2(mdo 'grel): gtsang mi gtsang dngos po gcig ste/ gzhi la nges pa bzhin de kho na ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa sems kyi chos nyid sangs rgyas sems can dbye ba med pa la/ phyogs su bltas na nor ba'i blo/ zhes pa/ gzhi 'khrul 'khor med pa'o/ /rnam dag
260a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig tu bltas te/ gzhi med pa la bsam blos blo bur du blta ba dag ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dag dang/ tha snyad la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta ba ste/ gnyis med dang la gsal ba 'dus par brjod pa nyid kyis mkha' i lta
260a4(mdo 'grel): ba khas blangs pa'o/ /'dir gnyis su yod med nyid kyang dbyer med pas thun mongs ma yin pa'i gnyis su med pa ste/ 'di skad du/ gnyis med gnyis su med min zhing/ zhes pa/ dgos byed gnyis kyi phyir brjod pa tsam mo/ /lan lnga
260a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i sems/ /shes pa lo rtog tha dad pa'i sems bsam yas pa'o/ /me long g.ya' dang mkha' sbrin bzhin/ zhes pa/ ma rig pa dang sems ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dpe'o/ /rig dang ma rig
260a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis med pas/ shes pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa med pa min pa'i phyir/ ye shes dang ma rig pa dbyer med kyang/ /phyogs gcig rkyen gyis dus gsum 'khrul/ zhes pa/ phyogs gcig nas ltos pas 'khor ba'i/ de'i rgyu
260a7(mdo 'grel): ma rig pas rkyen las dang nyon mongs pas dus gsum thog mdza' med par rgyun chags su 'khrul pa ni/ thag sbrul tho mi sab rtas mtshon nas gzhi med pa las 'byung bar smra ba lta bu ma yin te/ sgro bkur dang bral ba'i dang
260b1(mdo 'grel): las 'khrul ba'o/ /lan drug pa/ 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/ ces pa/ brtan g.yo blo brtags kyi rang bzhin bsam pa la yod la gzhi la med par smra ba ni rang bzhin la bkur ba ste/ 'dir 'khrul pa
260b2(mdo 'grel): snang ba do ba'i dus nyid na mkha' sprin ltar rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa chen po la rang bzhin yod med dbyer med la dgos ched kyis brjod pa'o/ /rang byung phyin nad med snang phyir/ zhes pa/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis
260b3(mdo 'grel): kyang chu nyid rlabs lta bur 'gro 'ong med par snang ba'o/ /de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/ zhes pa/ 'khrul pa de snang ba'i dus na rang bzhin stong pas ji bzhin nyid las ma nyams rang bzhin thun mongs ma yin pa'i 'khrul pa ste/
260b4(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du/ 'khor ba nyid na bde gnas so/ /shes pa dang/ rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ ces gsungs so/ /lan bdun pa ni/ 'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta ba/ shes rab thun mongs spyan yin na/ zhes pa/ lta ba'i ngo bo 'og
260b5(mdo 'grel): ma bdag yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'du byed kyi shes rab dang mtshungs par thun mong gi lta ba lam du rigs pa'i shes pa la lta ba zhes brjod do/ /'dir rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag /
260b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab spyan gyi mchog yin no/ /zhes pa/ tshogs brgyad rigs rgyud gzugs mtshan gnas kyis tha dad med par 'od gsal ba'o/ /rkyen dang rgyu med par ma 'gags par ye rang gsal bar rang byung ye shes te/ bltas
260b7(mdo 'grel): ba med par de kho na nyid du gsal ba lta ba'i phul lo/ /lta ba'i ngo bo des ji ltar mthong snyam pa la/ rdo rje yid ni dbang samchog phyir/ zhes pa/ yid ye shes rdo rje ni shes rab kyi dbang po mchog ste gtan tshigs/ /lta ba 
261a1(mdo 'grel): med pa rang spya'i chos/ dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba/ zhes pa/ yul du lta ba med de rang rig phyi nang med phyir ro/ /rang dang spya'i mtshan nyid kyi chos su snang ba yang shes pa dang rnam ba tsam du dbyer
261a2(mdo 'grel): med pas/ nang phyogs nas phyi ru bltas pa 'am/ phyi nas nang du blta ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas de kho na nyid yul med par rig ba rang gsal ba'i gdeng brnyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa la/ zhes bas/ zhe 'dod
261a3(mdo 'grel): du med pas/ ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/ /shes gsungs so/ /de la g.yo theb brtan mthar phyin pa'i lam du gyur ba'o/ /lan brgyad pa ni/ gsum gnyis gcig gi the tshom spangs/ zhes pa/ dris lan bdun pa'i
261a4(mdo 'grel): tshom dris pa rjes su bsam pa'i phyir/ dang po dngos dang gsal ba/ zhes pa/ tshig lngas gtar ka gnyis kyi gags bsal pa la/ snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag /so so sems rgyud tha dad pa/ gcig na bdun la snga rtog
261a5(mdo 'grel): skye ? zhes pa/ spyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams phyogs gcig pa'i gcig pa yin na bka' lung la mi snang ba dang/ don dang 'gal ba dang/ gtan tshigs kyis mi rgyas pa dang /rigs pas mi 'thang ba dang/ chos
261a6(mdo 'grel): brtags ba skyi? dang 'gal pa bdun po kun la 'byung mod kyang/ skabs gnyis kyis gsang sngags ni spyi dang 'thun bar rigs pas mi 'thang pa'i skyon brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang sems can gyi sems phyogs
261a7(mdo 'grel): gcig pa'i ldog pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na/ rgyal ba bzhin du 'gro bas kyang thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba dang/ rtog pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ lam gyi
261b1(mdo 'grel): chos la rag las mi dgos pa dang/ rgyal ba yang 'gro ba bzhin thams cad mi mkhyen pa dang/ rtog pa can du 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs pa sdug bsngal myong ba dang/ skyon bdun 'byung do/ /'gro ba drug gi sems can tha dad gcig na
261b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/ zhes pa/ chos tha ma'i skyon 'byung ste/ 'gro ba drug po kun sems rang byung gi ye shes su gcig na yang/ 'gro ba gcig sangs rgyas na kun sangs rgyas bar riD pa dang /gcig ba ltung
261b3(mdo 'grel): na kun bltung bar rigs pa dang/ gtsig shes ba chen kun che/ gcig shes pa chung na kun chung/ /gcig 'du shes rgya che na kun che/ /gcig 'du shes chung na kun chung /gcig rno na kun rno/ /gcig brtul na kun brtul/ gcig
261b4(mdo 'grel): dog na kun deg /gcig yangs na kun yangs /gcig tshor ba gsal na kun gsal/ gcig mi gsal na kun mi gsal/ gcig dran pa gsal na kun gsal/ gcig mi gsal na kun mi gsal/ brgyad po de ltar the tshom za ba/
261b5(mdo 'grel): tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal/ ces pa/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang 'gro ba'i sems tha dad na yang/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis rang bzhin tha dad du 'gyur/ ngo bo tha dad du 'gyur bas 'brel pa med pas don byar mi btub/
261b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba sangs rgyar mi btub/ nyon mongs pa spang zhing sgrib ba byang du mi btub/ rgyal ba bstan pa la dgos pa med/ so sor rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ba dang bdun no/ /sems can kun gyi rang gi ye shes tha dad na yang/
261b7(mdo 'grel): rang byung gi ye shes so so na yod ba'i phyir/ gcig gis gcig rig na gzhan 'byung du 'gyur ba dang/ des tshig med/ gcig gi gcig ma rig na/ ye shes su mi 'gyur ro/ /yul med par rig na dam bca' nyams/
262a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i rnam pa ye shes gzhan du snang ngo zhe na/ bdag gzhan gyi phyogs nas rnam pa cha gnyis yod pas bzung 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /ye shes la rigs brgyud la sogs pa tha dad pa bdun 'ong
262a2(mdo 'grel): bas du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro/ /de gsal ba ni/ de bas dgag dang sgrub med pa'i/ gcig dang du mar bral ba'o/ /zhes pa/ sangs rgyas dang sems can gcig dang du ma'i mdza' ma bkag la bral ba sgrub du med
262a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid gcig dang du ma dang bral ba dang ma bral pa kun yin pas/ bral ma bral dbyer med pa la shugs snang la dgag bsgrub ltar snang yang/ zhes 'dod la lhag ba'i dgag
262a4(mdo 'grel): bsgrub med pas skyon de dag mi 'byung de/ /gsum pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod med ston pa'i phyir/ gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu /zhes pa/ 'khrul snang gzhi la yod na gzhi 'khor ba rang rgyud rtag pa'i skyon
262a5(mdo 'grel): gyis sgrib pa mi 'byang/ 'ching bu dbes sangs mi rgya/ rgyal ba dang/ 'gro ba rigs rgyud tha dad 'byung/ bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/ mya ngan 'das pa'i snang ba 'gag /'khor ba mthar 'gyur/
262a6(mdo 'grel): 'grel pa med pas don byar mi tub/ gzhi'i chos dri ma can du 'gyur ba'o/ /phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis bzhi'o/ /zhes pa/ gzhi la 'khrul pa med pa yin na'ang/ lhan gcig skyes
262a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i ma rig pa med pa'i skyon dang/ rang bzhin chad ba'i skyon dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/ 'khrul snang 'gag /gzhi med pa la 'khor ba snang na/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'byung /rgyud dag ba yang
262b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/ bstan pa le dgos ched med/ ye nas gzhi la med ba las snang na/ mu stegs chad pa'i snang bar 'gyur/ snga na med pa'i skyon dang/ gcig la gcig med pa'i skyon dang/ ye nas med pa dang bcu gnyis 'byung do//
262b2(mdo 'grel): gzhi ni 'khrul snang yod med gnyis su med pa'i don dang 'gal/ bka' lung las mi snang ba/ gtan tshigs kyis ma rgyas pa/ de ltar rigs bas mi thad ba'o/ /zhor la shes ba'i khyad par bstan pa ni/ mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam
262b3(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ zhes pa/ dbye na/ mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa/ zhes pa/ mi mkhas pa'i bsam pa la gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'o/ /zhes pa/ mu stegs pa dang skye bo dag go /mi mkhas yod med brtsod byed cing
262b4(mdo 'grel): dgag dang/ bsgrub pa gang byed pa/ de de de la chags sdang skye/ zhes pa/ ltos ba'i mi mkhas pa dag ni/ tshad ma tshul yod la brtsod/ sems tsam pa rnam pa yod med la brtsod/ dbu ma snang pa yod med la rtsod pa byed cing/ riD
262b5(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin pa'i shes pa'i yul ched du 'gegs/ rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul sgrub par byed pa de ni/ sgrub pa'i don la blo chags/ dgag bya la zhe sdang bskyed pas/ blang dor med pa'i don ma mthong ba'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o
262b6(mdo 'grel): 'o na mkhas pa gang zhe na/ mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni/ zhes pa/ mkhas pa'i bsam pa dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o/ /mkhas pa phal pa dgag bsgrub can/ sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/ ces ba/ theg pa chen po
262b7(mdo 'grel): dbu dang sems tsam pa'o/ /de yang gsang sngags la ltos na 'khrul pa'i phyir/ byas ba'i bzung 'dzin dpar gyur pa'i/ ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/ zhes pa'o/ /ched du dgag sgrub byed ba'i des pa 'jog pa'i rtog?
263a1(mdo 'grel): ba skyes bas/ gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang bral ba'o/ /gsang sngags mi shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la/ /sems phyir dgag dang sgrub med/ zhes pa/ gsang sngags pa ni shin tu mkhas pa'i bsam pa ste/
263a2(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dgag sgrub ched du mi byed pa yang rtogs byed kyi thabs dam pa ste/ zhor la dgag sgrub can gyi lta ba 'gegs pa dang/ dgag sgrub med pa'i don sgrub pa yod mod kyang/ dgag sgrub
263a3(mdo 'grel): med pa'i phyogs gcig pur khas mi len te/ don ni de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/ dgag sgrub med pa'i yid mi rten/ zhes pa/ dgag sgrub yod mod kyi chos thams cad rang rig pa yin pas/ dgag sgrub med pa'i don
263a4(mdo 'grel): ched du dmigs pa yul du mi byed do/ /dgag sgrub gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus dang/ mnyam pa la bzhag pa'i dus gnyis ka ched du byed pa 'khrul pa'i phyir/ de phyir so so dgag bsgrub can/ bsgrub ba'i phyogs la zhen
263a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ de de med pa ga la mthong/ de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/ zhes gsungs so/ /lan dgu pa zhar la bstan pa'i phyir/ de de skas gdang ji lta ba/ khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/ zhes pa/ rgyu'i theg pa de dang
263a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu de skas gdan ltar khyad yod pa'i grangs mi 'dor bas/ bdun po'i skyon rgyu'i theg ba la grangs ji ltar brjed? pa ltar 'byung gi /'bras bu'i theg pa la skyon mi 'byung bar smos pa'o/ /dgos ched ni/ cha yod dug
263a7(mdo 'grel): la mi rtub bzhin/ log lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur /zhes pa/ des de bzhin du rang bzhin log pa dang/ ltos pa'i log pa ltar gsang sngags mi 'gro ba'o/ /gnyis ba the tshom gsal ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa de ltar nyid la/
263b1(mdo 'grel): zhes ba/ grangs kyi gnyis pa de lta bur lhun grub dris pa/ grub pa'i tha snyad de ltar mtshon/ zhes ba/ lhun gyis grub pa phyogs gcig pa 'am/ phyogs med pa gang yin dris ba'o/ /ma grub grub na des tshig med /ces pa/ phyogs med na
263b2(mdo 'grel): grub pa'i dang la rta la glang ma grub pa la sogs pa yang grub las/ grub pa gcig bu'i nges tshig med bar 'gyur ro/ /de ma grub na de bzhin no/ /zhes pa/ ma grub par brags pa'i chos lhun gyis ma grub na'ang/ ma grub ba'i chos
263b3(mdo 'grel): ma rdzogs pas nges tshig med do/ /gzhan yang ma grub pa phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas yod mthar lta ba dang /bden pa mthong ba yang 'khor ba dang/ zhen bas 'tshang rgya ba dang/ dge sdig 'bras bu bsnol mar 'gyur ba yang
263b4(mdo 'grel): grub dgos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/ /de gsal ba'i thabs ni/ de bas srid dang mi srid kun/ lhun grub phyogs su grub ba med/ zhes pa/ lhun grub kyi gtan tshigs kyis dge bas mtho ris su srid pa la sogs ba dang/ dge bas
263b5(mdo 'grel): ngan song du mi srid ba kun yod med grub ma grub dbyed med ba la dgos? tshad kyis lhun grub du brjod kyis/ don grub grub por brjod pa med pas/ lhag pa'i lhun grub la skyon de dag mi 'gyud/ bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/
263b6(mdo 'grel): shes pa/ ye sangs rgyas pa phyogs gcig pa cig rin chen gling dang/ nyi mas mtshon pa sgra ji bzhin du brtags na/ mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rigs brgyud can du 'gyur/ sgrib ba sbyang mi dgos/
263b7(mdo 'grel): tul? bas don byang med/ sgrub pa'i gang zag med pas lam mi dgos/ bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos tshad med/ 'khor ba'i snang ba 'gag/ gal te na brgyud pa yang 'khor/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'gyur/ gzhi la
264a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba med la blo la yod na blo dang gzhi tha dad pa'i skyon 'ong/ tha mi dad na blo la yod pa bzhin du gzhi la yang yod par 'gyur/ de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa yin zhe na/ de nyid ma yin pas gzhi la
264a2(mdo 'grel): med kyang/ gzhan du brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis gzhi la yod par 'gyur/ sgrub sngags gnyis pa des ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyang min no/ /de bzhin phyi ma rjes su 'thun/ zhes pa/ gzhi sangs rgyas ma yin par 'khor
264a3(mdo 'grel): ba yin zhe na/ skyon grangs phyi ma'ang snga ma'i rjes mthun te/ gzhi 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur/ gzhi dri ma can du 'gyur/ 'gro ba rang rgyud par 'gyur/ don byed pa po med par 'gyur/ mya ngan 'das pa 'gag/ gal te mya ngan 'das pa
264a4(mdo 'grel): la thog ma 'byung/ 'khor ba mdza' ma 'byung ste/ mdza' stod par 'gyur/ sgrib pa mi 'byongs par 'gyur/ 'khor ba rtags pa'i skyon dang/ 'brel ba med pas don byar med pa dang/ bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/
264a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi la 'khor ba yod na/ zhen blo dang khyad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang bcu gnyis so/ /gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la/ zhes pa/ ye sangs rgyas pa yin men gnyis ka ma yin na'ang/ thung po gsum pa dang/ lung du ma bstan
264a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'gal ba 'dus pa 'byung ngo zhe na/ de gsal ba ni gnyis med dang/ zhes pa/ rang rig la ni sangs rgyas dang sems can dbyer med na'ang/ 'di skad du/ bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ ye nas lhun rdzogs
264a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas chos/ shes gsungs pa'i don la/ dpe/ sman nyid sman gnod bdag gnas ltar/ ces pa/ sman cig kyang phan gnod gnyis ka'i ngo por gnas pa ltar/ ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med/ ces pa/ sems rgyal
264b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro gang gi phyogs su ma gyur pas/ yin min lung du ma bstan pa'i skyon mi 'byung ngo/ /lam sa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i/ zhes pa/ chos nyid dang la 'khor gzhi yod med gnyis/ gnyis med dang gsum la gsum pa mtshon pa sgo?
264b2(mdo 'grel): so sor bstan kyang/ don la gcig par ma shes pa dag yod pa rang rgyud pa dang/ med pa rnam dag phyogs gcig pa dang/ phyogs kyi gnyis med la 'khrul par smra na/ skyon ni gsum pa ji ltar grangs/ shes pa/ 'khrul snang
264b3(mdo 'grel): yang med skabs su bshad pa dang mthun par bgrang ngo/ /de gsal ba ni/ mig yar gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/ chos yod bzhin pas/ shes pa/ 'khrul tu btub pa'i dpe ni/ tho yor dang sam mo dang thag pa la/ yang dag pa'i
264b4(mdo 'grel): rta sbrul gyi sha khrag med kyang/ mi rta sprul dang 'dra ba'i chos yod pas 'khrul tu btub pa'i rkyen gzhis btub pa bzhin/ rang sems la/ de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug/ rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin/ so sor snang ba/
264b5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa/ sems la 'khor ba rang rgyud med kyang me long gi g.ya' bzhin 'khor ba'i rgyu gnyis rkyen gzhis gnas pas snang du btub la/ dpag bsam shing la bsod nams che chung gis so sor snang ba ltar/ dag dang ma
264b6(mdo 'grel): dag pa'i spyod yul du snang ngo/ /gzhi ma rig pa yang dag par rang snang ba dang/ lhan gcig skyes pa'i ma rig mtshungs par yod pa dang/ yod med dbyer med pas 'khrul gzhi med do yod do gnyis su med do/ /zhes
264b7(mdo 'grel): pa bstan pa don gcig go /dus gsum du rgyun du 'khrul pa lhun grub pas/ shes pa/ dus dang 'khrul gzhi'o/ /'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang ba/ gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs/ shes pa/ chu rlabs kyi
265a1(mdo 'grel): tshul du 'gro 'ong med par 'khor bar snang ba'i gzhi yod med dbyer med du gcig pa la skyon med do/ /drug pa de ltar de bden na/ de la skyon du bya ba bdun/ zhes pa/ gong du 'khrul tshul bstan pa ltar bden to/ /yid
265a2(mdo 'grel): med phyogs can las 'khrul tu btub na/ tho yor la rta ru 'khrul/ sam mo la mir 'khrul/ thag pa la rtar 'khrul par rigs/ mi srid pa'i chos gzhi 'byung bar rigs te/ dpe skyon bdun no/ /de bas 'khrul pa'i rang? bzhin
265a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa nyid du rtag na'ang/ 'khor ba gzhi la grub nas/ 'khrul pa'i rgyu rkyen gnyis la rag yi lus pa'i skyon gnyis/ 'khrul pa mi sangs pa'i skyon/ gang zag dgos pa rtsan du 'khor ba la mdza' mi 'ongs?/ bden
265a4(mdo 'grel): pa mthong du mi btug chos nyid du ma 'dus shing ma khyab pa'i skyon 'byung ngo/ /de gsal pa'i thabs/ thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la/ zhes pa/ gzhi la 'khrul ma 'khrul yod med kyi bsgro bskur med pa'o/ /gnyis mthong
265a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrul bar blta ba'o/ /'khrul /zhes pa/ /rang bzhin ma nyams par blta ba'o/ 'khrul pa'o/ /de bas blang dang dor ma byed/ /bde sdug gnas su rig ma blta /zhes pa/ don gnyis med la lta spyod kyi gang ma dag ngag go? /bdun
265a6(mdo 'grel): pa rang rig spyan yin na/ de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes pa/ rang byung ye shes lta pa'i ngo bo yin na/ rang byung ye shes gcig pas gcig gis rtogs na kun gyis skyon 'byung/ skye mi 'byung/ rgyal ba dang 'gro ba khyad par med
265a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ lam chad/ da lta nyid nas thams cad mkhyen par thal/ gzhir thal/ sgom mi dgos/ tshig dang yi ge la la dgos pa med/ gton la dbab mi dgos/ mngon shes ma bsgom par 'char bar 'gyur ba dang
265b1(mdo 'grel): bcu'o/ /de gsal ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/ mi lnga bdag po kun gyi sems/ shes pa/ de bzhin nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ rang byung dang/ lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o/ /ngo bo 'gro ba kun gyis
265b2(mdo 'grel): sems so/ /rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/ rang yul med par nges gsal ba/ zhes pa/ lta ba'i don no/ /dpe ni/ nam mkha' i sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du/ zhes pa/ sbrin gang dag pa na/ nyi ma'i 'od dang nam mkha' gsal ba ltar/ rab ribs gang
265b3(mdo 'grel): dag shes rab snang/ zhes pa/ log rtog tha dad pa'i bsam rgyud gang dag pa la rim par rang byung ye shes snang bas/ stobs rdzogs ma rdzogs kyi skyon med do/ /brgyad pa des mthong sgrib ba'i grangs/ /brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan?
265b4(mdo 'grel): lag bcas/ shes pa/ don mthong ba la sgrib pa'i the tshom ste /de'i rtsa ba bdun la skyon gyi grangs brjod zin pa de bsdu na/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ nges par dos zin bya bar bsnyad/ ces pa/ 'di skad du /bka' don/
265b5(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs/ rigs pa gzhi/ snang dang/ mi 'gal/ rgyas/ 'thad sbyar zhes pas don ngos gzung ngo/ la zla ba ni/ ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/ the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan/ log rtog nyid kyang ma nor yam/ de la mi mthun
265b6(mdo 'grel): shes dang bral/ zhes pa/ gsum po rim pa rang snang phyir/ de dag gnyis su med par bstan pa la 'gal ba 'dus par brtag tu med pa'o/ /dgu pa 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ theg ba'i lta ba gral bgod? nga/ skas gdad lta bur
265b7(mdo 'grel): bstan pa dag go /kun dang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te/ zhes pa/ nyan thos yan cad kun 'jig rten pa'i bdag nyid med par 'phags mod kyang/ de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub/ zhes pa/ theg pa che chung nad pa gol 
266a1(mdo 'grel): ba man chog la yod pas khyad par ni/ rim par yod med khyad par dang/ ltos pas phye ba khyad par ni/ zhes pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa rnams lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du/ bdag spong bdag
266a2(mdo 'grel): med bsgrub pa dang/ gzugs spang phyi stong bsgrub pa dang/ don 'gog sems tsam bsgrub pa dang/ mdza' spong mdza' bral bsgrub ba dang/ dri spong dag pa bsgrub pa dang/ mtshan 'gag mtshan med bsgrub pa dang/ blang dor 'gag
266a3(mdo 'grel): med bsgrub pa dang/ rtsol spong rtsol bral bsgrub pa dang/ de dag kun kyang yod med bdag phyir/ dgag bsgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o/ /rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston/ mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i/ rim pas don gcig khyad par snang/
266a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa/ lta ba ma dag pa'i byis pa gnyis so/ /ltos pa'i ma dag pa'i rjes su rnal 'byor man cad do/ /'o na dag pa chen po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dag pa kun mthong ba 'di/ zhes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lta ba'o/ /de yang 'di skad du/
266a5(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang/ ji snyed bsdom pa'i bya ba rnams/ spyad par bya ba ma yin yang/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal/ zhes 'byung bas/ ngo bo rang byung thams cad mkhyen pa dang/ rang bzhin lta ba thams
266a6(mdo 'grel): cad dang/ mtshan nyid lta ba gang dang yang ma 'dres pa dang/ rtsal lta ba'i sgrib pa kun bcom pa dang/ byin rlabs lta ba kun 'byung ba dang/ yon tan lhag pa'i lha dang/ sangs rgyas thob pas/ go 'phang bla na med ba'o/ /bsngo
266a7(mdo 'grel): ba tshogs kyi lung ni/ kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid/ zhes pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi shes rab kyis rang gi bzhin rang gis ma mthong ba ltar/ ma rig pas sgrib pa ni/ bstan pa'i me long mthong bsgom rang dag par/ 'gyur
266b1(mdo 'grel): bas ma 'ongs de can ched bgyid pa'i dge rtsas bdag dang mdza' yas grol bar bsngo/ zhes pa/ bzhin la me long bstan pas/ dri ma mthong nas 'dag par byas pa bzhin/ 'phrul gyi tshig dgus bstan pa'i tshig gi sgron mas/ lta ba
266b2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa la bsgoms pas sgrib 'dag par 'gyur bas/ ma 'ongs pa bdag pas blo dman pa'i don du/ 'phrul gyi me long brtsams pa'i dags kyi sbyin pa'i dge rtsas/ mdza' yas pa theg pa chen por grol bar dmigs
266b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor la/ /rig pa'i me tog gis 'grel pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// // * //thugs kyi sgron ma bzhugs so// //
266b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku gsungs thugs kyis rdo rje'i bdag/ chos kun rdzogs pa'i thugs rdo rje/ dz+nyA? na'i yin par bzhed sems dpa' tshal phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyan mchog dbul ba'i shi sha'i phyir/ /skyu 'phrul
266b5(mdo 'grel): dra ba'i rgyud dag las/ /'khor lo dag mchu'i tshul bzhin tu/ /sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi sgrol ma/ de/ 'dzin pas dbang gi sdug bsngal bas/ /g.yo 'dzin gsum dang mi g.yo ba'i/ /'dzin dgu log lta de bzhin pa'i/ /rnam gnyis
266b6(mdo 'grel): spang phyir gnyen por brjod/ bsam mi khyab dang de sdus pa/ brgyad khri gzhi stong da lta bas/ /gnyis sdus nges bzhi 'bras bur gcig/ thun mongs mchog gi lam lnga po/ /'dod pa'i yul+la zhen pa dang/ /bsam gtan
266b7(mdo 'grel): snyoms 'jug 'du shes med/ /rtag tshad bcu gsum zhen pa rnams/ /ring du btod la mi mthun pa'i/ /spyod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la'ang/ /dang po phyed spong gcig gtang snyoms/ /byed pa'i zhen pas gzhi byed dang//
267a1(mdo 'grel): 'phra zab dngos lha'i zhen pa dang/ /phyogs stong de bzhin phyogs 'dzin pa'i/ /rgyud 'dzin zhen pa bden pa gnyis/ /rigs 'byed zhen pa'i stong pa can/ /'jig rten ngan song khams su rtse/ /zhi ba phyogs
267a2(mdo 'grel): las nges 'byung dang/ /rgyu 'bras pa la nges 'byung ba'ang/ /phyi pa dag lha gnyis rjes 'brang/ /mtshan med 'od gsal nges zhen pa'i/ /spong len nges 'dzin bdag 'dzin bzhi/ /theg mchog lam gyis stegs gyur kyang//
267a3(mdo 'grel): rang rang nges pas bsgribs pa yis/ /mchog gi gzhung lugs gdeng ma gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs/ /bcu gnyis gcig gi zhen pa dag/ mi spong gnyis med blang ba med/ /thabs kyi rang bzhin bral
267a4(mdo 'grel): mngon byed/ /de bzhin pa yi lugs mchog 'di/ /rgyud dang rnal 'byor gsum rim pa/ /de las kun nas spags pa'i don/ /yang rab rnal 'byor blo la gsal/ /de gang zhe na bdod bsams pas/ /dug lnga dngos dang
267a5(mdo 'grel): yul shes bcas/ /sems phyir cho 'phrul snang ba la/ /gsum snang zhen pa'i yul med par/ /brgyud drug shes pa rkyen bcas kyis/ /yul med mi dmigs phyir mi mthong/ /mthong shes dbang bcas rang ma mthong//
267a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin pa yis lnga nyon mongs/ /rjes 'brangs stobs gyur 'gro lngar smin/ /mi mthun bde sdug myong gyur bzhin/ /lam bral dus dgras bcom pa dang/ /thar mang yang dag lam ston dgos/ /de phyir mi rtsang rus spyod dang
267a7(mdo 'grel): sab rda thag sprul mtha mi ltar/ /mi bden shes snang phyir rdzun pa'ang/ /mi spong mod kyang bden pa med/ /rang byung ye shes mdza' dbus med/ /mi g.yo rang gsal 'dzin bral la/ /tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi//
267b1(mdo 'grel): rim par sor sor bdag cing/ /gzugs rnams kun lu bdag rtog pas/ gsang pa'i bden gsum mnyam ma mthong/ /thams cad mkhyen ldan 'bral ba yis/ /'du shes med lta sho bar ba/ /mnyam pa gsum la mdongs pa yis/ /mi
267b2(mdo 'grel): g.yo snyoms 'jug bzhi 'dzin can/ /thal 'byung ting 'dzin lus zhig na/ /ya nga'i 'bras bu lhud yod phyir/ /dran pa nyams pa'i ting 'dzin te/ /yid rten bya ba'i yul ma yin/ /rang bzhin 'das dang 'khar ba dag/ gnyis med
267b3(mdo 'grel): lhun grub brjod bsam yul/ /'das dang sngon bzhin ma mthong bas/ /'khrul yul gzhir 'thod lta rang blo 'khrul/ /g.yangs mtho dman lam zhugs pas/ /zad par bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bug la yin//
267b4(mdo 'grel): de phyir gsum la khyad par mod/ /drug gnyis ston pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i/ /rigs min lta ba bsam yas pa/ /gnyis sdud rtag dang chad pa dngos/ /log lha'i gtso bo ya nga'i rgyu/ /lnga pa ril po 'byed lta ba'ang/ /snga ma dran pa'i
267b5(mdo 'grel): byed lta ba'i/ /rigs bzhi nges 'dod rang blo log/ de la kha dog dbyibs yod na/ /gzugs su thal bas mang nyung gis/ /'gal dang dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /rnam smin myong ba ga la rung/ /'on te gzugs kyis shes myong thal/ des na ril po rdzun
267b6(mdo 'grel): par nges/ /byed pos byas pa'ang de bzhin te/ /de kho gal te bden zhen/ /byed bor grub pa su yis byas/ /byed po rdub/ las 'grub gyur ram/ /'on te las kyis byed 'byung zhe 'am/ /byed po nyid la byed yod dam/ /rang bzhin
267b7(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /byed po stags dbang tsam du zad/ /byed la byed yod thugs med skyon/ /rdul na byas 'dra rag lus med/ /las yin kho bo'i 'dod ba mog/ rang bzhin steng dbang byas pa'ang thal/ /tsha rims a
268a1(mdo 'grel): bras chod pa'i mig/ 'bag sogs snang ltar ga la bden/ /cis shos nya shing stsos bsregs pas/ /mi skye rlag 'gyur rigs pa yin/ /snga phyi med par bden lta ba'ang/ /mi bden da lta sha 'brug ltar/ /stegs
268a2(mdo 'grel): dbang snang du btub zhe na/ /snga phyi 'ang stegs dbang cis mi 'byung/ /de mi 'byung na da lta'ang/ /mi 'byung de min smos ci dgos/ /da ltar de na bdag dang gzhan/ /stegs dbang snang ba dus gsum du/ /rgyun brtags med
268a3(mdo 'grel): pa cis pa 'gyur/ /gzugs la rung yang ming bzhis so/ /de ltar bden na rmi lam gyi/ /shes pa'ang nya shing mtshungs brlag 'gyur/ /rmi lam btags ldang zhing rgyun brtag na/ /gzugs phung zhig kyang de 'dra mod/
268a4(mdo 'grel): 'on te da lta yod pa bzhin/ /snga phyi yod pa smos ci dgos/ /rtag chang gnyis kar blo zhen na/ /don gyis snying po mchog las gol/ /rang rig snang stong yul min par/ /rig pa rang gsal bsam brjod 'das/ /de phyir
268a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang der mi 'dzin/ /de la blang dor phyogs 'dzin med/ /` de dag so so zhen yul bcas/ /blos bzhag med a yod brtags pa/ /spang byed chad du byas spong ba'ang/ /lnga yi bye brag mi mthun pa/ /mos
268a6(mdo 'grel): pa tha dad phyir gsungs pa/ /bye brag mod tsam bshad par bya/ /theg pa dang po bcu drug 'gon/ /gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrungs/ /gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan/ /bzhi pa bden pa rnams pa gnyis//
268a7(mdo 'grel): lnga pa gsang ba'ang phyi pa'ang/ /dang po rang rig rnam par dag/ gnyis pa snga phyi rjes su 'brangs/ /gsum pa dbyings nyid 'od gsal ba'i/ /sa bdun rim par bkod pa yang/ /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro pa'i lam//
268b1(mdo 'grel): theg pa bzhis yis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /tha ma 'ang sti gnas mthar thug ste/ /tha ma'ang gtso mchog 'dir bshad do/ /de la spong thabs mi mthun pa/ /'dod dang 'gog spong sbyong sol byed/ /'bras
268b2(mdo 'grel): shes btang snyoms dag byed dang/ /phyogs spyod dang len pha rol/ /bdag phyir blang dor med pa yis/ /che bas skas gdang lta bur 'gyur/ /brgyad gnyis bcu spyod theg sogs pa/ /thun mongs lam brjod rnam dgu/ srid pa dang po
268b3(mdo 'grel): dngos lta ba/ /rnal 'byor g.yeng drug gis bral yang/ /rgyu 'bras shes pas yang spong/ /sti gnas dang po smin par 'dod/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /bsam gtan snyoms
268b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa brgyad pa/ /'dod spyod sdig sogs spyod pas 'dor/ /dang po'i g.yeng drug bsam pas 'dor/ /'dzin pa phra bas ting nge 'dzin/ /dor ba gnyis 'thun der ba yis/ /sa stegs rtsa gcig thob byed pa'o/ /log lta bzhi
268b5(mdo 'grel): po gnyis mthong bas/ /log pa'i lam zhugs ya nga'i? 'bras/ /lam rim dang po dngos 'dzin gzhi/ /'khor ba'i lam bzhi zag bcas 'bras/ /de dag mchog gi gsum la rmongs/ /de phyir ma rtogs log rtogs pa'o//
268b6(mdo 'grel): spong bgegs byed pa'i byis pa gnyis/ /tshul khrims bslab pas dangs 'gog cing/ /mthong goms shes rab ting 'dzin gyis/ /spong bgegs med smra ting 'dzin lta/ /zab phra'i bzung 'dzin zhen ba can/ /blang dor zhags
268b7(mdo 'grel): pas bcings pa yi/ /log par rtog pa tsam nyid la sa/ /phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin te/ lhag par drug gnyis phyi stong 'dod/ /phyogs stong zhen pas sgribs pas te/ /rmi lam rten 'brel bzhi snang bas/ /mi bden
269a1(mdo 'grel): rang byung ye shes skal/ /bshed med theg pa'i gzhung gnyis pos/ /rdul dang rten 'brel bzhir 'dod pas/ /phyogs cig 'das mdza' lam zhugs pas/ /sti gnas dang po 'bras bu tsam/ /bla na med pa'i theg
269a2(mdo 'grel): pa ba/ /bslab pa gsum gyis spang bya dag/ sol sbyong dag pas thob 'dod pa/ /rnam rig rnal 'byor mdo sde'o/ /dang po rang byung ye shes don/ /mig phyir na rang sems la/ /rnam pa yod med rtsod pa byed/ /gang ltar rtsod kyang
269a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa'i mdza' o/ /'khrul snang yul gyis rnam pa can/ /rang bzhin 'khrul mthong yod ma myong/ /rnam pa med pa'i rang rig pa/ /'od gsal shel ltar dag pa'ang/ /rgyu rtag skad cig mi rtag pas/ /skye 'gag med
269a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i ye shes la/ /nam yang reg par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par 'gog par thug pa'i mdza' o/ /rnam dag ye shes rnam bral ba/ /sems can rgyud re de yin te/ /rgyud 'dzin yul med bzud 'dzin can/ /g.yo med
269a5(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa 'khrul par zad/ /byis pa mkha' la rtsod dang mtshungs/ /rnam pa yod med kun bdag skal/ /shes rgyud bzhi la rtsol ba'i lam/ /de dang thun mongs sangs rgyas de'i 'bras bur/ /byed kyi lhag pa'i
269a6(mdo 'grel): gsum ma mthong/ /dam pa'i shes pa'ang rdzun pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang de 'dra'i phyir/ /snga ma'i dam pa rgyu rkyen la/ /rang lus zhig ngang skyes dang skyes/ /de bas brdzun lta dam par ni/ /thams cad sems
269a7(mdo 'grel): te de ma dmigs/ /ma skyes stong pa smra bsams 'das /mdza' la dben pa'i don du lta/ /rnam pa yod med rtsod dang bral/ /shes pa ma skyes phyogs lta ba/ /mdza' dang bral ba thug pa'i mdza' / /skye med phyogs cig
269b1(mdo 'grel): mdza' dang bral/ /de kho mchog lta'i zhen pa can/ /gnyis med dbyer med ma mthong bas/ /sems stong bzhi la dka' spyod lam/ /'bras bu sngon bzhin 'das pa'i mdza' / /grub mdza' nor rtog shes rab kyis/ /'bad pas brtan thob de yis phyir/ /de
269b2(mdo 'grel): mi bden pas de mi bden/ /mdo sde pa yi gzhung lugs kyang/ /kun brtags snang ba'i spyod yul 'di/ /dam pa gzhan dbang sgyu ma tsam/ /shes snang ma yin 'du snang yin/ dam par skye med smra bsams 'das/ /rten 'brel cig dang du ma med/ /rdo rje
269b3(mdo 'grel): gzegs ma rnam bzhi dang/ /mu bzhi skye 'gag la sogs pas/ /mdza' yis bye brags/ sel byed cing/ /de 'dra bsam gtan 'das chen cing/ snang ba yong dang med pa dang/ /rigs pas 'grub dang ma grub sogs/ /de dag la
269b4(mdo 'grel): rtsod mdza' tshol ba/ /snyed nas nges 'jog bzung 'dzin can/ /bden gnyis po bo cig mi gcig/ cod cing cig la bden dang rdzun/ /rigs lta cha shas zhen pa can/ /gcig na rdzun mthong bden thal 'gyur/ /yang na bden mthong
269b5(mdo 'grel): brdzun par 'gyur/ /brdzun zhi bden par bslu sogs lngar/ /za la 'gyur bden bzhin brdzun pa'ang/ /skye 'gag med sogs bzhir thal 'gyur/ /yang na mnyam bzhag tshe na'ang/ /bden gnyis dus cig
269b6(mdo 'grel): mthong par rigs/ /bden brdzun phan tshun spangs pas 'gal/ /tha dad gyur na sgyu ma la/ /brten nas don dam mi rtogs shing/ /sgyu mar 'bad pas 'ang tshi tshad 'gyur/ /dam pa btsal ba'i gnas med cing/ /'grel pa med pas mi
269b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang ma skyes ba'ang/ /skye ba med par 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zhan spong gnyen po mi btub cing/ /de nyid rang rgyud can gyur pas/ /gang la phan gnod med 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rtog cing the tshom za ? khas blangs med sgra phyogs
270a1(mdo 'grel): la zhen/ /de bas bla med theg pa pa/ /don dam du ni dbyer med te/ /kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la/ /dag dang mdag gnyis kar 'dzin/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /don dam du ni kor bdun no/ /kun rdzob du ni
270a2(mdo 'grel): mnyam rdzogs so/ /rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob duAng dbyer med te/ /lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/ /de nyid 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la/ don dam ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu/ /lhag pa'i bden par mtshan brjod do/ /cir yang snang
270a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i ye shes nyid/ /mtshan mar ma 'gags cir yang snang/ /ngo bo ma nges don mdzad dang/ /rtag pa gnyis las ring ba dang/ /rnal 'byor dam pa'i yul 'thun dang/ /snang la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir/ /lhag pa'i kun rdzob
270a4(mdo 'grel): zhes su grags/ /thams cad kun gyi rang bzhin pas/ /ye shes snang ba'ang rgyu rkyen med/ /skye 'jig med do lnga 'bras bu/ /dbyings dang ye shes rdzogs mi dmigs/ /phyogs med re skong 'phrin las ni/ /kun nas mtshams
270a5(mdo 'grel): pas don mdzad de/ /ched du byas pa'i rtag pa'ang bral/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ngo bo dang/ /yon tan 'phrin las rtags pas dben/ /chos drug ldan phyir lhag par bsgrags/ /de bzhin rang bzhin 'bras bu dang//
270a6(mdo 'grel): ye shes gsum phyir don dam pa'ang/ /shes don nang nas mchog gyur bas/ /don gyi ming du 'grub pa yin/ /de'ang ma skyes dbyings kyi don/ /gzhi yis nges la khyad gyur pa/ /log rtog spyod yul las
270a7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa/ /kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs bkol med/ /ngo bo bdun rdzogs dmigs pa med/ /mtshan nyid kun grol kun bdag la/ /phyogs stong chang par yod pa med/ /kun byin ldan pa'i brlabs snang la/ /dngos
270b1(mdo 'grel): po gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rgyur/ /gyur pas ci yang mi 'gog ste/ /rgya mtsho'i chu dang brlabs bzhin no/ /yid bzhin nor ltar re bskod pa'o/ /yon tan kun rdzogs phyir snang ba'o/ /thun mong dam pa'i yul min te/ /phyogs cig mdza' bral ma
270b2(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs thun mongs pas/ /gtan la 'babs pa ma yin te/ /bdun sogs ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir/ /lhag pa'ang grangs mthun nyid du brjod/ /rnal sogs spyod yul ma yin mo/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni//
270b3(mdo 'grel): pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud med/ /kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ /gnas su ma yin gang yang med/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la/
270b4(mdo 'grel): rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab/ /rang byung de nyid dngos med pas/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no/ /ma skyes bzhi la dgrod pa'i lam/ /gang spangs gang thob de'i 'bras bu/ /dngos po ji bzhin mi mthong pas/ /'bras
270b5(mdo 'grel): bu btags pa'i sangs rgyas tsam/ /de ltar nges 'byung bye brag gi/ rgyud nas nges pa'i gsang ba'ang/ /dang po rgyu 'bras dbye byed pas/ /'bras bu lam du byed zhe'ang/ /phyogs cig dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /lta zhing de las lha drug sogs//
270b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs? pa gsum dang yan lag gis/ /bsgom byed 'bras bu bzung 'dzin can/ /lta spyod ya cha'i zhen pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po nang mi mthong/ /dag pa'i sems zhi rtsol ba'i lam/ /rdo rje gsum gyis 'dzin pa/ /rmu long 'dri mkhan dang
270b7(mdo 'grel): mtshungs nye/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs rje'i yul/ /gnyi ga ba yi bya ba dang/ /rnal 'byor rjes su lta spyod 'brang/ /gnyis po ya cha sngon bzhin te/ /de nyid bzhi yi zhen pa can/ /de'ang phyi rol pa la gnas/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin zhe? 
271a1(mdo 'grel): pa can/ /dam par rang rig 'od gsal ba/ /dbyings nyid rnam dag ye shes la/ /kun rdzob byin brlabs dkyil 'khor dag/ ye shes snang sgra de la dmigs/ /de phyir lta dgongs phyi rol 'gyur/ /de rtogs khas
271a2(mdo 'grel): len gtsang smrar len/ /chu yi ral gri phyis pa bzhin/ /sbyod par mi phod 'dzin pa can/ /de nyid sgo nas phyi rol spyod/ /shin tu nang don ma gtogs pas/ /phyi rol cha yis bcings pa yin/ /'od gsal bzhi las mtshan mar g.yo//
271a3(mdo 'grel): snang stong res slob lam lnga yis/ /thob pa dam pa'ang sti ba'i gnas/ /phyi rol gnyis sogs 'bras bu'i phyir/ /'chib bu rin chen ji lta bar/ /lam 'bras ma 'brel 'khrul par zad/ /gtso mchog bshad par khas blangs
271a4(mdo 'grel): pa/ rgyas par gdams kyi gdengs du bgyis/ /rnal 'byor chen po lta ba'i don/ /yod las btsal na sgros btags te/ /mang las btsal na bkur btab 'gyur/ /yod med gnyis las rtsal byas na/ /de ni lung du ma stan
271a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de la gzhan 'ang 'brel med pas/ /nam yang brnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /mdza' la rtsad kun de lta bas/ /gsum bral phyogs cig mdza' bral ba/ /rang blo 'khrul pa snang ba yin/ /de bas mthar thug ltos yod pa//
271a6(mdo 'grel): kun kyang mdza' yis bral ba'ang mdza' / /yin phyir nges pa'i blo mi bzhag/ gnyis med smras bsam bral ba ltos/ /tshig dang sgra 'thun tha dad pa/ /lta spyod log par drangs thabs su/ /gsung phyir rdo rje thag chen po/ /sgra cig
271a7(mdo 'grel): don gyis khyad par rtogs/ /dang po chos kun gnas bubs nyid/ /dang por mtshan cing dngos bzog dang/ /gnyis par yang dag bdan bral don/ /mtshan phyir ma skyes de bzhin nyid/ /stong pa nyid dang snang ba med/ /gnyis su
271b1(mdo 'grel): med dang mnyam pa nyid/ /ci'ang min dang smras bsams 'das/ /mi gnas mi dmigs mi rtog dang/ /mdza' bral rnam par dag pa dang/ /mtshan med smon pa med pa dang/ /chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang/ /spros bral 'gro 'ong med pa dang
271b2(mdo 'grel): snang dang 'gag med thob pa med/ /grol dang thar dang thob pa dang/ /kun rdzob don dam bden pa dang/ /ma chags pa dang rang bzhin dang/ /dngos med zhen med rigs pa dang/ /bdag med gzhan med spyod yul med/ /lta ba rig pa ye
271b3(mdo 'grel): shes sogs/ /mtshan pa'i sgra grags chos rnams kyi/ /rang rang don rnams tha dad pa/ /khyad par ma 'dres gsal bya'i phyir/ /rig pas mdo tsam phyogs brjod pa/ /dang po rgyun gyis log rtog tshos/ /bkag bsal phyogs cig ma
271b4(mdo 'grel): skyes dang/ /dri mar ma skyes mtshan mar min/ /ched du byas pa ma skyes rnams/ /skyes spong ma skyes 'dod pa yis/ /srin bu bal bzhin bcings par zad/ /ji snyed tha dad chos rnams kun/ /gnyis med blang dor med pa yis//
271b5(mdo 'grel): ltag pa mgo don mchog ni/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /dbyings phyogs ma skyes de bzhin nyid/ /rig pa nyid dang yod ye shes 'dod/ /blang dor med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med ma byas pa bcos pa/ /sma bsams 'das pa'i
271b6(mdo 'grel): gtso mtsho skyes/ de bzhin stod nyid zhen pa'ang/ /phyogs stong gsal stong la sogs las/ /rnam pa'i mchog ldan steng chen po/ /yod pa nyid ni stong pa nyid/ /yod dang med dbus smra bsams 'das/ /ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang/
271b7(mdo 'grel): byin brlabs la sogs khyad par 'phags/ /snang ba med ces brjod pa yang/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /snang la med lta bus pa med/ /phyogs cig snang med phyogs rig med/ /brdzun pa gsal ba snang med dang
272a1(mdo 'grel): snang ba dri ma med pa dang/ /mtshan snang med pa la sogs pa/ /ched byas snang rtags kun par zad/ /sna tshogs snang ba dang bcas pa'i/ /snang ba med pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /snang ba yang med dbyer med pas
272a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar snang zhes bsam du med/ /gnyis su med par bstan pa yang/ /phyogs stong gnyis med yul sems med/ /phyogs cig gi bral ba'i gnyis med pa/ /de kun gnyis pa'i gtso mchog go/ don dang 'dod pa yod phyir ro//
272a3(mdo 'grel): rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa yang/ /bya ba rnal 'byor don dam par/ /gnyis med dang du len pa'ang/ /res 'jog ltos pa'i phyogs cig pa'o/ /gnyis par grags pa'i chos so cog/ ldan bzhin gnyis su med pa yis/ /lhun grub blang
272a4(mdo 'grel): dor med pa dang/ /gzugs brnyan nor bus mtshon pa'o/ /tshe phyir mnyam nyid gsungs pa dang/ /'dra ba'i mnyam pa mi mnyam chos/ /mi mnyam bral ba'i phyogs mnyam ni/ /mnyam pa'i mdza' la gnas pas log /gsang chen
272a5(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa chen po ni/ /mi mnyam chos kun bdag nyid la/ /mnyam mi mnyam cha shas med/ /mnyam pa kun gyi yang rtse yin/ /gzhan sel don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ /ci'ang min par bka' stsal pa'ang/ /rigs pas ma yin shes
272a6(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /yin par snang la skyon lta bar/ /mdza' sel phyogs cig ma yin dang/ /dmigs pa ma yin kun kyang mdza' / /blang dor med sogs mi gsum ldan/ /ci'ang min zhes brjod pa'ang/ /ci'ang yin pa'i dngos gzhi can/ /yin men
272a7(mdo 'grel): dbyer med cha shas bral/ /phyogs su thugs pa 'di la med/ /rma bya'i mdongs rtse kha dog 'dra/ /dgos med sngon bzhin smra bsam 'das/ /bden pa phyogs cig de bzhin pa// /'khur bar chu blugs bzhin 'dod la/ /phyogs chas smra
272b1(mdo 'grel): bsam yul las 'das/ /rtog ge'i yul du da smra'o/ /mi gsum ldan pa'i don mchog ni/ /smra bsam kun dngos smra bsam dka' / /blong na yul du ma gyur las/ /nam mkha' 'di zhes dka' dang 'dra/ /log rtog phyogs rigs rnal 'byor dang/ phyogs
272b2(mdo 'grel): gsal mi gnas rten pa can/ /phyi pa'ang 'dzin pa'i gzhi can/ /gnas pa'i gtso bor bdag gi brjod/ /blang med dor med mi gnas pa/ /bsgom bya sems phyir brtan bral ba/ /gnas dang mi gnas spong len med/ /ci la'ang yid rten mi 'cha'
272b3(mdo 'grel): bas/ mi gnas nyid la gnas mi byed/ /rten dang rten can med pa ni/ /mi gnas chen po mchog yin te/ /nam mkha' lta bu rten dang bral/ /gang gi mi dmigs shes brjod pa'ang/ /log dang 'jig rten ting 'dzin dang/ /'gog gnyis phyogs cig
272b4(mdo 'grel): la gnas dang/ /dbu ma pa dag mi dmigs gsum/ /'dod las gsel ba'i dmigs pa can/ /phyogs cig rten med dmigs pa'o/ /dmigs pa kun bdag mi dmigs la/ /mtshon chen can du de brjod kyang/ /mi dmigs 'dod pa'i
272b5(mdo 'grel): chags pa med/ /dmigs spo zhe? sdang phrang dog med/ /gnyis su med par mi dmigs la/ /mkha' la 'di zhes dmigs bral 'dra'o/ /rnam par mi rtog brjod pa'ang/ /'jig rten zhen pa'i rnam mi rtog/ log par sgom pa mi rtog dang//
272b6(mdo 'grel): byis pa dag la/ sgrub mi rtog gnyis/ /phyogs 'dzin gsal ba mi rtog pa/ /rnam dag gsal ba mi rtog rnams/ /bzhi la rtog pa med smra zhing/ /mi rtog mi mthun bgegs lta bas/ /dgag sgrub blang dor byed pa de/ /nges mchog bzhi yi rtog pa
272b7(mdo 'grel): can/ thags tshon? rnam par mchog? pa/ /rtogs tshogs ming tsam ye shes phyir ? rtog pa nyid nas ma skyes bas/ /skyes brda'i 'du shes dbye ba med/ /dgag dang sgrub ma med mi rtog pa/ /mi rtog nyid duAng rtog med pas/ /me long nag
273a1(mdo 'grel): la rtog med bzhin/ /grol rtogs bya phyir mdza' bral ba/ /mdza' zhes thub par grags pa rnams/ /log pa'i mdza' gnyis bral gzugs med/ /skye 'gag cha shas bral ba dang/ /rang rig mdza' brgyad bzhi gnyis ? pha/
273a2(mdo 'grel): mdza' la skyon du rtog byed cing/ /mdza' bral yon tan len byed pa/ /ltos pas thub pa yod pa'i phyir/ /mdza' bral nyid kyang mdza' i gtso/ /kun rdzob shes yul byed pas 'khrul/ /yang dag mdza' bral shes bya ba'ang/ /mdza' brgyad
273a3(mdo 'grel): la sogs grags pa rnams/ /rang rig ye shes snang ba'i phyir/ /spros pa thugs rje'i dus nyid na/ /ming tsam der red med pa'i phyir/ /mdza' dang bral ba gnyis su med/ /sman zhes bya ba'i ga bur dus/ /gang ba'i dug dang gnyis med
273a4(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /bral rjes brjod pa de kho na/ /thug pa'i mdza' dang dbyer med la/ /gang duAng thug pa med pa'i phyir/ /mdza' bral bla mar bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor dag pa sbyad bya dag/ mthong sgom lam gyi spong bya zhing/ /sngags dang phyag rgya
273a5(mdo 'grel): spyong rim dag/ dag 'dod dri med chags pas bcings/ /thug pa'i rnam dag zhen pa can/ /rang rang kun tu btags pas non/ /'og mas smad pa'i dri ma rnams/ /dri ma nyid na rnam dag cing/ /blang dor gnyis su med pa la/ /dag dang ma
273a6(mdo 'grel): dag ris med pas/ /theg pa kun gyi yang rtse ste/ /'dam skyes pad+ma ji bzhin no/ /mchan ma med pa'i rim pa yang/ /grags pa'i mtshan med 'dod pa yis/ /spong dang spel bas phyogs cig pa/ /'du shes yul la skyon
273a7(mdo 'grel): lta shing/ /de med pa la mchog? gzhol byed/ /'dod dang zhen pa'i bzung 'dzin can/ /phyi yi bya ba rnal 'byor kyang/ /de phyogs mthun mtshan phyir na brdzun/ /mchog gi mtshan ma med ces pa/ /'du shes kun bdag rang rig
273b1(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /yul med de la 'dzin pa med/ /de nas phyogs kyi mtshan 'dzin bral/ /de bzhin smon pa med pa yang/ /blo chung ltos pa'i smon byed dang/ /bsal dang len dang smon med gsum/ /'dod pas zhen pa smon pa yin/ /smon pa kun rdzogs ?
273b2(mdo 'grel): rig nyid/ /lam dang 'bras bu dngos bzhi'i phyir/ /'phrul dga' i longs spyod tshul bzhin du/ /gzhan du re smon skye ba med/ /chos nyid dbyings shes rjod pa'ang/ /spyod yul 'di dag med stong zhing/ /gsal bral stong pa'i chos dbyings dang
273b3(mdo 'grel): rang rig dag pa'i chos nyid dang/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings sogs pas/ /zhen yul chos can mdza' las ril/ /stong nyid mu mdza' med sogs sna/ /rang rig rtags mthong dbyings shes bya/ /gsang sngags chen po'i chos nyid
273b4(mdo 'grel): dbyings/ /tshes? can ma gol dmigs pa'ang med/ /byad med byas med bslad pa'ang med/ /'di dang 'di zhes ris med pa/ /chos nyid dam pa de kho na'o/ /kun 'byung mu med brda' khyab med/ /gang yang ma spangs bkol ba med//
273b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs tshad med de blos rig med/ /de phyir gsang ba'i dbyings zhes bya/ /rnam srangs chos de nam mkha' dang/ /mthu yod phyir na nyer skyar ba'o/ /spros bral shes par bya ba'ang/ /log rtog zhen spos pa rnams/ /skyon shes sel ba'i
273b6(mdo 'grel): phyogs cig pa/ /phyogs cig spros pa'i mdza' thub bcings/ /rang rig ye shes spros pa'ang/ /spong len byed na spros pa'i mdza' / /thig le kun nas bzlum pa ltar/ /spros pa lhun 'grub spros bral ni/ /ji snyed spros pa sems nyid phyir
273b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu 'dzin med pas byang chub sems/ /ming lnga lhan pa'i ye shes ni/ /de nyid chos dbyings rang byung ste/ /mi gnas shes pa lhun 'grub pa/ /de kho de bzhin nyid dag pa'o/ /yul dang ngo bos spros med phyir/ /spros 'phrul
274a1(mdo 'grel): kun gyi slor? 'gyur yin/ /'gro ? 'od pa med pa'ang/ /zhen log 'gro 'ong dam par med/ /thun mongs phyogs cig 'ong med/ /dag dang 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med/ /'gro 'ong phyogs la smod byed cing//
274a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro 'ong med phyogs rjes 'brangs pa/ /shas bya shas byed ya cha ba/ /dam pa'i lam du gang la 'gyur/ /'gro 'od kun dang gnyis med pa'i/ /'gro 'ong med pa chen po la/ /'gro 'ong nyid na med pa'i phyir/ /'od dang mi
274a3(mdo 'grel): 'od yod med med/ /rgya mtshor 'brol ba'i 'bab chu bzhin/ /yod med mdza' yi pa med/ /rtag pa 'khrul snang log snang dang/ /phra rab stong 'khrul rnam snang dang/ /sgyu snang ltar snang rim pa dag/ long snang la sogs
274a4(mdo 'grel): 'dus snang dang/ /bdag rig rang bzhin rkyen bslangs pas/ /lhag snang 'dod pas 'khrul mthong yin/ /snang med snang ba kun bdag nyid/ /rang rig ye shes cho 'phrul ni/ /rgya mtsho chu dang brlabs bzhin bu/ /byang chub
274a5(mdo 'grel): sems nyid kun tu shar/ /'gag pa med pa'i bye brag ni/ /med na mi 'gyung 'gag med dag/ /blo bur tsam snang mi 'gog dang/ /'bras bu rdo rje'i 'gag med gnyis/ /'gag spong de dang bral 'dod na/ /'gag med
274a6(mdo 'grel): mdza' la zhen par zad/ /gnyis med 'gag ba med pa ni/ /rang byung ye shes rang snang phyir/ /'gag pa nyid na 'gag med pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur skye 'jig med/ /'dod pa zhen pa thob pa dang/ /spangs thob sbyangs thob 'grod pa dang
274a7(mdo 'grel): bdag yin las rung thob pa dag 'dod pas spangs thob phyir na rdzun/ /thob pa med pa'i thob pa ni/ /mtshan ldan long pa mig phyed bzhin/ /thabs la rten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /'bras bus shar bar zad/ /gzhi tsam nyid la spang thob med//
274b1(mdo 'grel): ched du byed pa'i thob med gnyis/ /len cing chags pa yod pa'i phyir/ /thog med zhen pa lcags sgrog can/ /bdag nyid chen po thob med ni/ /'bras bu kun bdag rang rig la/ /gnyis phyir thob bya'i chos med te/ /dbul mo gter dang gyang?
274b2(mdo 'grel): nor bzhin/ /byed pos bgrol dang skag grol dang/ /sbyangs pa grol ba phyogs cig pa/ /thun mongs min pa'i ltas grol ba/ /'ching grol gnyis su ltas pas bcings/ /bdag nyid chen por dbyer med pa/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings?
274b3(mdo 'grel): med te/ /bcings par bya ba med gnyis grol/ /mkha' la 'dud med ji lta bu'o/ /ma rigs nyon mongs las sdug bsngal/ /chu bo bzhi las thar pa'ang/ /shin tu ring dang rgyud pa dang/ /bkag spangs gsal bas thar pa dang/ /zil
274b4(mdo 'grel): gnon sbyor bas thar 'dod pa/ /'dod pa'i rgya mtshor chung pA'i/ /rtsol ba'i chu rgyun phyogs cha khyer/ /mchog dang 'di? ba'i log lta can/ /chu bo bzhi nyid lam 'bras phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi/ /chu bo nyid la rol spyod pas//
274b5(mdo 'grel): brgal ba med par rnam par thar/ /chu la nya chen 'phyo ba 'am?/ /sman sngags ldan pa'i dug nad 'dra'o/ /log pa'i kun rdzob rnam gnyis dang/ /'khrul pa gzhan dbang kun rdzob rnams/ /rigs pa bzhis bcus bden lta ba'ang/ /yon tan
274b6(mdo 'grel): brlabs 'byung lha yi 'khor/ /tshul mthun rigs pas 'bras pur lta/ /ltag pa kun rdzob don dam gnyis/ /bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /thun mongs don dam bye brag kyang/ /bshad pa cha yis shes par bya/ /rgya mtsho
274b7(mdo 'grel): dad par gza' skar bzhin/ bden gnyis snang stong dbyer med pa/ /phyogs blta'i mthar thug med pa ni/ /de ka rang bzhin rgyud nyid do/ zhen pa'i yul la ma chags pa'ang/ /tshim dang snying po bar chad sogs/ /chags med 'khrul
275a1(mdo 'grel): dang log pa dang/ /bkag spangs phyogs cig chags pa dang/ /bzlog dang btang snyoms chags med dang/ /bzhi po chags med chags pas bcings/ /chags med blang dor med pa ni/ /chags pa nyid na chags
275a2(mdo 'grel): med pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gdeng ldan pas/ /pad+ma la ni bzhin no/ /kun rtags rang bzhin chos rnams ni/ /rgyud spangs phyogs cig rang bzhin med/ /phyogs cig mdza' yi rang bzhin dang/ /chos nyid mtshan nyid la sogs

275a4(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de bzhin dngos po med pa dang/ /zhen pa med cing grags pa rnams/ /ye med snga la gcig med gcig la gcig/ med dang zhig med 'dod lta ba/ /bzhi la gnyis pa med 'dod pa/ /mi srid bzhi yi dpes mtshon par//
275a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa snang ris mi mthun par/ /lta ba sngon bzhin rgyu rim bzhin/ /de nyid 'bras lta'i rim pa gnyis/ /drug po 'das pa'i mthar zhen cing/ /phyogs cig gzhi la gang lta ba/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i bzhi mi rung/ /de ngas mar me
275a6(mdo 'grel): gsal dus na/ /mun pa ma song sgrol med de/ /gsal nyid gnyis su med par lta/ /dngos zhen ma rig ye shes pa/ /spangs dang mi gnas 'gal pa med/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/ /dngos gnyis lhun grub cir yang
275a7(mdo 'grel): snang/ /chos kun gzhi zhes de phyir bya'o/ / ` rdzun la sogs pa'i rig pa ni/ /rgyu yi gzhi 'dod bden lta ba/ /phyogs cig yin gyi nges 'jog/ 'byung ba'i gzhi rtsar the tshom med/ /thams cad yi nas dbyer med la/
275b1(mdo 'grel): rigs dang ma rigs blang dor med/ /gnyis med ston pa'i lung man ngag/ rigs pas 'tsham pa go 'byed pa/ /dpa' bo'i lag cha ji bzhin du/ /rnam grangs kun kyang rtogs pa'i thabs/ /rig pa med kyang thabs kyis mchog/ yin min chos
275b2(mdo 'grel): la rtsod mi byed/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /dngos lta'i bdag med nyan thos pas/ /phyogs tsam stong pa'i chos bdag med/ /rgyun snang don 'gog bdag med dang/ /gsal ba phyogs cig bdag med dang/ /rigs snang bdag med ye shes
275b3(mdo 'grel): snang/ /gsum gnyis spong len byed pa'i phyir/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin/ /phyogs bcu rang byung ye shes la/ /rang byung 'di 'dra'i dngos med pas/ /chos rang gang zag yod ma yin/ /la lar nyi ma'ang mun rkyen ltar/ /bdag
275b4(mdo 'grel): med ye shes bdag kun ldan/ /gnyis med bdag med bdag nyid che/ /med mthar thug pa 'di la med/ /gzhan med spyod yul med pa yang/ /pra bas gzhan pa'i yor bo med/ /zab pas rtags pa'i dpyod byed med/ /gzhan pa stong pas
275b5(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ /'khrul pas med pa'i rdzun pas med/ /rig phyir med dang ye shes phyir/ /gzhan med pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de bral 'dod phyir lcags kyi dkris/ /sngon bzhin thams cad ye shes la/ /ngo bo cig phyir cha shas med/ gcig mdza' 
275b6(mdo 'grel): med pas kun tu shar/ /gnyis su med pas lung gsum med/ /de la smras bsam med pa'i phyir/ /bzung 'dzin lcags kyis sdams pa med/ /lha rig gnyis kyi sngon brjod pa/ /'dod pa tha dang yul mthong ba'o/ /shes rab spyan gyi ngo bo ste/
275b7(mdo 'grel): khyad par bshad pa nyid du zad/ /mthong ba'i lam du cig smra ba'ang/ /bshes gnyen rkyen brad sngags mthong gi/ de med rang gi mngon shes kyis/ /mthong na bcu pa'ang thob par rigs/ /lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba'i phyir/ /las? 
276a1(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras bu'i khyad par che'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes la/ /bcu drug gnyis su 'dod pa dang/ /bzhi dang gnyis su gnas 'gyur 'dod/ /rig pa bzhi dang lngar 'dod pa/ /rang rang rtags ba'i don
276a2(mdo 'grel): mthong phyir/ /mun pa'i rab mchog yin zhes brjod/ /brgyad drug tshogs bzhi snang bcas pa/ /dpyod yul dngos po snang ngo cog/ rigs pas dbang bsgyur bzhin snang dang/ /so so'i ji ltar brtags snang dang/ /
276a3(mdo 'grel): ngo bos nges pa red med phyir/ /sems nyid 'ba' zhig snang ba yang/ /'khrul dus rang bzhin ma 'khrul dang/ /so so shes pa brgyad chos phyir/ /ming gsum ldan pa'i shes cig ste/ /gcig dang du ma kun dngos bas/
276a4(mdo 'grel): ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid pa/ /cha yi lnga dang brgyad brjod pa/ /rtsa ba rang byung ye shes so/ /ye nas shes pa'i bdag nyid bas/ /me long lta ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /snang stong chos su grags pa kun/ /kha dog dbyibs
276a5(mdo 'grel): sogs rang snang ba'o/ /rtag chad phyin ci log pa'i grangs/ /dngos dang ther zug skad cig rgyun/ /mi nyams ngo bo nyid rtag pa/ /tha ma theg mchog bzhed kun dang/ /zhig med ye nas chad pa dang/ /rkyen gyi rang chad la
276a6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa/ med bzhin sngon bzhin bsungs pa yang/ /ched du byas ba'i rtag snang zad/ /sum cu brgyad sogs mdza' rnams la/ /spong len bral 'dod zhen chags can/ /bdag med smra ba'i blang dor mkhan/ /blang
276a7(mdo 'grel): dor mdza' la mkhan po gnas/ /mchog 'dir mdza' yi grangs de'ang/ /'du shes bzlog phyir brjod pa las/ /de dag nyid du 'dod pa med/ /sems phyir mi spong rkun bu yang/ /so so phyogs kyi ma reg pas//
276b1(mdo 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bo la/ /thams cad dag ces bya ba yang/ /dngos po bsal dag ma yin te/ /snang sbyod nyid na rnam par dag/ de phyir lhag pa zhes su brjod/ /rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad
276b2(mdo 'grel): kun/ /ngo ngo cig pa'i de kho na/ /de ni cig gi mthar thug 'gyur/ /cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid/ /bcos med nges pa'i de kho na/ /lhag pa'i ye shes sgyu ma de/ /byas 'gro med par ci yang 'khrul/ /nam mkha' i tshe 'phrul mtshan bas/
276b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /snang ba'i dus na snang med te/ /dbyer med pa la rim mi phyad/ /de phyir cig ces mtshon thabs brjod/ /de kho 'dra ba'i mchog yin no/ /tha dang spong ba'i cig 'dod pa/ /gcig gi mdza' la zhen pas nor/ /dag pa'i 'og tu gcig pa
276b4(mdo 'grel): las/ /ma dag blo bur snang 'dod pa/ /sa bon med ba'i 'bras 'dod pa/ /sab rta tho mi thag sbrul ltar/ /smig rgyu chu zla ltar med bas/ /snang zhes rigs pas bsgrub pa yang/ /'khrul te de na ri bong ?Ang/ /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med//
276b5(mdo 'grel): gzhi la 'dra 'khrul chos yod phyir/ /'di 'dra 'khrul pa'i chos med ltar/ /lhun 'grub dbyer med dang las snang/ /'khor 'das snang yang grub pa med/ /yod pa sun 'byin chos 'di la/ /med par smra ba byis ba'i blo/ /med par sun
276b6(mdo 'grel): 'byin chos dag la/ /yod lta yin zhes smra ba'ang log/ dbus 'dzin sun 'byin chos dag la/ cig tu lta bur byed ba'ang 'khrul/ /mdza' bral 'dzin pa sun 'byin pa/ /dri mas bgos 'dra nor pa'i mig /kun gyi 'byung gnas byed
276b7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de yis ma byas gang yang med/ /kha dog dbyibs rigs kun dngos dang/ /la dog dbyibs rigs gang yang men/ /shin tu rtag dka' sus mi rig/ rig med dang las thams cad snang/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni
277a1(mdo 'grel): skad cig kun dngos rgyud med phyir/ /gang nas ma 'ong gar mi 'gro/ rtog med rang rig kho na'o/ /shes byar gyur ba'i chos so cog/ rig pa ye nas rang gsal phyir/ /rang rig shes bya dmigs skye med/ /dngos
277a2(mdo 'grel): yul tsam yang 'dod ma yin/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le ni/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /kha dog gnas dbyibs ris yod min/ /yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/ /rtog ge'i sbyod yul de ma yin/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid
277a3(mdo 'grel): ji lta bu/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/ /gnyis phyir min zhes brjod ba las/ /phyogs cig min pa smra? brjod 'das/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma rtogs pa/ /chos kyi dang la tshig med brjod med pa'ang/ /spangs
277a4(mdo 'grel): bsal med phyogs log gsum blta ba ste/ /rang bzhin ngo bo mtshan nyid mchog/ las gol ba ni/ /'og mas spangs pa'i log ltog grangs/ /mdza' yas mi spong rang rig phyir/ /len pa'i chos rnams blang du med/ /blang dor med pa'i don mchog
277a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ zhen bral mdza' 'das 'ching khrol sogs/ /blang bya kun gyi mchog yin te/ /de nyid bdag yin bla med pa/ /nyams su blang ba'i thabs mchog yin/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med te/ /bcings par bya ba yod ma yin/ /bcings
277a6(mdo 'grel): med rnam par grol med ba'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/ /bden gsum don kyang de ltar snang/ /don du bden dang mi bden zhes/ /gnyis pa'i rtog pa dang gis med/ /de mthong shes rab mchog gi
277a7(mdo 'grel): spyan/ /dmigs pa'i yul gyis lta 'dod pa/ /bzung 'dzin lam du zhugs pa'i phyir/ /nam yang lhag pa'i don mi mthong/ /rtog pa'i yid dang rdo rje'i yid/ /snga ma mi spong mi len te/ /de sogs brgyad po'i rigs med phyir/ /brgyad bzhi'i/
277b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams cig yin te/ /rang rig cho gas cig dbang drug mchog/ so so'i rgyud du dbyer med te/ /rtags pas mdza' snyad snang dus na/ /ngo bos cig pa rdo rje yin/ /yul med rang gsal shes rab spyan/ /shes pa spyod yul gnyis su med//
277b2(mdo 'grel): shes dang shes par bya med pa'i/ /ye shes sgron me sbreng bar ni/ /rgyu med rgyun tu rang shar bas/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab can/ /go tshim myong dag rig soD chos/ /ming grangs drug
277b3(mdo 'grel): bzhi gnyis su grangs/ /de ltar nges pa'i lta ba la zhen pa'i lam du 'gro sa med/ /'jug pa'i dus na gcig po nyid/ /nges par rang gsal mi g.yo la/ /rtog ge bdag de lta na/ /phogs dang yon tan dgag 'gyur zhes/ /som gnyis za
277b4(mdo 'grel): zhing yul min pas/ /gnyis su bslabs pa gces bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ /blo tsal rab kyis rtogs 'gyur cing/ /brjod bzhin shes pa des skye phyir/ /zab brjod zab mor nges bar skye/ /zab mo'i tshe na blo can gyis
277b5(mdo 'grel): rang gi mtshon nyid mngon rtogs phyir/ /'dod pa med par zhor bogs sogs/ /'byung ba nyid na g.yos pa med/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab lam rim par mngon byas stobs 'gyur na/ /dbags bsam shing dang rin chen ltar/ ngo
277b6(mdo 'grel): mchar rmad 'byung 'bras bu lnga/ /gzhan nas yod 'od ma yin te/ /thabs la rten shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i dang du 'byung/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya/ /rigs 'dzin gsum pa'i gang de nyid/ /srid pa tha ma mdzad rdzogs
277b7(mdo 'grel): pas/ /de la dbang bskur mngon sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje 'dzin par the tshom med/ /skal pa snod shes dang rtson shes/ /mchog rnams kun gyis rtag bya bgyis/ /de bzlog yul min sgro bkur la/ /ming tsam don phyir bstan mi bya/ /skal
278a1(mdo 'grel): mun nang gi rin chen nor/ /sgron mes brnyed 'gyur dbul sel ltar/ /skal pa thugs kyi rin chen nor/ /ston tshig sgron ma 'di brnyed bgog/ thugs kyi sgron ma dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
278a2(mdo 'grel): lta ba yang dag sgron ma bzhugs so// dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i 'od stong gis/ /shin tu 'bar ba'i zer tsam bdag blo mun par byung/ /dbyangs dang chig 'das nam mkha' i mtshan nyid las 'das ba'i rang sems skyed med zab mo'i don gyi phyogs
278a3(mdo 'grel): tsam snang/ /rang gis rtogs pas mkhas pas gsungs pa'i rnam mang ba/ /rtog ge bdag 'dra'i spyod yul rtsam par mi 'os kyang/ /rig pa'i brjed dbyangs tsam 'di nges don mos rnams kyis/ /chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis dpyad cing
278a4(mdo 'grel): goms par bya/ /skal ba mang por rgyal ba rnams la ni/ /dge rtsa bskyed cing rang sems sbyangs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor dam pa nges pa'i lung tshan la/ /shes rab mtsho ka ldan rig pa'i mos blo gsal/ /rnam par mi rtag don dam
278a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyi/ /rig pa'i chul chen sems kyis dmigs ba ni/ /lung dang man dag rigs bas thab?/ gcad te/ /chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid ches bya/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du/ /ming dang tshig gis brjod
