278a6(mdo 'grel): par byed mod kyi/ /mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyi yul las 'das/ /ji ltar mig rgyu'i phung po snang ba dag/ snang ba nyid na nam mkha' i rang bzhin ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams su sna tshogs
278a7(mdo 'grel): snang ltar snang ba yang/ /snang ba nyid na mtshan ma nam mkha' bzhin/ /rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/ /don dam dmigs med spros pa kun las 'das/ /bdag dang chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi/ /dbu ma'i don can blo
278b1(mdo 'grel): yi rting du go bar byos/ /yang dag don dam gcig car go nas ni/ /yod med la sogs sems kyi yul 'das shing/ /re dang dgos pa'i mdza' ni rab spangs nas/ /brtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad yod
278b2(mdo 'grel): nas ro cig phyar/ /bsgom pa dang ni bskam bya'ang dmigs su med/ /sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos/ /rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal dag/ sad par gyur na rang bzhin mnyam pa
278b3(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /rnam par rtag dang mi rtog gnyis ka yang/ /shes pas rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /de ltar dus gsum rnam par dag pa dag/ rang bzhin nyid las ma 'das shes na ni/ /sgro 'dogs bus pa'i rjes su ma 'byungs na/ /rang
278b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du yod gis bcos mi dgos/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes sems kyis ni/ /ma skyes de nyid bsgom par gal 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dang gnyan po
278b5(mdo 'grel): dbyed med don/ /rang gi shes na rtsol pa kun spangs te/ /btang snyoms chen por ma bcos rang bzhag na/ /tha snyad tsam du 'ang bsgom zhes de la bya/ /skyon dang yon tan gnyis po ma skyes phyir/ /rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung yang/ /
278b6(mdo 'grel): ma bkag rang byung ma 'brangs rang zhi te/ /ma bcos ma byas rang gi dang gis gsal/ /lta ba yang dag sgran ma rdzogs so/ /Atsarya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// * //mdza' i mun sal sgron ma// */ /chos rnams
278b7(mdo 'grel): sems kyi 'khrul ba ste/ /sems las ma rtogs chos rnams med/ /chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/ /rten 'brel sgyu ma skye ba med/ /skye ba med ces bstan pa'ang/ /dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir te/ /sgyu ma ye nas skyed
279a1(mdo 'grel): med la/ /skye med snyad kyi sgra mi gdags/ /nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes/ /blun po gang zhig rtog bar byed/ /mkhas pa sngon nas yod mi 'dzin/ /med par mi rtog tshig mi brjod/ /sems las ma rtoD chos med phyir/ bsgom bya'i chos
279a2(mdo 'grel): nyid gud na med/ /sems kyang ye nas ma skyes na/ /bsgom pa po'ang gang la yod/ /brjod pa'i rtsa ba sems nyid ni/ /ma skyes dngos gzhi yod min na/ /bsgom dang bsgom du med pa yi/ /tha snyad gang zhig gang la 'jug/ 'gro la sems
279a3(mdo 'grel): rgyud gnyis mi 'chad/ /de ni ma skyes rang mi dmigs/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems med phyir/ /bcos shing gnas pa gang zhig yod/ /'khrul rtog rkyen dang ldan gyi bar/ /dmigs rgyu bzhin du sems snang na/ /ring bzhin shes pas
279a4(mdo 'grel): bcos su med/ /mi shes dmigs rgyu bcos pa bzhin/ /mi rtog mtshan med sems rnams kyis/ /ma rtogs mtshan ma med la'ang gnas mkhyed/ /mtshan ma med la mi gnas na/ /mtshan mar gnas pa smos ci dgos/ bsgrub pa med
279a5(mdo 'grel): cing gnas pa med/ /'du byed med pa mkha' 'dra bas/ /'du byed las byung bsam gtan skyon/ /ma lus kun gyis gos pa med/ /ji ltar rtog med zab mo zhig/ blo yi yul du snang zhe na/ /mi rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ga/ myong ba
279a6(mdo 'grel): yin phyir de nyid min/ /lta ba dgum chung/ /mdza' i mun sel sgron ma/ /bod kyi paN+Di ta Atsar bsnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o/ /thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs so/ /dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar thugs chud pa'i/ /chos
279a7(mdo 'grel): kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ma thob thob phyir brtson par mi byed kyang/ /snying rje'i bye brag thabs kyi spyod pa'ang ston/ /ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' mtshon rnam mang yang/ /nam mkha' i dang du ro cig bye brag med/ /de bzhin rgyal
279b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i gzugs sku rnam mang yang/ /ye shes dbyings su ro cig bye brag med/ /bde gshegs snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /yun ring dus nas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems rgyud so sor snang/ /rang bzhin nyid ni?
279b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i chos skur cig/ ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ /log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems can gnyis/ /ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang/ /snyam yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /sems can sangs
279b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas bden par tshul cig cing/ /rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na/ /gzhan nas bsgrub par bya ba ci yang med/ /de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na/ /ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye//
279b4(mdo 'grel): snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phan 'dogs thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji lta ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gnas med de ltar bsgom/ /thugs rje'i 'bar ba rab 'byams ji lta ba/ /rnal 'byor thabs
279b5(mdo 'grel): kyi ting 'dzin de ltar sprul/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/ /pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs par ldan/ /thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang/ /sgyu ma'i blo ldan rlam sems ci yang med/ /ma skyes sems
279b6(mdo 'grel): la sems can med pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku'i nga rgyal 'chang/ /chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba'i phyir/ /ting 'dzin sgyu mas ci 'dus de ltar ston/ /chos sku mnyam nyid rtogs nas ? don du/ /bde gshegs phyin brlabs
279b7(mdo 'grel): cing yang ston pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chos sku rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thabs kyi bye brag da nas de ltar brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //
280a1(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma bzhugs// ji bzhin pa yi chos brtsan par/ /chos la chos ni mi 'jug te/ /ji tsam zab pa'i tshig brjod kyang/ /don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems ni
280a2(mdo 'grel): ci la'ang mi gnas dang/ /ci la'ang mi dmigs shes bya ba/ /sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel pa'i/ /sems 'dzin phra mo de la yod/ /dmigs rgyu bzhin du sems med na/ /mi gnas mi dmigs byed pa gang/ /nam mkha' rang la'ang
280a3(mdo 'grel): mi gnas shes/ /bsgom pa don dang ldan ma yin/ /de bzhin skyil krungs drang 'dug dang/ /lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang/ /lus rtog mngon par zhen las byung/ /lus med mkha' la bcos su med/ /sgyu ma bzhin du lus shes
280a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /drang 'dug skyil krung 'cha' ba med/ /spyod lam gsum gyis gnas pa gang/ /ched du bya med byed pa'ang med/ /lus sems? sam skyes gzhi med pa/ /mkha' ltar bcos pa'i kha na med/ /tshad mar lus sems 'chos
280a5(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /'dzin pa'i phur pa de la yod/ /ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha' ni/ /dmigs dang dmigs med brtsol dang bral/ /de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha' yang/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o/ /lus la sogs kyang de bzhin
280a6(mdo 'grel): teD? brtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang/ /gnas pa med de mi gnas na/ /mi 'gal tsam du gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin bsgom thabs rdzogs so// //man dag dgu ma chung/ /
280a7(mdo 'grel): gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //lta rin sgron ma bzhugs so/ /gnod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam/ /rig dang gti mug sgyu ma'i khyad par las/ /srid
280b1(mdo 'grel): dang rnam grol rgyu dang 'bras bur snang/ /dngos po med phyir dngos por rtog pa'ang med/ /chos can mi dmigs chos nyid yod ma yin/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma gtogs pa/ /chos kyi dang la tshig med brjod du med/ snang
280b2(mdo 'grel): ba nyid na med pa'i dmig rgyu la/ /shes ldan rnams ni med pa'i blo mi 'byung/ /chos rnams rang bzhin ma skyes rtogs pa yi/ /mkhas pas skye med stong par sgro mi 'dogs/ /ji bzhin ma skyes gdod nas zhi ba yi/ /gnyis med
280b3(mdo 'grel): spros bral rang rig blo ldan pa/ /brjod med dang tsam du yang mi gnas na/ /dngos dang tha snyad 'dzin par ga la 'gyur/ /bdag med chos sku byang chub snying po bas/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing thob pa ma yin yang/ /rmi lam sad nas
280b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang bral ba bzhin/ /sgrib spangs byang chub thob ces rgyal bas gsungs/ /rmi lam skyes bus dug 'thungs gri bzhin du/ /srid rgyu nyon mongs las rnams de ltar shes/ /rmi lam dug nad sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ skye
280b5(mdo 'grel): rgas na 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin/ /rmi lam nad sel sman dang 'dra ba ni/ /'phags lam rnam thar mang por rig par bya/ /sdug bsngal khang kyis 'byang ba'i skad cig ma/ /shes rab ting 'dzin khyad par skye ba'i tshul/ rmi lam nad
280b6(mdo 'grel): bsal sos pa'i bde snyed pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub thob pa'i dpe/ /rmi lam nyid na rgyu 'bras mi bslu bzhin/ /ma rig gnyid log rnams la de ltar nges/ /rmongs pa'i gnyid sad shes rab ldan pa dang/ /'khor ba rmi lam lta
280b7(mdo 'grel): du'i dbang tsam du/ /'phags lam don brtson 'bras bu rag par gsal/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur thob pa'i brlom sems med/ mnyam pa'i don nyid blo dang ma mnyam na/ /tshig gi mnyam pas rtog pa'i klung mi bzlogs/ /dmyal sogs 'khor
281a1(mdo 'grel): pa mnyam las ma g.yos kyang/ /sdug bsngal mi zad srid las 'byam?/ /ye nas rnam dag thob la med rig nas shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor rab brtson zhing/ /sku gsung che ba'i yon tan kun bsdus bas/ /mtshan ma'i nyes dang
281a2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa ga la yin/ /shes par mchog gis log rtog sems sbyangs nas/ /ye shes tshogs chen rgyal ba chos kyi sku/ dpe byad mtshan kyis rting 'dzin dbang thob nas/ /bsod nams tshogs chen rgyal ba gzugs kyi sku/ /rnam smin tshul gyis
281a3(mdo 'grel): grub par mi lta zhing/ /ye shes gzhan nas thob par mi byed de/ sku gsum ji bzhin sbyor bas 'bras bu'i mchog/ brtsal byas bsgrub pa'i dbang gi rgyu yang yin/ /rang sems rnal 'byor shes rab ting 'dzin yin/ /sems can nyid na bde gshegs
281a4(mdo 'grel): yul la 'jug/ dag pa'i zhing du smon par mi byed te/ /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su bsgom/ /shes rab gnas med chags pa'i rdul bral yang/ /snying rje sems can khams la skyob med/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma 'gags mngon
281a5(mdo 'grel): sum te/ mtshan med ro cig don dam dbyings su rtogs/ /slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/ lta ba rin po che sgron ma rdzogs so/ //'phags pa bzang po sbyod pa'i smon lam bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ arya bta dra tsarya pra ni d+hA na rA dza/ bod
281a6(mdo 'grel): skad du /'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ /
281a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la/ /lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /bzang po sbyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba thams cad yid kyi mngon sum du/ /zhing gi rdul snyed lus rdabs tu
281b1(mdo 'grel): tud pa yis/ /rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul cig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /thams cad rgyal ba dag gis
281b2(mdo 'grel): gang bar mos/ /de dag bsngags pa mi bzad rgya mtsho rnams/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ /me tog dam pa
281b3(mdo 'grel): phreng ba dam pa dang/ sal snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang/ /mar me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang/ /phye ma'i phur ma ri rab
281b4(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa dang/ /bkod pas khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /mchod pa gang rnams bla mang rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos/ /bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag
281b5(mdo 'grel): gis/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang/ /sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis
281b6(mdo 'grel): so sor bshags/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/ /rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang/ /de dag kun kyi rjes su bdag yi rang/ /gang rnams phyogs
281b7(mdo 'grel): bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/ /mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ /'khor lo bla na med pa bskar bar bskul/ /mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dga' / /'gro ba
282a1(mdo 'grel): ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang/ /bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang bskul
282a2(mdo 'grel): zhing gsol ba yi/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/ /gang yang ma byin de dag rab
282a3(mdo 'grel): myur bar/ /bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas sbyon/ /phyogs bcu gang gA'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi rab tu gang
282a4(mdo 'grel): bar shog phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur/ /'gro ba kun kyi chos kyi don rnams ni/ /mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog/ /byang chub sbyod pa dag ni bdag spyod
282a5(mdo 'grel): cing/ /'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur/ /tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na/ /rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/ /bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing/ /chul khrims
282a6(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ /rtag tu mnyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ /grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang/ /'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par/ /thams cad
282a7(mdo 'grel): skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ /byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur/ /sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur ba dag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang
282b1(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/ /grol shing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang/ /ji ltar pad+ma chus ma tshigs pa bzhin/ /nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar sbyad/ /zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ /ngan song sdug bsngal rab
282b2(mdo 'grel): tu zhi bar byed/ /bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun dgod cing/ /'gro ba thams cad dag las phan par spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod dang mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod ba dag ni rab ston cing/ /ma 'ong
282b3(mdo 'grel): bskal pa kun tu spyod par 'gyur/ /bdag gi sbyod dang mthun par gang spyod pa/ /de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang/ /spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ /bdag la phan par
282b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ /de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nam yang yang mi 'byung/ /sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ /mngon sum rtag tu bdag
282b5(mdo 'grel): gi rgyal ba lta/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing/ /byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/ /bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyad ba yang/ /ma 'ongs
282b6(mdo 'grel): bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ /srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor pa na/ /bsod nams me shes dag ni mi zad rnyed/ /thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang/ /yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ /rdul cig steng na rdul skyed zhing
282b7(mdo 'grel): rnams te/ /zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyis dbus na bzhugs pa la/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi/ /de dag ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang/ /skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad
283a1(mdo 'grel): snyed? kyi/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang/ /bskal pa rgya mtshar spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/ /rgya ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ?
283a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin dbyangs/ /sangs rgyas gsungs la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi/ /de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la/ /blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab
283a3(mdo 'grel): tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang/ /skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ /gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi
283a4(mdo 'grel): mi yi seng+ge gang/ /de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ /rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ /sgyu mar gyur ba'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug de dag dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa/ /de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub//
283a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ /de dag rim par 'chad rgya 'khor lo bskor/ /mya ngan 'das ba rab tu zhi mdza' ston/ /mgon po kun
283a6(mdo 'grel): gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/ /kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang/ /kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang/ /kun du yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang/ /kun du khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/ /kun nas dge ba'i bsod
283a7(mdo 'grel): nams stobs rnams dang/ /chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ /shes rab stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ /byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed/ /las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing/ /nyon mongs stobs
283b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ /bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing/ /bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing/ /sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par dgrol/ /chos rnams
283b2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing/ /smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing/ /bskal ba rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad
283b3(mdo 'grel): par bgyi/ /gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ /bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thub pa/ /gang
283b4(mdo 'grel): gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /mkhas pa de dang mtshungs pa spyad ba'i phyir/ /dge ba ni? dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing/ /spyod ba rnams dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang/ /bsngo ba bzang po mkhas
283b5(mdo 'grel): pa ci 'dra bar/ /de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du mi skyo bar/ /de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /spyod
283b6(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa chad med pa la gnas nas kyang/ /de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ /nam mkha' i mthar thug gyur ba ji tsam par/ /sems can ma
283b7(mdo 'grel): lus mdza' yang de bzhin te/ /ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur ba/ /bdag gi smon lam mdza' yang de tsam mo/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mdza' yas pa/ /rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul/ /lha dang mi
284a1(mdo 'grel): yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang/ /zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas/ /gang gis sngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ /byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing/ /lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni/ /bsod nams dam
284a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pas/ /des ni ngan song thams cad spangs bar 'gyur/ /des ni grogs bo ngan pa spangs pa yin/ /snang ba mdza' yas de yang de yang de myur mthong/ /de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/ /mi
284a3(mdo 'grel): tshe 'dir yang de dag legs bar 'od/ /kun du bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar/ /de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga bo dag gi sdig pa rnams/ /gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di
284a4(mdo 'grel): brjod na/ /myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ /ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mchan rnams dang/ /rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub/ /'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod
284a5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro/ song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul/ /gang yang bzang po spyod
284a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i smon lam 'di/ /'chad ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yis/ /de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /byang chub mchog la som nyis ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang/ /kun tu bzang po de yang
284a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin te/ de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing/ /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun
284b1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur ba na/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te/ /mngon sum snang ba mdza' yas de mthong nas/ /bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der sor nas ni smon lam 'di
284b2(mdo 'grel): dag kyang/ thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang/ /'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/ /pad+ma dam pa shin tu mdzes las skye//
284b3(mdo 'grel): snang ba mdza' yas rgyal ba'i mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ /sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /blo yi stobs kyi phyogs bcu rnams su yang/ /sems can rnams la
284b4(mdo 'grel): phan pa mang pa bgyi/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor bar shog/ bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bsdos
284b5(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /bsod nams dam ba mdza' yas gang thob des/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog/ smon lam rgyal po 'di dag mchog gi gtso/ /mdza' yas 'gro ba kun la phan byed cing/
284b6(mdo 'grel): kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub cing/ /ngan song rgyud rnams ma lus stongs par shog/ 'phags pa bzang po sbyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ /'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam bzhugs so// //sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang
284b7(mdo 'grel): srong lha mig ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang/ /nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing/ /mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/ /rga shi med bar 'dren gyid pa/ /byang chub sems la
285a1(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi/ /bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis/ /bsod nams
285a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs ni skyes pa ste/ /bdag gis kun mkhyen sa bon te ? bdag ni byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa yi rang bas/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ro/ /sdig pa
285a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la yid ngo/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang
285a4(mdo 'grel): chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'debs/ /byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing/ /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /tshos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni//
285a5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog/ bskal ba bye ba bsam yas su/ /chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing/ /sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/ /'ching ba kun gyi bcings bdag la/ /rkang gnyis
285a6(mdo 'grel): mchog gis gziD su gsol/ sems kyi dri mar bgyis pa la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang/ /gang dag
285a7(mdo 'grel): 'das dang ma byon pa/ de dag rjes su bdag slob cing/ /byang chub sbyad pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/ /'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/ /bla med byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma
285b1(mdo 'grel): skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang/ /rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/ /stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltang/ /sems can ma mchis srog ma mi chis/ /gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/ /bdag
285b2(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi/ /dngos po kun la mi gnas bar/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dgos po ma mchis pas/ /bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog/ dngos po thams
285b3(mdo 'grel): cad rnam 'jig pas/ /spyin ba'i pha rol byin rdzogs shog/ khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/ /rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa'am
285b4(mdo 'grel): yang na chu 'am me/ /rlung gi khams lhar mi gnas shig/ bzod pa 'am khro ba ma mchis par/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i lus
285b5(mdo 'grel): sems kyis/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzegs shog sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang
285b6(mdo 'grel): yang?/ /rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa dang/ /'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i brtson 'grus kyis/ /bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/
285b7(mdo 'grel): de ltar spyad pa spyod med cing/ /byams pa klags dang ldan pa yis?/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/ /sa bcu po la rab tu gnas/ /'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang pa'i smon lam bzhugs so //
286a1(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stor gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang/ /dbul pa'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bshog/
286a2(mdo 'grel): rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang dral bar shog /ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan
286a3(mdo 'grel): kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /rnga bo che yis sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad tshangs ba'i sgra ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog re gshog/
286a4(mdo 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos ? ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/
286a5(mdo 'grel): sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te/ /rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen sgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can gyi tshe rabs brgya dag dang/ /tshe rabs stong
286a6(mdo 'grel): phrag bye bar skyo dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing/ /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis mi/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong par
286a7(mdo 'grel): shog /bya ba dge pa rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ rnga bo cha yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cing/ /sems can gang dag sems dmyal
286b1(mdo 'grel): mi zad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab? tu 'bar/ /skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa/ /me rnams ma lus rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dags mi yi 'jig rten na/ /sems can sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po gang/ /rnga po che yis sgra skad ?
286b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang/ /skyabs med par ni gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyobs pa dang/ /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cing/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dampa dag/ thugs rtse thugs rje ldan pa'i
286b3(mdo 'grel): thugs/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag gi sngon chad sdig pa'i las/ /shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /pha ma
286b4(mdo 'grel): dag tu mi 'dzin dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang/ /dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang/ /phyugs pa'i rgyags pas dwegs pa dang/ /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang/ /gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa
286b5(mdo 'grel): yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang/ /nyes sam nyes par smras pa dang/ /nyes pas bgyis pa'i las rnams dang /nyis? pa'i dmigs su ma bltas pas/ /bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyi dang/ /byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang/ /mi shes mun pa'i
286b6(mdo 'grel): sems dang ni/ /sdig pa'i grogs bo'i dbang gyur dang/ /nyon mongs rnam par 'khrugs sems dang/ /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang/ /mya ngan dang na nid dbang dang/ /nor gyis mi chag nyes pa yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang//
286b7(mdo 'grel): 'phags smin skye bo 'dre ba dang/ /phrag dog ser sna'i sgyu dang ni/ /g.yo dang dbul pa'i nyes pa yi/ /bdag gis sdig ba gang bgyis dang/ /phongs pa byung ba'i dus gyi che/ /'dod pa rnams dang 'jig rgyu dang/ ? po ma yin gyur pa yi/ /bdag gi ?
287a1(mdo 'grel): pa gang bgyis dang/ /g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang/ /'dod dang khro ba'i dbang nyid dang/ /bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang/ /bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang/ /bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir nyon
287a2(mdo 'grel): mongs gdung pa sna tshogs kyi/ /bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang/ /lus dang dag dang yid kyi sdig gnyis par spyad pa rnam pa gsum bsags/ /'di 'dwi'i tshul gyis gang bgyis ga /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang
287a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang/ /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang/ /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad
287a4(mdo 'grel): bdag 'chags so/ /dam chos smra ba rnams la yang/ /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang/ /chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /gdag gi rtag tu mi shes pas/ /dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang/ /pha ma rnams la
287a5(mdo 'grel): ma gus gang/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /blun pa dang ni byis pa dang/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten du/ /stobs bcu rnams
287a6(mdo 'grel): la mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/ /sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang/ /thams cad de bzhin gshegs
287a7(mdo 'grel): gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/ /de kun thar bgyis nus srid kyi/ /sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/ /bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog /gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ /las rnams thams cad byang byed pa/ /zab mo dag ni ston
287b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ /sems can de dag ston gyur cig/ gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzang bgyis/ /lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/ /de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams/ /myur du yang dag zad 'gyur pa/ /gser?
287b2(mdo 'grel): 'od dam pa dge ba yi/ /bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig/ srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu po dang/ /yon tan
287b3(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho zab mo de/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyi/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par shog/ ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang/ /gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang/ /dbang rnams byang chub yan lag gi/ stobs bcu dam par 'gyur
287b4(mdo 'grel): bar shog /dgongs pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams/ /bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol/ /bdag gi bskal pa brgya rnams su/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /de phyir
287b5(mdo 'grel): bdag ni mya ngan sems/ /phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs par gzir/ /sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid/ /yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur/ /gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa/ /bdag ni gang duAng bdag ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thugs
287b6(mdo 'grel): rjer ldan/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas/ /nongs par rab tu bzungs du gsol/ /'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /bdag gis nyon mongs las rnams kyi/ /dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas sol/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag
287b7(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /snying rje'i chu yi bku bar gsol/ /sdig pa thams cad bshegs par bgyi/ /sngon chad bdag gis gar bgyis dang/ da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /nongs par bgyid pa'i las rnams kun//
288a1(mdo 'grel): slan chad mi bgyi bsdams par bgyi/ /bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang/ /sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /dag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/ /de dag
288a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /lus kyis bgyis dang dag gi las/ /yid kyi rnam par bsam pa dang/ /las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /mi dge las bcu spangs nas su/ /dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis
288a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi/ /stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'dzam bu gling 'dir
288a4(mdo 'grel): gang dag dang/ /'jig rten khams 'di gzhan dag tu/ /gang rnams dag ba'i las bgyi pa/ de dag kun la yi rang ngo/ /lus dang dag dang yid kyis kyang/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/ /bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /byang chub
288a5(mdo 'grel): mchog la reg par shog/ srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /shin tu mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /skye ba nyam ba srid pa
288a6(mdo 'grel): nyam pa dang /'jig rten nyam pa g.yo sems nyam pa dang/ /lus kyi spyod pa nyam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so/ /byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam ba dang/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam
288a7(mdo 'grel): du dang/ /srid pa nyam pa 'dod chags nyam ba dang/ zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam da dang/ /dal ba'i nyam da dus kyi nyam nga dang/ /bsod nams sgrub pa nyam pa gang bgyis pa/ /rgyal ba mi nyam mngon sum mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de
288b1(mdo 'grel): kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /gser mdog gser ni dri ma med par
288b2(mdo 'grel): gser gyi 'ong/ /dri med rnam dag baiDUrya yi yan lag spyan/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi drag 'bar 'gyur ba'i gnas/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer bdag gis mun pa mun nag gsal/ /yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzos/ /sangs rgyas
288b3(mdo 'grel): nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'das khyab/ /nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la/ /thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim bar mdzad/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyi dbang po yan lag mdzes/ /dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan
288b4(mdo 'grel): lag rnam par mdzos/ /dpal gzi bsod nams 'phar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ /dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs baiDUrya/ /skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/ /'od
288b5(mdo 'grel): zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas/ /thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes/ /mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu brgal ba'i dbab rlabs can/ /'khor ba'i rlung chen phongs pa'i chu bor ltung ba las/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsab
288b6(mdo 'grel): cing shugs drag pa/ /bder gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems/ /yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang/ /ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa//
288b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang/ /ji ltar sa la sa rdul mdza' yas dang/ /ji ltar ri rab sdo? la mdza' mtshungs med dang/ /ji ltar nam mkha' i ma mdza' yas pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
289a1(mdo 'grel): yon tan mdza' yas te/ /sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so/ /bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ /yon tan tha ma shes par mi nus so/ /chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang/ /rdor bcas rir bcas
289a2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ /bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan pha mdza' shes mi nus/ /yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang/ /dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
289a3(mdo 'grel): pa rgyan pa yis/ /sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi rings sangs rgyas 'gyur par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ sems can sdug
289a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal yang gzir thar byed shog /stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog/ bskal pa bsam mi khyab bzhugs gyur cig/ bdud rtsi chu yi sems can tshim byed shog/
289a5(mdo 'grel): ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba rdzogs pa ltar/ pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog/ nyon mongs 'joms shing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog/ che rabs brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba stod//
289a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi rtag tu tshe? rabs dran par shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos shog/ bdag ni dge ba'i las ni 'di dag gis/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog/ sdig pa'i las
289a7(mdo 'grel): rnams rnam bar spong gyur cig/ dge ba'i byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog/ zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang/ /'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun ni 'gyur/ /sems can dbang po ma tshangs yan lag rnams/ /de kun
289b1(mdo 'grel): de du re dbang po tshar bar shog/ gang dag nad btang nyam chung lus nyams dang/ /phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ /de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog /gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u sdig gsang?
289b2(mdo 'grel): thug dang/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yos phongs gyur pa/ /sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ /'jig tshogs mi bzang brgya po de las thar gyur cag/ gang dag brdegs shing bcings pas bcings ba zir ba/ /khongs pa
289b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing/ /nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang/ /'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ /de dag thams cad bcings las gral gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar bar shog/ gsang pa rnams kyang
289b4(mdo 'grel): srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag bkres sred skom gyis bzir/ /de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ yod bas na gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cing/ /'on pas yid 'ong
289b5(mdo 'grel): sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyi sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ /sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/ /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog /gang yang sdug bsngal tshor ba
289b6(mdo 'grel): myong ma gyur/ /sems can thams cad bstan sdug pa dang/ /gzugs bzang mdzes shing shin tu shis par shog /rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsam ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza
289b7(mdo 'grel): bcang te rtsub ? sgra snyan dang/ /chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu steng ka dag/ gser gyi pad+ma utpal pad+ma can/ /zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan ser rin chen sna tshogs baiDUrya/ /de dag bsams pa thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten
290a1(mdo 'grel): gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung/ /sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/ /de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang/ /phan tshun du ni 'od byed 'gyur bar shog /mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yang dag?
290a2(mdo 'grel): bsam par de dag skye bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang/ /bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang/ /gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang/ /ljon shing dag la dus
290a3(mdo 'grel): gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang/ /rdul bral dri med bstan pa'i chos la yang/ /phyogs bcu rnams su/
290a4(mdo 'grel): mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad spong gyur cing/ /mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mtho ba'i rigs su skyes bar shog/
290a5(mdo 'grel): nor dang 'bru yis mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/ /bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/ /dpa' zhing rtul phong mkhas shing gsal bar shog /da
290a6(mdo 'grel): kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag ni rin chen shing dbang drung /sangs rgyas bder bzhugs rin chen baiDUrya khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig /chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog /
290a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa na/ /srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ /sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cing/ /sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun/ /'khor ba'i zhaD
290b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i thags pas dam bcings pa/ /shes rab lag gis bcings pa grol par shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thub gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di dang/ /gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/ /bsod nams sna tshogs
290b2(mdo 'grel): zab mo rnams byed pa/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /lus dang dag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yis/ /bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des/ /bdag gi smon lam 'bras bu yod bar shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag tag tu
290b3(mdo 'grel): dri ma bral ba dang/ /dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang/ /yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni/ /bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ /skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal
290b4(mdo 'grel): pa gang bstod pa/ /tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /yan lag dbang po kun gyi yan lag rgyas/ /bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /mi dbang rgyal po rtag tu de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag rna ba'i bu gar
290b5(mdo 'grel): bshags pa bdis ni grag gyur pa /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gnas nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gnyis las ma yin bzhi las ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /da ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
290b6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsan nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal lo/ /legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rmi lam na gser gyi rnga las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan
290b7(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa dag sdig pa bshags ba 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde bas tshig par byed de sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur bar 
291a1(mdo 'grel): shes par gyis shig/ 'di lta bu'i spyad do? pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni thams cad kyang sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod pa dang/ /smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
291a2(mdo 'grel): rlabs kyis de dag thos par gyur pa yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa gser 'ong dam pa nas gsung
291a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// //rgyal po gser gyi lag ba'i smon lam bzhugs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung ldan zhing dang ldang ba
291a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa// /yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g.yur za la mgo lcog me tog kha phye shing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te/
291a5(mdo 'grel): bung ba lang long khyus 'ding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis gzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam 'dar ldem ldem la/ /rin chen yal ga dang ma rgad lcug phrin gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par bsgrub par byed la/ /'gro ba dag tu
291a6(mdo 'grel): ma tshor bar 'gro ba'i g.yang sa chen po dag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang las bsod nams dang/ bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang/ dge ba dang dge ba'i rgyu dang 'thun pa/ /bde dgu'i gzhir gyur pa/
291a7(mdo 'grel): des ni sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang/ kha dog dang/ stobs dang/ gzi byin dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ shes rab dang/ spobs pa phun
291b1(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs par gyur cig/ //sbyin bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye bar gyur cig/ sbyin bdag gi bsod nams skyes zin pa rnams ni 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sbyin bdag gi pham mchog tu dka' ba byed byed
291b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ gso gso/ gnam gnam/ bskyed bskyed/ bsrid ba srid/ 'dzam+bu'i gling bkra yer yer mig gis mthong bar byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phung kyi skal shas thob par sho gcig/ de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi chung ma rnams dang/
291b3(mdo 'grel): bu rnams dang/ bu mo rnams dang /sbyin bdag gi gnyen 'dab mdza' gshes rgyas pa'i tshan rigs gang dag 'khod cing 'tshol gnas pa de dag kyang tshe ring zhing longs spyod che la g.yog 'khor mang par gyur cig/ gang dag 'das shing
291b4(mdo 'grel): che 'phongs pa de dag kyang 'gro ba dang/ skye ba'i gnas dang/ gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob par gyur te/ lha'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ de bzhin du rgyal po'i
291b5(mdo 'grel): mchog rgyal po'i mda' bdag dam pa dpal lha btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams ni phebs par gyur cig/ pheb zin pa rnams ni tsham du phebs par gyur cig/ stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang mnyes par gyur cig de bzhin du grong
291b6(mdo 'grel): khyer gyi nye 'khor na gnas pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang rjes su rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig/ de bzhin du mi brjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i
291b7(mdo 'grel): dbang po brgya byin dang/ 'jig rten skyod pa bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang/ gangs can dang/ lngas rtsen dang/ lnga len la
292a1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa dang/ nor bu bzang dang/ rdzogs bzang gnyis dang/ phrog mo bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' i ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding
292a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ dri za dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ sbyin bdag gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang/ /sbyin bdag gi bsten pa'i lha'i khyad par gyis de dag gzi byin dang/ stobs dang/ gzhal med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig /de dag gzi byin dang/
292a3(mdo 'grel): ldan par gyur/ stobs dang ldan bar gyur/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur/ che bar grags par gyur nas/ /sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang/ bang ? dang/ ba lang gi khyu dang/ phyug gdags sna tshogs kyi khyu dang/ zhing gi
292a4(mdo 'grel): rma ko dang/ las kyi sgo rnams dang/ bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar byed bar gyur cig/ gnod pa thams cad ni zlog par gyur cig /don bu bsgrubs pa rnams ni snang bar gyur cig /de bzhin du
292a5(mdo 'grel): sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba rnams zlogs par gyur cig/ yi dags rnams kyi bkres shing skom pa'i sdug
292a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ mi rnams tshol khros g.yen spyo ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig
292a7(mdo 'grel): mdor na khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad dang srog chags thams cad kyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa ma skyes ma byung gam byas ma bcos pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi gnas ba/ dmigs su med pa/ bde ba/ zhig gya nom pa/ bde laD
292b1(mdo 'grel): can/ gnas dang/ gling dang/ skyob pa dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ mi g.ye ba gang yin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi mchog de reg cing thob par gyur cing/ /gnod sbyin gang dag gzhon pa mi bzang dpung brtsan lha rdzas gso? gyon phreng ba thogs/ /gang dag 'jig rten
292b2(mdo 'grel): gsum mchod mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song la/ /lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa/ /de dag thams cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim du chos bzhin srung bar shog/ //lngas rtsen dang
292b3(mdo 'grel): ni 'phrog ma bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzangs sras dbung? dang bcas rnams dang/ /gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang/ /gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag sde chen grags ldan bstan pa
292b4(mdo 'grel): dag la dga' ba rnams/ /thams cad mthun par khyod kyi mtshan dang ni gnyen sdug bcas pa rtog tu skyong gyur cig/ mchan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char ka nyi ma'o gung rnams dang/ /nyi ma nub kar rtag tu khyod la bkris ldan par shog /dpal chen lag
292b5(mdo 'grel): na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes sogs/ /khyod dang gnyen 'dun rnams dang bcas la yongs su skyong gyur cig/ gtong la dpa' ba rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang 'byar ba grub cing mi nad med par shog/ yon gnas rnams kyang
292b6(mdo 'grel): yon tan tshogs las 'phel bar 'gyur zhing 'zu rnams rab tu rgyas par shog /mchod rten rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog/ rkyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can
292b7(mdo 'grel): mdza' dag rab zhi bde ba myong gyur shog /sbyin pa'i rab rdzogs so/ /rgyal po la gtan bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las 'byung pa'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa bzhugs so// //dkon mchog sum la phyag 'tshal/ /de phyir sku gzugs mchod
293a1(mdo 'grel): rten gyi/ /spyan snga 'am yang na gzhan duAng rung/ /tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di/ /nyin gcig bzhin yang dus gsum brjod/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang/ /rnam kun btud de sbyangs? mchis
293a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdig pa las ni ldog bgyid cing/ /bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung/ /lus can kun gyi bsod nams dag/ kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bdag ni spyi btud thal sbyar te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
293a3(mdo 'grel): slad dang/ /'gro gnas bar du bzhugs slad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol/ de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang/ /bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyang/ /bla med byang chub sems ldan shog/
293a4(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad dri med dbang/ /yongs rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing/ /sbyod pa rang dbang yong pa dang/ /'tsho ba bzang dang ldn par shog/ lus can dag ni thams cad kyang/ lag na rig chen nyid ldan bzhin/ /yo byad thams cad
293a5(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas pa/ /'khor pa sring du mi zad shog/ bud med thams ca dus kun du/ /skyes mchog nyid du 'gyur bar shog/ lus can thams cad rig pa dang/ /rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog/ /lus can kha dog ldan pa dang/ /gzuD
293a6(mdo 'grel): bzang gzi brjid che ba dang/ /blta na sdug cing nad med dang/ /stobs can cha dang ldan par shog/ thams cad thabs la mkhas gyur te/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar ba dang/ /dkon mchog gsum la gzhal bar byed/ /sangs rgyas chos?
293a7(mdo 'grel): nor che ldan shog/ byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /nyon mongs btang snyoms gnas ? dang/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab kyis rgyan cing/ /mchog rnams thams cad 'das rdzogs te/ /mtshan
293b1(mdo 'grel): dang dpe byang gsal ba dang/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sa cu dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par bgrong par shog/ bdag kyang yon tan de dag dang/ /gzhan kun gyis kyang brgyan ldan te/ /nyes pa kun las grol ba dang/ /sems can kun mchog byams pa dang/ /sems can
293b2(mdo 'grel): kun yid re ba yi/ /dge ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing/ /rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal sel bar bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo gang/ /su ngag 'jigs pa skyo ba de/ bdag gi ming cam thos pas kyang/ /shin tu
293b3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa med par shog/ bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang/ /ming tsam thos pas skye bo kun/ /rab dang 'khrug mang rnal ma dang/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub des pa dang/ /tshe rabs kun tu rjes 'brang ba'i/ /mngon shes lnga po thob par shog/ sems can kun la
293b4(mdo 'grel): rnam kun tu/ /rtag tu phan bde bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten kun? skyes po gang/ /sdig pa byed pa 'dod gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad gnod med par/ /rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /sman dang dgon pa'i shing bzhin du/ /rtag tu sems can
293b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /rang dgar dgag med spyod par shog/ sems can rnams la srog sbyin phangs/ /bdag la de dag ches phangs shog/ bdag la de dag sdig smin cing/ /bdag dge ma lus der smin shog/ ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang/ /gang du ma grol de srid
293b6(mdo 'grel): du/ de phyir bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig /de skad brjod pa'i bsod nams gang/ /gal te de ni gzugs can gyur/ /gang ga'i phye ma snyed kyi ni/ 'jig rten khams su shod mi 'gyur/ /slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa//
293b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las 'gyur ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa nye shu pa rdzogs so// byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i smon lam bzhugs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal/ /de ltar 'di dag kun
294a1(mdo 'grel): byas te/ /dge ba bdag gis bsags pa gang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdug? bsngal thams cad gsal bar shog/ 'gro ba nang ba ji srid du/ /nad sos gyur gyi bar du ni/ /sman dad sman pa nyid dag dang/ /de yi nad g.yog byed par
294a2(mdo 'grel): shog/ zas dang skom gyi char phab ste/ /bkres dang skom gyi gnod pa bsal/ /mu ge'i bskal ba bar ma'i tshe/ /bdag dang zas dang skom du gyur/ /sems can phongs shing dbul ba la/ /bdag ni mi zad gter gyur te/ /yo byad ma/ bo? dgu sna tshoD su
294a3(mdo 'grel): mdun na nye bar gnas gyur cig/ bdag la dmigs nas nam du yang/ /'ga' yang don med ma gyur cig /bdag la dmigs nas gang dag gi/ khro ba 'am dad pa'i sems byung na/ /de nyid rtag tu de dag gi/ don kun 'grub ba'i rgyur gyur cig/
294a4(mdo 'grel): gang dag bdag la kha zer ram/ /gzhan gang gnod pa byed pa 'am/ /de bzhin phyar ka gtong yang rung/ thams cad byang chub skal ldan gyur/ /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon/ /klam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang/ /rgal 'dod
294a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi gru dang ni/ /gzings dang zam pa nyid du gyur/ /gling don gnyer la gling dang ni/ /gnas mal 'dod la gnas mal dang/ /bdag ni lus can bran 'dod pa/ /kun gyi bran du gyur par shog/ yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzangs/ /rig sngaD
294a6(mdo 'grel): grub dang sman chen dang/ /dpag bsam gyis ni shing dag dang/ lus can rnams kyi 'dod 'jor gyur/ /sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang/ /nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang/ /sems can dpag tu med pa yi/ /rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i gzhir
294a7(mdo 'grel): yang shog/ de bzhin nam mkhas mthas gtugs ba'i/ /sems can khams la rnam kun tu/ /thams cad mya ngan 'das par du/ /bdag ni nye 'tshe'i gzhir yang shog/ bdag gi byang chub spyod pa la/ /'jug pa rnam par bsam pa yi/ /dge
294b1(mdo 'grel): ba gang des 'gro ba kun/ /byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog/ phyogs rnams kun na lus dang sems/ /sdug bsngal nad ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag dag gi bsod nams kyi/ /bde dga' rgya mtsho thob bar shog/ de dag sangs rgyas bde thob kyi/ /bar tu bde ba nyams ma gyur//
294b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro bas bla na med pa yi/ /bde ba rgyun mi 'chad thob shog/ 'jig rten khams na dmyal ba dag/ gang dag ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /de dag du ni lus can rnams/ /bde can bde bas dga' bar shog/ grang bas nyam thag dro thob shog/ byang chub sems
294b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' i sbrin chen las/ /byung ba'i chu bo mdza' yas kyi/ /tsha bas nyam thag bsil bar shog/ ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal yang/ /de la dga' tshal sdug gur shog/ shal ma li yi sdod po yang/ /dpag bsam shing du 'khrungs par shog/ thing ril ngur pa dag
294b4(mdo 'grel): dang dang pa dang/ /bzhad sogs skad snyam 'byin bas mdzes gyur cing/ /pad+ma dri gsung chen ldan mtsho dag gis/ /dmyal ba'i sa phyogs dag ni nyams dgar shog/ sol phung? de yang rin chen phung por gyur/ /sa bsregs shel gyis gzhi bstar bar shog
294b5(mdo 'grel): bsdus 'joms ri bo rnams kyang mchod pa yi/ /gzhal med khang gyur bde gshegs gang bar shog/ mdag ma rdo bsregs mtshan phyi char pa dag /ded nas bzung ste me tog char par gyur/ phan tshun mtshon gyis 'debs pa de y ang ni/ /deng nas
294b6(mdo 'grel): rtse? phyir me tog 'phel par shog/ chu po rab med me dang 'dra nang bying ba dag/ sha kun zhiD gyur rus gong me tog kun da'i mdog bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis lha yi lus thob nas/ /lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dal gyis 'babs gnas shog /ci phyir
294b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir ? shin ze'i mi dang khru dang bya rgod mi bzang rnams skrag? byed/ /kun nas mun bsal bde dga' bskyed pa'i mthu bzang 'di ko su yi yin pas ste/ /gyen du bltas na nam mkha' i dkyil na phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar bzhugs mthong nas/ /rab tu
295a1(mdo 'grel): dga' ba'i shugs kyis sdig dang bral nas de dang lhan cig 'gro bar shog// me tog char pa spos chu dang 'dres bab pa yis/ /dmyal ba'i me mdag chil chil gsod pa mthong gyur nas/ /glo bur bde bas tshim pa ?
295a2(mdo 'grel): bsams pa dang/ /sems dmyal rnams kyi phyag na pad+ma mthong bar shog/ grogs dag 'jigs pa bor la rings bar tshur shog 'u bu'i thad du ni/ /gang du mthu yis sdug bsngal thams cad bral zhing dga' ba'i shugs phyin la//
295a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba kun skyob byang chub sems dpa' 'od dang brtse ba skyes gyur pa/ /gzhon nu zur phudcan 'bar 'jigs pa med par byed pa ci zhig phyin/ /khyod kyis lha brgya'i cod pan dag gis zhabs kyi pad+ma la mchod cing/ /thugs rjes brlan spyan?
295a4(mdo 'grel): dbu ma me tog du ma'i tshogs kyis char 'bab pa/ /khang brtsegs yid 'od lha mo stong phrag bstod dbyangs sgrogs ldan 'di ltos zhes/ /'jam dbyangs de 'dra mthong nas da ni sems dmyal ku co 'don par shog/ de ltar bdag gi dge rtsas kun tu
295a5(mdo 'grel): bzang la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med sprin bde ba dang/ /bsil zhing dri zhim pa/ ldad char pa 'bebs mthong nas/ /sems can dmyal ba de dag mngon par dga' gyur cig/ dud 'gro rnams ni gcig la gcig/ za ba'i 'jigs dang bral
295a6(mdo 'grel): par shog/ sgra mi snyan pa'i mi bzhin du yi dags rnams ni bde bar gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ phyag nas 'bab pa'i 'o rgyun gyis/ /yi dags rnams ni tshim byas shing/ /khrus byas rtag tu bsil bar shog/ long ba rnams kyis
295a7(mdo 'grel): gzugs mthong shog/ 'on pas rtag tu thos par shog/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul bzhin du ni/ /sbum? ma gnod med btsa' bar shog/ gcer bu rnams kyi gos dang/ /bkres pa rnams kyi zas dang ni/ /skom pa rnams kyis chu dag dag dang/ /btung ba zhim po thob par shog
295b1(mdo 'grel): bkren pa rnams kyis nor thob shog/ mya ngan nyam thag dga' thob shog/ yid chad rnams kyang yi sos shing/ /bstan pa phun sum tshogs par shog/ sems can nad pa ji snyed pa/ /myur du nad las thar bar shog/ 'gro ba'i nad ni ma lus pa/ /rtag tu 'byung ba med par shog/ skrag pa rnams
295b2(mdo 'grel): ni 'jiD med shog/ bcings pa rnams ni brol bar gyur/ /mthu med rnams ni mthu ldan zhing/ /phan tshun sems ni gnyen gyur cig/ 'gron pa dag ni thams cad/ la/ /phyogs rnams thams cad bde bar shog/ gang gi don tu 'gro byed pa/ /de 'bad mi dgos grub
295b3(mdo 'grel): gyur cig/ gru dang gru chen zhugs pa rnams/ /yid la bsams pa grub gyur te/ /chu yi dogs su bde phyin nas/ /gnyen dang lhan cig dag par shog mya ngan lam gol 'khyams pa rnams/ /'gron pa dag dang phrad gyur nas/ /tshom rkun stag sogs 'jigs
295b4(mdo 'grel): med par/ /mi ngal? bde blag 'gro bar shog/ /dgon sogs lam med nyam da bar/ /byis pa rgan po mgon med par/ /gnyid log myos shing rab myos rnams/ /lta dag srung bar byed par shog/ mi dal kun las thar pa dang/ /dang dang shes rab brtser ldan
295b5(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /zas dang spyod pa sna tshogs nas/ /rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur cig/ thams cad nam mkha' i mdzod bzhin du/ /longs spyod zad pa med par shog/ rtsod pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /rang dbang du ni spyod par shog/ sems can gzi brjid chu du gang/ /de dag gzi
295b6(mdo 'grel): brjid chen por shog/ dka' thub can gang gzugs ngan pa/ /gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'jig rten bud med ji snyed pa/ /de dag skyes pa nyid gyur cig/ ma rab rnams kyi tho thob cing/ /nga rgyal dag kyang bcom par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams 'di
295b7(mdo 'grel): yis ni/ /sems can thams cad ma lus pa/ sdig pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /rtag tu dge ba byed par shog/ byang chub sems dang mi 'dral zhing/ /byang chub spyod la gzhol ba dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung zhing/ /bdud kyi las kyang 
296a1(mdo 'grel): spangs par shog/ sems can de dag thams cad ni/ /tshe yang dpag med ring bar shog/ rtag tu bde bar 'tsho 'gyur zhing/ /'chi ba'i sgra yang grag ma gyur/ /dpag bsam shing gi skyed mos tshal/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas sras?/ /chos
296a2(mdo 'grel): snyan sgrogs pas gang ba yi/ /phyogs rnams thams cad dga' bar shog /thams cad du yang sa gzhi dag/ gseg ma la sogs med pa dang/ /lag 'thil ltar mnyam baiDUrya'i/ /rang bzhin 'jam por gnas par gyur/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod
296a3(mdo 'grel): dgur yang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag/ rang gi legs pas sa steng dag/ brgyan par mdzad pas bzhugs gyur cig/ lus can kun gyi bya dang ni/ /shing dang 'od zer thams cad dang/ /nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra/ /rgyun mi 'chad par thos
296a4(mdo 'grel): par shog/ de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang/ /sangs rgyas sras dang phrad gyur cing/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni mdza' yas pas/ 'gro ba'i bla ma mchod par shog/ lha yang dus su char 'bebs shing/ /lo tog phun sum tshogs par shog /rgyal po chos
296a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin byed pa dang/ /'jig rten dag kyang dang bar shog /sman rnams mthu dang ldan pa dang/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'grub par shog/ mkha' gro srin po la sogs pa/ /snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur cig/ sems can 'ga' yang
296a6(mdo 'grel): sdug ma gyur/ /'jig dang brnyas pa mi 'byung zhing/ /'ga' yang yid mi bde ma gyur/ /gtsug lag khang rnams klog pa dang/ /kha don gyis brgyan legs gnas shog/ rtag tu dge 'dun mthun pa dang/ /dge 'dun don yang 'grub par
296a7(mdo 'grel): shog/ bslab par 'dod pa'i dge slong dag/ dben pa dag kyang thob par shog/ g.yeng ba thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sems ni las rung bsgom gyur cig/ dge slong ma rnams rnyed ldan zhing/ /'thab dang rtsod pa spangs par shog/
296b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rab tu byung ba kun/ /tshul khrims nyams pa med gyur cing/ /tshul khrims 'chal pas yid byung nas/ /rtag tu sdig pa zad byed shog/ bde 'gro dag kyang thob gyur nas/ /der yang brtul shugs mi nyams shog/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bkur ba dang//
296b2(mdo 'grel): bsod nams dag kyang rnyed par shog/ rgyud ni yongs su dag pa dang/ /phyogs rnams kun tu grags par shog /ngan song sdug bsngal mi myong zhing/ /dka' ba spyad pa med par yang/ /lha bas lhag pa'i lus kyis ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas myur grub 'gyur/ /sems
296b3(mdo 'grel): can kun gyis lan mang du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byed cing/ /sangs rgyas bde ba bsam yas kyi/ /rtag tu bde dang ldan gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /'gro don thugs la dgongs grub shog/ mgon po yis ni gang dgongs
296b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ sems can rnams la de 'byor shog /de bzhin rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /nyan thos rnams kyang bde gyur cig /bdag kyang 'jam dbyangs bka' drin gyis/ /sa rab dga' ba thob bar du/ /rtag tu tsha rab dran pa dang/ /rab tu 'byung ba thob par
296b5(mdo 'grel): shog/ bdag ni kha zas gyi nas kyang/ /nyams dang ldan zhing 'tsho bar shog /tshe rabs kun tu dben gnas pa/ /phun sum ldan pa thob gyur cig /gang tshe blta bar 'dod pa dang/ /cung zad 'dri bar 'dod na yang/ /mgon po 'jam dbyangs de nyid ni/ /gegs
296b6(mdo 'grel): med par yang mthong bar shog/ phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /sems can kun don bsgrub bya'i phyir/ ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa/ /bdag gi spyod pa'ang de 'drar shog /ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa dang/ /'gro dang ji srid gnas gyur pa//
296b7(mdo 'grel): de srid bdag ni gnas gyur nas/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang du ci'i rung/ /de kun bdag la smin gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun gyis/ /'gro ba bde la spyod par shog /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sman cig bu/ /bde ba?
297a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bstan bsnyed dang bkur sti dang/ /bcas te yun ring gnas gyur cig/ slob dpon chen po zhi ba ltas mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las? 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs so// //byang chub
297a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i smon lam bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hyA ka ra pra Ni d+hA na/ bod skad du/ byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /log rtog mun bsal mkhyen rab 'dab rgyas shing/ /bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom yang dag ji
297a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs/ /thugs rje'i mtsho bskyil don mchog 'byor pa'i gter/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' ltar mtshan med rab zhi rtog las 'das/ /sgrib ba skyon bral legs tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /skye ba 'gron mang
297a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub 'byung ba'i lam/ /yang dag dam chos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs dgra rgyal srid 'tsho las brgal cing/ /sdug bsngal mtshon spangs yang dag thar lam mkhyen/ /'gro la phan mdzad yon tan mang bo'i phul/ /'phags pa'i
297a5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos dbyings mkha' dkyil mkhyen rab nyi shar nas/ /rmongs pa'i mun bsal yang dag tshes nyid rtogs/ /thabs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la phan brtson pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i chogs la phyag
297a6(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rin chen sa gzhi dpag bsam nags tshal bcas/ /yid bzhin gzhal yas gdan khri rgyun mchog ldan/ /lha mi'i mchod sprin mang po gtibs pa rnams/ /yon tan gter mnga' sras bcas rgyal la 'bul/ /dus kun bdag gis dkon
297a7(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum spangs shing/ /de yi dkor phyogs byang chub sems btang dang/ /mtshan med la sogs smad pa'i las bgyis rnams/ /bla ma'i spyan sngar de bshags slan chad bsdam/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang/ /byang chub
297b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' so so skye bo yi/ /bsod nams rgyu dang 'bras bcas ci mchis ba/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /phyogs gang 'gro la sman slad bde gshegs rnams/ mya ngan 'dar bzhed chos bshad bskul gzhes la/ /'gro ba'i don smad mya ngan mi 'da' 
297b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul/ /skyon kun byang zhing yon tan kun rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ /bdag ni dus kun lus 'bul skyabs gsol gyis/ /yongs bzhes log lta'i lam las bskyab du
297b3(mdo 'grel): gsol/ /bdag gi 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bsal slad dag/ /byang chub spyad pa'i bcom ldan gdud gsag phyir/ /bdag med rtog bral mi gnas rtag pa yi/ /bla med byang chub mchog du dus kun mkhyen/ /phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs/ /khyod la bdag
297b4(mdo 'grel): gis sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba chos sdud sems can don byed pa'i/ /bslab gsum der nas brtsam ta bzung bar bgyi/ /bsod nams stobs 'dis mchod gnas thams cad la/ /bla med mchod sprin 'byung zhing dgyes bgyid shog /sems can
297b5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang sgrib tshogs kun byang nas/ /yon tan tshogs rdzogs kun mkhyen mchog gyur cig/ bdag kyang dus kun blo rnams snying rje ldan/ /ting 'dzin shes rab gzungs sgo mchog thob nas/ /gro kun bder 'gyur spyod mchog rnams byed cing
297b6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams mtshan nyid ji bzhin rtogs gyur cig /bsdu ba bzhis bsdus pha rol phyin rdzogs shing/ /mos sbyong la sogs sa rnams kun sbyangs nas/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib tshogs rnam spangs te/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs
297b7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs mkhas? rgyas byung/ /bdag ni mthong thos rig pa'am dran tsam gyis/ /'gro kun nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi byed shog /lus sems dag rnams spyod yul cir 'jug pa/ /srog chags rnams la bde ba'i rgyur gyur cig /dus kun
298a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis lus ngag yid kun nas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad ci bsags pa/ dus gsum rgyal dang ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin/ /thams cad bla med byang chub myur 'grub bsdo/ /byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam/ /slob dpon 'phags
298a2(mdo 'grel): pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsan+d+ra go mi pra Ni d+hA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ btsun pa zla ba'i smon lam zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal la/ zhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i las ni nyam da yis/ /gang dang
298a3(mdo 'grel): gang du nyer skye ba/ de dang der ni skyes ba dang/ /dad dang dbang po tshang ba dang/ /bzo dang rgyu rtsal kun mngon shes/ /bstan bcos kun la 'jig med dang/ /'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs shing/ /dngos kun yongs su gtong ba dang/ /dran dang
298a4(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing bden smra dang/ /sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' / /byang chub sems kyis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang/ /dul ba'i spyod dang yang dag ldan/ /blo bzang skye ba gcad? ma dran/ /sdig ba'i las
298a5(mdo 'grel): la 'jigs byed pas/ /spyod par dge ba'i spyod yul can/ /mthar yang bla med rtogs pa yi/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu bsten bas/ /'gro la gcig tu bde ba yi/ /g.yo med mgon po thob par gyur/ /bdag ni bran dang mor ma gyur/ /blun dang
298a6(mdo 'grel): yul ngan skye ba dang/ /sangs rgyas 'byung la lkog ma gyur/ /ni duAng lta ba log ma gyur/ /'dod med tshul ldan sangs rgyas gyur/ /pha rol 'dod pa'i rjes longs spyod/ /sems can nyam thag phyed 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod pa'i slong mos? bdag
298a7(mdo 'grel): mi spyod/ /sems can rnams la byams goms/ /shing/ /rgyu med rang bzhin sangs rgyas dang/ /byang sems 'gro ba'i 'bras mi lta/ /rigs chen blon po skye ba dang/ /skye ba skye bar lus mdzes shing/ /bder gshegs mang po'i snyan
298b1(mdo 'grel): dag byed/ /skye zhing skya ba dang ldan par/ /gang du sangs rgyas lhar byed pa'i/ /rigs der bdag ni skye ba dang/ /skye ba dang ni skye ba ru/ /chos lnga ? ni mi spong zhing?/ /bsod nams ye shes stobs dang ni/ /brtson 'grus byang chub sems lnga po/ /ji ltar
298b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ zhabs thob pa yi thabs de bzhin/ /de ltar bdag gi thabs gyis ni/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i zhabs thob shog/ btsun pa zla ba'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po nye ba'i 'thung
298b3(mdo 'grel): gcod dpal bal po yum bu'i grong khyer du/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta dza ta kan+tNa'i? zhal snga nas/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// ` //rgya gar skad du/ Arya nA
298b4(mdo 'grel): gArdzun pu? Ni b+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi smin lam zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor bar 'khor che skye? gnas thams cad du/ /chos la bzod pa ma thob par du ni/ /ngan song gsum du 'am? yang mi
298b5(mdo 'grel): skye zhing/ /mtho ris mi yi lus su skye bar shog /mtho ris ma yi lus su skyes nas kyang/ /sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang/ /na mag? dpon zhal che spyod par bdag ma skye/ /khe byed til rdud chad tshong rkun po dang/ /bran dang bran mo'i lus su
298b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ma skye/ /dge slong gnas la dbang byed bdag po dang/ /gnas brtan las byed pa dang nang khrims pa/ /dge skos gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhag pa/ /gang zag las byed rnams su bdag na skye/ /mdza' la bob? gla klo skye ba'i yul rnams dang//
298b7(mdo 'grel): glen lkugs 'on yang phrag dog can rnams dang/ /mu stegs log rtog bram ze'i rigs rnams dang/ rigs ngan bshan pa'i rigs su bdag ma skye/ /byang chub ma thob bar du rtag pho'i? bdag /dam chos spyod pa'i lus su skye bar shog /dam chos spyod
299a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i lus su skyes nas kyang/ /mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing/ /tshe la nad kyis bar gcod med pa dang/ /skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad bar shog/ /skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad nas kyang/ /mnyan bsams bsgom
299a2(mdo 'grel): pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs te/ ting 'dzin rtse gcig sems la dbang thob ste/ /rnam shes drug po yul la g.yengs ma gyur/ /lus kyi yan lag rgyas shing skyon med de/ /dbang po mnyams rigs mtho bkur ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas chos kun rdzob
299a3(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang/ /gzhon nu rab byung tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ /dge bshes mchog rnams rtag tu bsten byed cing/ /sa bcu rim gyis bgrod rnams thogs med de/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog bla med byang chub myar du thob
299a4(mdo 'grel): nas kyang/ /rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /bsdu ba rnam bzhis 'gro don byed par shog/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /ku la pri Na d+ha manA? ma/ bod
299a5(mdo 'grel): skad du/ rigs kyi smon lam zhes bya ba/ /'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /dbang po gsal par 'chi ba dang/ /gnad gcod sdug bsngal med pa dang/ /srid ba par ma ngo ru yang/ /rang byung ye shes rtogS par
299a6(mdo 'grel): shog /rang byung ye shes rtogs nas kyang/ /gang skye rang dbang yod par shag? /gang du skyes pa'i sa der yang/ /nyon mongs mdza' dag chung ba yi/ /chos ldan rigs su skye bar shog /chos ldan rigs su skyes nas kyang/ /chos ldan groD dang phrad pa shog/
299a7(mdo 'grel): chos ldan grogs dang phrad nas kyang/ /gtso bo dkon mchog mchod pa dang/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par shog/ sdom pa gsum la gnas nas kyang/ /stong nyid dam pa sgom pa dang/ /thos pa'i chos rnams dran par shog /? pa'i chos
299b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dran nas kyang/ /theg pa chen po'i don rtogs nas/ /rang don gtso bor mi byed cing/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal bdag la smin par shog/ sdug bsngal bdag la smin nas kyang/ /lus ngag sems la mi gnod cing
299b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan pa'i spyod pas mi g.yel ba'i/ /gzhan don dmigs pa'i sems kyis su/ /gzhan don thams cad byed par shig/ gzhan don thams cad mthar phyin nas/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sku gsum lhun gyis grub bar shog /rigs kyi smon lam zhes?
299b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar mi mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bdag ni sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /rnyed? dka' i sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /rab med srid pa'i rgya mtsho? las/ /sems can ma
299b4(mdo 'grel): lus sgrol bar shog/ ces bya ba ni slob dpon btsun pa rta dbyangs kyi bsngo? ba shin tu bsdus pa yin no/ /paN+Di ta dA na shI las bsgyur ba'o// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i lam 'jug yang dag par/ /sbyar
299b5(mdo 'grel): las bsod nams tshad med gang/ /de yis 'gro kun rgyal ba yi/ /lam la legs par 'jug par shog /bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/ /nam mkha' kun khyab skye bo rnams/ /ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing/ /mi khom? thams
299b6(mdo 'grel): cad rnam par spangs/ /skye bar lha dang ma yi ni/ /skye ba yongs su thob par shog/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing/ /dam chos nyan sems don sgom dang/ /sems ni dben par gnas
299b7(mdo 'grel): par shog /theg pa chen? po la gnas te/ /tshangs pa'i spyod dang ldan bar shog / lam kun rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /sa la sogs pa kun thob nas/ /zhing kun yang dag sbyangs nas su/ /myur? du sangs rgyas thob par shog /ji ltar 'khor ba'i
300a1(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs su/ /bsam pa'i don kun thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' i mdzod 'dzin nam mkha' nyid nas/ /sems can kun la 'byung bar shog/ phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthar gnas pa'i/ /'jig rten khams ni de dag rnams/ /don kun 'jig
300a2(mdo 'grel): rten khams bzhin du/ /de dag thams cad dag par shog /bdag kyang byang chub snying po'i par/ /zad zing mi 'jigs dam chos dang/ /byams pas sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam kun yongs su rdzogs byed cing/ /rtag pa nyid du tshangs
300a3(mdo 'grel): spyod dang/ /sdom pa kun gyis bsdams par shog/ sems can don kun byed pa dang/ /chos kun don ni ston par shog/ 'jig rten khams ni sems can kun/ /gang la gnod pa byed kyang ni/ /bdag ni de dag thams cad la/ /phan 'dogs byed pa
300a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du shog/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsran nas bdag/ rtag par sems ni dam chos bsam gtan la/ /ro gcig brtan pa nyid du shog ji ltar brtson ldan brtson 'grus bzhin/ /bdag kyang go cha sbyor ba dang/ /de bzhin mi zlog pa zhes pa'i/ /brtson 'grus
300a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni ldan par shog/ ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /tshogs kyi byang chub bsgrubs pa yi/ /bsam gtan kun la gcig tu gnas/ /bdag sems rdo rje lta bur shog/ shes rab nam mkha' i mkhas khyab pa/ /rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid dang/ /rab mthun
300a6(mdo 'grel): kun dga' tshogs dang ni/ /snying rje'i ro yis nges gang zhig/ /thabs dang smon lam de bzhin du/ /stobs ni rab tu 'byor ba dang/ /ye shes bdag nyid 'di dag ni/ /bdag la rnam par dag par shog /mngon shes kun gyi phar phyin te/ /khyad par
300a7(mdo 'grel): lam ni thob par shog/ sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyangs te/ /bdag ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/ 'di nyid kyis ni rim pa yis/ /bdag ni bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /'khor bar gnas pa'i sems can kun/ /myur du rgyal ba nyid du shog?
300b1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba 'di/ /bdag nyid kyi ni blo yis byas/ /kun nas kun tu ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pas na/ /kun tu bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i/ /smon lam rgya mtsho ji lta ba/ /de bzhin du di? bdag la yang/ /dge ba rgya mtshod?
300b2(mdo 'grel): myur du/ /'bras bu dang ni bcas par shog /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i kun khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyal rnams gang/ /de dag ji ltar smon lam na/ /sngon du bya ba'i rim pa rnams/ /de tsam nyid du bdag gis kyang/ /bsam pa gtan pas de bzhin bgyi
300b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams mthu yis 'di dag ni/ /de bzhin du ni grub bar shog /ji ltar dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /smon? lam de dag bdag yi rang/ /dus ni yun mi ring ba yis/ /smon lam 'di ni rdzogs pa shog/ sangs rgyas kun rnams rang rang gi/ zhing bzhugs mya ngan mi
300b4(mdo 'grel): 'da' zhing/ /mkha' mnyam tshas kyi char gyis no?/ /rtag tu sems can tshim byed shog/ /sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas chos/ /dge 'dun bcas pa thams cad la/ /lha rdzas mchod sprin mdza' yas pas/ /yang dag par ni mchod byed shog/
300b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis/ 'jig rten khams kun gang bar shog/ mchog gi chos rnams sems 'gyur zhod/ /srid pa spyod pa byed par shog/ paN+Di ta sangs rgyas dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa'i las
300b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs/ /smon lam bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra Ni d+hA na sa pta ti nA ma gA thA/ bod skad du/ smon lam bdun bcu ba zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag
300b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rin chen dpag med tshigs mda' zhing/ /nyes pa'i dug sdong mdza' dag drungs phyung ba/ /phyogs bcu dag na dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/ /ba de par gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib sel? bar? 
301a1(mdo 'grel): cing de? bag la nyal ba'i mda' dug 'byin pa'i thabs/ /'gro ba gsum bo kun gyi blo gros kyi/ /mig 'byed pa yi chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs sras po dge 'dun mi ldog pa/ /thugs rje chen pos yid ni drangs gyur te/ blo can skye? bar gyur
301a2(mdo 'grel): pa ma lus la/ /rgyun mi chad par mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ /'gro ba rnams su bdag gis mi dge gang/ /cung zad bgyis sam bgyid rtsal rjes yi rang/ /rgyal ba rnams la de dag bshags nas ni/ /slan chad mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa nod/ /bder gshegs
301a3(mdo 'grel): rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos dang/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis dge ba bsags pa dang/ /'jig rten pa yi legs par spyad pa bzhin/ /ma lus pa'ang bdag ni yi rang ngo/ /skye bo nyon mongs dug gis mgo rmongs pa/ /de dag rnams la mi dge gang
301a4(mdo 'grel): mchis pa/ /des ni bdag nyid kha na dga' bzhin du/ /ci nas dmyal ba rnams su gzhol bar bgyi/ /'jig rten rab zhe bde ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /tshim nas yid ni dge bar bgyid gyur cig 'gro ba bdag gi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa/ /de ni bdag
301a5(mdo 'grel): gis dang du len par shog/ 'gro ba 'di dag yid la myur du ni/ /yang dag byang chub nyid ni skye gyur cig/ yid la byang chub dag ni bskyed pa dag/ byang chub tshogs rnams yang dag sgrub par shig dge ba'i tshogs? grub nas ni sa thob cing/ /srid pa
