301a6(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi mgon po'i gdung bzung nas/ /dgra rnams bcom nas 'jig rten gsum dag ni/ /chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i gnas thob shog /byang chub shing drung sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /nyin zhag ji snyed gzhes shing bzhugs pa dag/ dpe ma mchis
301a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char/ 'gro la dbab pa'i slad du gsol bar bgyi/ /gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs mdzad nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gshegs pa gang/ /gzhan la phan pa mdzad cing yun ring du/ /bzhugs
301b1(mdo 'grel): par blo bzang de la gsol bar gyi/ /'jig rten gsum po thibs po der rgyu ba'i/ /sems can su dag ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de dag rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba yi/ /bdud rtsi'i longs spyod dgra don du gnyer bar bgyi/ /de ltar dge ba gang dag bsgrubs pa 'di/ /ma
301b2(mdo 'grel): lus yang dag byang chub bsngo bar bgyi/ /des ni bdag ni byang chub sems dang ni/ /skad cig tsam yang 'bral bar ma gyur cig/ ji srid phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang ma mnan pa/ /de srid du ni thab pa'i khyu?
301b3(mdo 'grel): mchog dang/ /byang chub/ sems dpa' rnams dang 'bral ma gyur/ /di dag kho nas gzhan la sman pa yi/ /sbyod pa'i lam dag nye bar bstan pa la/ /skyo ba ma mchis par ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /sras kyis kun la'ang sbyar bar bgyi/ /bdag gi lus kya
301b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag nyid lag dag/ tshang zhing skye ba kun gyis bstod 'os pa'i/ /yon tan phung po tshe rabs dran pa dang/ /tshe rigs btsun zhing lus ni mdzes? par shog /gzhan phan spod zhing rang don lhur len pa/ /tha chad dug dang 'dra ba spangs nas su/?
301b5(mdo 'grel): snying rjes? gdangs pa'i yid kyi skye bo kun/ /gcig tu gzhol bar rjes su 'dzin par shog/ bdag gi bdog? pa rnams la gzhan gyi blo/ /gzhan gyi nor nyams cung zad mi 'dzin cing/ /rang gi nor ba sa mo nyi ma mchis ltar/ /bag yangs dag
301b6(mdo 'grel): tu len cir/? spyod par shog/ bdag gi sha zhig slong pa mchis na yang/ /brod la 'dzum pa'i mig gis stsal bar bgyi/ /bdag gi rkang la sogs pa rtag tu yang/ /lus can rnams kyi don tu gtong bar shog /bdag ni yid bzhin nor bus 'gro
301b7(mdo 'grel): ba yis /'dod? pa'i dngos po mdza' dag sgrub pa dang/ /yid la re ba yongs rdzogs bgyid pa yi/ /dpag bsam gyi ni shing dang 'dra bar shog/ bdag ni rang gi dang gis sdig pa dag/ mi gtsang ba ltar rgyang ring spang ba dang/ /thub pa'i skyes
302a1(mdo 'grel): mchog gis ni bslab bcas pa'i/ /chu lon 'dral bar bgyid par ma gyur cig/ lus dang srog la lta brgyad bsrings nas/ /rtag par dkon pa rnams su dga' bar bgyi/ /rnyed pa dag dang bkur sti mdza' dag la/ /slon pa'i zas bzhin zlo? ni bzlog bar bgyi/ /'gro ba rnams la gdol ba'i phrug gu bzhin/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa spangs ba dang/ /rigs brtsun pa yi nye du'i tshogs bzhin du/ /rjes su mthun pa sgrub cing spyad par bgyi/ /zla zer pad+ma rtsa lag dri ma bral/ /ma ral ma 'dres nag
302a2(mdo 'grel): nog ma mchis la/ /ma lus rab tu zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i/ /tshul khrims la ni bdag gis goms par bgyi/ /su dag nongs ma mchis par bdag gi mgo/ /sog les tshal pa brgyar ni gshegs bgyid kyang/ /de la'ang bu gcig gcas pa
302a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par sems ni phangs par bgyi/ /su dag snying nas bdag la khros gyur te/ /dgos pa ma mchis bzhin du srog 'phrog na'ang/ /de la'ang las kyi 'bras bu mi bzad pa/ /mi 'tshal ba dag 'byung bar ma gyur cig /khro ba dang
302a4(mdo 'grel): ni gshe dang 'tshang 'du dang/ /brdegs par gyur kyang bzod pa mi btang ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal ma lus pa dag dang du blang/ /sngon chad rnyed ma myong ba thub ba'i chos/ /shin tu zab cing rigs pa'i
302a5(mdo 'grel): mchog la yang/ /bdag gi sems la skad cig tsam yang ni/ /som nyi'i spyad thag g.yo bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi skye ba tshe rab tshe rabs su/ /'gro ba kun la sman pa lhur sbyad cing/ /skad cig tsam yang dge ba rgya ch3n po/ /bgyid par mi 'gyur
302a6(mdo 'grel): bar ni ma gyur cig bran dang 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /bgyi ba ma lus pa dag bsgrub par bgyi/ /bdag gis kun gyi bgyi ba'i khur blangs nas/ /sems can rnams ni bde bar shog/ lus ni gzhan gyi bran bgyid tshig smra na'ang/ /gzhan
302b1(mdo 'grel): la chos ston pa la dga' ba dang/ /bdag gi yid kyang rtag tu gzhan dag la/ /phan par sems pa'i dbang du bgyid par shog/ gal te dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med du/ /gcig tu sdug bsngal nyams su myong na yang/ /'on kyang skyo ba dag ni ma mchis par/ /sems
302b2(mdo 'grel): can yongs su smin par bgyid par shog/ gcig gnas bsgrub pa'i rim 'di nyid kyis/ /lus can rnams ni 'dul bar bgyid slad du/ /'gro ba gsum po yongs su smin bgyi pa'i/ /go cha 'di nyid kyang ni dgo bar bgyi/ /me yi mdag mas par mtshams ma mchis
302b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /'obs rnams gang las brgal nas legs gsungs pa'i/ /tshig gcig tsam yang mnyan pa'i ched du ni/ /le lo ma mchis spro ba bgyid par shog /bsam gtan gzugs med ting 'dzin mdza' dag gi/ 'bras bu rnams la dga' ba spangs
302b4(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /rab tu mthar phyin pa yi gnas pa yis/ /dga' bar 'gyur ba dag tu goms par bgyi/ zhen pa ma mchis zhi gnas rta zhon nas/ /rang bzhin g.yo ba'i sems kyi glang po che/ /shin tu gdul bar dka' ba log pa yi/ /lam du zhugs pa
302b5(mdo 'grel): rnams? ni gdul bar bgyi/ /lha dbang dag dang 'khor los sgyur ba yi /'byor ba dam pa mchod dag mchis pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i rang bzhin mi gtsang ba bzhin du/ /bdag gi yid ni ltos pa ma mchis shog /lcags kyi khang pa 'ba' ? ba 'dra ba yi/ /srid
302b6(mdo 'grel): par rgyu bar bdag ni dgar ma gyur/ /snying rjes drangs pas gzhan la sman pa dag/ bgyid par rjes su mthun par skye bar shog /'gro ba'i mgon gyi sras po thams cad kyi/ /ting 'dzin gang zhig la ni dbang brnyis pas/ /rnam par bsgyings pa bsam
302b7(mdo 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa/ /dpa' bo rol pa sna tshogs mdzad pa yi/ /dpa' par 'gro ba dag dang nam mkha' i mdzod/ /dri med la sogs ma lus thob bgyid nas/ /'gro ba gsum po ma lus pa dag gis/ /bde ba gya nom bsgrubs nas rtser stsal to/ /kha zo dang
303a1(mdo 'grel): bstan bcas sgyu rtsal rgya mtsho dag /mchog tu pha mdza' phul du phyin pa dang/ /sems can thams cad kyis ni tshig gi don/ /ma lus pa dag rtogs shing mkhas par shog/ tshig don ma lus spyod pa'i shes rab ni/ /dri med rnon po dpag
303a2(mdo 'grel): tu med thob nas/ /sems can rnams la shin tu zab ba yi/ /rigs pa'i chos rnams kyis ni go bsha' bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gsung dag mthar phyin ma rtogs pa'i sems can ma lus pa ni mdza' dag la/ /sems la yi ge bris pa 'dra bar ni
303a3(mdo 'grel): mang po bdag gis rab tu bstan par bgyi/ /ci nas 'bras bur bcas pa stobs bcu yi/ /go 'phang mngon par 'dzegs nas 'gro ba'i don/ /ma tshad ma lus 'bras mchis bgyid pa yi/ /thabs kyi sbyod pa de dag bsgrub par bgyi/ /ji lta ji ltar
303a4(mdo 'grel): sems can phan pa'i rgyu/ /thub pa rnams kyi smon lam ma lus pa/ /de lta de ltar rgyun du smon lam gyi/ /pha rol phyin pa dag ni thob bar bgyi/ /yul gyi dgra yi tshogs ni mi bzad pa/ /mod la ma lus cing gar zil mnan nas/ /sems kyi spyod pa
303a5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni mi g.yo zhing/ /sa steng phan pa kho nas gnas par bgyi/ /chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma mig rgyu dang/ /sprul pa lta bur yang dag rtogs bgyis nas/ /rtog ba'i dri ma rnams ni spangs nas su/ /'jig rten gsum la phan pa bgyid gyur cig/ pha
303a6(mdo 'grel): dag bu gcig lhag par gces pa bzhin/ /nag nog ma lus pa dag spangs nas su/ /rgyun mi 'chad bar 'gro ba mdza' dag la/ /byams pa'i bsgom pa dag gis gnas par bgyi/ /ji ltar ma dag brtsebs khu 'jo ba'i/ /bu na ba la rjes su mthun spyod pa/ /de bzhin
303a7(mdo 'grel): bdag kyang 'gro ba sems can la/ /snying rjes rgyas 'gyur so sor bgyid par shog/ pha rol bde ba'i 'byor ba mthong nas ni/ /lhag par dka' ba mang po skyes nas su/ /snying gi bu gcig pa la bde skyes bzhin/ /dga' ba'i sgom pa dag gis
303b1(mdo 'grel): gnas par bgyi/ /sems can rnams la phan dang gnod pa'i rgyu/ /khong khro rjes su chags pa spangs nas ni/ /rang gi bu la bgyi ba bsgrub pa bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po kun gyi bgyi ba bsgrub/ /dbang dang mngon shes so sor rig pa dang/ gzungs dang rnam
303b2(mdo 'grel): par thar ba'i sgra rtogs nas/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag tu ma mchis ba'i/ /sems can rnams la phan pa dus gcig bgyi/ /sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'i sgra ni rna lam du/ /thos ma gyur ba'i yul khams gang lags pa/ /der ni thabs kyi rnam
303b3(mdo 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyi/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa dag dang mthun par bgyi/ /nam zhig 'jig rten 'dir ni srid gsum gyi/ /bla ma nyi ma shar bar ma gyur ba/ /der ni bdag gis nyi ma bzhin du ni/ /lus can kun gyi rab rib bsal bar bgyi/ /bde gshegs rab tu
303b4(mdo 'grel): mang pos spangs pa yi/ /yid dag sdig pas stsags pa song lags pa'i/ /'gro ba de ni bdag gi tshig dag gi/ spyod yul rnams la brten nas 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni 'jig rten ma lus ba dag gis/ /bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dag la nye du dang//
303b5(mdo 'grel): byams la mdza' bshes ma bzhin sgrub pa dang/ /pha bzhin phan ba'i gdams dag 'don par shog/ bdag gi ming ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang/ /'gro ba ma lus ba dag 'jig pa dag/ mdo la skyong bar gyur cig srid gsum gyi/ /sdug
303b6(mdo 'grel): bsngal ma lus pa dag spangs par shog/ phongs pa brgya phrag rten pa'i mi dag la/ /bum pa bzang dang nad pa'i sman dag ni/ /yi dags sogs la rgyun mi 'chad par yang/ /bdud rtsi'i chab kyi rdzing bu bzang por shog /bdag ni grang ba'i
303b7(mdo 'grel): dmyal bar dro ba dang/ /tsha bar rdzi char bcas pa'i char 'babs shing/ /gzhan yang shin tu smad pa'i dan 'gro dag/ gnod pa ma lus zhi bar bgyid par shog/ 'gro bas bdag ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang/ /phongs pa mngon sum gyur las? nyen
304a1(mdo 'grel): bshes dang/ /nyam thag mda' char 'bab la go sra dang/ /mya ngan me la bsil ba'i chab gyur cig/ 'gro ba dag gis dran na nyon mongs pa'i/ /dug gi gnyen bor gyur cing srid gsum gyi/ /chu bo dag la zam pa brtan po dang/ /ngan song gnas
304a2(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo gtan bgyid par shag/ bdag gi ming tsam dran na'ang 'jus pa bzhin/ /'gro ba ma lus srid pa'i g.yang sa ru/ /lhung ba zhi ba dag gi rtse mo la/ /'dzeg par gyur cing them skas gzhir gyur cig/ skad cig tsam te/? ra khro zhing bdag gi ming/ /blo la
304a3(mdo 'grel): dran pa tsam zhig bgyid bar shog/ ngan song rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /nges par byang chub yang dag sgrub par shog /bdag gi yon tan zla zer dri med ltar tA? 'jig rten ma lus pa la dger gyur cig/ dbugs tsam phyung ba rnams kyang
304a4(mdo 'grel): pha rol la/ /bde ba dpag med skyed par bgyid par shog/ shin tu phun sum chogs pa ma lus pa/ /mthar phyin pa yi sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /dam pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kho na la/ /'gro ba ma lus pa yang sbyar bar bgyi/ /de'i
304a5(mdo 'grel): tshe na su yi sems la yang gnyis byas phran tshigs tsam yang mi 'byung la/ /skye bo gzhan la rgyun tu phan bgyid cing/ /dge ba bcu yi lam la gnas par shog/ su yang rung ste/ /ngan song gnas rnams ni rmi lam na yang mthong bar
304a6(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur zhing/ /ngan 'gro rnams kyi gnas ni mdza' dag kyang/ /lha'i 'jig rten bzhin du dga' bar shog/ ji srid 'jig rten gsum gyi mi dge ba'i/ /mtsho klung dbus su 'ga' zhig chud na yang/ /sangs rgyas bgyi ba yongs su mthar phyin
304a7(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /de srid de yi ched du bsdad par bgyi/ /bdag ni mya ngan 'das 'gro ston pa na/ /gsung rab rnams ni 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing/ /de la 'ga' yang som nyi'i spyad thag la/ /skad cig tsam yang 'ju bar ma gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal
304b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i sras kyi rnam 'phrul la/ /mngon bsags bdag gi dge ba bsgrub pa gang/ /de ni 'gro ba ma lus 'di dag gi/ ma lus bar ni thun mong 'gyur bar shog/ slob dpon btsun pa gzhan la phan pa'i dbyangs dgon pa gsung rab mdza' dag chub bar byas
304b2(mdo 'grel): pa rtag gis rang la skyon de nags khung du phyin pa na/ /snying rjes gdung ba'i yid kyis 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa'i smon lam bdun cu pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harmmA sh+rI pra b+hA dang/ lo tsA ba banda? dpal gyis lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
304b3(mdo 'grel): gtan la phab po// //slob dpon kam shI las mdzad pa'i smon lam bcu gnyis ma bzhugs so// //dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brten nas sems skyes pa'i/ /dri ma med ba'i sbyin pa la/ /brten nas yin dag nyid grol te
304b4(mdo 'grel): de la yon dag mi re zhing/ /'jig rten re bzhi bar shog /sgo gsum dri ma med pa yi/ /tshul khrims rgyan dang ldan par shog/ sbyin ba 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ /rtag tu longs spyod ldan par shog/ longs spyod de la ma chags shing/ /sems can
304b5(mdo 'grel): kun la snying brtse bas/ /stod pa'i sems dang ldan par shog/ sbyin pa 'di yi sbyin rlabs kyis/ /dus 'dir bar du gcod pa yi/ /bgegs rnams ma lus zhi gyur nas/ /rkyen rnams ma lus bzlogs par shog/ bsrung bar gyur pa'i lha rnams
304b6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /g.yel ba med par bsrung bar shog/ yid ches rten te 'phel bar shog/ 'di dang phyi ma gnyis kar yang/ /mi rnams kun gyis khur bar shog/ shin tu phra bar gyur pa yi/ /sbyin pa shin tu chung 'gyur kyang/ /sems kyis thongs ba'i
304b7(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa 'di/ /dpag tu med pa 'phel 'gyur te/ /byang chub thob ba'i rten du shog/ bla med byang chub thob gyur nas/ /'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du shog / //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag kyang bde la ma chags shing/ /khe drang rnyed?
305a1(mdo 'grel): pa bkur sti dang/ /'jig rten snyan grags zhi bar shog /chags pa med pa'i rnga ma sems kyis/ /gzhan la re ba med par shog /phyogs 'dzin do bsrungs med par shog/ bdag gi dge ba mthar phyin nas/ /dri ma med pa'i dge ba
305a2(mdo 'grel): yis/ /gzhan gyi bsod nams 'phel nus shog /dri ma med bas kun dag shog /brjod pa'i stobs kyis kun bral shog/ bdag gzhan dge ba ma chad pa'i/ /bar chad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /byang chub 'bras bu thob nas kyang//
305a3(mdo 'grel): ngan 'gro bde la 'god pa dang/ /theg pa chung ngur sems bskyed nas/ /theg chen sa la 'god nus shog /slob dpon ka ma la sh+rI la'i smon lam cu gnyis ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten
305a4(mdo 'grel): dag gi phyogs kun na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs dang/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag/ de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /tshe rabs gang yang rung ba na/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag na
305a5(mdo 'grel): tshe rab 'di dang 'khor ba na/ /'dod chags dbang dang blun pa dang/ /khro bdag gis 'khrugs gyur te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nam/ /bla ma dag dang pha ma dang/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /sbyin gnas gang yang rung ba dang/ /de las gzhan
305a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems can dag /yon tan ldan dang mi ldan la/ /sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis dang/ /gang yang bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /gang yang cung zad yi rang ba/ /bag med pas ni phra mo yang/ /lus ngag yid kyis bgyis ba rnams/ /de dag ma lus blos
305a7(mdo 'grel): bsdus nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /bdag gis de ni mngon sum bzhin/ /rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyo ba'i yid du gyur pa yis/ /thal mo sbyar te nongs pa rnams/ /yang dang yang du so sor bshags/ /bdag gis
305b1(mdo 'grel): mi dge bgyid ba rnams/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa bzhin/ /de ltar bdag gis so sor bshags/ /slan chad de ltar yod mi bgyid/ /srog chags sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /gus pas
305b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag skyabs su mchi/ /de yi yon tan gus bsgrags te/ /sa la mgo bos gtugs nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la blo can gyis/ /de ltar gus pas skyabs su 'gro/ /de nas mchog gi sa bon gang/ /thar pa bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu sbyin/ /shin tu bsgoms
305b3(mdo 'grel): nas mchog gyur pa/ /dngos grub phyir ni de bskyed do/ /sems can khams ni mdza' yas pa'i/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang/ /ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang/ /nyon mongs rnams las dgrol ba'i phyir/ /srid pa mi bde dog pa na/ /sdug
305b4(mdo 'grel): bsngal sna tshogs ci mchis pa/ /de dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sems can phongs pa thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs skyabs su bdag nyid shog /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon/ /rten med rnams kyi rten du bdag
305b5(mdo 'grel): skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing/ /sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog /dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang/ /'di dang gzhan du bsags pa rnams/ /bsod nams
305b6(mdo 'grel): ye shes zhes bya ba'i/ /cho ga la ni rnam pa gnyis su shag /pha rol phyin pa drug sgo nas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus gang brtsams pa/ /de yang sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad la ni phan bar shog/ tshe yi mdza' klas byed pa dang/ /gang yang cung zad
305b7(mdo 'grel): byed 'gyur ba/ /mdor na sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi ba dang/ /grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing/ /byang chub rab tu dga' brtson no/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /cho ga bzhin du kun du bskyed/ /sems can
306a1(mdo 'grel): kun la snying rje dang/ /byams pa nye bar gnas par bya/ /sems ni legs par spyad pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rjes dran pa gnad gi bdag nyid zhi ba yis/ /bsam pa cig tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis//
306a2(mdo 'grel): smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang dge ba'i sems kyis su/ /de bzhin du ni smon lam 'debs/ /chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag nas yi rang ngo/ /sems can thams cad bde ba dang/ /zhi zhing nad ba med
306a3(mdo 'grel): par shog /bdag kyang bya ba kun nus shi ngag? yon tan dang yang ldan par shog /nor ldan gtong phod shes rab can/ /bzod ldan dge la dad pa yi/ /sems ldan tshe rabs thams cad du/ /skye ba dran cing brtser ldan shog /dpal leD
306a4(mdo 'grel): par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las gsung pa'i smon lam rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ /a gra tsarya pra Ni d+hA na/ /bod skad du/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye
306a5(mdo 'grel): dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud/ /de dag la ni brjod cing mchod par gyi/ /'gro kun byang chub mchog la rag gyur cig /byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag tog /chos kyi blo gros dpa' 
306a6(mdo 'grel): bo bdud rtsi gsungs/ /dpa' bo de la phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud/ /thugs rjes ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba/ /mi dbang thugs rtse
306a7(mdo 'grel): byams la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyid bdag gis bshags/ /de bzhin lus dag yid kyis bgyid pa rnams/ /de dag
306b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /shAkya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med/ /de dag gis ni phrin las yongs spangs dang/ /chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing rtags gyur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gi sdig pa bshags par bgyi? sems?
306b2(mdo 'grel): cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang/ /byang chub bzhugs ba kun la gsol bar 'tshal/ /ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig /mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog /sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang/ de bzhin
306b3(mdo 'grel): lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma sgron/ /de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin tshul khrims spyod rnams dang/ /shes rab
306b4(mdo 'grel): bsgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mdza' yas dang/ /chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyir? thams cad la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo/ /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/
306b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul/ /phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang/ /de dag sangs rgyas ji ltar gsol pa ltar/ /rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig /rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs bar
306b6(mdo 'grel): shog /'gro kun byang chub mchog la? reg gyur cig /mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma bder gshegs gyur gyur cig /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang/ /las dge rnams la yi rang gang la
306b7(mdo 'grel): lags dang/ /sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang/ /rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang/ /bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis ba/ /lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung/ /bdag gis dgyid? dang
307a1(mdo 'grel): bgyid dang bgyid 'gyur ? /thams cad skye dgu sman slad stsal ba bgyi/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas ka? stsal ba legs par rtsal zhing legs rgyas la/ /de bzhin bdag gi skye dgu sman slad rtsal
307a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /bdag gi 'gro la rtsal ba gang lags pa'i/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa/ /theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag la byang chub 'bras bu grub par shog /mtshungs pa
307a3(mdo 'grel): ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams/ /'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog /'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid cing/ /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi/ /mi gcig tsam gyi ched duAng mnar med pa'i/ /tshor ba thams
307a4(mdo 'grel): cad bdag gis myong 'gyur bar/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar bgyi/ /'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog /sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang/ /dud 'gro'i gnas rnams mi yi sdug bsngal dang/ /'gro ba'i sdug
307a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal gung? po mdza' yas dag bdag la bab 'gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag dang/ /sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mdza' yas gang/ /smon lam de kun bdag
307a6(mdo 'grel): la grub par shog /bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig bdag na nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur shog /byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog /mchog gi spyod ba'i smon lam rdzogs sho/ /
307a7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs ba/ glog gi dus su smon lam du gsol pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na ston pa bla na med pa sangs rgyas
307b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das/ zhi ba chos kyi sku/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ ma 'dres pa'i chos kyis brgyan la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la ston pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus
307b2(mdo 'grel): par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /bston pa bla med pa dam pa'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol pa/ 'phags pa so sor rang gis rig ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul/ /rnam grangs byis pa lta bu'i
307b3(mdo 'grel): spyod yul du ma gyur ba/ /don dam ba'i chos dang/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa thams cad gshegs pa'i bshul lam gyis chos 'phags pa'i lam lam yan lag brgyad kyis bsdus pa dang/ bstan pa'i chos skyes bu chen po'i dpal
307b4(mdo 'grel): gyi dgur nas legs bar gsungs pa/ /thog mar dge ba/ thar? du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang zhing tshig 'bru gsal ba/ /mngon par mthong ba/ nges par legs pa'i lan du gyur pa/ mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa bstan bcos la sogs pa dam pa'i chos yi
307b5(mdo 'grel): ge 'gru gnyed? gyis bsnyad pa thams cad la bstan pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing/ dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /sgrub pa bla na med pa/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa? 'jigs pa lnga
307b6(mdo 'grel): las shin tu 'das pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i go? 'phangs brnyes pa/ sa chen po la rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis rim par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras/ 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon du gyur cing/ sems can thams cad kyi
307b7(mdo 'grel): don mdzad pa la/ brtson pa sku nyams su bzhes pa rnams dang/ 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas rang gi shes kyi rtsal gyis go zhing/ bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin la dbang thob bas rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa rnams dang/ nyan thos?
308a1(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa gnas brtan chen po mchog bcu drug la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung las byung ba'i sras chos las skyes pa/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ /srid par kun du sbyor g.yongs su zad pa/ shes rab dang ting
308a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi cha las rnam par grol ba/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun gyis mchod cing phyag bya bar 'os pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mchod gnas dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus bas phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o
308a3(mdo 'grel): khyad par du yang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ /bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo dang/ sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ phyogs bcu'i byang
308a4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'khor mdza' yas pa dang bcas pa/ thams cad la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid rab tu dang bas gus par phyag 'tshal zhing
308a5(mdo 'grel): skyabs su mchi'o/ /dkon mchog gsum 'khor mdza' yas pa dang bcas pa phyag gi gnas/ /bsod nams kyi dpal gyi zhing mthu dang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ /mchod do/ bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /lus
308a6(mdo 'grel): dbul lo/ /srog phyogs so/ /dkon mchog gsum mchod nas de dag thams cad la mchod par 'bul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs las byung ba/ gser gyi
308a7(mdo 'grel): pad+ma stir 'dab ma stong dang/ gzhan yang mchod pa bla na med pa dang/ bla na med pa'i lha'i me tog dang/ lha'i bdug spos dang/ lha'i phreng ba dang/ lha'i byug pa dang/ lha'i na bza' dang/ rgyan dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdun? dag
308b1(mdo 'grel): gis rim gror bgyi'o/ /bkur sti bgyi'o/ /phu dud du bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te/ me tog
308b2(mdo 'grel): gi gsil ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dang/ dar gyi lda ldi dang/ tshun? po mang pos kun tu bres pa dang/ snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos mar po 'thul ba dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing mang po yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur za ba dang/ me tog gi shing dang
308b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'i shing dang/ spos kyi shing dang/ phreng ba'i shing dang/ 'dug spos sna tshogs kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur pa/ bla na ma mchis pa mchod bar dbul gyis ba zhes su gsol lo/ /da ltar gyi mchod pa rnam pa lnga la
308b4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa dngos su 'byor ba rnams kyang/ lha dang mi'i mchod pa khyad par can rgya chen por sprul pas/ /yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas
308b5(mdo 'grel): pa rnams mngon sum dang 'dra bar dmigs te/ mchod par dbul gyis bzhes su gsol lo/ /bdag gir mdzad du gsol lo/ /longs spyad nas mnyes shing dgyes pa chen bor mdzad du gsol lo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ 'khor ba thog ma
308b6(mdo 'grel): mchis pa nas/ /yang dag pa'i don ma mthong ste/ phyin ci log gis bslad nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mtshams med pa lnga dang/ de dang nye ba lnga dang/ mi dge ba bcu spyad pa dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las
308b7(mdo 'grel): bgyis pa dang/ sems can gzhan la gnod pa'i las rnam pa mang po bgyis pas/ /'khor pa dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur cing/ /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgrib par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las cis bgyis so/ /'tshal thams cad mi 'chang mi?
309a1(mdo 'grel): thed bar mnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis ma lus bar mthol zhing bshags so/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus
309a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa/ rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad la/ shin tu rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag dam pa'i chos btsun par mdzad pa'i slad du/ nad du yang dag 'jog la bzhag
309a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor zhing/ /bskul ba'i sa gzhes pa de dag la yang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam ba bcu gnyis/ /bden pa bzhi'i tshul du bskor nas dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab pas/ bskul zhing gsol/ /bde bar
309a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa gang dag gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing/ /'byor pa thams cad rgud par bstan te/ 'jig rten mi rtag par bstan pa'i slad du/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshigs nas/ /thabs kyis mya
309a5(mdo 'grel): ngan 'da' ba' i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag la yang/ thugs rje chen po'i gzugs kyis/ /'khor ba ma tongs kyi bar du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing/ /'jig rten na yun ring por bzhugs na/ lha dang mi'i ston pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
309a6(mdo 'grel): bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gis sems can ma lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du/ dkon mchog
309a7(mdo 'grel): gsum la skyabs su gsol te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de ltar phyag 'tshal ba nas byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i bar gyi dge pa'i rtsa ba dang/ srung ma thugs dam can mi bjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/
309b1(mdo 'grel): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa 'khor mdza' yas pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba chos thos pa/ bstan pa bsrung bar khas blang pa/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen po pa dag la chos dang zang zing? gi longs spyad rgya
309b2(mdo 'grel): chen po gtams shing phul ba dang/ 'gro ba ris drug khams gsum gyis bsdus pa/ lam rgyud lngar 'khor zhing/ 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi las skyes pa/ /ji cam? sems can gyi ris na mchis pa/ sems can bsdu bar
309b3(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa thams cad la yang bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po khyab par bsngos pa dang/ tshe rabs rgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang/ gnas dang/ dus dang/ longs spyod ji ltar
309b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i mched sbyin gyi gtor ma chen po bsngos shing stsal ba/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ gzhan yang bdag cag gi snga slad dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so/ /'tshal gyi mthu dang/ khyad par du yang yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
309b5(mdo 'grel): pa la sogs te/ shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs/ g.yo rgyu med par bris pa dang/ bklags shing gton pa dang/ mchod cing rim gro bgyid pa dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang/ lha dang drang srong la sogS
309b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang/ bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ /bdag cag gis mchod pa bsham pa'i gnas 'di/ /sngon bya rgod yi phung po'i ri la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas /thams cad dang ldan pa'i ' khor  gyi dkyil 'khor du/ yum
309b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing bshad pa de bzhin du/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur cing/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor
310a1(mdo 'grel): phun? bum? tshogs ba dang bcas pa/ pho drang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te/ mchod pa dang/ bklaD pa dang/ mdo sde dang/ mi mnyam pa dang/ mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang/ dngos grub kyi chog dang/
310a2(mdo 'grel): mchang pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cig 'khor dang bcas ba dang/ mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rab la gar skyes gar gnas kyang/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni byang/ ngan
310a3(mdo 'grel): song? gsum dang/ mi khom brgyad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par gral zhing thar te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong ste/ phyag g.yas pas
310a4(mdo 'grel): gser gyi kha dog can brgyad nas/ bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ong pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten khams 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas 'di lta bus zhes bya par 'gyur/ zhes lung bstan pa myur du thob nas bla na med
310a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du grub par gyur cig sangs rgyas ma grub kyi bar du 'jig rten 'di dag tu yang/ tshe 'di/ nad med/ longs spyod 'phel/ rigs rgyud rgyas zhing bde skyid phun bum? tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /mi dang mi ma yin pa
310a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dgra bgegs par du gcad pa cis kyang mi tshugs shing/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhan du 'grub par gyur cig /khyad bar du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos
310a7(mdo 'grel): spyod rnams pa bcu'i sgo nas chu la bzhin /bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab na yang/ mngor bsdus ba bcu ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su bgongs shing byin gyis brlab par 'gyur pa dang/ tshar sa pa dang
310b1(mdo 'grel): brgya byin la sogs pa bsrung ma thugs dam can rnams kyis bu bzhin du skyong bar 'gyur pa dang/ tshe? dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ /bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa gnod pa thams cad kyis bsam sbyor dan pas mi chugs pa dang/ gza'?
310b2(mdo 'grel): dang rma ltas la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlogs par 'gyur ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad pos pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur ba dang/ tshe rabs thams cad
310b3(mdo 'grel): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngon dang mi skol bar 'gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba dang/ mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mdza' yas shing rmad
310b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba rnams bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par ugyur cig /khyad par du yang bde? kyi rgyal khams su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por bzhugs par gyur cig 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su
310b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ ngan sems kyi 'khrug pa mi 'byung ba dang/ mi nang dang phyugs nad rgyun chad pa dang/ lo phyugs rtag tu legs/ char chu dus su phebs bde kyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad dge ba spyod ba'i bsam pa bzang po
310b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log sred can bstan pa bzhig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams na/ chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum la dad cing /dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i
310b7(mdo 'grel): bsam pa bzang po dang/ ldan pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe? ring zhing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig /bdag? dang sems can thams cad rnam pa kun tu/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i bbyin brlabs dang/ dus
311a1(mdo 'grel): gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis/ /gang dang gang na ji ltar gnas pa yi/ /sgrib dang sdug bsngal ma lus kun bsal cing/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas/ /rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus kun? bsgral te//
311a2(mdo 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing/ /rin chen mdzes pa rnam bkod bde ba can/ /bdud rtsi mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan/ /der 'byung skal ldan pad+ma'i mchog las skyes/ /yiD bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags
311a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sa/ /rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der/ /thog med brdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas/ /mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba/ /rin chen 'od 'bar sku mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs/ /tshe dang longs spyod dpag med
311a4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i gtso/ /snang ba mdza' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste/ /de las mchog thob lung bstan dbang bskur nas/ /rgyal sras gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing/ /phyogs bcur 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas/ /srid gsum
311a5(mdo 'grel): yongs kyi skyabs su gyur bar shog /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyoD kyi smon lam rdzogs sho// 'phags pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs mdo sde chen po bklags nas/ /chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsngo ba/ dam chos gsung
311a6(mdo 'grel): rab yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar bar/ /yid dang rin chen mang pos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /mkhyen bzhi shes bcu gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa yi/ /chos rjes sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ /chos
311a7(mdo 'grel): mdzad rang rgyal nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad la/ /lus btud dang ba'i spyi? bos phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ thugs rje snyoms pa'i mar dang ting 'dzin snying po laS
311b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i mar me 'bar/ /'od bzang bdud rtsis srid gsum 'jig rten thams cad khyab/ /sdug bsngal nad sel mi shes mun pa kun sel ba/ /dam chos mdo yi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bstan
311b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /dam pa'i chos lung bstan sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde las gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /dam chos
311b3(mdo 'grel): gling bzhi'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mtshal mgo? 'di ltar 'das pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /rmad? du
311b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /gtan 'bebs pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /skyes bu gang gis chos la gus pas gang zhig gis/ /blo dang
311b5(mdo 'grel): lce las dam chos sgron ma 'bar ba dang/ /mdo sde'i tshig 'bru bdud rtsi thigs pa 'ga' tsam yang/ /su yi snying dang lce la snang bar byed pa yi/ /blo gsal dag bzad skye bo ji snyed bzhugs gang la/ /dad pa'i sems kyi rjes su
311b6(mdo 'grel): yi rang phyag 'tshal nas/ tshas brjed seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs chos kyi sbyin pa 'di/ /'phags pa chos mnga' mdzad tshig la dbang sgyur dang/ /khyu mchog dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal tshab ji bzhin du/ /tshig gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i
311b7(mdo 'grel): sgra skad thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten so so'i yid mthun chos kyi 'char 'bab shog /'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings gzhi bya phrag mngon sum du shes pa'i
312a1(mdo 'grel): sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon bar 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' dbang sgyur ba thob pa rnams la/ gzhi kun du brten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab? bar
312a2(mdo 'grel): gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' i chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur
312a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la/ /kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon bar 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog ba rnams la snying rje chen po'i mchog shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
312a4(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa rnams la/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur
312a5(mdo 'grel): cig /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la /'gro ba yongs su bsdus pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char pa mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes
312a6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs ba'i sprin zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa
312a7(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang/ gzhi rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpal las dang po pa rnams la/ snying rje chen po'i tshul dang
312b1(mdo 'grel): thabs kyis snying po'i bye brag gi sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed ba rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu brtsegs pa'i snying po zhes
312b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa la mos pa rnams la/ rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya
312b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /gzugs la spyod ba'i sems can rnams la bzhi kun tu mi grad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho
312b4(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la/ stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
312b5(mdo 'grel): 'bab par gyur cig /bdud rigs kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /'phrul dga' i lha rnams la ye shes rin po
312b6(mdo 'grel): che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems pa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshar mngon
312b7(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'bab bar gyur cig /mche ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon bar 'bab par gyur cig /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin
313a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa mthong na dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /gnod? spyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
313a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bas rgyas bar 'gengs ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gre ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
313a3(mdo 'grel): char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /lha ma yin gyi dbang ba'i gnas su ye shes tshul rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprn gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par
313a4(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang/ 'phags pa'i
313a5(mdo 'grel): lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba
313a6(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor lhun zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon bar 'bab par gyur cig /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can
313a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi stong pa'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon bar 'bab bar gyur cig/ sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar rab tu thob pa'i dbugs dbyung
313b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dus thams cad du mchod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rtag par 'byung ba dang/ sems can
313b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grogs su gyur te/ phyogs bcu na byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa rnams ni skyes par gyur cig /sems skyes pa rnams ni
313b3(mdo 'grel): slar ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig /slar ldog pa'i sa thob pa rnams ni/ slar mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig /slar mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa rnams ni //na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob ste/ sems can thamS
313b4(mdo 'grel): cad kyi don yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grogs su gyur te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ /theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i sgor gzhol zhing 'bab bar shog cig /'jig rten
313b5(mdo 'grel): skyong ba tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis grogs su gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi dgra las rgyal ba dang/ so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /longs spyod kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po bzhi grogS
313b6(mdo 'grel): su gyur te/ so so'i rnam par thar sgo kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /longs spyod kyis rgyas par cig /'jig rten skyong ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /blon po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi grogs su gyur te/ lha so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun
313b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par gyur cig /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po thams cad kyi grogs su gyur te/ so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par gyur cig /'byung ba
314a1(mdo 'grel): chen po bzhi dang/ lo tog gi lha dang/ sman gyi lha la sogs mi dang mi ma yin pa'i ris na/ 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed bzhugs pa'i grogs su gyur te/ so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par
314a2(mdo 'grel): gyur cig /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bsngos pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'di lha'i 'jig rten thams cad du khyab ste/ lha'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig /mi'i? ris thams cad du khyab ste/ mi'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid bar shog cig/
314a3(mdo 'grel): klu'i rigs thams cad du khyab ste/ klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dge zhing skyid bar shog cig gnod sbyin gyi ris thams cad du khyab ste/ gnod sbyin gyi ris dge zhing skyid par shog cig /dri za'i ris thams cad du khyab ste/ dri za'i 'jig rten dge
314a4(mdo 'grel): zhing skyid par shog cig /lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du khyab ste/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig /gshin rje'i ris thams cad du khyab ste /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag zhin skyid par shog cig /de bzhin du mi
314a5(mdo 'grel): 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ grul bum dang/ srin po'i ris thams cad du khyab ste /so so'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig /byol song gi ris thams cad du khyab ste/ byol song gi 'jig rten dge zhing
314a6(mdo 'grel): skyid par shog cig /dbang po gsal bar gyur cig /yid dags kyi gnas ris thams cad du khyab ste/ yi dags kyi 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig /dmyal ba'i ris thams cad du khyab ste /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad
314a7(mdo 'grel): rab tu zhi nas/ /dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig /snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad du khyab ste /sa'i bdag po thams cad dgyes shing zhi nas phan 'dogs bas sprin chen po dus dus su 'du/ 'brug sgra dus dus su sgrogs
314b1(mdo 'grel): shing/ char chu dus dus su 'bab ste/ lo tog skye 'khrungs dus su smin cing 'phel bar shog cig /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la khyab ste/ gnas thams cad dang dus thams cad du/ dam pa'i chos rnam pa thams cad du/ kun tu rgyas shing rdzogs par shog
314b2(mdo 'grel): cig/ yon bdag thams cad kyi ris su khyab ste /legs pa'i yon tan thams cad rgyas shing 'phel ba dang/ nyes pa'i skyon thams cad byang zhing zhi nas/ yid la bsam shing bzang por smon pa thams cad grub par shog /cig bsam
314b3(mdo 'grel): ba myur du 'grub par shog cig /rdzogs sho// //bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal gyis mdzad pa'i sngo ba bzhugs so// //rkang gnyis mchod gyur rgyal ba sras bcas dang/ /chags sdang bral ba'i dam chos bdud rtsi dang/ /sdug bsngal chogs
314b4(mdo 'grel): gsal dge 'dun tshogs rnams la/ /lus dang dag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /lus kyi gus bcas bsti stang dab bsgrubs te/ /dang sems 'dun bcas rtogs ldan gsal 'gyur la/ /yon tan pa sngags pa mdza' yas rab brjod de/ /mgon po sras
314b5(mdo 'grel): bcas bdag gis rab tu bstod/ /me tog phreng ba sil snyan mchog rnams dang/ /byug pa gdugs dang mar me bdug spos rnams/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis dbul bar gyi/ /rin chen na bza' rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /gduD dang bla re pho brang gdan
314b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs/ /khyad par can gyi rgya mtsho thams cad kun/ /thabs mkhas kun rdzob byang chub sems yin te/ /'gro ba'i don du dang bas bdag 'bul gyis/ /thugs brtser dgongs nas 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /gnyis med mdza' bral don dam
314b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems/ /bsngo dang bsngo bya nam mkha' i dbyings 'dra yang/ /sngon spyod rgyal sras bsngo mdzad ji bzhin du/ /shes rab rtsal gyis bdag gis bsngo bar bgyi/ /phyogs su dus kun gyi rgyal ba sras bcas dang/ /dam chos bsrung ba nyid kyis
315a1(mdo 'grel): zhal 'ches pa'i/ /tshangs ris tshangs bcas 'og min lha la sogs/ /gzhan 'phrul 'phrul dga' dga' ldan 'thab bral dang/ /brgya byin nye dbang rgyal chen phyogs skyong bcas/ /sa 'og sa steng nam mkha' bar snang bcas/ /bsod
315a2(mdo 'grel): nams tshogs? ldan lha tshogs mang po kun/ /thugs brtser dgongs nas dbang po mdzad du gsol/ /khyed kyi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa ni/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can thams cad kyi/ /thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du/ /bdag
315a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin sgyu mkhan log pa'i sems brgyud nas/ /nyon mongs drug dang nye ba nyi shu yi/ /dbang du gyur nas sdig pa'i las byas pa'i/ /mtshams med lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga/ /mi dge bcu dang mi khom brgyad la sogs/ /bya bar ma 'ongs bdag gis bgyis
315a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi rkyin song nas/ /bdud rtsi spangs nas dug 'thungs ji bzhin du/ yang dag lta spyod dam tshig spangs nas ni/ /log pa'i lta spyod dam tshig mchog bzung nas/ /sdig pa'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho tshul 'dra la/ /bdag dang
315a5(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas sems can thams cad kyis/ /rang gis bgyid dang bgyid du rtsal ba dang/ bgyid par byed la rjes su yi rang bas/ /sems dmyal dung 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten ba'i/ /'bras bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong 'gyur kun/ /dang sems brtson
315a6(mdo 'grel): pas rab tu bshags 'gyur bas/ /myong bar ma gyur smin par ma gyur cig /deng nas bzung nas ma 'ongs dus su yang/ /rkyen du mi 'tsham sdig pa'i las rnams kun/ /nam yang mi bgyid dam du bcas pas na/ /'phags pa'i 'khor tshogs
315a7(mdo 'grel): thugs rje che rnams kyi/ tshangs ba rtsol nas byin gyis rlob tu gsol/ /byang chub snying po myur du bgrod pa dang/ 'gro ba ma lus byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dang ba'i sems kyis dge ba bsngo ba ni/ /thog ma med nas da lta'i dus grang? du//
315b1(mdo 'grel): bla med byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab gnyis med nges ba'i tshul rtogs shing/ /thabs mkhas snying rje sku gsung thugs dang ni/ /sku gsum 'phro 'du 'phrin las rnam bzhi yis/ /snying rje bskyed nas dge ba ci bsags dang/ sku gsung
315b2(mdo 'grel): thugs kyi mtshan ma bris pa dang/ /bla na yod med mchod pa rgya chen dang/ mchod nas sbyin gnas sbyin pa rnam gnyis dang/ nyan dang len dang de bzhin bklags pa dang/ kha ton dag dang ci rigs bshad pa dang/ tshul bzhin sems dang sgom pas
315b3(mdo 'grel): mthar byung? dang/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms dang/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang/ /bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang stobs dang ni/ /smon lam dang ni de bzhin ye shes dang/ /rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga dang ni//
315b4(mdo 'grel): dran pa brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang/ /dbang stobs yan lag 'phags pa'i lam rnams dang/ /phyi nang rten 'brel rgyu 'bras phye ba dang/ /gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs dang/ /ma 'dres chos dang rnam pa kun khyen dang/ /thabs
315b5(mdo 'grel): dang shes rab bden gnyis bden bzhi dang/ /snyoms par 'jug dgu zad par bcu dag dang/ /rnam thar brgyad dang rnam thar gsum dag dang/ /bsam gtan brgyad dang dge ba bcu la sogs/ /de la sogs te dge ba ji snyed pa/ /rgyal ba
315b6(mdo 'grel): sras dang bcas pas dang? bsngags pa/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i lam/ /nye lam dam pa shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /bdag gis bsgrubs dang bsgrub tu rtsal ba dang/ /sgrub par byed la rjes su yi rang bas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag
315b7(mdo 'grel): gis ci bsags dang/ /skal pa mnyam pas rigs kyi bu mchog rnams/ /bsam pa dag pas brtson 'grus rab bskyed nas/ /byang chub sgrub phyir dge ba ci bsags dang/ phyogs dus kun gyi rgyal ba sras bcas pas/ /dang por thugs
316a1(mdo 'grel): bskyed dam chos gnas par bgyi/ /dge ba'i yon tan khyad par ci mdzad dang/ /mdza' yas mu med 'jig rten rab 'byams na /'gro cug sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid gyis yang ?
316a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i yon tan khyad par ci bsags pa/ /thabs mkhas bcas pas snying rje cher bskyed nas/ /'gro ba'i don tu dge ba bsngo ba ni/ /rgyal brgya mtsho tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyan dang longs spyod mchog gis klubs gyur cig/ phyogs
316a3(mdo 'grel): dus kun na bzhugs pa rgyal pa'i sras/ /sa bcu rgyal tshab srid pa tham pa/ /shes bya bag chags rtsa nas bsal nas su/ /byang chub snying po shin tu nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje'i gdan mchog myur du mnan nas kyang/ /bdud rnams sder bcas
316a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu pham mdzad nas/ /zhing gi rdul bsnyed mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po skong gyur cig/ tshogs kyi lam rtags bcu gsum rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /skyes bu dam pa dad pa thob pa dang/ /des 'byed yan lag
316a5(mdo 'grel): ting 'dzin bzhi spyangs nas/ /sbyor ba'i sa gzhings par non pa dang/ /dang po thob nas dgu la thug par gyi/ /skyes mchog dam pa thug rje mda' rnams kyi/ /brtson 'grus drag po'i me chen sbar nas su/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes
316a6(mdo 'grel): chen po yis/ /'og ma'i skyon rnams myur du bsal nas kyang/ /kun gyis mthun par byang chub thob par shog/ ma nor tshul bzhin dge ba 'di bsngos pas/ /cho gas dang bse ru lta bu'i rang rgyal rnams/ /rgyu rkyen rten 'brel ting
316a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin sbyangs nas su/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog brnyes nas/ /'gro ba ma lus thabs kyiS sgrol mdzad cing/ /sa bcu'i yon tan lhun gyis rdzogs gyur cig dge bshes dam pa'i drin la rab gnas shing/ /dbang po sgron?
316b1(mdo 'grel): med 'dun dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /nyan thos shes pa'i tha snyad ldan pa rnams/ /chos la bdag 'dzin ting 'dzin sbyangs nas su/ /theg pa chen po'i sems la gzhol bar shog/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tshul bzhin bsngos pa 'dis/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas rnam shes mdza' 
316b2(mdo 'grel): yas dang/ /ci yang med dang srid pa'i rtse mo pa/ /bdag dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin sbyangs nas su/ /bla med byang chub myur tu thob par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /bsam gtan bzhi gsum bcu gnyis la gsol te/ /gzugs khams
316b3(mdo 'grel): lha tshogs mang po thams cad kun/ /bdag 'dzin sgyu mkhan de dag bsal nas kyang/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /gzhan 'phrul 'phrul dga' dga' ldan 'thab bral dang/ /sum cu gsum
316b4(mdo 'grel): brgyal chen sa bla ba/ /'dod khams ris drug lha tshogs thams cad kun/ /dge bcu dpag med yon tan bsgrubs nas su/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /lha ma yin gyi ris su rtogs pa rnams/ /pa
316b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal phrag dog dug rnams spangs nas su/ /byang chub gsum gyi go 'phang thob par shog/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /gling na gnas pa'i mi rnams thams cad kun/ /sdug bsngal dug gsum skyon rnams rab spangs nas/ /byang chub
316b6(mdo 'grel): mchog tu sngon sems bskyed pa rnams/ sems de rgyas shing yon tan rdzogs gyur cig/ sngon chad nam yang dad sems ma bskyed pa/ /dad dang mos pa'i sems su gyur nas su/ /lus dag yid kyi brtson 'grus bskyed nas ni/ /byang chub sgrub la
316b7(mdo 'grel): som nyi med par shog/ gzhan yang phran tshegs sdug bsngal 'di dag kyang/ /rnams kyang mi 'byung byung yang zhi bar shog/ long pas gzugs mthong 'on pas sgra thos shing/ /dge? pas smra shes smyon pas dran rnyed shos zha po rnams kyang
317a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rangs pa dang/ /nad ba rnams kyang myur du sos par shog/ dbul po rnams kyis rtag tu nor rnyed cing/ /bkres skom rnams kyis zas skom rnyed par shog/ gos med rnams kyang gos dang ldan pa dang/ /de la sogs pa
317a2(mdo 'grel): phongs pa'i sdug bsngal kun/ /thams cad bsal nas sgra mi snyan bzhin du/ bde ba kun gyis stan tu rgyas nas kyang/ /bsod nams 'bras bu rtag tu grub par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /mdza' yas 'jig rten
317a3(mdo 'grel): khams kyi byol song rnams/ /gleng zhing gti mug par ni gyur pa dang /gcig la gcig ni gnod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /myur du bsal nas lha mi thob par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten
317a4(mdo 'grel): khams kyi yi dags rnams/ /bkres skom sdug bsngal rnams ni bsal nas kyang/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba'i mchog la gnas/ /byang chub sgrub la som nyi med par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /'jig rten khams
317a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sems dmyal ji snyed pa/ /tsha grangs sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /ba mo la ni nyi zer ji bzhin du/ /myur du zhi nas lha ma'i bde ba dang/ /byang chub sgrub la the tshom med par shog/ mdor na mdza' yas sems can thams cad kyis/ /sdig pa
317a6(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs ma lus kun bsal nas/ /sdug bsngal 'bras bu kun las thar ba dang/ /bla med byang chub mthun pa thob par shog/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar brtsams pa yang/ /bdag phyir ma yin 'gro ba'i phyir brtsams pas/ deng nas
317a7(mdo 'grel): bzung nas byang chub thob par shog/ mi khom brgyad dang gtan du bral gyur cig/ grogs mcho dam pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas/ /gang nas gang du byang chub sgrub pa'i tshe/ /phrad par gyur nas spyod par mi smon pa/ /lha mi'i longs
317b1(mdo 'grel): spyod mchog tu bde ba dang/ /rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin snyan tshig rnams/ /'gro ba'i don du spyod pa ma gtogs pa/ /slus shing chags par nam yang ma gyur cig/ rig pa'i gnas la sogs pa'i bya byed kun/ /mthong thos tha snyad bzhis ni bsgrub
317b2(mdo 'grel): nas su/ /thabs mkhas snying rjes 'gro don ma togs pa/ /spyod par ma gyur slob par mi gyur cig/ yul 'khor non dang 'byung ba'i gter rnams dang/ /pha ma phu nu de bzhin spun rnams dang/ /bu dang chung ma khyim dang bad mdzod dang/ /bran
317b3(mdo 'grel): pho bran mo rta dang glang po dang/ /de la sogs pa bya byed thams cad kun/ /thabs mkhas snying rjes spyod pa ma togs par slus shing chags par nam yang ma gyur cig/ rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus mchod pa dang/ /'gro ba ma lus byang chub
317b4(mdo 'grel): bsgral ba'i phyir/ /mgo gcod pa dang rna ba sna gcod dang/ /snying dang rkang dang rus pha khrag rnams dang/ /pags pa rnams dang yan lag nyid lag rnams/ /dgos pa'i don tu spyod pa'i dbang thob nas/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin rtag tu gtong bar shog/
317b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub snying po myur du thob bya'i phyir/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod cing mchod pa dang/ /sdig pa bshags shing tshul bzhin bsngos pa dang/ /yid dam bcas na nam yang mi 'bral bas/ /byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen thob nas su/ /ji
317b6(mdo 'grel): ltar mthun par 'gro ba'i don spyad nas/ /byang chub snying po myur du song nas ni/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas par tshar bcad nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen skor gyur cig /lha dang lha ma ni mi la sogs pa yi/ /grogs mchog dam pa
317b7(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor spyod rnams kyis/ /lta spyod dam tshig shes rab rtsal bzung nas/ /kun gyis bdag bzhin bsgrub par mdzad du gsol/ /bsngo ba bla chen po dgongs pa gsal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
318a1(mdo 'grel): bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyi mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon pa
318a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/ /lha cig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshigs gsol te// /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags/ /bcom
318a3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed na/ /de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang/ /sngon chad bsod nams byas
318a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /sems ni legs par gtang byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin dang shin tu smra ba dang/ /yang dag don la rnam nges dang/ /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams
318a5(mdo 'grel): la mi rten dang/ /mkhas pa rnams la brten pa dang/ /mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /do ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ /zhi dang tshangs dang spyod pa dang/ /'byung po kun la snying rtse ba/ /de ni
318a6(mdo 'grel): bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sdig pa'i lam las ldog pa dang/ /dge ba'i las la brten pa dang/ /bag yod pa dang brtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang/ /chog shes mthun pas 'tsho ba
318a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /mi smod de bzhin bzod pa dang/ /'phags pa rnams dang mthun 'byor ba/ /dus skabs su ni chos nyan dang/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /le lo med dang mang zos
318b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /chos la legs par rnam nges dang/ /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni rab sgom zhing/ /dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa/ de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang
318b2(mdo 'grel): zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig ni rab sbyangs dang/ /tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang/ /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'thob
318b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang/ /ma rig pa dag rnam spangs dang/ /shes ba mi 'khrug skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang/ /gang gi sems ni
318b4(mdo 'grel): ma g.yo dang/ /dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang de dang 'dir ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis 'di dag ni/ /mkhas pa zhig rjod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
318b5(mdo 'grel): bde legs kyi bkra shis tshugs su bcad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /swa sti dA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs su gcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha cig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs
318b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas chen po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur/ /des ni? tshig de gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu rjod byed pa/ /da yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris
318b7(mdo 'grel): na/ /rin chen rmad byung rgya chen mchog yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /cis kyang grangs dang bgrangs dang char mi phong/ /ngo tshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten chog
319a1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar ra'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang/ /shAkya thub pas mnyam gzhag thugs chud pas/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /de mngon rgyas
319a2(mdo 'grel): na phyin chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad
319a3(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa/ /de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas de dag sa steng bzhin du dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo tshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji
319a4(mdo 'grel): ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gis dam pa mchog/
319a5(mdo 'grel): mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs
319a6(mdo 'grel): shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang/ /mdza' las blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas na/ /ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting
319a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rin chen 'jig rten 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog tu/ /'den pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste/ /stobs chen rlung bzhin dag gis mi bskyed pa/ /de ltar
319b1(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi yod/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni
319b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu bde legs shog thams cad zil non kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig/ /ngo mtshar
319b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu rmad byung dpag med do/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ bden pa 'dis na shin tu bde legs shog/ srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yor 'gyur ba med/ /skyon med 'jigs pa
319b4(mdo 'grel): kun las rnam par grol/ /shin tu 'gag cing gya nom nges par 'byung/ /shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phros/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na//
319b5(mdo 'grel): bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing/ /bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dgongs bral ba/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /ngo mtshar
319b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa rnams kyis dam pa don dam mkhyen/ mchog dang mchog
319b7(mdo 'grel): min mkhyen cing don dam brtson/ /gzhan gyi mi phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchod?
320a1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ 'dun pa bskyed pas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing/ /gau tam brtan la rtag rtson rab grol zhing/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhing
320a2(mdo 'grel): de re dag/ 'di la de rig grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i da'i de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bden pa ng ngag dang ni/ /yi
320a3(mdo 'grel): rgya lam na/ /gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang/ /de ??ni de 'chab ba yin 'os min te/ /chos nyid 'di ni si g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig
320a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston ba bla na med/ /ston pa
320a5(mdo 'grel): ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog ngo mtshar shin tu slad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ so ga'i zla ba dang por thub
320a6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni ltag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /'di la de dag grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu slad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar
320a7(mdo 'grel): de'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sdig pa snying zad gsar du byas mang la/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan gral/ /rtsa ba 'gag pas srid pa mi skyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me shin tu
320b1(mdo 'grel): 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad gyur dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden la 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog lhas zhus pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcas pa
320b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs sto// //rgya gar skad du/ swa skya ya na gA sla/ /bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ lha zhig nye bar song nas su/ /gang gis rtag tu bde legs pa/ /bdag gis
320b3(mdo 'grel): zhu yis bcom ldan gsung/ /dam pas de dag gsan pa dang/ /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /gang gis kun du bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lha khyod legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /dad la mi g.yo legs rab bstan
320b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can ? de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang/ /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /rtag tu legs par gnyen bkur pa/ /de dag kun tu legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs
320b5(mdo 'grel): par rab tu yon tan 'bul dang/ /lta yi bka' zhes byed pa dag/ de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gi lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang/ /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur//
320b6(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la/ /tshad med kun tu mi 'khrugs pa/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa
320b7(mdo 'grel): thegs dgom pa/ de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad ni/ /stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing/ /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus akyis dri med chos/ /mngon gsum 
321a1(mdo 'grel): byas nas 'gyur ba dang/ /dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang/ /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing/ /ye shes 'khrugs med skyed gyur bshad
321a2(mdo 'grel): dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /lhas zhus pa'i bde legs gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs ho// //
321a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srungs rigs skyed pa/ /rnam par
321a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar gshegs gyur ba/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gser thub sgrib pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ /rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir
321a5(mdo 'grel): yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bsod skyab gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'di re yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ dkra shis dam pa
321a6(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gis/ /thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba// /mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa
321a7(mdo 'grel): zil gyis mi non ba/ /rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'di? de yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs ba skyes bu zla ba mi yi mgon/ /rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa//
321b1(mdo 'grel): des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing bstan pa de/ /ma la ya yi rtser gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis
321b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas ston mchog thos pa mi mnga' ba/ /dri med zla bar gshegs gyur ba/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /grags pa dri ma med par mgon po pad+ma pad+ma'i zla/ /dri ma med par shegs
321b3(mdo 'grel): gyur ba/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'ong snang mnga' ba des/ /'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang dkra shis legs gyur cig bcom ldan
321b4(mdo 'grel): 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcang pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis//
321b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas grags pa'i dam par mtshan btags pa/ /nor bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ dkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags ba/ /sbyangs pa'i
321b6(mdo 'grel): lam du gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sgrib med gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i sbyan tu mtshan btags pa/ /rgyan cig ldan par shegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang dkra
321b7(mdo 'grel): shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma mang? me mdzad ces mtshan btags ba/ /rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig
322a1(mdo 'grel): gis/ bder gshegs yang dag don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa/ /dri med rtse mor gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rang rgyur
322a2(mdo 'grel): mchog ces mtshan btags ba/ /rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkris dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma dbyig gi lha zhes mtshan btags ba/ /dri med sna tshogs gshegs pa
322a3(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa/ /thams cad tshal du gshegs pa ltar/ /nges ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis
322a4(mdo 'grel): dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyi rgyal bar mtshan btags pa/ /dga' ba'i rgyun tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten pan
322a5(mdo 'grel): brtson dka' thub drag por mtshan btags pa/ /kun nas mchog tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe mas bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa'o// //
322a6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das lhi? rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /chags ba med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa/
322a7(mdo 'grel): pho rang mchog tu rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /ye shes mdza' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /kha dog gser du rab gshegs
322b1(mdo 'grel): des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkris dam pa gang zhig gis/ /kun tu mdza' yas sbyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /pad+ma'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam par
322b2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gis/ /yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ rin chen mdzad du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /dpal rab
322b3(mdo 'grel): rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yon tan thams cad stan pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa/ /me tog snying
322b4(mdo 'grel): por rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yan lag 'od zer mdza' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/ shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
322b5(mdo 'grel): legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po the tshom 'joms ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan de/ /rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mi li
322b6(mdo 'grel): seng+ge ye shes sgron ma mdza' yas pa/ /spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba/ /nor bus brgyan par
322b7(mdo 'grel): rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis bkri shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas phal po che las gsungs pa'i bkra shis tshigs su bcang ba'o?//
323a1(mdo 'grel): shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi bkra shis don 'grub cing/ /phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des/ /khyed kyis don rnams 'grub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du mthug par
323a2(mdo 'grel): shog/ phred ba mgo la 'dug ba ltar/ /lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog/ g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog chod pa dag ni nor cho la zhing/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/ /rnyed pa chen bo
323a3(mdo 'grel): rnyed gyur cig/ de dag bde ba bskyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni smar ma dang/ /mgo dang lag dang nabs so dang/ /rgyal dang
323a4(mdo 'grel): skag ces bya ba ste/ /de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /shar phyogs log na yod ces bya/ /de dag khyed la kun tu bsrung/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /yul 'khor bsrung zhes
323a5(mdo 'grel): grags pa ste/ /de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa/ /mkhas shing ming yod pa/ /mthun pa ste// / dgu bcu rtsa cig zad par yang/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med
323a6(mdo 'grel): cing/ /shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang/ /don 'grub ma dang mi pham dang/ /dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang/ /dga' can
323a7(mdo 'grel): ma dang dga' 'phel ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/ /de rnams kyis
323b1(mdo 'grel): ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la
323b2(mdo 'grel): gang gi phyir/ /lha phyogs su ni 'gro ba la/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mchu da dgrod? ngo bo dang ni/ /me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin/ /sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/ /da dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag
323b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu bsrung/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ni grul?  bum kun gyi bdag /gshin rje lhan cig bsrung par
323b4(mdo 'grel): shog/ /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu cu rtsa gcig zang par yang/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nang med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs
323b5(mdo 'grel): chan/ /lha mo gzhan cu brgyab? yod de/ /dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/ /grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin ma/ /legs par langs dang rab snga dang/ /legs par sad dad bde sgrub ma/ /de dag khyed la nar med cing/ /shis ba lhag bar
323b6(mdo 'grel): skyong bar shog/ lha phyogs logs? kyi phyogs chan/ /pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rtag tu gzi rjid kyis kyang 'bar/ /rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing/ /shes par lhag par skyong gyur cig/
323b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs cu? khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cag/ lha rnams kun phyis rang gsungs nas/ /nor rnams snyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas?
324a1(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang/ /brtson 'grus brtan ldan smrubs? dang ni/ /chu stong chu sma ? dbyi bzhin dang/ /gro bzhin da ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba
324a2(mdo 'grel): grags ldan pa/ /nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/ /de ni kU? rnams kun gyi bdag chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mar yod
324a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa des/ /dgu cu rtsag cig zad par yang/ /bzang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ lha mi gzhon nu
324a4(mdo 'grel): brgyad yod de/ /rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/ /pad+ma dkar dang skya rangs dang/ /cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang/ /rol dang gnag dang stobs myur sing/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing/ /shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na//
324a5(mdo 'grel): nub ces bya ba'i ngo bo yod/ /nyi ma za ba gnyis ka'ang nub/ /nub ba'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed bcag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha
324a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nong rnams rnyed nas ldog par shog/ /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /byang phyogs su ni 'gro pa na/ gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mon gra dang ni mon gru dang/ /khrus
324a7(mdo 'grel): stong dang ni khrums slang dang/ /nam gru dang na tha dkar dang/ bra nye dad ni bdun yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po da dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu bsrung/ /de dag bdag po rgyal
324b1(mdo 'grel): po ni/ /mi la gzhon pa lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin kun gyis bdag po ste/ nor? bzang lhan cig bsrung par shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa/ /mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu cu rtsa gcig zad par yang/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ de dag
