324b2(mdo 'grel): khyed la nang med cing/ shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rab chags lha mo stong lha mo/ /sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can/ /rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang/ /de dang khrel yod
324b3(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan ma/ /de dag khyed la nang med cing/ /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs legs kyi phyogs cha na/ /spos dang ldan pa'i ri go? yod/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas/ /rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med
324b4(mdo 'grel): cing/ shes par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed da ldog par shos/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/ /phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun
324b5(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/ /dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/ /yul rnams ni ni grong brdal brgyad/ /dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/ /de dag khyed la kun tu bsrung/ /khyed cag
324b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro na'ang brka shis gyur/ /ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog gnyen gyis lta na'ang bkra shis shog/ dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang/ /dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas/ /thams cad du ni bkra shis dang/ /bdud rtsi shis ba thob par
324b7(mdo 'grel): shog/ tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang /zag pa med pa rnams par grol rnams dang/ /klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes bsrung/ /ston brgya mtshungs par chen skyong bar shog/ 'phags pa rgya tshar ngol pa'i mdo'i/ tshod dpon ?
325a1(mdo 'grel): bzang po'i le'u las byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //legs par gyur cig/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'chal lo
325a2(mdo 'grel): gang la ser sna rnams chags pa/ /rnam 'dzoms dri ma med mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzod par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'jud mdzad cing/ /chos
325a3(mdo 'grel): rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mang la mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig?
325a4(mdo 'grel): byams pa yi/ /thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyed de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'bor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing/ /gling dang dbung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde
325a5(mdo 'grel): legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gcad zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung bcang ga bu? mang mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyos pas/ /phun sum tshogs
325a6(mdo 'grel): don 'byor gyur cig/ don 'grub tshogs kyang grub pa te/ /byed la bde legs mdzad par gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos nas/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad
325a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cig /bdung ming mi bder gyur pa te/ khyed la bde legs bcas par gyur/ /tshos kyi 'khor lo skor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa ? gsungs pas
325b1(mdo 'grel): thub pa'i grags pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad de/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed ?
325b2(mdo 'grel): legs mdzad/ brgya byin ltar bcas bde legs dang/ /'byung po kun gyis bde legs ni/ khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang/ /lha rnams gyis ni bsams pa yi/ /khyed kyis don 'dar gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur
325b3(mdo 'grel): cig/ de dag nyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ nyin ma'i gung la bde legs shing/ /khyed rnams kun
325b4(mdo 'grel): la bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig sangs rgyas lta ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems can rnams phyer gyur cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams khong/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams
325b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di na stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig gnas gyur cig/ thams cad nad ni nang gyur cig
325b6(mdo 'grel): kun gyi bzang po mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung bo gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cig/ sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cig/ nyin dang mtshan tu tshos la spyod par shog/ yangs
325b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i grong khyer tu 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa nrdzogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di 'am yang na ? pa dang 
326a1(mdo 'grel): mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis lhar gyur pa/ /mi mchog de dang 'di ni mtshungs pa med/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog bu gsungs/ /bden pa de yi 'dir ni dge bar shog zad pa chags
326a2(mdo 'grel): bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ shes par shAkya thub de rab tu phye/ bdug rtse zhi ba 'dus ma byas yin pa/ /yos? de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog du gsung/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /zad
326a3(mdo 'grel): ba chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab tu bstan/ /ston pa'i bla med rnal 'byor rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/ /ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'dir
326a4(mdo 'grel): ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po brgyad pos ngab bsngags shar/ /gang zag zung bzhin brjod pa de dag ni/ /drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ bde bar gshegs pa sbyin pa'i
326a5(mdo 'grel): gnas zhes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu tshan 'gyur te/ /zhing rab gshin las bon btab pa shin/ 'di ni dge 'dun? rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab
326a6(mdo 'grel): brtson zhing/ /gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thos nas bdud rtsi mchog thob ste/ /mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mthong
326a7(mdo 'grel): ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang/ the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag cig car spangs te 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong/ /de na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsung
326b1(mdo 'grel): bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lus sam dag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang/ /sdig pa rnams gsum nam yang mi byed la/ /glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed cing/ /de ltar de la lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog/
326b2(mdo 'grel): tu gsung/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po rab bcugs pa/ /phyogs bcu'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yis/ /gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /de la
326b3(mdo 'grel): na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsung/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/ /'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam skom zhing/ /lus kyang sbyin pa yid las byas pas ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa
326b4(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang mi ldan 'gyur/ /nges na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsung/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar ? rlung gis rab gtor la/ /lag du blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar de kun sbyor ba rab btang pa'i/ /sangs rgyas
326b5(mdo 'grel): sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsung/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde ? shog sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ston mchog dam pa lta mis
326b6(mdo 'grel): mchod 'os pha/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng ring bde legs shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal dang 'dir bde
326b7(mdo 'grel): legs shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur ci ? tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dag 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni
327a1(mdo 'grel): lhags gyur cig /sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/ skyed dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing/ /nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog/ 'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ shin tu bden pa gsungs zhing rdzun mi dang
327a2(mdo 'grel): bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig/ rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe/ /'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi nas/ /snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su/ /bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang/ /mthu
327a3(mdo 'grel): yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa/ /lha yi snod mchog de dang ni/ /bdud rtsa 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur ba/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma
327a4(mdo 'grel): yi lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/ /blangs nas ston la ra phul ba/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag giS/ nad pa rnams kyi nad sel cing/ /nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa/ /sman rnams bdun rtsir gyur par
327a5(mdo 'grel): shog/ sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi? brjid dang/ /gtsug phud can gyi stobs rnams dang/ /thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang/ /log dang sel gyi ting 'dzin dang/ /gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang/ /'od srungs kyi ni rdzu 'phrul
327a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /shAkya seng+ge'i mthu rnams kyis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang/ /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang/ /dgra bcom rnams kyi
327a7(mdo 'grel): mthu dag dang/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang/ /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang/ /maung+gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang/ /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ /kau di rgya'i sar thob dang/ /kun
327b1(mdo 'grel): dga' bo yi thos ba dang/ tshangs pa yin byams pa dang/ /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang/ /dbang phyug chen po stobs rnams dang/ /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang/ /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang/ /de dag
327b2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog/ 'phags pa stod chen mo'i rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs so/ //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rnam gziD
327b3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung/ /thams cad skyon pa sA la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jigs shir sha'i drung/ /sangs rgyas gser thub u dam ba ra'i drung/ /'od srungs n+ya grod+ha'i drung na gnas//
327b4(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /mngon par dad pa'i lta gang 'khod pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar
327b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar byas/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde leD
327b6(mdo 'grel): nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing/ khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ de dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra
327b7(mdo 'grel): bcom thams cad zag pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun tu bde legs su gyur cig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang/ /bden tshig rdzogs so// //dge zhing legs par gyur cig/ rgya gar
328a1(mdo 'grel): skad du/ /me gA la gA thA/ khong skad du /bkri shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs ba
328a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nyer bar stan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye
328a3(mdo 'grel): dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyis mchog rab do tsha shes
328a4(mdo 'grel): dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dag ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba bo/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i
328a5(mdo 'grel): bkris gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dag rnams la zhi byed shog/ 'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lha yi bskor pa'i
328a6(mdo 'grel): bkris gang 'byung ba/ /bkris des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum ba'i tshal/ /lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bstams pa la/ /srid pa mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang
328a7(mdo 'grel): byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhums nas bstams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba
328b1(mdo 'grel): yi bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la ni zhi byed shog/ grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags ba che ba'i lha yi mngon bstod de/ /bsam yas dge sgrub bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des
328b2(mdo 'grel): ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ gyis shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang/ /bkris des ni skye dgu
328b3(mdo 'grel): rnams la zhi byed shog/ rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing/ /kheDUrya ltar sngo ba'i rtsa ba ting ster bzhugs te/ /skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/
328b4(mdo 'grel): chu bo'i 'gram na rtsa shi'i phreng gis yongs bskor pa/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba'i sred pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byos pa yi bkra shis bar/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ shing rgyal drung gshegs
328b5(mdo 'grel): byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul ste sa ster dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang 'byung ba/ /bkris des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sdug bsngal mdza' dag gzhig phyir rdo
328b6(mdo 'grel): rje'i gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnams btul ba/ /ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ /grong khyer ba ran ser drang srong mchog /
328b7(mdo 'grel): bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bsten ba yi bkra shis gang/ /lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkris des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bkris gang zhig phan byed dam pa gang byed pa// bsod nams
329a1(mdo 'grel): bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng+ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mu stegs byed pa rnams kyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang/ /'grol bde ba bskyed phyir chos ? dam
329a2(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ te bar ston pa'i rgyal ba'i bkris gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ 'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs
329a3(mdo 'grel): pas yongs su bskor pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /mnar dpa' i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon
329a4(mdo 'grel): par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lha dbang klu dar mi yis dbang pos phyag byas pa/ /mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri ba'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
329a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcang pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar
329a6(mdo 'grel): gyi ma/ bar po ji na mi tra dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ra rna stri gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon
329a7(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med/ /chos rje nyid ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdung dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshon bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden
329b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos mchog bla na med/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin brlabs gyis/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel pa/ /tag tu dang la gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin
329b2(mdo 'grel): brlabs kyis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung pa'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin
329b3(mdo 'grel): 'grub pa dang/ /tshe rings nad med bde skyed ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcang pa// //bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin na mi tra dang// /
329b4(mdo 'grel): zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmi ngan 'jigs dang sdig pa
329b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /tshe dang 'byor dang stobs dang bde pa rnam 'phel byed/ /khyed kyi bkra shis thams cad sgrub par byed 'di dag/ rab tu brjod gyis de phyir mi rnams bsgrims te nyon/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa dad pa 'dab 'dra'i sbyan mnga' 
329b6(mdo 'grel): ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu dang/ /chos dang dge 'dun lta dang lha min gyis bstod pa/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /bdud stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /rnam
329b7(mdo 'grel): snang mdzad dang thams cad skyob dang rnam par gzigs/ /kun tu mchod cing rgyas 'gyur ba gzi brjid mchog/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang shAkya thub pa thub chen dang/ /ye shes dbang phyug
330a1(mdo 'grel): skan lags pa dang zla zhal dang/ /'brug gi sgra dang rnga sgra lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'od zer rgyal mtshan dang ni gser thub 'od srungs dang/ /mar me mdzad pa shin tu brjid ? shin?
330a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /'dren pa gtsug tor can dang 'od tog dpag med 'ong/ /bkra shis rnam par sbel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /pad+ma mdzes dang ye shes stobs dang zla 'ong dang/ /nyi ma'i zhel dang dgra las rgyal dang rgyal bstams dang/ /yon tan
330a3(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid 'jig rten gtso/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /mi 'khrugs pa ni rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa dang/ /'dren pa mchog sbyin rin chen tog tu bcas pa dang/ /rnam par sbel dang
330a4(mdo 'grel): lag na rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog/ bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug rtag tu rgyal dbang gtsug tor can/ /ston zla dri med lta bur zhal ras mdzes pa dang/ /nam mkha' i snying po dang ni sa
330a5(mdo 'grel): yi snying po dag /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'jam dpal gtsug phud shin tu mdzes par rab brgyan cing/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan pa dang/ /rtag tu rgyal bar dga' ba lag na
330a6(mdo 'grel): rdo rje dpal/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /byams pa shin tu rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mnga' pa/ /lcang lo'i 'khril mnga' mchod rten gtsug tor gnas ba dang/ /kun tu bzang dang nor bzang dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin//
330a7(mdo 'grel): bkra shis rnam par spel byir rtag tu dran par byed/ /skul byed ma dang sgrol ma khro gnyer 'gro phan dang/ /de bzhin shes rab la sogs pha rol phyin drug dang/ /rma bya dang ni 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub bcas/ /bkra shis rnam par
330b1(mdo 'grel): spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /gtsug tor las byung gsang sngags ? 'dzin bcas pa dang/ /phyir ldog ma dang/ /bsil pa'i tshal na rgyal las 'khrungs/ /lha mo ri khrod lo ma can par bcas pa rnams/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par
330b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /don yod grub dang stod chen rab tu 'joms pa dang/ /glengS? khyer ba ra NA si zhes byar grags pa dang/ /bad sa'i snying po gcig dang gu sha'i kyang ldan pa/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang ni gtsug
330b3(mdo 'grel): 'phyang 'od po che/ /de bzhin bgegs 'joms 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang/ /zla 'od de yang gzhon nu'i gzugs gang ldan pa ni/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /gshin rje gshed po 'jig
330b4(mdo 'grel): kun rab tu 'joms mdzad dang/ /pad+ma mthar byed gnod mdzes de bzhin 'khor lo can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dbyug ldan bsnams par mdzad pa dang/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'phags pa mi g.yo bgegs rigs rab tu
330b5(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa dang/ /phun sum tshogs byed rmugs 'dzin ud dpal mdog can dang/ /glang chen ko rlon stag lpags dag gi rgyan gyur pa/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang mong+ga la 'os srungs dang/ /nor bu
330b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang ma 'gags nye bar 'khor dang bcas/ /rab 'byor dang ni lus 'phags ri bo kun dga' o/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /stobs chen bgegs kyi rigs ni rab tu 'joms pa dang/ /'od zer ldan dang cha byad rab tu
330b7(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa dang/ /dug sbel sbrul gdug rgyags pa rab tu 'jig byed pa/ /bkra shis rnam par sel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'phrog ma rnam pa sna tshogs g.yo 'gul pa/ /bu pho lnga brgya dag gis brgyan par gyur de dang/ /gnod sbyin bdag po lngas
331a1(mdo 'grel): rtsen dang ni pad+ma'i mgo/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /ta la ta la sems can kun la phan mdzad dang/ /rin chen sgron mar grags dang nor gyi rgyun mchog dang/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rnam thos sras po dpal thob pa/
331a2(mdo 'grel): bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /thams cad sgron pa sbyin phod dam pa gzi chen dang/ /byams pa'i stobs ni stong pa'i stobs chen ldan pa dang/ /sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i bu ni gang yin pa/ /bkris rnam par spel phyir rtag tu
331a3(mdo 'grel): dran par byed/ /rab tu dga' ba la sogs sa bcu de dag dang/ /dpa' bas phyin pa de dang gtsug na nor bu dang/ /rgyal po dam pa zas gtsang dang ni ka yin/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /lum bi'i tshil ni bud ba mar
331a4(mdo 'grel): po phung lding dang me tog 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /rma bya dang ni khu byug po mo sgra 'byin pa/ /bkra shis so rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /btsun mo sgyu 'phrul dang ni de bzhin gau ta mi/ /shAkya'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul
331a5(mdo 'grel): chen mo grags 'dzin dang/ /ne raM? dza na bsod nams ldan pa 'bab chur bcas/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma bud dang khyus lding dang/ /'jam dpal ud pa la sngon po yid du 'ong
331a6(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /mgon po byams pa yid ni klu shing me tog bsnams/ /bkris rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /rnam snang mdzad pa lta bu'i 'khor lo dang/ /dpal thob rin chen nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang/ /mgon po 'od
331a7(mdo 'grel): dpag med pa'i pad+ma dam pa mchog/ bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /don yod grub pas legs bsnams mchog dang ni/ /mi bskyo rdo rje nyid dang gzhan yang ni/ /bskyob pa thams cad kyi ni phyag mtshan ma
331b1(mdo 'grel): lus pa/ /bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bcas pa dang/ /dpag bsam gyi ni shing dang bum pa bzang po dang/ /rgyal ba kun gyis nges par bsten pa'i byang chub shing/ /bkris rnam par spel?
331b2(mdo 'grel): phyir rtag tu dran par byed/ /lam 'jug dus dang nor dang 'bru rnams bdud pa dang/ /nad bar dus sam yang na zhi ba'i las tshe 'am/ /dga' ston kun na 'dug dang dgos pa sgrub pa na/ /ming mtshan 'di dag mi yid rab tu bsgrims te gdon/ /rgyal ba dag
331b3(mdo 'grel): dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi mtshan 'di ma lus pa/ /lha la gus shing nyin gcig bzhin du nad bar sus brjod pa/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba'i dogs dang bral zhing bde ba dang/ /dpal dang ldan zhing nad kun 'jom la nor bar ldan par 'gyur/ /bkra
331b4(mdo 'grel): shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande ye shes sdes sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi
331b5(mdo 'grel): bkra shis gar?/ /tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs 'di gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khra'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shar shi yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /dang 'dir
331b6(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bder gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/ /tshe lo bdun khri'i dus nas su ba'i grong khyer du/ /shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir
331b7(mdo 'grel): bdir gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob ba rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ /shing mchog sA la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'diryA? gshegs
332a1(mdo 'grel): bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor pa 'jig ni bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /sha ri sha li shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ded 'dir bder gshegs
332a2(mdo 'grel): bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram za ri rigs/ /tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /u dum pa ra'i shing drung mngon pa sangs rgyas nas/ /deng 'dir bder gshegs bkris na
332a3(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na ba ra NA si ru/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bder gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig 'gro
332a4(mdo 'grel): mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs btson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shAN+ThA? yi shid drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bder gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ /sangs rgyas
332a5(mdo 'grel): rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang/ /phyogs dus kun gyi bder gshegs byin rlabs rmad byung ba/ /chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba/ /deng 'dir bder gshegs bkra shis phun sum
332a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /tri ratna na maM gA lA gA tha khong skad du/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog
332a7(mdo 'grel): gsum la phyag 'tshal/ /rgya mtsho lta bur rgyal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka' ma lus rdzogs/ /'gro ba ma lus gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs/ /dkris dam
332b1(mdo 'grel): pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lnga brgyad srings te/ /dad dang brtson bkrus lhur len grags mchog byang chub sems/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir
332b2(mdo 'grel): bde legs shog/ skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mdza' dag spangs/ /ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog/ /dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyis bde sgrub chos/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde
332b3(mdo 'grel): legs? shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad cig? ? ti spa sti? gA tha/ /bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyis tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la
332b4(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bder gshegs rgyal ba gang gi mthu nyid kyis/ /legs pa'i 'khor los sgyur rgyal las 'byed ba'o/ /sku gsum mngon par mtho ba'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang ded 'dir bde legs shog/ /zhi ba chags med
332b5(mdo 'grel): dam chos nor bu 'dra/ /legs par bshad pa las byung bkra shis/ /bdud rtsis lta bur gsungs pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog/ thugs rje che la mngon byung byang chub sems/ /mngon par/
332b6(mdo 'grel): mtho ba'i 'khor ba'i sa rab rnon/ /stobs ldan dge 'dun dag gis bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
332b7(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ra rna tri swasti gA thA/ /bod skad du/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' ba/ /che dgus mchod cing smon
333a1(mdo 'grel): lam sprin tshogs 'dus/ /go 'phangs mchog brnyes bstod pa'i char bab pa'i? bkra shis dam pa dang 'dir bde legs shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' ba/ /shin tu lan dang bde ba des gsungs pa//
333a2(mdo 'grel): 'khor brtag bde mya ngan med thob pa'i/ /bkra shis dam pa deng 'dir bde legs shog/ dge 'dun che la mthu dpal rmad mnga' ba/ /bslob gzhi legs bcad brtson pa'i sbyor ba can/ /bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs
333a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /bkra shis dam pa des ji bde legs shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal la'o/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku?  mdog gser 'drag
333a4(mdo 'grel): shes rab rtags ral gri po ti phyag na bsnams/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa /bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bad lags shag/ thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'di dags
333a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ skyod gyi mgos phyag na rdo rje bnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa nges kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags sku mdog 'di dag sngo/ /thabs
333a6(mdo 'grel): dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog/ rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs so// //
333a7(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku/ /bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ bkra shis dam pa des
333b1(mdo 'grel): ni dang 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang/ /bder gshegs ma gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog/ /bcom ldan
333b2(mdo 'grel): ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/ /bder gshegs thugs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ bkra shis dam pa des ni dang 'dir bde legs shog/ rigs gsum gyi bkris kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
333b3(mdo 'grel): ltar ni skron ma bzhugs so// //gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thus dang ye nas mnyam/ /rig dang gti mug sgyu ma'i khyad par las/ /srid dang rnam grol rgyu dang 'bras bur snang/ /dngos po med phyir dngos
333b4(mdo 'grel): por rtogs pa'ang med/ /chos can ma rim gis chos nyid yod ma yin/ /zhes pa zlog phyir rkyan bshad ma gtogs pa/ /chos kyi dang la tshig mas brjod du med/ /snang ba nyid na med pa'i smin rgyus/ /shes ldan rnams mi med pa'i blo mi
333b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /chos rnams rang bzhin ma skyes rtogs pa byes/ /mkhas pas skye mar stang par sgro mi 'dogs/ /ji bzhin ma skyes gdong nas zhi ba yi/ /gnyis med spros bral rang rig blo ldan pa/ /brjod med dang ? du yang mi
333b6(mdo 'grel): gnas na/ /dngos dang tha snyad 'dzin par gal? 'gyur/ /bdag med chos sku byang chub snying po bas/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing thob pa ma yin yang/ /rmi lam sad nas gzugs dang bral ba bzhin/ /sgrib spangs byang chub thob ces
333b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal bas gsungs/ /rmi lam skyes bus dug 'thungs ji bzhin du/ /srid rgyu nyon mongs las rnams de ltar shes// rmi lam dug nang sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ /skye rgad 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin/ /rmi lam nad sel sman drangs?
334a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba ni/ /'phags lam rnam thar mang por rig par bya/ /sdug bsngal khad kyis 'byang ba'i skad cig ma// shes rab ting 'dzin khyad par skye ba'i tshul/ /rmi lam nang bsal sos pa'i bde rnyed pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin
334a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub thob pa'i dpe/ /rmi lam nyid na rgyu 'bras rmi bslu bzhin/ /ma rig gnyid log rnams la de ltar nges/ /rmongs pa'i gnyid sad shes rab ldan pa dang/ /'khor ba rmi lam lta bu'i dbang tsam du//
334a3(mdo 'grel): 'phags lam don brtson 'bras bu rig par gsal/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur thob pa'i rlom sems med/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid blo dang ma mnyam na/ /tshig gi mnyam pas rtog pa'i klung mi bzlog /dmyal
334a4(mdo 'grel): sogs 'khor ba mnyam las ma g.yos kyang/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad srid las 'khyam par snang/ /ye nas rnam dag thob pa med rig nas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor rab brtson zhing//
334a5(mdo 'grel): sku gsung che ba'i yon tan kun bsdus pas/ /mtshan ma'i nyes dang ldan pa ga la yin/ /shes rab mchog gis log rtog sems sbyangs nas/ /ye she tshogs chen rgyal ba chos kyi sku/
334a6(mdo 'grel): dpe byad mtshan gyis ting 'dzin dbang thob nas / bsod nams tshogs chen rgyal ba gzugs kyi sku /rnam smin tshul gyis grub par mi blta zhing / ye shes gzhan nas thob par
334a7(mdo 'grel): mi byed de/ /sku gsum ji bzhin sbyor bas 'bras bu'i mchog /rtsol byas sgrub pa'i dbang gis rgyu yang yin/ rang sems rnal 'byor shes rab ting 'dzin yin/ /sems can
334b1(mdo 'grel): nyid na bde gshegs yul la 'jug/ /dag pa'i zhing du smin par mi byed de/ /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su bsgom/ shes rab gnas med chags pa'i rdul bral yang/ /snying rje sems can khams
334b2(mdo 'grel): la skyob med / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma 'gags mngon sum te/ mtshan med ro gcig don dam dbyings su rtogs / slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyi mdzad pa lta ba rin po che sgron ma
334b3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// //bkra shis// mang+gal laM// //sta tha yang dag sgron ma bzhugs so// //dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i 'od stong gis/ /shin
334b4(mdo 'grel): tu 'bar ba'i zer tsam bdag blo mun par byung/ /dbyangs dang tshigs 'das nas mkha' i mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i/ /rang sems skye med zab mo'i don gyis phyogs tsam snang/ /rang gi rtog pa mkhas pas gsungs pa'i
334b5(mdo 'grel): rnam mang ba/ /rtog gi bdag 'dra'i spyod yul brtsam par mi 'os kyang/ /rig pa'i brjod bya rtsam 'di des don mos rnams kyis/ /chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis dbyad cing goms par bya/ /bskal pa mang por
334b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba rnams la ni/ /dge tsa bskyed cing rang sems sbyangs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor dam pa nges pa'i lung chen la/ /shes rab mchog ldan rig pa'i mos blo gsal/ /rnam par mi rtog don dam rang bzhin
334b7(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /rig pa'i tshul las sems kyis dmigs pa ni/ /lung dang man ngag rig pas thag bcad de/ /chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid ches bya/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du// ming dang tshig gis
335a1(mdo 'grel): brjod par byed mod kyis/ /mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sems kyi yul las 'das/ /ji ltar smig rgyu'i phung po snang ba dag /snang ba nyid na nam mkha' i rang bzhin ltar//
335a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang/ /snang ba nyid ma mtshan med nam mkha' bzhin/ /rgyu che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/ /don dam spros med spros pa kun las 'das/ /bdag dang chos
335a3(mdo 'grel): kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi/ /dbu ma'i don can blo yis go bar byas/ /yang dag don dam gcig cang go nas ni/ /yid med la sogs sems kyi yul 'das shing/ /de dang dogs pa'i mdza' ni rang spangs nas/
335a4(mdo 'grel): col ba med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ye nas ro gcig phyir/ /sgom pa dang ni bsgom bya'ang dmigs su med/ /sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na// chos kyi dbyings nyid
335a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan du bsgom mi dgos/ /rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal dag/ /sed par gyur na rang bzhin mnyam pa ltar/ /rnam par rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ka yang/ /shes pas rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /de ltar dus
335a6(mdo 'grel): gsum rnam par dag pa dang/ /rang bzhin nyid las ma 'das shes na ni/ /sgro 'dogs bus pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs na/ /rang bzhin nyid du yod gis bcos mi dgos/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ /
335a7(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes sems kyis ni/ /ma skyes de nyid sgom par ga la 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dbyer med don/ /rang gi shes na rtsol ba kun sbyangs te
335b1(mdo 'grel): btang snyoms chen por ma bcos dang bzhag na/ /tha snyad tsam duAng bsgom zhes de la bya/ /skyon dang yon tan gnyis po ma skyes phyir/ /rnam par rtogs pa'i mtshan ma ci byung yang/ /ma bkag rang byung ba 'brangs rang zhi ste//
335b2(mdo 'grel): ma brtsis ma byas rang gi dang gis gsal/ /lta ba yang dag sgron ma rdzogs so// //gnyan A tsarya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //mang+gal laM/ /gcig zhus//
335b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' i mun sel sgron ma bzhugs so// //chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste/ /sems las ma gtogs tshes rnams med/ /chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/ /rten 'brel sgyu ma skyo ba med/ /skye ba med ces bstan pa'ang//
335b4(mdo 'grel): dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir te/ /sgyu ma ye nas skye med la/ /skye med gnas gyi snga ma gdags/ /nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes/ /blun po gang zhig rtog par byed/ /mkhas pa sngon nas yang mi 'dzin/ /med par mi rtog tshig mi
335b5(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /sems las ma gtogs chos med phyir/ /bsgom bya'i chos nyid gung ma med/ /sems kyang ye nas ma skyes na/ /sgom pa po'ang gang la yod/ /brjod pa'i rtsa bas sems nyid do/ /ma skyes dngos gzhi nyid min na//
335b6(mdo 'grel): bsgom dang bsgom du med pa yi/ /tha snyad gang zhig gang la 'jug /'go la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chad/ /de ni ma skyes rang mi dmigs// de las gzhan pa'i sems med phyir/ /bcos shing gnas pa gang zhig yod/ /
335b7(mdo 'grel): 'khrul rtog rkyen dang ldan gyi bar/ /smig rgyu bzhin du sems snang na/ /rang bzhin shes pas btsas su med/ /mi shes smig rgyu bcos pa bzhin/ /mi rtog mtshan med sems rnams kyis/ /mtshan ma med la'ang gnas
336a1(mdo 'grel): mi byed/ /mtshan ma med la mi gnas na/ /mtshan mar gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /bsgrub pa med cing gnas pa med/ /'du byed med pa mkha' 'dra bra/ /'du byed las byung bsam gtan skyon/ /ma lus kun gi dgos
336a2(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /ji ltar rtog med zab mo zhig /blo yi yul du snang zhe na/ /mi rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ba/ /myong ba yin phyir de nyid min/ /lta ba dgum chung mdza' mun sel sgon ma/ /bod kyi paN+Di ta A tsarya gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis
336a3(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /mang+ga laM/ //thabs shes sgrol ma bzhugs// //du gsum gyal bas ji ltar thugs chud pa'i/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ma thob thob phyir brtson par mi byed kyang/ /snying rje'i bye brag
336a4(mdo 'grel): thabs kyi spyod pa'ang ston/ /ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon rnam mang yang/ /nam mkha' i dang du ro gcig bye brag med/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs sku rnam mang yang/ /ye shes dbyings su ro gcig bye brag med/ /bde gshegs
336a5(mdo 'grel): snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /yul ring dus nas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems rgyud so sor snang/ /rang bzhin nyid na rgyal ba'i chos skur gcig/ ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ /log
336a6(mdo 'grel): rtog rgyu mar snang ba'i sems can gnyis/ /ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang/ /sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /sems can sangs rgyas bden par tshul gcig cing/ /rang gi sems nyid sangs
336a7(mdo 'grel): rgyas yin shes na/ /gzhan nas bsgrub par bya ba ci yang med/ /de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na/ /ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye/ /snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting
336b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyis/ /phan 'dogs thabs kyis spyod pa cir yang ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ji lta ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gnas med de ltar bsgom/ /thugs rje'i 'bad pa rab 'byams ji lta ba/ /rnal 'byor thabs kyi ting 'dzin
336b2(mdo 'grel): de ltar sprul/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/ /pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs par ldan/ /thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang/ /sgyu ma'i blo ldan rlom sems ci yang med/ /ma skyes sems la
336b3(mdo 'grel): sems can med pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku'i nga rgyal 'chad/ /chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba'i phyir/ /ting 'dzin sgyu mas ci 'dul de ltar ston/ /chos sku mnyam nyid rtogs nas 'gro don du/ /bde gshegs
336b4(mdo 'grel): byin rlabs cing yang ston pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chos sku rig pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /thabs kyi bye brag pa? nas de ltar mdzod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o//
336b5(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs des pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma bzhugs so// //ji bzhin pa yis chos btsan par/ /chos la chos ni mi 'jug ste/ /ji tsam zab pa'i tshig brjod kyang/ /don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems
336b6(mdo 'grel): ni ci la'ang mi gnas dang/ /ci la'ang mi dmigs zhes bya ba/ /sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba'i/ /sems 'dzin phra mo de la yod/ /smig rgyu bzhin du sems med na/ /mi gnas mi dmigs byed pa gang/ /nam mkha' 
336b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i ? ? mig zhes/ /bsgom pa don dang ldan pa yin/ /de bzhin skyil krung drang 'dug dang/ /lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang/ /lus rtog mngon par zhen las byung/ /lus med mkha' la bcos su med/ /sgyu ma bzhin ?
337a1(mdo 'grel): lus shes na/ /drang 'dug skyil drung 'cha' ba med/ spyod lam gsum gyi gnas ba gang/ ched du bya med byed pa'ang med/ lus sems ma skyes bzhi med pa/ /mkha' ltar
337a2(mdo 'grel): bcos pa'i kha na med/ /tshad mar lus sems 'chos byed pa/ /'dzin pa'i phur pa de la yod/ /ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha' ni/ /dmigs dang dmigs med rtsol dang brag/
337a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha' yang/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o/ /lus la sogs kyang de bzhin te/ /rtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang/ /gnas pa med de mi gnas na/ /mi
337a4(mdo 'grel): 'gal tsam du gyur pa yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs rdzogs so// //
337a5(mdo 'grel): man ngag dgu ma chung/ /gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// /bkra shis// //
